question_en: Who is the staff officer responsible for the approval of poultry meat and poultry meat product importation, and what are their contact details?

question_ta: கோழி இறைச்சி மற்றும் கோழி இறைச்சிப் பொருட்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான ஒப்புதலுக்குப் பொறுப்பான அலுவலர் யார், அவர்களின் தொடர்பு விவரங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: கால்நடை அறுவை சிகிச்சை நிபுணர் (கோழி இறைச்சி) டாக்டர். பி.ஐ.பி. பெரேரா பொறுப்பான அலுவலர் ஆவார். அவரது தொடர்பு எண் 0094812388120 எக்ஸ்டென்ஷன் 302, தொலைநகல் 0094812389125 மற்றும் மின்னஞ்சல் daphimport@yahoo.com ஆகும்.
question_si: කුකුළු මස් සහ කුකුළු මස් නිෂ්පාදන ආනයනය සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා දෙන වගකිවයුතු නිලධාරියා කවුද සහ ඔවුන්ගේ සම්බන්ධතා තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: පශු වෛද්‍ය ශල්‍ය වෛද්‍ය (කුකුළු මස්) ආචාර්ය පී.අයි.පී. පෙරේරා මහතා වගකිවයුතු නිලධාරියා වේ. ඔහුගේ සම්බන්ධතා අංකය 0094812388120 දිගුව 302, ෆැක්ස් 0094812389125 සහ විද්‍යුත් තැපෑල daphimport@yahoo.com වේ.

question_ta: உரம் மற்றும் விவசாய தாவரங்களைப் பெறுவதற்கான முதன்மை தொடர்பு நபர் யார், அவர்களின் தொடர்பு விவரங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: உரம் மற்றும் விவசாய தாவரங்களைப் பெறுவதற்கான முதன்மை தொடர்பு நபர் தேசிய கால்நடை அபிவிருத்தி சபையின் பொது மேலாளர் திரு. டி. எச். வி. பெரேரா ஆவார். அவரை தொலைபேசி எண் +94-11-2502693 அல்லது மின்னஞ்சல் nidbqm@sltnet.lk மூலம் தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: කොම්පෝස්ට් සහ කෘෂිකාර්මික ශාක ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ප්‍රධාන සම්බන්ධීකරණ නිලධාරියා කවුද සහ ඔවුන්ගේ සම්බන්ධතා තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: කොම්පෝස්ට් සහ කෘෂිකාර්මික ශාක ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ප්‍රධාන සම්බන්ධීකරණ නිලධාරියා වන්නේ ජාතික පශු සම්පත් සංවර්ධන මණ්ඩලයේ සාමාන්‍යාධිකාරී ඩී. එච්. වී. පෙරේරා මහතාය. ඔහුව දුරකථන අංකය +94-11-2502693 හෝ විද්‍යුත් තැපෑල nidbqm@sltnet.lk හරහා සම්බන්ධ කර ගත හැකිය.

context:
Service: Registration of Manufacturers of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Approval & Registration
Topic: Additional Notes and Timeline
---
Note 1: If the inspector does not indicate approval in the workshop report, the Department would inform the Manufacturer the reason for disapproval and would advise the applicant on making amendments after which he/she could reapply. Note 2: If the Department disapproves the Pattern, a discussion between the Director and the party concerned will be held regarding making amendments to the instrument and would enable reapplication after the required changes are done. Note 3: If any amendments are made to a Pattern approved measuring instrument, the Manufacturer must obtain a new Registration Certificate from the Department. Timeline

Process Time Line : 3 – 6 months

Submission Timeline : Obtaining Application Form Submit Application Form:

Working days – Monday to Friday Counter open hours – 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays Validity Timeline : Valid only for a period of one year after which the license must be renewed. Only the stamp fee should be paid.
question_en: What is the validity period of the license for the registration of manufacturers, and what is required for its renewal?
answer_en: The license is valid for a period of one year. After this period, it must be renewed, and only the stamp fee should be paid.
question_ta: உற்பத்தியாளர்களின் பதிவிற்கான உரிமத்தின் செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் என்ன, அதன் புதுப்பித்தலுக்கு என்ன தேவை?
answer_ta: உரிமம் ஒரு வருட காலத்திற்கு மட்டுமே செல்லுபடியாகும். இந்தக் காலத்திற்குப் பிறகு, உரிமம் புதுப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும், மேலும் முத்திரைக் கட்டணம் மட்டுமே செலுத்தப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: නිෂ්පාදකයින් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ බලපත්‍රයේ වලංගු කාලය කොපමණද, එය අලුත් කිරීම සඳහා අවශ්‍ය වන්නේ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: බලපත්‍රය වසරක කාලයක් සඳහා පමණක් වලංගු වේ. මෙම කාලයෙන් පසු, බලපත්‍රය අලුත් කළ යුතු අතර, මුද්දර ගාස්තුව පමණක් ගෙවිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: SCPPC-Seed Certification: Registration of seed production crops and certification of produced seeds
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Eligibility and Registration Procedure (Part 2)
---
After harvesting, a sample will be drawn for quality testing at a seed testing laboratory of SCS. Only approved seed lots are released as certified seeds with relevant SCS certified labels.

Basic requirements needed (i) minimum extent (1acer for paddy, 1 acre for potato, acre for Field crops, acre for vegetables) (ii) proof of origin (original label of basic seed lot) (iii) healthy crop conditions and isolated distance from other varieties and true varietal characters (iv) for potato: last 2 year should be free from any cultivation of solanesae family crop such as tomato, brinjal, chilli; submit information on variety, seed class, basic seeds and sketch of the land with boundaries; land elevation should be about 4500 feet from sea level and less than 40% land slop
question_en: What are the specific land requirements for potato cultivation to be eligible for seed certification, particularly regarding previous crops, land elevation, and slope?
answer_en: For potato cultivation to be eligible for seed certification, the land must have been free from any cultivation of solanaceae family crops such as tomato, brinjal, or chilli for the last two years. Additionally, the land elevation should be approximately 4500 feet from sea level, and its slope should be less than 40%.
question_ta: விதைச் சான்றிதழுக்குத் தகுதியான உருளைக்கிழங்கு சாகுபடிக்கு, முந்தைய பயிர்கள், கடல் மட்டத்திலிருந்து நிலத்தின் உயரம் மற்றும் சரிவு தொடர்பாக உள்ள குறிப்பிட்ட நிலத் தேவைகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: விதைச் சான்றிதழுக்குத் தகுதியான உருளைக்கிழங்கு சாகுபடிக்கு, நிலம் கடந்த இரண்டு ஆண்டுகளாக தக்காளி, கத்தரி அல்லது மிளகாய் போன்ற சொலானேசியே குடும்பப் பயிர்கள் பயிரிடப்பட்டிருக்கக் கூடாது. மேலும், நிலத்தின் உயரம் கடல் மட்டத்திலிருந்து சுமார் 4500 அடியாகவும், நிலச் சரிவு 40% க்கும் குறைவாகவும் இருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: බීජ සහතික කිරීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට අර්තාපල් වගාවට, පෙර වගා කළ බෝග, මුහුදු මට්ටමේ සිට උස සහ බිම් බෑවුම සම්බන්ධයෙන් අවශ්‍ය වන නිශ්චිත ඉඩම් අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: බීජ සහතික කිරීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට අර්තාපල් වගා කරන ඉඩම පසුගිය වසර දෙක තුළ තක්කාලි, වම්බටු හෝ මිරිස් වැනි සොලනේසියේ කුලයට අයත් කිසිදු බෝග වගාවකින් තොර විය යුතුය. ඊට අමතරව, ඉඩමේ උස මුහුදු මට්ටමේ සිට අඩි 4500 ක් පමණ විය යුතු අතර, එහි බෑවුම 40% ට වඩා අඩු විය යුතුය.

question_ta: அம்பாறை அන්තர் மாகாண விவசாய விரிவாக்க சேவைகளுக்கான தொடர்பு முகவரி மற்றும் தொலைபேசி எண் என்ன?
answer_ta: தொடர்பு முகவரி பிரதிப் பணிப்பாளர் (விவசாய விரிவாக்கம்) அலுவலகம், விவசாயத் திணைக்களம், அம்பாறை ஆகும், மேலும் தொலைபேசி எண் 063-222066 ஆகும்.
question_si: අම්පාර අන්තර් පළාත් කෘෂිකාර්මික ව්‍යාප්ති සේවා සඳහා සම්බන්ධ කරගත හැකි ලිපිනය සහ දුරකථන අංකය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: සම්බන්ධ කරගත හැකි ලිපිනය නියෝජ්‍ය අධ්‍යක්ෂ (ව්‍යාප්ති) කාර්යාලය, කෘෂිකර්ම දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව, අම්පාර වන අතර, දුරකථන අංකය 063-222066 වේ.

context:

Eligibility Process of submitting applications. (Places from where applications can be obtained, Place, Counter and time at which applications should be submitted.) Places from where applications can be obtained. Treatment Technology Division National Plant Quarantine Service Canada Friendship Mawatha Katunayake. question_en: What is the fee for a single fumigation service?
answer_en: The fee for a single fumigation service is Rs. 100.00/-.

answer_ta: ஒரு புகையூட்டல் சேவைக்கான கட்டணம் ரூ. 100.00/- ஆகும்.
question_si: තනි දුම් ගැසීමේ සේවාව සඳහා අය කරන ගාස්තුව කොපමණද?
answer_si: තනි දුම් ගැසීමේ සේවාව සඳහා අය කරන ගාස්තුව රුපියල් 100.00/- කි.

question_ta: ஒரு விவசாயிக்கு பழப் பயிர்ச்செய்கை தொடர்பான ஆலோசனை சேவைகள் தேவைப்பட்டால், HORDI இல் எந்தப் பிரிவை அணுக வேண்டும், மற்றும் நியமிக்கப்பட்ட தொடர்பு அதிகாரி யார்?
answer_ta: பழப் பயிர்ச்செய்கை தொடர்பான ஆலோசனை சேவைகளுக்கு, விவசாயிகள் HORDI இன் பழப் பிரிவை அணுக வேண்டும், மேலும் நியமிக்கப்பட்ட தொடர்பு அதிகாரி பழப் பிரிவின் தலைவர்/ஆராய்ச்சி அதிகாரி ஆவார்.
question_si: ගොවියෙකුට පළතුරු වගාවන් සඳහා උපදේශන සේවා අවශ්‍ය නම්, HORDI හි කුමන අංශය හා සම්බන්ධ විය යුතුද, සහ නම් කරන ලද සම්බන්ධීකරණ නිලධාරී කවුද?
answer_si: පළතුරු වගාවන් සම්බන්ධ උපදේශන සේවා සඳහා, ගොවීන් HORDI හි පළතුරු අංශය හා සම්බන්ධ විය යුතු අතර, නම් කරන ලද සම්බන්ධීකරණ නිලධාරී වන්නේ පළතුරු අංශයේ ප්‍රධානියා/පර්යේෂණ නිලධාරී ය.

context:
Service: SCPPC-Plant Quarantine: Issuing phytosanitary certificate on agricultural commodities
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Eligibility and Application Procedure for Phytosanitary Certificate
---
Eligibility

Any person

Procedure of applying Application can obtain from Plant Quarantine Station at the airport, National plant Quarantine Station, Katunayake and submit to the station. The items should be free from any pest and diseases.

Time of submission the applications any time (during 24 hours)

Fees for application Free of charge

Fees for obtaining the service Rs 162/= per certificate (including Inspection fee Rs.150/=)

Time taken to provide the service 30 minutes maximum (Depend on the type and amount of consignment)

Documents needed Export/ Import permit and fulfill the conditions requested, Test reports if necessary, no objection letter if necessary
question_en: What are the fees for obtaining a phytosanitary certificate and how long does it take to provide this service?
answer_en: The fee for obtaining the service is Rs 162/= per certificate, which includes an inspection fee of Rs.150/=. The time taken to provide the service is a maximum of 30 minutes, depending on the type and amount of the consignment.
question_ta: தாவர சுகாதார சான்றிதழ் பெறுவதற்கான கட்டணங்கள் யாவை மற்றும் இந்த சேவையை வழங்குவதற்கு எவ்வளவு நேரம் ஆகும்?
answer_ta: சேவை பெறுவதற்கான கட்டணம் ஒரு சான்றிதழுக்கு ரூ.162/= ஆகும், இதில் ஆய்வு கட்டணம் ரூ.150/= அடங்கும். சேவையை வழங்குவதற்கான அதிகபட்ச நேரம் 30 நிமிடங்கள் ஆகும், இது சரக்கின் வகை மற்றும் அளவைப் பொறுத்தது.
question_si: ශාක සෞඛ්‍ය සහතිකයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා වන ගාස්තු මොනවාද සහ මෙම සේවාව සැපයීමට කොපමණ කාලයක් ගතවේද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා සහතිකයක් සඳහා රු. 162/= ක ගාස්තුවක් අය කෙරේ, එයට පරීක්ෂණ ගාස්තුව වන රු. 150/= ඇතුළත් වේ. සේවාව සැපයීමට ගතවන කාලය උපරිම මිනිත්තු 30 කි, එය භාණ්ඩ තොගයේ වර්ගය සහ ප්‍රමාණය මත රඳා පවතී.

context:
Service: Registration of Sellers of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Approval & Registration
Topic: Eligibility and Submission Procedure for Business Establishment Registration
---
Eligibility

Must be registered as a Business Establishment.

Note: A person or an institution holding a Certificate of Registration for the sale of authorized weights, measures or weighing or measuring instruments shall sell or possess for sale only after the weights, measures or weighing or measuring instruments are stamped by an Inspector. The verification certificate issued by the Inspector shall be issued to the purchaser.

Submission Procedure

Obtain an Application Form

The applicant would receive the Application Form after the Department receives the letter of request. The applicant could also physically come to the Department and request for an application form.

Support Documents required Copy of Business Registration Certificate

Hand over Application Form The applicant is able to send the filled Application Form by post or by physically visiting the Department.

Working Days : Monday to Friday

Working Hours : 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays : All Public and Mercantile holidays
question_en: What is the main eligibility requirement to register as a seller of weights, measures, and weighing or measuring instruments?
answer_en: To be eligible for this service, one must be registered as a Business Establishment.
question_ta: எடைகள், அளவைகள் மற்றும் எடை அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகளை விற்பனை செய்பவராகப் பதிவு செய்யத் தேவையான முக்கிய தகுதி என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவைக்குத் தகுதி பெறுவதற்கு, ஒருவர் ஒரு வணிக நிறுவனமாகப் பதிவு செய்யப்பட்டிருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ කිරුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ විකුණන්නෙකු ලෙස ලියාපදිංචි වීමට ඇති ප්‍රධාන සුදුසුකම කුමක්ද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට නම්, ව්‍යාපාරික ආයතනයක් ලෙස ලියාපදිංචි වී තිබිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Agricultural Education for Public Officers
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Training & Extension Services
Topic: Central Scholarships for Public Officers in Agriculture (Part 2)
---
Agricultural Schools where the Courses are conducted and the language Media Places i. Kundasale Sinhala, Tamil, English ii. Angunakolapelessa Sinhala only iii. Pelwehera Sinhala only iv. Vavuniya Tamil only Eligibility a) G.C.E. (O/L) with 06 subjects in not more than two sittings compulsorily with credit passes for the tree core subjects Sinhala / Tamil anguage, Mathematics and Science and also with credit passes for at least one of the two subjects Social Studies and Agriculture (thus having a total of 04 credits in all) At least passes in 05 of the above subjects and 03 credits should have been obtained in one sitting. b) Candidates who wish to follow the course in the English medium should have a credit pass for English language at the G.C.E.(O/L) Examination. ii. Age Shall be less than 45 years as on the date mentioned in the notification calling for tenders. iii. Shall hold a permanent appointment in the Public Service duty confirmed in the appointment as on the date mentioned in the notification calling for applications.
question_en: What are the agricultural schools where courses for public officers are conducted, and what language media are available at each location?
answer_en: The agricultural schools where courses are conducted are Kundasale (Sinhala, Tamil, English), Angunakolapelessa (Sinhala only), Pelwehera (Sinhala only), and Vavuniya (Tamil only).
question_ta: பொது அதிகாரிகளுக்கான படிப்புகள் நடத்தப்படும் விவசாயப் பாடசாலைகள் யாவை, மற்றும் ஒவ்வொரு இடத்திலும் எந்த மொழி ஊடகங்கள் கிடைக்கின்றன?
answer_ta: பொது அதிகாரிகளுக்கான படிப்புகள் நடத்தப்படும் விவசாயப் பாடசாலைகள் குண்டசாலை (சிங்களம், தமிழ், ஆங்கிலம்), அங்குனுகொலபெலஸ்ஸ (சிங்களம் மட்டும்), பெல்வெஹெர (சிங்களம் மட்டும்) மற்றும் வவுனியா (தமிழ் மட்டும்) ஆகும்.
question_si: රාජ්‍ය නිලධාරීන් සඳහා පාඨමාලා පවත්වන කෘෂිකාර්මික විද්‍යාල මොනවාද සහ එක් එක් ස්ථානයේ ලබා ගත හැකි භාෂා මාධ්‍යයන් මොනවාද?
answer_si: පාඨමාලා පවත්වන කෘෂිකාර්මික විද්‍යාල වන්නේ කුණ්ඩසාලේ (සිංහල, දෙමළ, ඉංග්‍රීසි), අංගුණකොලපැලැස්ස (සිංහල පමණක්), පෙල්වෙහෙර (සිංහල පමණක්) සහ වවුනියාව (දෙමළ පමණක්) ය.

context:

answer_en: One can apply by submitting a written request to the Director General, Deputy Director (Technical) or to the Assistant Director (ISTC). Requests can also be made to the Director General or Assistant Director (ISTC) through district Assistant Directors.
question_ta: EAC தொடர்பான சேவைக்காலப் பயிற்சிக்கு எவ்வாறு விண்ணப்பிப்பது?
answer_ta: பணிப்பாளர் நாயகம், பிரதிப் பணிப்பாளர் (தொழில்நுட்பம்) அல்லது உதவிப் பணிப்பாளர் (ISTC) ஆகியோருக்கு எழுத்து மூலமான கோரிக்கையைச் சமர்ப்பிப்பதன் மூலம் விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம். மாவட்ட உதவிப் பணிப்பாளர்கள் ஊடாகவும் பணிப்பாளர் நாயகம் அல்லது உதவிப் பணிப்பாளர் (ISTC) இற்கு கோரிக்கைகளை சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம்.
question_si: EAC සේවාස්ථ පුහුණුව සඳහා අයදුම් කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer_si: අධ්‍යක්ෂ ජනරාල්, නියෝජ්‍ය අධ්‍යක්ෂ (තාක්ෂණික) හෝ සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂ (ISTC) වෙත ලිඛිත ඉල්ලීමක් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමෙන් අයදුම් කළ හැකිය. දිස්ත්‍රික් සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂවරුන් හරහා අධ්‍යක්ෂ ජනරාල්ට හෝ සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂ (ISTC) ටද ඉල්ලීම් ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකිය.

context:
Service: Registration of Manufacturers of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Approval & Registration
Topic: Submission Procedure and Working Hours
---
Working Days :- Monday to Friday

Working Hours :- 8.30 am to 4.15 pm

Holidays :- All Public and Mercantile holidays

Step-by-Step Procedure: Step 1: Manufacturer sends a request letter to the Department stating what is being manufactured and the Company/Manufacturer name. Step 2: A field visit is then done by the District Inspector who prepares a workshop report. District Inspector conducts a field inspection and prepares the Workshop Report. Step 3: Inspector forwards workshop report to the Department Step 4: If the Inspector has approved the workshop report the Department informs the manufacturer via letter to bring the sample. Step 5: The Manufactures brings the sample and it is checked by the Department. Step 6: Once the Pattern is approved, the Department sends the Application Form to the Manufacturer via mail. Step 7: The Manufacturer then fills the Application Form, pastes the paid stamp and sends it via mail or by physically visiting the Department. Step 8: The Department then Issues the manufacturing certificate.
question_en: What is the step-by-step procedure for the 'Registration of Manufacturers of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments' service?
answer_en:
The procedure involves eight steps:
1. Manufacturer sends a request letter to the Department stating what is being manufactured and the Company/Manufacturer name.
2. A District Inspector conducts a field visit and prepares a workshop report.
3. The Inspector forwards the workshop report to the Department.
4. If the Inspector has approved the workshop report, the Department informs the manufacturer via letter to bring the sample.
5. The Manufacturer brings the sample and it is checked by the Department.
6. Once the Pattern is approved, the Department sends the Application Form to the Manufacturer via mail.
7. The Manufacturer then fills the Application Form, pastes the paid stamp and sends it via mail or by physically visiting the Department.
8. The Department then Issues the manufacturing certificate.
question_ta: எடைகள், அளவைகள் மற்றும் எடையிடும் அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகள் உற்பத்தி செய்பவர்களைப் பதிவு செய்வதற்கான படிமுறைச் செயல்முறை என்ன?
answer_ta:
இந்தச் சேவைக்கான செயல்முறை எட்டு படிகளைக் கொண்டுள்ளது:
1. உற்பத்தியாளர் உற்பத்தி செய்யப்படும் பொருட்கள் மற்றும் நிறுவனம்/உற்பத்தியாளர் பெயர் ஆகியவற்றை குறிப்பிட்டு ஒரு கோரிக்கை கடிதத்தை திணைக்களத்திற்கு அனுப்புவார்.
2. மாவட்ட ஆய்வாளர் கள விஜயம் செய்து பட்டறை அறிக்கை ஒன்றை தயாரிப்பார்.
3. ஆய்வாளர் பட்டறை அறிக்கையை திணைக்களத்திற்கு அனுப்புவார்.
4. ஆய்வாளர் பட்டறை அறிக்கையை அங்கீகரித்தால், மாதிரியைக் கொண்டுவர உற்பத்தியாளருக்கு திணைக்களம் கடிதம் மூலம் அறிவிக்கும்.
5. உற்பத்தியாளர் மாதிரியைக் கொண்டு வருவார், அது திணைக்களத்தால் சரிபார்க்கப்படும்.
6. முறை அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்டதும், திணைக்களம் விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தை அஞ்சல் மூலம் உற்பத்தியாளருக்கு அனுப்பும்.
7. உற்பத்தியாளர் பின்னர் விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தை நிரப்பி, கட்டண முத்திரையை ஒட்டி, அதை அஞ்சல் மூலமாகவோ அல்லது நேரில் திணைக்களத்திற்கு விஜயம் செய்வதன் மூலமாகவோ அனுப்புவார்.
8. அதன் பிறகு திணைக்களம் உற்பத்தி சான்றிதழை வழங்கும்.
question_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ බර කිරන හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ නිෂ්පාදකයින් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා පියවරෙන් පියවර ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය කුමක්ද?
answer_si:
මෙම සේවාව සඳහා වන ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය පියවර අටකින් සමන්විත වේ:
1. නිෂ්පාදකයා නිෂ්පාදනය කරනු ලබන දේ සහ සමාගම/නිෂ්පාදකයාගේ නම සඳහන් කරමින් දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවට ඉල්ලීම් ලිපියක් යවයි.
2. දිස්ත්‍රික් පරීක්ෂකවරයෙකු ක්ෂේත්‍ර චාරිකාවක් සිදුකර වැඩමුළු වාර්තාවක් සකස් කරයි.
3. පරීක්ෂකවරයා වැඩමුළු වාර්තාව දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවට යොමු කරයි.
4. පරීක්ෂකවරයා වැඩමුළු වාර්තාව අනුමත කර ඇත්නම්, සාම්පලයක් ගෙන එන ලෙස දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව ලිපියක් මගින් නිෂ්පාදකයාට දැනුම් දෙයි.
5. නිෂ්පාදකයා සාම්පලය ගෙන එන අතර එය දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව විසින් පරීක්ෂා කරනු ලැබේ.
6. ආකෘතිය අනුමත වූ පසු, දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව අයදුම් පත්‍රය තැපෑලෙන් නිෂ්පාදකයාට යවයි.
7. ඉන්පසුව නිෂ්පාදකයා අයදුම් පත්‍රය පුරවා, ගෙවන ලද මුද්දරය අලවා, එය තැපෑලෙන් හෝ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවට පුද්ගලිකව පැමිණීමෙන් යවයි.
8. ඉන්පසු දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව නිෂ්පාදන සහතිකය නිකුත් කරයි.

question_ta: செல்லப்பிராணிகள் இறக்குமதி சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான நியமிக்கப்பட்ட அலுவலர் யார்?
answer_ta: டாக்டர். கோமதி மகேஸ்வரன், ஒரு கால்நடை அறுவை சிகிச்சை நிபுணர், செல்லப்பிராணிகள் இறக்குமதி சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான அலுவலர் ஆவார்.
question_si: සුරතල් සතුන් ආනයනය කිරීමේ සේවා භාර නිලධාරියා කවුද?
answer_si: පශු වෛද්‍යවරියක වන ආචාර්ය කොමති මහේෂ්වරන් මහත්මිය සුරතල් සතුන් ආනයනය කිරීමේ සේවා භාර නිලධාරිනියයි.

question_ta: 'விவசாயம், கால்நடை வளர்ப்பு மற்றும் மீன்வளம்' என்ற பிரதான பிரிவின் கீழ் வழங்கப்படும் முக்கிய சேவை என்ன? இந்த சேவைக்கு எந்தப் பிரிவின் முக்கிய பணியாளர்கள் பொறுப்பு?
answer_ta: பிரதான சேவை நடுத்தர மற்றும் பெரிய அளவிலான நிலங்களை வணிகப் பண்ணைகளாக மேம்படுத்துவதாகும். விவசாய நிறுவனங்கள் பிரிவின் முக்கிய பணியாளர்கள் இந்த சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பு.
question_si: 'කෘෂිකර්ම, පශු සම්පත් සහ ධීවර' යන ප්‍රධාන කාණ්ඩය යටතේ සපයන ප්‍රධාන සේවාව කුමක්ද? මෙම සේවාවට අදාළ ප්‍රධාන නිලධාරීන් කුමන අංශයට අයත් වේද?
answer_si: ප්‍රධාන සේවාව වන්නේ මධ්‍යම හා මහා පරිමාණ ඉඩම් වාණිජ ගොවිපල ලෙස සංවර්ධනය කිරීමයි. කෘෂි ව්‍යවසාය අංශයේ ප්‍රධාන නිලධාරීන් මෙම සේවාවට අයත් වේ.

question_ta: விவசாயம், கால்நடைகள் மற்றும் மீன்பிடி போன்ற முக்கிய பிரிவின் கீழ் வரும் விவசாயத் துறையில் முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்குப் பொறுப்பான நிறைவேற்று இயக்குநர் யார், அவரது மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரி என்ன?
answer_ta: துறை குழு 01 க்கான நிறைவேற்று இயக்குநர் திரு. துமிந்தா ஆரியசிங்க பொறுப்பாவார். அவரது மின்னஞ்சல் dumindaa@boi.lk ஆகும்.
question_si: කෘෂිකර්ම, පශු සම්පත් සහ ධීවර යන ප්‍රධාන කාණ්ඩය යටතට වැටෙන කෘෂිකාර්මික අංශයේ ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා වගකිව යුතු විධායක අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා කවුද, ඔහුගේ විද්‍යුත් තැපැල් ලිපිනය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: අංශ කණ්ඩායම 01 හි විධායක අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා වන ඩමින්ද ආරියසිංහ මහතා මේ සඳහා වගකිව යුතුය. ඔහුගේ විද්‍යුත් තැපෑල dumindaa@boi.lk වේ.

context:
Service: SCPPC-Seed Certification: Registration of fruit plant nurseries
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Eligibility and Application Procedure for Nursery Registration and Fruit Planting Material Certification
---
Eligibility: Any fruit planting materials producers who needs to register their nurseries as DOA approved nurseries and to certify their fruits planting materials with SCS certified labels

Procedure of submitting application: (i) Applications are available at SCS headquarter and SCS regional offices (application format and the offices list given below). (ii) Completed application should be submitted to the Agriculture Instructor of the Extension service in the area (iii) Field inspection will be done by the AI and it will be forwarded with his recommendations to the DD (SCS) through the Provincial Director of Agriculture or Deputy Director (Extension) in the Inter-provincial areas. (iv) SCS Headquarter officers will visit the nursery for final inspection.

Basic requirements needed for registration: (i) minimum extent 1/8 acre (ii) proof for the ownership (iii) preliminary requirements such as water, transport accessibility, knowledge etc (iv) already started nursery in establishing with at least 500 plants at the inspection (v) availability of registered mother plants or access to bud woods from registered mother plants (vi) registered nurseries should be maintained at least 1000 plants/ year for continuation

Time of submission the request: During office hours

Fees for obtaining the service: for registration Rs 290/= per nursery/ annual for certification labels Rs 1/50 per label per plant

Time taken to provide the service: as per the above process

Place of service given: Seed Certification Service (SCS) PO Box 3, Gannoruwa, Peradeniya TP 081 2388217 email [scsdoa79@yahoo.com](mailto:scs@slt.lk)

Staff officer in charge of the service: Deputy Director (SCS) Dr. Mrs. R. Nanayakkara.
question_en: What are the fees associated with the SCPPC-Seed Certification service for nursery registration and fruit planting material certification?
answer_en: The fees for this service are Rs 290/= per nursery annually for registration, and Rs 1/50 per label per plant for certification labels.
question_ta: SCPPC-விதைப் பதிவுச் சான்றிதழ் சேவையின் கீழ் நாற்றுப்பண்ணை பதிவு மற்றும் பழப் பயிர் நடவுப் பொருட்களுக்கான சான்றிதழ் பெறுவதற்கான கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: இச்சேவைக்கான கட்டணங்கள் நாற்றுப்பண்ணை பதிவு செய்வதற்கு ஆண்டுக்கு ஒரு நாற்றுப்பண்ணைக்கு ரூ 290/= ஆகும். மேலும், சான்றிதழ் லேபிள்களுக்கு ஒரு செடிக்கு ஒரு லேபிளுக்கு ரூ 1/50 ஆகும்.
question_si: SCPPC-බීජ සහතික කිරීමේ සේවාව යටතේ පැල තවාන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සහ පලතුරු පැල තවාන් ද්‍රව්‍ය සහතික කිරීම සඳහා වන ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා, පැල තවාන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා වාර්ෂිකව එක් තවානකට රු 290/= ක් ද, සහතික කිරීමේ ලේබල් සඳහා එක් පැලයකට එක් ලේබලයකට රු 1/50 ක් ද අය කෙරේ.

context:
Service: RRDI-Rice: Providing  field visits and diagnosis of problems of rice cultivation
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Service Information for Rice Growing Farmers
---
To Whom / Beneficiary: All rice growing farmers

How to obtain the service: (i) Inform the currently available problem in the paddy field by a letter or fax or by a telephone call. (ii) Visit the Institute on week days with the sample having the problem

Fees payable to obtain services: Free of charge

Time for submitting request: During office hours in working days 8.30am – 4.15 pm

Time for supplying the services: Through telephone if the problem is clear. Field visits if the problem is unclear or severe

The responsible institute: Rice research and Development Institute, Bathalagoda, Ibbagamuwa TP?037-2259881, 037-2258560, 037-2258561, 037-2258562 email [rice@sltnet.lk](mailto:rice@sltnet.lk)

question_en: Who can benefit from the RRDI-Rice service?
answer_en: All rice growing farmers can benefit from the RRDI-Rice service, which provides field visits and diagnosis of problems of rice cultivation.
question_ta: RRDI-அரிசி சேவையிலிருந்து யார் பயனடையலாம்?
answer_ta: நெல் சாகுபடி பிரச்சினைகளுக்கு கள வருகைகள் மற்றும் நோயறிதல்களை வழங்கும் RRDI-அரிசி சேவையிலிருந்து நெல் பயிரிடும் அனைத்து விவசாயிகளும் பயனடையலாம்.
question_si: RRDI-සහල් සේවාවෙන් ප්‍රතිලාභ ලබාගත හැක්කේ කාටද?
answer_si: වී වගාවේ ගැටලු හඳුනාගැනීම සහ ක්ෂේත්‍ර චාරිකා සපයන RRDI-සහල් සේවාවෙන් සියලුම වී වගා කරන ගොවීන්ට ප්‍රතිලාභ ලබාගත හැකිය.

context:
Service: 09.Approval for importation of Poultry meat and Poultry meat products
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Requirements and Application Information
---
Specific requirement as prescribed in the web site : www.daph.gov.lk

Applications are available:

- www.daph.gov.lk
- Veterinary Regulatory Affairs      Division, Department of Animal Production and Health, Peradeniya.

Fee for the application: N ot charged

Time of submission: From 8.30 a.m to 4.15 p.m during the office hours of the weekdays

Service charge: N one

Duration takes at providing the service: 0 3 days

Required certificates:

· Application.

· Proforma Invoice.

· Submission of the document to prove the state of the raw material obtained

· Processing procedure of the product.

· Copy of the HACCP certificate of the processing plant.

· Microbiological test report (As per the guideline given by Cordexalimentarius)

· Copy of the Registration Certificate of the plant at the local government.

· Country of Origin Certificate (if the country of export is different).

· Specimen of the International Veterinary Health Certificate issued by the Government authority.
question_en: How long does it take to obtain the approval for the importation of Poultry meat and Poultry meat products?
answer_en: The duration to provide the service for the approval of importing Poultry meat and Poultry meat products is 3 days.
question_ta: கோழி இறைச்சி மற்றும் கோழி இறைச்சிப் பொருட்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான ஒப்புதலைப் பெறுவதற்கு எவ்வளவு காலம் ஆகும்?
answer_ta: கோழி இறைச்சி மற்றும் கோழி இறைச்சிப் பொருட்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான ஒப்புதல் சேவை வழங்க 3 நாட்கள் ஆகும்.
question_si: කුකුළු මස් සහ කුකුළු මස් නිෂ්පාදන ආනයනය සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීමට කොපමණ කාලයක් ගතවේද?
answer_si: කුකුළු මස් සහ කුකුළු මස් නිෂ්පාදන ආනයනය සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා දීමේ සේවාව සැපයීමට දින 3ක් ගතවේ.

context:
Service: Assistance for Productivity Improvement of Low Productive Export Agricultural Crop Lands
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Subsidies & Assistance for Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Topic: Eligibility for Assistance and Provided Support
---
Who can apply: Farmers or Estates growing Cinnamon, Pepper, Coffee, Cocoa, Cardamom, Clove, Nutmeg and have low productive lands with over 25% crop vacancies in their lands

Assistance Provided by the DEA under the Scheme:

- Required no. of planting material, based on vacancies in land, at free of charge
- Technical advices
- Financial reward or fertilizer after the successful completion of recommended practices
- Eligibility Criteria:
- Minumum eligible land extent - 0.2 ha (1/2Ac.)
- Minumum eligible land extent for " Jathika Saviya" or "Gama Naguma" programs - 0.1 ha (1/2Ac.)
- [Title of the land](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=1161&task=info&back=0&pid=827) must be produced as a prooff of?the ownership of the land. [Plan of the land](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=827) is necessary for lands over 2 ha
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria for farmers or estates to receive assistance for productivity improvement of low productive export agricultural crop lands?
answer_en: Farmers or estates growing Cinnamon, Pepper, Coffee, Cocoa, Cardamom, Clove, or Nutmeg are eligible if they have low productive lands with over 25% crop vacancies. Additionally, the minimum land extent is 0.2 ha (1/2 Ac.) or 0.1 ha (1/2 Ac.) for "Jathika Saviya" or "Gama Naguma" programs, and proof of land ownership is required.
question_ta: குறைந்த உற்பத்தித்திறன் கொண்ட ஏற்றுமதி விவசாயப் பயிர் நிலங்களின் உற்பத்தித்திறனை மேம்படுத்துவதற்கான உதவிக்கு விவசாயிகள் அல்லது தோட்டங்களுக்கான தகுதி அளவுகோல்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: இலவங்கப்பட்டை, மிளகு, காபி, கோகோ, ஏலக்காய், கிராம்பு அல்லது ஜாதிக்காய் பயிரிடும் விவசாயிகள் அல்லது தோட்டங்களுக்கு, அவர்களின் நிலங்களில் 25% க்கும் அதிகமான பயிர் வெற்றிடங்கள் கொண்ட குறைந்த உற்பத்தித்திறன் கொண்ட நிலங்கள் இருந்தால் தகுதியுடையவர்கள். கூடுதலாக, குறைந்தபட்ச நிலப்பரப்பு 0.2 ஹெக்டேர் (1/2 ஏக்கர்) அல்லது "ஜாதிக சவிய" அல்லது "கம நகுமா" திட்டங்களுக்கு 0.1 ஹெக்டேர் (1/2 ஏக்கர்) ஆகும், மேலும் நில உரிமையாளர் சான்று தேவைப்படுகிறது.
question_si: අඩු ඵලදායි අපනයන කෘෂිකාර්මික බෝග ඉඩම්වල ඵලදායිතාව වැඩිදියුණු කිරීම සඳහා සහන ලබා ගැනීමට ගොවීන් හෝ වතු සඳහා ඇති සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක මොනවාද?
answer_si: කුරුඳු, ගම්මිරිස්, කෝපි, කොකෝවා, එනසාල්, කරාබුනැටි හෝ සාදික්කා වගා කරන ගොවීන් හෝ වතුවලට, ඔවුන්ගේ ඉඩම්වල 25% ට වැඩි බෝග හිස්තැන් සහිත අඩු ඵලදායි ඉඩම් තිබේ නම් සුදුසුකම් ලැබේ. තවද, අවම ඉඩම් ප්‍රමාණය හෙක්ටයාර 0.2 (අක්කර 1/2) හෝ "ජාතික සවිය" හෝ "ගම නැගුම" වැඩසටහන් සඳහා හෙක්ටයාර 0.1 (අක්කර 1/2) වන අතර, ඉඩම් හිමිකාරිත්වය පිළිබඳ සාක්ෂි අවශ්‍ය වේ.

question_en: Who are the primary beneficiaries of the RRDI-Rice service?
answer_en: The primary beneficiaries of the RRDI-Rice service are rice growing farmers and agriculture field officers.
question_ta: RRDI-Rice சேவையின் முக்கிய பயனாளிகள் யார்?
answer_ta: RRDI-Rice சேவையின் முக்கிய பயனாளிகள் நெல் பயிரிடும் விவசாயிகள் மற்றும் விவசாய கள அலுவலர்கள் ஆவர்.
question_si: RRDI-Rice සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන ප්‍රතිලාභීන් කවුද?
answer_si: RRDI-Rice සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන ප්‍රතිලාභීන් වන්නේ වී වගා කරන ගොවීන් සහ කෘෂිකර්ම ක්ෂේත්‍ර නිලධාරීන් ය.

question_en: How can one apply to receive advice for soil conservation?
answer_en: To receive advice for soil conservation, one can apply by addressing a letter with details to the Additional Director, National Resource Management Centre, Sarasavi Mawatha, Peradeniya.
question_ta: மண் பாதுகாப்பு ஆலோசனை பெறுவதற்கு எவ்வாறு விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம்?
answer_ta: மண் பாதுகாப்பு ஆலோசனை பெற, தேசிய வள மேலாண்மை மையத்தின் மேலதிக இயக்குனருக்கு, சரஸ்வதி மாவத்தை, பேராதனை என்ற முகவரிக்கு விவரங்களுடன் ஒரு கடிதத்தை அனுப்பி விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம்.
question_si: පාංශු සංරක්ෂණය සඳහා උපදෙස් ලබා ගැනීමට අයදුම් කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer_si: පාංශු සංරක්ෂණය සඳහා උපදෙස් ලබා ගැනීමට, අතිරේක අධ්‍යක්ෂ, ජාතික සම්පත් කළමනාකරණ මධ්‍යස්ථානය, සරසවි මාවත, පේරාදෙණිය යන ලිපිනයට විස්තර සහිත ලිපියක් යැවීමෙන් අයදුම් කළ හැක.

context:
Service: Obtaing an In-Service Training on EAC
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Training & Extension Services
Topic: In-Service Training Program on EAC: Eligibility and Nature of the Service
---
Who can apply: Farmer Groups, Community Based Organizations, NGOs, groups of Enterpreneurs, Other public/semi public Institutes or Departments who are interested in gaining knowledge on cultivation, processing and marketing of?EAC such as Cinnamon, Pepper, clove, nutmeg, Coffee, Cocoa etc.

Nature of the Service: Training program will be conducted at the In-Service Training Centre located at Elwala, Matale. Program is essentialy residential. Duration vary from 2-5 days. Lectures are conducted by traing officers of the ISTC, Reseach Officers and Assistant Directors. Lectures will folow practical sessions in cultivation plots near to ISTC. Field visits are arranged according to the necessaty. Food and lodging are provided to the trainees.
question_en: What is the nature of the In-Service Training Program on EAC, including its location, duration, and facilities provided?
answer_en: The In-Service Training Program on EAC is a residential program conducted at the In-Service Training Centre located at Elwala, Matale. Its duration varies from 2 to 5 days. The program includes lectures by ISTC training officers, research officers, and assistant directors, followed by practical sessions and field visits. Food and lodging are provided to the trainees.
question_ta: EAC குறித்த சேவைக்காலப் பயிற்சித் திட்டத்தின் தன்மை என்ன? அதன் இடம், கால அளவு மற்றும் வழங்கப்படும் வசதிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: EAC குறித்த சேவைக்காலப் பயிற்சித் திட்டம் என்பது எல்வளை, மாத்தளையில் அமைந்துள்ள சேவைக்காலப் பயிற்சி மையத்தில் நடத்தப்படும் ஒரு குடியிருப்பு அடிப்படையிலான திட்டமாகும். இதன் கால அளவு 2 முதல் 5 நாட்கள் வரை மாறுபடும். இத்திட்டத்தில் ISTC பயிற்சி அதிகாரிகள், ஆராய்ச்சி அதிகாரிகள் மற்றும் உதவி இயக்குநர்கள் நடத்தும் விரிவுரைகள், அதைத் தொடர்ந்து நடைமுறைப் பயிற்சி அமர்வுகள் மற்றும் கள வருகைகள் ஆகியவை அடங்கும். பயிற்சியாளர்களுக்கு உணவு மற்றும் தங்குமிடம் வழங்கப்படும்.
question_si: EAC පිළිබඳ සේවාස්ථ පුහුණු වැඩසටහනේ ස්වභාවය, එහි පිහිටීම, කාලය සහ සපයනු ලබන පහසුකම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: EAC පිළිබඳ සේවාස්ථ පුහුණු වැඩසටහන මාතලේ, ඇල්වල පිහිටි සේවාස්ථ පුහුණු මධ්‍යස්ථානයේදී පවත්වනු ලබන නේවාසික වැඩසටහනකි. එහි කාලය දින 2 සිට 5 දක්වා වෙනස් වේ. මෙම වැඩසටහනට ISTC පුහුණු නිලධාරීන්, පර්යේෂණ නිලධාරීන් සහ සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂවරුන් විසින් පවත්වනු ලබන දේශන, ප්‍රායෝගික සැසි සහ ක්ෂේත්‍ර චාරිකා ඇතුළත් වේ. පුහුණුවන්නන්ට ආහාර සහ නවාතැන් සපයනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Obtaining Permits for Transporting Timber
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Permits & Licenses
Topic: සීමාවලට යටත් වන ගස් (Part 2), සේවය සඳහා ගෙවීම සහ වගකීම
---
සටහන
කලින් කලට ,දිස්ත්‍රික්කයෙන් දිස්ත්‍රික්කයට වෙනස්විය හැකිය.
කොටස් ගාන ලද දැව අලූත් ලී බඩු ජනෙල් රාමු ජනෙල් දොරවල් දොර රාමු, දොරවල් වැනි සීමාවලට යටත් නොවන දැව ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා බලපත්‍ර ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යල වලින් ලබා ගත හැකිය.

සේවය සඳහා ගෙවීම
දැව ප්රවාහන ගාස්තු ප්‍රවාහනය කරන වාහනය අනුව වෙනස් වේ.
කර තබා ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා ගාස්තු නොමැත.
කරත්ත සඳහා රුපියල් 150
අත් ට්‍රැක්ටරය රුපියල් 150
ට්‍රැක්කටර් රුපියල් 150
ලොරි රුපියල් 150

සේවය සඳහා වගකීම
තනතුර අංශයේ නම
ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් අදාළ ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලය
ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී අදාල ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී කොට්ඨාශය
question_en: What are the fees for obtaining a permit to transport timber using various types of vehicles, and which mode of transport is exempt from charges?
answer_en: The fees vary by vehicle: LKR 150 for carts, hand tractors, tractors, and lorries. Transporting timber as a headload is exempt from any charges.
question_ta: மரக்கட்டைகளை வெவ்வேறு வகையான வாகனங்களைப் பயன்படுத்தி கொண்டு செல்வதற்கான அனுமதிப்பத்திரத்திற்கான கட்டணங்கள் என்ன, மேலும் எந்த போக்குவரத்து முறைக்கு கட்டணங்கள் இல்லை?
answer_ta: வண்டிகளுக்கு ரூபாய் 150, கையால் இயக்கும் டிராக்டருக்கு ரூபாய் 150, டிராக்டருக்கு ரூபாய் 150, மற்றும் லாரிக்கு ரூபாய் 150 என வாகனத்தைப் பொறுத்து கட்டணங்கள் மாறுபடும். தலையில் சுமந்து கொண்டு செல்லும் மரக்கட்டைகளுக்கு எந்தக் கட்டணமும் இல்லை.
question_si: විවිධ වර්ගයේ වාහන භාවිතයෙන් දැව ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීමේ ගාස්තු මොනවාද, සහ කුමන ප්‍රවාහන ක්‍රමයක් ගාස්තු වලින් නිදහස්ද?
answer_si: කරත්ත සඳහා රුපියල් 150ක්, අත් ට්‍රැක්ටරය සඳහා රුපියල් 150ක්, ට්‍රැක්ටරය සඳහා රුපියල් 150ක් සහ ලොරි සඳහා රුපියල් 150ක් ලෙස වාහනය අනුව ගාස්තු වෙනස් වේ. කර තබා ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා ගාස්තු නොමැත.

question_en: What types of advisory services are provided by the Horticultural Crop Research & Development Institute (HORDI) to address farmers' problems?
answer_en: The Horticultural Crop Research & Development Institute (HORDI) offers advisory services including cultivation of major vegetables and hybrid development, fruit cultivation and nutrient management, pest problem resolution, plant disease diagnosis, mushroom cultivation, plant tissue culture, and food processing & post-harvest technology.
question_ta: விவசாயிகளின் பிரச்சினைகளைத் தீர்க்க தோட்டக்கலை பயிர் ஆராய்ச்சி மற்றும் மேம்பாட்டு நிறுவனம் (HORDI) வழங்கும் ஆலோசனை சேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தோட்டக்கலை பயிர் ஆராய்ச்சி மற்றும் மேம்பாட்டு நிறுவனம் (HORDI) பிரதான காய்கறி சாகுபடி மற்றும் கலப்பின வளர்ச்சி, பழ சாகுபடி மற்றும் ஊட்டச்சத்து மேலாண்மை, பூச்சி தொடர்பான பிரச்சினைகளுக்குத் தீர்வு, தாவர நோய் கண்டறிதல், காளான் சாகுபடி, தாவர திசு வளர்ப்பு மற்றும் உணவு பதப்படுத்துதல் & அறுவடைக்குப் பிந்தைய தொழில்நுட்பம் போன்ற ஆலோசனை சேவைகளை வழங்குகிறது.
question_si: ගොවීන්ගේ ගැටළු විසඳීම සඳහා උද්‍යාන භෝග පර්යේෂණ හා සංවර්ධන ආයතනය (HORDI) විසින් සපයනු ලබන උපදේශන සේවා වර්ග මොනවාද?
answer_si: උද්‍යාන භෝග පර්යේෂණ හා සංවර්ධන ආයතනය (HORDI) ප්‍රධාන එළවළු වගාව සහ දෙමුහුන් සංවර්ධනය, පලතුරු වගාව සහ පෝෂක කළමනාකරණය, පළිබෝධ ගැටළු නිරාකරණය, ශාක රෝග හඳුනාගැනීම, හතු වගාව, ශාක පටක රෝපණය සහ ආහාර සැකසීම සහ පශ්චාත් අස්වනු තාක්ෂණය ඇතුළු උපදේශන සේවා සපයයි.

context:
Service: SCPPC:  Issuance of import permits to import plant, planting material and plant products
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Eligibility, Application Process and Fees for Import Permits
---
Eligibility: Who imports these items should obtain permits by law.

Process of submitting applications: Applications can be collected from National Plant Quarantine Service (NPQS) Canada Friendship Road Katunayake or downloaded from the NPQS website.

Applications with required document can be sent to [importpermits@gmail.com](mailto:importpermits@gmail.com) , /by post or by hand to Additional Director, National Plant Quarantine Service (NPQS) Canada Friendship Road Katunayake.

Fees payable to obtain application form: Free of charge

Time taken from submitting the application to the issuance of import permit: For complete applications related or regularly importing plant commodities importing from regularly importing countries – about one week.

For new plant commodities/ importing form new country-vary with the time taken for pestRisk Assessment process/receiving no objection from other institutes.

Fees payable to obtain the service: Free of charge

Time of supplying the service: From 8.30 a.m. to 4.15 p.m. on week days excluding public holidays.
question_en: What are the fees associated with obtaining an import permit for plant products, and where can one collect the application form?
answer_en: Both the application form and the service for issuing import permits to import plant, planting material, and plant products are free of charge. Applications can be collected from the National Plant Quarantine Service (NPQS) Canada Friendship Road Katunayake or downloaded from the NPQS website.
question_ta: தாவரப் பொருட்கள் இறக்குமதி அனுமதிப்பத்திரத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான கட்டணங்கள் என்ன, விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தை எங்கிருந்து பெறலாம்?
answer_ta: தாவரங்கள், நடவுப் பொருட்கள் மற்றும் தாவரப் பொருட்கள் இறக்குமதி அனுமதிப்பத்திரத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான விண்ணப்பப் படிவமும் சேவையும் இலவசம். விண்ணப்பங்களை தேசிய தாவர தனிமைப்படுத்தல் சேவை (NPQS) கனடா நட்பு சாலை கட்டுநாயக்காவிலிருந்து பெறலாம் அல்லது NPQS இணையதளத்திலிருந்து பதிவிறக்கம் செய்யலாம்.
question_si: ශාක නිෂ්පාදන ආනයන බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා වන ගාස්තු මොනවාද, සහ අයදුම්පත්‍රය ලබා ගත හැක්කේ කොතැනින්ද?
answer_si: ශාක, රෝපණ ද්‍රව්‍ය සහ ශාක නිෂ්පාදන ආනයන බලපත්‍ර නිකුත් කිරීම සඳහා අයදුම්පත්‍රය සහ සේවාව යන දෙකම නොමිලේ. අයදුම්පත් ජාතික ශාක නිරෝධායන සේවාව (NPQS) කැනඩා මිත්‍රත්ව මාර්ගය, කටුනායකින් ලබාගත හැකිය, නැතහොත් NPQS වෙබ් අඩවියෙන් බාගත කළ හැකිය.

question_ta: தொழில்முனைவோர் மகாவலி திறமையான தொழிலாளர்களைப் பெறுவதற்கு என்ன தகுதிகள் தேவை?
answer_ta: தொழில்முனைவோருக்கு மகாவலி திறமையான தொழிலாளர்களைப் பெறுவதற்கு ஒரு முதலீட்டுத் திட்டத்தில் ஈடுபடும் திறன் மற்றும் விருப்பம் தேவை.
question_si: ව්‍යවසායකයින්ට මහවැලි නිපුණ ශ්‍රමය ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය සුදුසුකම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: ව්‍යවසායකයින්ට මහවැලි නිපුණ ශ්‍රමය ලබා ගැනීමට ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘතියක නිරත වීමට හැකියාව සහ කැමැත්ත තිබිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Obtaing a Farmer Training Program on EAC
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Training & Extension Services
Topic: Eligibility and Nature of Farmer Training Program on EAC
---
Who can apply: Farmers, Farmer Groups and Community Based Organizations who are interested in solving field problems in cultivation, processing and marketing of EAC such as Cinnamon, Pepper, Coffee, Cocoa etc.

Nature of the Service: Farmer training is given either in farmer fields or as a group class. Type of training is decided by mutual discussion of trainers and Farmers. Extension Officers or Research and Development Assistants conduct the classes.Training is given on soil conservation, crop establishment, shade control, pest disease control, fertillizer application etc. for EAC.
question_en: Who is eligible to apply for the Farmer Training Program on Export Agriculture Crops (EAC)?
answer_en: Farmers, Farmer Groups, and Community Based Organizations who are interested in solving field problems related to the cultivation, processing, and marketing of EAC such as Cinnamon, Pepper, Coffee, and Cocoa are eligible to apply.
question_ta: ஏற்றுமதி விவசாயப் பயிர்கள் (EAC) தொடர்பான விவசாயப் பயிற்சித் திட்டத்திற்கு விண்ணப்பிக்க யார் தகுதியானவர்கள்?
answer_ta: இலவங்கப்பட்டை, மிளகு, காபி, கொக்கோ போன்ற ஏற்றுமதி விவசாயப் பயிர்களை சாகுபடி செய்தல், பதப்படுத்துதல் மற்றும் சந்தைப்படுத்துதல் ஆகியவற்றில் உள்ள களப் பிரச்சினைகளைத் தீர்க்க ஆர்வமுள்ள விவசாயிகள், விவசாயக் குழுக்கள் மற்றும் சமூக அடிப்படையிலான நிறுவனங்கள் விண்ணப்பிக்கத் தகுதியுடையவர்கள்.
question_si: අපනයන කෘෂිකාර්මික භෝග (EAC) පිළිබඳ ගොවි පුහුණු වැඩසටහන සඳහා අයදුම් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: කුරුඳු, ගම්මිරිස්, කෝපි, කොකෝවා වැනි අපනයන කෘෂිකාර්මික භෝග (EAC) වගා කිරීම, සැකසීම සහ අලෙවිකරණය සම්බන්ධ ක්ෂේත්‍ර ගැටළු විසඳීමට උනන්දුවක් දක්වන ගොවීන්ට, ගොවි කණ්ඩායම්වලට සහ ප්‍රජා පදනම් වූ සංවිධානවලට අයදුම් කළ හැකිය.

question_ta: “பூச்சிக்கொல்லி மருந்து விற்பனையாளர்களுக்கான சான்றிதழ்” சேவைக்கான மையத்தின் தலைவர் யார்?
answer_ta: இச்சேவைக்கான மையத்தின் தலைவர் பூச்சிக்கொல்லி மருந்துகளின் பதிவாளர், டாக்டர் ஜி.ஏ.டபிள்யூ. விஜேசேகர ஆவார். அவரது அலுவலகம் பூச்சிக்கொல்லி மருந்துகளின் பதிவாளர் அலுவலகம், த.பெ.எண். 49, எண் 1056, கடம்பே, பேராதனை என்ற முகவரியில் அமைந்துள்ளது.
question_si: “පළිබෝධනාශක අලෙවිකරුවන් සඳහා සහතික කිරීම” සේවාවෙහි මධ්‍යස්ථානයේ ප්‍රධානියා කවුද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාවෙහි මධ්‍යස්ථානයේ ප්‍රධානියා වන්නේ පළිබෝධනාශක ලේඛකාධිකාරී, ආචාර්ය ජී.ඒ.ඩබ්ලිව්. විජේසේකර මහතාය. ඔහුගේ කාර්යාලය පළිබෝධනාශක ලේඛකාධිකාරී කාර්යාලය, තැ.පෙ. 49, අංක 1056, ගටඹේ, පේරාදෙණිය හි පිහිටා ඇත.

context:
Service: 03.Approval for importation of meat and meat products
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Import Requirements for Meat and Meat Products (Part 1)
---
Applications for importing meat (excluding poultry) are available at www.daph.gov.lk, Veterinary Regulatory Affairs Division, Department of Animal Production and Health, Peradeniya. The application is free of charge and can be submitted from 8.30 a.m to 4.15 p.m. on weekdays. There are no service charges. The service duration is 0-3 working days. Required documents for importation include: Application form, Proforma invoice, Processing procedure of the product (for processed meat), Copy of the HACCP certificate of the processing plant (for processed meat), Microbiological test report (as per Cordex alimentarius guidelines), and a copy of the Registration Certificate of the establishment/plant at the local government.
question_en: What is the service duration for obtaining approval for the importation of meat and meat products (excluding poultry)?
answer_en: The service duration for obtaining approval for the importation of meat and meat products (excluding poultry) is 0-3 working days.
question_ta: இறைச்சி மற்றும் இறைச்சிப் பொருட்களை (கோழி இறைச்சியைத் தவிர) இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான ஒப்புதலைப் பெறுவதற்கான சேவை கால அளவு என்ன?
answer_ta: இறைச்சி மற்றும் இறைச்சிப் பொருட்களை (கோழி இறைச்சியைத் தவிர) இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான ஒப்புதலைப் பெறுவதற்கான சேவை கால அளவு 0-3 வேலை நாட்கள் ஆகும்.
question_si: මස් සහ මස් නිෂ්පාදන (කුකුළු මස් හැර) ආනයනය සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා සේවා කාලය කොපමණද?
answer_si: මස් සහ මස් නිෂ්පාදන (කුකුළු මස් හැර) ආනයනය සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා සේවා කාලය වැඩ කරන දින 0-3 කි.

context:

Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development

---
Eligibility Officer groups in agriculture and non agriculture who conduct training and presentations

Process of application Request by letter to Director (NAICC), Department of Agriculture, Peradeniya. Training will be arranged on demand

question_en: Who is eligible for the training on AV teaching aids and presentation technology?

question_ta: AV கற்பித்தல் உதவி உபகரணங்கள் மற்றும் விளக்கக்காட்சி தொழில்நுட்பம் குறித்த பயிற்சிக்கு யார் தகுதியானவர்கள்?
answer_ta: பயிற்சி மற்றும் விளக்கக்காட்சிகளை நடத்தும் விவசாயம் மற்றும் விவசாயம் அல்லாத அதிகாரி குழுக்கள் தகுதியானவர்கள்.
question_si: AV ඉගැන්වීම් ආධාරක සහ ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේ තාක්ෂණය පිළිබඳ පුහුණුව සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: පුහුණුවීම් සහ ඉදිරිපත් කිරීම් පවත්වන කෘෂිකාර්මික සහ කෘෂිකාර්මික නොවන නිලධාරි කණ්ඩායම් සුදුසුකම් ලබයි.

context:
Service: SCPPC-Plant Quarantine: Issuing phytosanitary certificate on agricultural commodities
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Contact Information for Plant Quarantine Stations
---
Place of service given Plant Quarantine Station-Airport, Bandarnayake International Airport, Katunayake. Fax /Tel. 011-2252575, 011/226395 Cargo Inspection room: 011/2263955 Passenger Terminal : 011/2264568 e-mail: [phytoquarantine@gmail.com](mailto:phytoquarantine@gmail.com)

Plant Quarantine Station-Airport, Maththala Address: Rajapaksha International Air Port, Maththala, Tel. 047-2031370, E-mail: [pqsmattala@gmail.com](mailto:pqsmattala@gmail.com)

Plant Quarantine Station-Airport, Jaffna Address: Jaffna International Air Port, Palaly, Tel. 076 2901986, E-mail: [sumitharmarasa@yahoo.com](mailto:sumitharmarasa@yahoo.com)
question_en: What is the main service offered by SCPPC-Plant Quarantine and where are its airport stations located in Sri Lanka?
answer_en: The main service offered is 'Issuing phytosanitary certificate on agricultural commodities'. Its airport stations are located at Bandarnayake International Airport (Katunayake), Rajapaksha International Air Port (Maththala), and Jaffna International Air Port (Palaly).
question_ta: SCPPC-தாவர தனிமைப்படுத்தல் வழங்கும் முக்கிய சேவை என்ன, இலங்கையில் அதன் விமான நிலைய நிலையங்கள் எங்கு அமைந்துள்ளன?
answer_ta: முக்கிய சேவை 'வேளாண் பொருட்களுக்கான தாவர சுகாதார சான்றிதழ் வழங்குதல்' ஆகும். அதன் விமான நிலைய நிலையங்கள் பண்டாரநாயக்க சர்வதேச விமான நிலையம் (கட்டுநாயக்க), ராஜபக்ஷ சர்வதேச விமான நிலையம் (மத்தள) மற்றும் யாழ்ப்பாண சர்வதேச விமான நிலையம் (பலாலி) ஆகிய இடங்களில் அமைந்துள்ளன.
question_si: SCPPC-ශාක නිරෝධායන මගින් සපයනු ලබන ප්‍රධාන සේවාව කුමක්ද සහ එහි ගුවන් තොටුපළ ස්ථාන ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ පිහිටා ඇත්තේ කොහිද?
answer_si: ප්‍රධාන සේවාව වන්නේ 'කෘෂිකාර්මික භාණ්ඩ සඳහා ශාක සෞඛ්‍ය සහතිකය නිකුත් කිරීම' යි. එහි ගුවන් තොටුපළ ස්ථාන බණ්ඩාරනායක ජාත්‍යන්තර ගුවන් තොටුපළ (කටුනායක), රාජපක්ෂ ජාත්‍යන්තර ගුවන් තොටුපළ (මත්තල) සහ යාපනය ජාත්‍යන්තර ගුවන් තොටුපළ (පලාලි) යන ස්ථානවල පිහිටා ඇත.

context:
Service: Registration of Sellers of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Approval & Registration
Topic: Step-by-Step Procedure and Timeline for License Issuance
---
Step-by-Step Procedure: Step 1: Applicant sends a request letter to the Department stating the need of an Application Form. Step 2: The Department receives the letter and sends the Application Form to the applicant. Step 3: Applicant fills Form and sends it to the Department along with a copy of the Business Registration Certificate. Step 4: Department Issues the license to the seller under registered cover.

Timeline Process Time Line By Post : 2 Weeks Physically coming to the Department: 4-7 Days

Obtaining Application Form:

Working days – Monday - Friday Counter open hours – 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays

Submit Application Form: Working days – Monday to Friday Counter open hours – 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays
question_en: What is the estimated timeline for receiving the license if an applicant submits their form by post for the 'Registration of Sellers of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments' service?
answer_en: The estimated timeline for receiving the license if an applicant submits their form by post is 2 weeks.
question_ta: எடைகள், அளவைகள் மற்றும் எடை அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகளின் விற்பனையாளர்களைப் பதிவு செய்தல் சேவைக்காக விண்ணப்பதாரர் தங்களின் படிவத்தை அஞ்சல் மூலம் சமர்ப்பித்தால் உரிமத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான தோராயமான காலக்கெடு என்ன?
answer_ta: விண்ணப்பதாரர் தங்கள் படிவத்தை அஞ்சல் மூலம் சமர்ப்பித்தால், உரிமத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான தோராயமான காலக்கெடு 2 வாரங்கள் ஆகும்.
question_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ කිරුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ අලෙවිකරුවන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සේවාව සඳහා අයදුම්කරුවෙකු තැපෑලෙන් ඔවුන්ගේ අයදුම්පත්‍රය ඉදිරිපත් කරන්නේ නම්, බලපත්‍රය ලබා ගැනීමට ගතවන ආසන්න කාලය කොපමණද?
answer_si: අයදුම්කරුවෙකු තැපෑලෙන් අයදුම්පත්‍රය ඉදිරිපත් කරන්නේ නම්, බලපත්‍රය ලබා ගැනීමට ගතවන ආසන්න කාලය සති 2 කි.

context:
Service: Rubber Land Regisration
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Requirements for Rubber Plantation Ownership Registration
---
The following requirements must be met for registration of ownership of rubber plantations:

- Registration of ownership

1. Lands previously not registered under the Rubber Control Act

2. Should bare Rubber plantation

- Changes of ownership

Time of forwarding application

From 8.30am to 3.30pm on Working days by Handor Registered post to the Regional Office of the relevant district
question_en: What are the requirements for registering ownership of rubber plantations for lands not previously registered under the Rubber Control Act?
answer_en: For lands not previously registered under the Rubber Control Act, the requirements for ownership registration are that the land should not have been registered under the Act before and it must bare a rubber plantation.
question_ta: ரப்பர் கட்டுப்பாட்டுச் சட்டத்தின் கீழ் முன்பு பதிவு செய்யப்படாத நிலங்களுக்கு ரப்பர் தோட்டங்களின் உரிமையை பதிவு செய்வதற்கான தேவைகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: ரப்பர் கட்டுப்பாட்டுச் சட்டத்தின் கீழ் முன்பு பதிவு செய்யப்படாத நிலங்களுக்கு உரிமைப் பதிவு செய்ய, அந்த நிலங்கள் முன்பு அந்த சட்டத்தின் கீழ் பதிவு செய்யப்படாமல் இருக்க வேண்டும் மற்றும் அவை ரப்பர் தோட்டங்களைக் கொண்டிருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: රබර් පාලන පනත යටතේ පෙර ලියාපදිංචි කර නොමැති ඉඩම් සඳහා රබර් වගාවන්හි හිමිකාරිත්වය ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: රබර් පාලන පනත යටතේ පෙර ලියාපදිංචි කර නොමැති ඉඩම් සඳහා හිමිකාරිත්වය ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමට නම්, එම ඉඩම් පෙර පනත යටතේ ලියාපදිංචි කර නොතිබිය යුතු අතර, ඒවායේ රබර් වගාවක් තිබිය යුතුය.

context:

---
Time of submission the request During office hours

Fees for obtaining the service for paddy Rs 400/ per acre/season (as per the sliding scale approved) for other Field crops Rs 400/per - 1 acre/season/Lot for vegetables Rs 400/ per -1 acre/season/Lot for potato Rs 800/ per acre/season/Lot

Time taken to provide the service as per the process

Place of service given Seed Certification Service (SCS) PO Box 3, Gannoruwa, Peradeniya TP 081 2388217 email [scsdoa79@yahoo.com](mailto:scs@slt.lk)

question_en: What is the fee for seed certification for potato crops?
answer_en: The fee for seed certification for potato crops is Rs 800 per acre/season/Lot.
question_ta: உருளைக்கிழங்கு பயிர்களுக்கான விதை சான்றளிப்பு கட்டணம் எவ்வளவு?
answer_ta: உருளைக்கிழங்கு பயிர்களுக்கான விதை சான்றளிப்பு கட்டணம் ஒரு ஏக்கர்/பருவம்/பகுதிக்கு ரூ 800 ஆகும்.
question_si: අර්තාපල් භෝග සඳහා බීජ සහතික කිරීමේ ගාස්තුව කීයද?
answer_si: අර්තාපල් භෝග සඳහා බීජ සහතික කිරීමේ ගාස්තුව අක්කරයකට/කන්නයකට/කණ්ඩායමකට රුපියල් 800 කි.

question_ta: காளான் தாய் கலாச்சாரங்கள் மற்றும் ஸ்பான்களை வழங்குவதற்கு எந்தப் பிரிவு மற்றும் நிறுவனம் பொறுப்பு, மேலும் அவர்களின் தொடர்பு தொலைபேசி எண் என்ன?
answer_ta: கன்னோருவா, பேராதெனியாவில் உள்ள தோட்டக்கலை பயிர் ஆராய்ச்சி மற்றும் மேம்பாட்டு நிறுவனம் (HORDI) இல் உள்ள நோயியல் மற்றும் காளான் பிரிவு காளான் தாய் கலாச்சாரங்கள் மற்றும் ஸ்பான்களை வழங்குகிறது. அவர்களின் தொலைபேசி எண் 081-2388011-12-13 ஆகும்.
question_si: හතු මව් සංස්කෘතීන් සහ බිජු සැපයීම සඳහා වගකිව යුත්තේ කුමන අංශය සහ ආයතනයද, ඔවුන්ගේ සම්බන්ධතා දුරකථන අංකය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ගන්නෝරුව, පේරාදෙණියේ පිහිටි උද්‍යාන භෝග පර්යේෂණ හා සංවර්ධන ආයතනයේ (HORDI) රෝග විද්‍යා හා හතු අංශය මගින් හතු මව් සංස්කෘතීන් සහ බිජු සපයනු ලැබේ. ඔවුන්ගේ දුරකථන අංකය 081-2388011-12-13 වේ.

context:
Service: 08.Approval for importation of day old poultry, live poultry and other birds
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Poultry Breeding Farm Registration Requirements and Application Details
---
To be eligible for this service, you must be registered as a poultry breeding farm with the Department of Animal Production and Health. Applications are available at the Veterinary Regulatory Affairs Division, Department of Animal Production and Health, Peradeniya. There is no fee charged for the application. You can submit your application from 8.30 a.m to 4.15 p.m during office hours on weekdays. There is no service charge for this process. The service is typically provided within 3 days.

The required certificates and documents include:

- Application form
- Agreement
- Proforma Invoice
- Specimen of the International Veterinary Health Certificate
- Documents to prove the country transit (if applicable)

The staff officer in charge of these services is Dr(Ms).P.I.P.Perera, a Veterinary Surgeon from the Veterinary Regulatory Affairs Division. You can contact her at 081-2388462. The fax number is 081-2388619.
question_en: Who is the staff officer in charge of the service for approval of importation of day old poultry, live poultry and other birds, and what is her contact number?
answer_en: The staff officer in charge is Dr(Ms).P.I.P.Perera, a Veterinary Surgeon from the Veterinary Regulatory Affairs Division. Her contact number is 081-2388462.
question_ta: ஒரு நாள் வயதுடைய கோழிகள், உயிருள்ள கோழிகள் மற்றும் பிற பறவைகளை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான ஒப்புதல் சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி யார், மற்றும் அவரது தொடர்பு எண் என்ன?
answer_ta: கால்நடை ஒழுங்குமுறை விவகாரப் பிரிவின் கால்நடை அறுவை சிகிச்சை நிபுணர் டாக்டர் பி.ஐ.பி. பெரேரா (திருமதி) இந்த சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி ஆவார். அவரது தொடர்பு எண் 081-2388462.
question_si: දිනක් වයසැති කුකුළු පැටවුන්, ජීවමාන කුකුළන් සහ අනෙකුත් පක්ෂීන් ආනයනය සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා දීමේ සේවාව භාරව සිටින නිලධාරිනිය කවුද, ඇයගේ දුරකථන අංකය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: පශු වෛද්‍ය නියාමන කටයුතු අංශයේ පශු වෛද්‍ය ශල්‍ය වෛද්‍යවරියක් වන වෛද්‍ය (මහත්මිය) පී.අයි.පී. පෙරේරා මහත්මිය මෙම සේවාව භාරව සිටින නිලධාරිනියයි. ඇයගේ දුරකථන අංකය 081-2388462 වේ.

context:
Service: Extension &Training: Training on agriculture enterprise development
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Service Delivery, Location, and Contact Information
---
Time of the supplying the service: Depend on the availability of resource persons and training schedules at the centers. Trainings are conducted in the second and third quarters of the year.

Place of the service given: Agriculture Enterprise Development and Information Services (AgEDIS) No1, Sarasavi Mawatha, Peradeniya Tel 0812 388 754 agedisdoa@yahoo.com

Staff officer in charge of the service: Deputy Director (AgEDIS), Mr Daya Abesooriya
question_en: Who is the staff officer in charge of the 'Training on agriculture enterprise development' service and what are the contact details for the service location?
answer_en: Mr Daya Abesooriya, the Deputy Director of AgEDIS, is in charge. The service is provided at Agriculture Enterprise Development and Information Services (AgEDIS) No1, Sarasavi Mawatha, Peradeniya. You can contact them at Tel 0812 388 754 or agedisdoa@yahoo.com.
question_ta: விவசாய நிறுவன மேம்பாட்டுப் பயிற்சிச் சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி யார், மேலும் சேவை வழங்கும் இடத்தின் தொடர்பு விவரங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: அக்எடிஸ் நிறுவனத்தின் பிரதிப் பணிப்பாளர் திரு. தயா அபேசூரிய அவர்கள் பொறுப்பாவார். சேவை வழங்கும் இடம் விவசாய நிறுவன மேம்பாடு மற்றும் தகவல் சேவைகள் (AgEDIS), எண் 1, சரஸ்வதி மாவத்தை, பேராதனை. அவர்களை 0812 388 754 என்ற தொலைபேசி எண்ணிலோ அல்லது agedisdoa@yahoo.com என்ற மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரியிலோ தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: කෘෂිකාර්මික ව්‍යවසාය සංවර්ධන පුහුණු සේවාව භාරව සිටින නිලධාරියා කවුද සහ එම සේවා ස්ථානය සඳහා සම්බන්ධතා තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: AgEDIS හි නියෝජ්‍ය අධ්‍යක්ෂ, දයා අබේසූරිය මහතා මෙම සේවාව භාරව සිටී. සේවාව සපයනු ලබන්නේ කෘෂිකාර්මික ව්‍යවසාය සංවර්ධන හා තොරතුරු සේවා (AgEDIS), අංක 1, සරසවි මාවත, පේරාදෙණිය යන ස්ථානයේදීය. ඔබට 0812 388 754 අමතා හෝ agedisdoa@yahoo.com වෙත විද්‍යුත් තැපෑලෙන් ඔවුන් සම්බන්ධ කර ගත හැක.

context:
Service: Agricultural Education for Public Officers
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Training & Extension Services
Topic: Central Scholarships for Public Officers in Agriculture (Part 1)
---
Selections will be made on the basis of awarding central scholarships on the marks scored at a competitive examination to be held by the Department of Agriculture for public officers of the following establishments. i. Foremen and Conductors of the Department of Agriculture - 10 scholarships ii. Agricultural Extension Workers of the Dept. of Agriculture - 30 scholarships iii. Field Instructors of the Land Commissioners Department - 10 scholarships iv.Technical Assistants of the Sugar cane Research Institute - 02 scholarships v.Unit Managers and Field Assistants of the Sri Lanka Mahaweli Authority - 18 scholarships vi.Farm Conductors of the Department of Export Agriculture - 04 scholarships vii. Field officers of the Coconut Cultivation Board - 05 scholarships viii. Field Assistants of the Tea Small Holders Development Authority - 03 scholarships ix. Development officers of the Cashew Corporation - 02 scholarships x. Research Sub Assistants of the Department of Agriculture - 05 scholarships xi. Seed Technicians of the Department of Agriculture - 05 scholarships xii. Bee controllers of the Department of Agriculture - 02 scholarships xiii. Demonstrators of the Department of Agriculture - 02 scholarships xiv. Agricultural Research and Production Assistants of the Department Agrarian Development -30 scholarships
question_en: How are the central scholarships for public officers in agriculture awarded, and which department conducts the competitive examination?
answer_en: The central scholarships are awarded based on the marks scored at a competitive examination, which is held by the Department of Agriculture.
question_ta: விவசாயத்தில் பொது அதிகாரிகளுக்கான மத்திய புலமைப்பரிசில்கள் எவ்வாறு வழங்கப்படுகின்றன, மேலும் போட்டிப் பரீட்சையை எந்தத் திணைக்களம் நடத்துகிறது?
answer_ta: விவசாயத் திணைக்களத்தால் நடத்தப்படும் போட்டிப் பரீட்சையில் பெறும் புள்ளிகளின் அடிப்படையில் மத்திய புலமைப்பரிசில்கள் வழங்கப்படுகின்றன.
question_si: කෘෂිකර්මයේ රාජ්‍ය නිලධාරීන් සඳහා වන මධ්‍යම ශිෂ්‍යත්ව ප්‍රදානය කරනු ලබන්නේ කෙසේද සහ තරඟ විභාගය පවත්වන්නේ කුමන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවද?
answer_si: කෘෂිකර්ම දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව විසින් පවත්වනු ලබන තරඟ විභාගයකින් ලබා ගන්නා ලකුණු මත පදනම්ව මධ්‍යම ශිෂ්‍යත්ව ප්‍රදානය කරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: 14.Providing license to manufacture / import animal feed/ingredients
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Animal Feed Registration and Application Process (Part 2)
---
After submitting the application, your application will be evaluated and the team will visit to inspect your feed manufacturing place (plant) to see the facilities available to ascertain the facilities are sufficient to produce quality animal feed. If the facilities are inadequate, your application may be disqualified. If the facilities can improve, provisional registration will be granted with suggestions. With the improvements, registration will be confirmed. This will take approximately 2 months. These registrations need to be renew annually.

The manufacturers already registered will be given the priority to produce extra animal feed which were approved. For that, it would take 1-7 days.
question_en: What is the process for obtaining an animal feed manufacturing license after submitting the application, and how long does it typically take for initial registration?
answer_en: After submitting the application, it will be evaluated, and a team will visit to inspect the feed manufacturing plant. If facilities are sufficient, registration will be confirmed. If facilities can improve, provisional registration with suggestions will be granted, leading to confirmed registration after improvements. This process takes approximately 2 months.
question_ta: விண்ணப்பத்தைச் சமர்ப்பித்த பிறகு விலங்கு தீவன உற்பத்தி உரிமத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான செயல்முறை என்ன, மேலும் ஆரம்பப் பதிவுக்கு பொதுவாக எவ்வளவு காலம் ஆகும்?
answer_ta: விண்ணப்பத்தைச் சமர்ப்பித்த பிறகு, அது மதிப்பீடு செய்யப்பட்டு, ஒரு குழு தீவன உற்பத்தி ஆலையை ஆய்வு செய்யும். வசதிகள் போதுமானதாக இருந்தால், பதிவு உறுதி செய்யப்படும். வசதிகளை மேம்படுத்த முடிந்தால், பரிந்துரைகளுடன் தற்காலிக பதிவு வழங்கப்படும், மேம்பாடுகளுக்குப் பிறகு பதிவு உறுதி செய்யப்படும். இந்த செயல்முறைக்கு தோராயமாக 2 மாதங்கள் ஆகும்.
question_si: අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමෙන් පසු සත්ව ආහාර නිෂ්පාදන බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය කුමක්ද, සහ මූලික ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා සාමාන්‍යයෙන් කොපමණ කාලයක් ගතවේද?
answer_si: අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමෙන් පසු, එය ඇගයීමට ලක් කරන අතර, කණ්ඩායමක් ආහාර නිෂ්පාදන කම්හල පරීක්ෂා කිරීමට පැමිණේ. පහසුකම් ප්‍රමාණවත් නම්, ලියාපදිංචිය තහවුරු කෙරේ. පහසුකම් වැඩිදියුණු කළ හැකි නම්, යෝජනා සමඟ තාවකාලික ලියාපදිංචියක් ලබා දෙන අතර, වැඩිදියුණු කිරීම්වලින් පසු ලියාපදිංචිය තහවුරු කෙරේ. මෙම ක්‍රියාවලියට ආසන්න වශයෙන් මාස 2ක් ගතවේ.

context:
Service: Post Harvest Practices
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Training & Extension Services
Topic: Private Processing Centers: Registration and Building Requirements
---
- In writing approval from the District Assistant Director must be obtained for the satisfactory installation and operation of the unit.
- Enough space should be there in the building to establish the equipments.
- Building constriction must be done according to the department’s plan and prior approval must be taken from the department for the building.
- Without prior approval buying of equipments and machinery should not be done. If such thing has been done the assistance may be halted.

Drying Process

- Drying area must be constructed to prevent the mixing of inert matter.
- Drying capacity should be minimum of 250 kg per batch.
- At least 200 sq. ft. should be there.

Solar Dryers

- Area should be at least 100 sq.ft.
- Should raised 2 feet above the ground.
- Artificial Dryers (fire wood/fuel/current).
- After examining if satisfied, Investment assistance can be given.

Payments Payments recommendation and approval is done by a board of officers, Appointed by the Director General of the Department.
question_en: What are the key approval requirements before establishing a private processing center, particularly concerning building construction and equipment procurement?
answer_en: Before establishing a private processing center, written approval from the District Assistant Director is essential for the unit's satisfactory installation and operation. The building construction must adhere to the department’s plan, requiring prior departmental approval. Furthermore, equipment and machinery should not be purchased without prior approval, as doing so may lead to the halting of assistance.
question_ta: ஒரு தனியார் பதப்படுத்துதல் மையத்தை நிறுவுவதற்கு முன், குறிப்பாக கட்டிட கட்டுமானம் மற்றும் உபகரணங்கள் கொள்முதல் தொடர்பாக, என்ன முக்கிய ஒப்புதல் தேவைகள் உள்ளன?
answer_ta: ஒரு தனியார் பதப்படுத்துதல் மையத்தை நிறுவுவதற்கு முன், அலகின் திருப்திகரமான நிறுவல் மற்றும் செயல்பாட்டிற்கு மாவட்ட உதவி இயக்குநரிடம் இருந்து எழுத்துப்பூர்வ ஒப்புதல் பெறுவது அவசியம். கட்டிட கட்டுமானம் துறையின் திட்டத்தின்படி இருக்க வேண்டும், அதற்கு துறையிடம் இருந்து முன் அனுமதி பெற வேண்டும். மேலும், முன் அனுமதி இல்லாமல் உபகரணங்கள் மற்றும் இயந்திரங்களை வாங்கக்கூடாது, அவ்வாறு செய்தால் உதவி நிறுத்தப்படலாம்.
question_si: පෞද්ගලික සැකසුම් මධ්‍යස්ථානයක් ස්ථාපිත කිරීමට පෙර, විශේෂයෙන් ගොඩනැගිලි ඉදිකිරීම් සහ උපකරණ ප්‍රසම්පාදනය සම්බන්ධයෙන් වන ප්‍රධාන අනුමැති අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: පෞද්ගලික සැකසුම් මධ්‍යස්ථානයක් ස්ථාපිත කිරීමට පෙර, ඒකකයේ සතුටුදායක ස්ථාපනය සහ ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීම සඳහා දිස්ත්‍රික් සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයාගෙන් ලිඛිත අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම අත්‍යවශ්‍ය වේ. ගොඩනැගිලි ඉදිකිරීම් දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ සැලැස්මට අනුකූල විය යුතු අතර, ඒ සඳහා දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවෙන් පූර්ව අනුමැතිය ලබා ගත යුතුය. තවද, පූර්ව අනුමැතියකින් තොරව උපකරණ සහ යන්ත්‍රෝපකරණ මිලදී නොගත යුතු අතර, එසේ කිරීමෙන් ආධාර අත්හිටුවීමට ඉඩ ඇත.

context:
Service: SCPPC-Pesticides: Registration of Pesticides
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Approval & Registration
Topic: Pesticide Registration Fees and Processing Time
---
Fees payable to obtain the service

Application for registration fee Rs. 6500/=

Registration of pesticide fee Rs 4000/=

Re-Registration fee at the end of the 3 year Rs 5000/=

Time required for supply the service

For new registration – 24 weeks (After completion of Bio Efficacy Test)

Third party registration – 2 weeks

Re-Registration – 6-8 weeks



Time of Quarrying

During office hours (8.30 am – 4.15pm) Not available in Saturdays, Sundays and Public Holidays.



Place of the service

Office of the Registrar of Pesticide, P.O. Box 49, No 1056, Gatambe, Peradeniya

Telephone: 081-2388076, Tele/Fax: 081-2388135, E mail: [pest@slt.lk](mailto:pest@slt.lk)
question_en: What are the different fees associated with pesticide registration services?
answer_en: The fees include an application for registration fee of Rs. 6500/=, a pesticide registration fee of Rs. 4000/=, and a re-registration fee of Rs. 5000/= at the end of 3 years.
question_ta: பூச்சிக்கொல்லி பதிவு சேவைகளுடன் தொடர்புடைய பல்வேறு கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: இந்தக் கட்டணங்களில் பதிவுக்கான விண்ணப்பக் கட்டணம் ரூ. 6500/=, பூச்சிக்கொல்லி பதிவு கட்டணம் ரூ. 4000/=, மற்றும் 3 வருட முடிவில் மறுபதிவுக் கட்டணம் ரூ. 5000/= ஆகியவை அடங்கும்.
question_si: පළිබෝධනාශක ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සේවා සඳහා අදාළ විවිධ ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම ගාස්තු අතර ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ අයදුම්පත් ගාස්තුව රු. 6500/=, පළිබෝධනාශක ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ ගාස්තුව රු. 4000/=, සහ වසර 3 අවසානයේදී නැවත ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ ගාස්තුව රු. 5000/= ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Obtaining Trade Permit for Sand and Exportable Mineral
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Permits & Licenses
Topic: Exceptions and Application Format
---
Instances outside the standard requirements may exist, and special information could be relevant depending on the specific circumstances of the application. Applicants should be aware of this possibility and prepared to provide additional information if requested. This ensures a thorough assessment of each application and allows for flexibility in addressing unique situations.

The application must be submitted using the designated Filled Application Form. Ensuring that the form is completely and accurately filled out is crucial for a successful application. The format of the application form is designed to capture all necessary information in a structured manner, facilitating efficient processing by the relevant authorities. Submitting a correctly filled form helps to avoid delays and ensures that the application can be evaluated promptly.
question_en: What are the essential requirements for submitting an application for a Trade Permit for Sand and Exportable Mineral, particularly regarding the application form and potential exceptions?
answer_en: Applicants must submit the designated Filled Application Form, ensuring it is completely and accurately filled out. They should also be prepared to provide additional information if requested, as exceptions and special requirements may apply depending on the specific circumstances of the application.
question_ta: மணல் மற்றும் ஏற்றுமதி செய்யக்கூடிய கனிமத்திற்கான வர்த்தக அனுமதி பெறுவதற்கான விண்ணப்பத்தைச் சமர்ப்பிக்கும்போது, விண்ணப்பப் படிவம் மற்றும் சாத்தியமான விதிவிலக்குகள் குறித்து அத்தியாவசியத் தேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: விண்ணப்பதாரர்கள் குறிப்பிடப்பட்ட பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தைச் சமர்ப்பிக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் அது முழுமையாகவும் துல்லியமாகவும் நிரப்பப்பட்டுள்ளதை உறுதி செய்ய வேண்டும். விண்ணப்பத்தின் குறிப்பிட்ட சூழ்நிலைகளைப் பொறுத்து விதிவிலக்குகள் மற்றும் சிறப்புத் தேவைகள் இருக்கலாம் என்பதால், கோரப்பட்டால் கூடுதல் தகவல்களை வழங்கவும் அவர்கள் தயாராக இருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: වැලි සහ අපනයනය කළ හැකි ඛනිජ සඳහා වෙළඳ බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අයදුම්පතක් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේදී, අයදුම්පත්‍රය සහ ඇතිවිය හැකි ව්‍යතිරේක සම්බන්ධයෙන් අත්‍යවශ්‍ය අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: අයදුම්කරුවන් නම් කරන ලද පුරවන ලද අයදුම් පත්‍රය ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතු අතර, එය සම්පූර්ණයෙන් සහ නිවැරදිව පුරවා ඇති බවට සහතික විය යුතුය. අයදුම්පත්‍රයේ විශේෂ තත්ත්වය අනුව ව්‍යතිරේක සහ විශේෂ අවශ්‍යතා තිබිය හැකි බැවින්, ඉල්ලා සිටියහොත් අමතර තොරතුරු සැපයීමට ද ඔවුන් සූදානම් විය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Post Harvest Practices
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Training & Extension Services
Topic: Post-Harvest Technical Investment Assistance: Group Processing Centers
---
To increase the product quality of the export agricultural crops, post harvest technical investment assistance is provided under 3 schemes.

1.  For group processing center establishments.
2.  For central processing center establishments.
3.  For private processing center establishments.

Groups Eligible to Obtain the Assistance for the Group Processing Center Establishments

- Export Agricultural Crop cultivators farmer organizations
- Export agricultural crop cultivating farmers of the villagers where “Jathika Saviya” or “Janasaba” programmes are conducted.

Requirements to Fulfill

- To establish a crop processing center, adequate supply of export agricultural crop harvests must be there in that particular area.
- Should be an Active farmer organization and the organization must have adequate amount of funds for carrying out the operation.
- Submission of a project report.

Lands Selecting to Establish Processing Units

- Should be easily reachable.
- Processing units can be constructed even in a private land.
- If the land is owned by the government, the ownership of the land should be taken over to the Department of  Export Agriculture before constructions.
- Required funds for construct should be built up through external resources.
question_en: Which groups are eligible to receive post-harvest technical investment assistance specifically for establishing group processing centers?
answer_en: Export Agricultural Crop cultivators farmer organizations and export agricultural crop cultivating farmers of the villagers where “Jathika Saviya” or “Janasaba” programmes are conducted are eligible.
question_ta: குழு செயலாக்க மையங்களை நிறுவுவதற்காக அறுவடைக்குப் பிந்தைய தொழில்நுட்ப முதலீட்டு உதவியைப் பெற எந்தெந்த குழுக்கள் தகுதியுடையவை?
answer_ta: ஏற்றுமதி விவசாயப் பயிர் சாகுபடியாளர் விவசாய அமைப்புகள் மற்றும் "ஜாதிக சவிய" அல்லது "ஜனசபா" திட்டங்கள் நடத்தப்படும் கிராமங்களைச் சேர்ந்த ஏற்றுமதி விவசாயப் பயிர் சாகுபடியாளர்கள் தகுதியுடையவர்கள்.
question_si: කණ්ඩායම් සැකසුම් මධ්‍යස්ථාන පිහිටුවීම සඳහා අස්වනු නෙලීමෙන් පසු තාක්ෂණික ආයෝජන සහාය ලබා ගැනීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන කණ්ඩායම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: අපනයන කෘෂිකාර්මික භෝග වගා කරන්නන්ගේ ගොවි සංවිධාන සහ “ජාතික සවිය” හෝ “ජනසභා” වැඩසටහන් ක්‍රියාත්මක වන ගම්වල අපනයන කෘෂිකාර්මික භෝග වගා කරන ගොවීන් සුදුසුකම් ලබයි.

context:
Service: Investment Assistance for New Planting/Replanting of  Export Agricultural Crops
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Subsidies & Assistance for Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Topic: Investment Assistance for New Planting/Re-Planting - Overview and Eligibility
---
Who can apply: Farmers or Estates growing Cinnamon, Pepper, Coffee, Cocoa, Cardamom, Clove, Nutmeg, Vanilla, Lemon Grass and Citronella

Assistance Provided by the DEA under the Scheme:

- Required No. of certified planting material at free of charge
- Technical advices for cultivation
- Financial reward is given after 2-3 yrs of successful completion (90% planting stand) of cultivation

Crop | Spacing | No. of Plants/ha. at free of charge | Min years. needed to gualify for grant | Reward Payments
--- | --- | --- | --- | ---
Cinnamon | 1.2mx0.9m | 9000 | 02 | Rs. 20,000
Pepper | 2.4mx2.4m | 1750 | 03 | Rs. 25,000
Coffee (Arabica) | 1.8mx1.8m | 3000 | 03 | Rs. 35,000
Coffee (Robusta) | 2.4mx2.4m | 1100 | 03 | Rs. 20,000
Coffee (Catimor) | 1.8mx1.8m | 3000 | 03 | Rs. 20,000
Cardamom | 2mx2.5m | 2000 | 03 | Rs. 35,000
Clove | 6mx6m | 250 | 04 | Rs. 10,000
Nutmeg | 6mx6m | 250 | 04 | Rs. 15,000

Eligibility Criteria:

- Minumum eligible land extent - 0.2 ha (1/2Ac.)
- Minumum eligible land extent for " Jathika Saviya" or "Gama Naguma" programs - 0.1 ha (1/2Ac.)
- [Title of the Land](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=1161&task=info&back=0&pid=826) Must be produced to prove the ownership of the land. [Plan of the land](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=826) is necessary for lands over 2 ha.
question_en: What is the "Investment Assistance for New Planting/Replanting of Export Agricultural Crops" service about, and who is eligible to apply?
answer_en: This service provides assistance for new planting or replanting of export agricultural crops. Farmers or estates growing Cinnamon, Pepper, Coffee, Cocoa, Cardamom, Clove, Nutmeg, Vanilla, Lemon Grass, and Citronella are eligible to apply.
question_ta: ஏற்றுமதி விவசாயப் பயிர்களைப் புதிதாக நடுதல்/மீண்டும் நடுதல் முதலீட்டு உதவி சேவை எதைப் பற்றியது, யார் விண்ணப்பிக்கத் தகுதியானவர்கள்?
answer_ta: இந்தச் சேவை ஏற்றுமதி விவசாயப் பயிர்களைப் புதிதாக நடுதல் அல்லது மீண்டும் நடுதலுக்கு உதவியை வழங்குகிறது. கறுவா, மிளகு, கோப்பி, கொக்கோ, ஏலக்காய், கிராம்பு, ஜாதிக்காய், வனிலா, எலுமிச்சைப்புல் மற்றும் சிட்ரோனெல்லா பயிரிடும் விவசாயிகள் அல்லது தோட்ட நிறுவனங்கள் விண்ணப்பிக்கத் தகுதியுடையவர்கள்.
question_si: අලුතින් වගා කිරීම/නැවත වගා කිරීම සඳහා අපනයන කෘෂිකාර්මික භෝග සඳහා ආයෝජන සහය සේවාව කුමක් ගැනද සහ අයදුම් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව අපනයන කෘෂිකාර්මික භෝග අලුතින් වගා කිරීම හෝ නැවත වගා කිරීම සඳහා සහය සපයයි. කුරුඳු, ගම්මිරිස්, කෝපි, කොකෝවා, එනසාල්, කරාබුනැටි, සාදික්කා, වැනිලා, ලෙමන්ග්‍රාස් සහ සිට්‍රොනෙල්ලා වගා කරන ගොවීන් හෝ වතු අයදුම් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබයි.

context:

How to get a land for Agricultural Purposes ? Business Development Division

01 Qualifications Potential of Investment 02 Procedure of submitting the application(Where to get, Handover the application, counter a time) Submit a project proposal to the Business Development division of the Mahaweli Authority of Sri Lanka at the Office hours 03 Fee for the application Decide at the time being 04 Time for submission of application 8.30am to 4.00pm on working daysAmount payable for the service None 05 Time duration to get the service(Normal & Priority Services) 06 Decide according to the project 07 Relevant Documents 08 Information on financial potential along with the project proposal andspecial abilities of the applicant Staff Officers responsible for the service Director Business Development 011-2683038/011-2699220
