question_en: What is the procedure to obtain land for agricultural purposes and what documents are required?
answer_en: To obtain land for agricultural purposes, you need to submit a project proposal to the Business Development division of the Mahaweli Authority of Sri Lanka during office hours (8.30 am to 4.00 pm on working days). The required documents include information on financial potential along with the project proposal and special abilities of the applicant.
question_ta: விவசாய நோக்கங்களுக்காக நிலத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான செயல்முறை என்ன, மேலும் என்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவைப்படுகின்றன?
answer_ta: விவசாய நோக்கங்களுக்காக நிலத்தைப் பெற, நீங்கள் இலங்கை மகாவலி அதிகார சபையின் வணிக மேம்பாட்டுப் பிரிவுக்கு அலுவலக நேரத்தில் (வேலை நாட்களில் காலை 8.30 மணி முதல் மாலை 4.00 மணி வரை) ஒரு திட்ட முன்மொழிவைச் சமர்ப்பிக்க வேண்டும். தேவையான ஆவணங்களில் திட்ட முன்மொழிவுடன் நிதித் திறன் பற்றிய தகவல்களும் விண்ணப்பதாரரின் சிறப்புத் திறன்களும் அடங்கும்.
question_si: කෘෂිකාර්මික කටයුතු සඳහා ඉඩම් ලබා ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය කුමක්ද සහ අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: කෘෂිකාර්මික කටයුතු සඳහා ඉඩම් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා, ඔබ ශ්‍රී ලංකා මහවැලි අධිකාරියේ ව්‍යාපාර සංවර්ධන අංශයට කාර්යාල වේලාවන්හිදී (වැඩ කරන දිනවල පෙ.ව. 8.30 සිට ප.ව. 4.00 දක්වා) ව්‍යාපෘති යෝජනාවක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය. අවශ්‍ය ලේඛනවලට ව්‍යාපෘති යෝජනාව සමඟ මූල්‍ය විභවය පිළිබඳ තොරතුරු සහ අයදුම්කරුගේ විශේෂ හැකියාවන් ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: FCRDI-Field Crops: Solving field problems related to field crops
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Training & Extension Services
Topic: Field Problem Solutions: Crops, Requests, and Methods
---
Major disciplines covered: Pests, diseases, agronomy and physiological aspects and soil problems related to field crops and value added product development

Crops of which field problems are solved Maize, finger millet, minor millets,  chilli, onion, , green gram, black gram, cowpea, soybean, horse grain, sesame, groundnut, mustard, sunflower

To whom requests should be made regarding field problems Director, Field Crops Research and Development Institute, Mahailiuppallama

Methods of informing field problems By telephone, fax, letters, emails, through visiting the FCRDI

Who can obtain the service Farmers, public officials, private sector or any personnel interested

Basic information to be provided with the field problem Location, crop affected, name and address of the farmer, extent of land affected, brief description of the problem/ symptoms etc., cropping history, if possible a fresh sample of affected plant/ part/ soil should be produced with the problem, information regarding inputs used such as fungicides, insecticides, fertilizers, foliar applications etc., the route to reach the affected field
question_en: Who is eligible to obtain the field problem-solving service provided by FCRDI?
answer_en: Farmers, public officials, private sector personnel, and any other interested individuals are eligible to obtain this service.
question_ta: FCRDI வழங்கும் களப் பிரச்சனை தீர்க்கும் சேவையைப் பெறத் தகுதியுடையவர்கள் யார்?
answer_ta: விவசாயிகள், அரசு அதிகாரிகள், தனியார் துறை ஊழியர்கள் மற்றும் ஆர்வமுள்ள எந்தவொரு தனிநபரும் இந்தச் சேவையைப் பெறத் தகுதியுடையவர்கள்.
question_si: FCRDI මගින් සපයනු ලබන ක්ෂේත්‍ර ගැටලු විසඳීමේ සේවාව ලබා ගැනීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: ගොවීන්, රාජ්‍ය නිලධාරීන්, පෞද්ගලික අංශයේ පුද්ගලයන් සහ උනන්දුවක් දක්වන ඕනෑම අයෙකුට මෙම සේවාව ලබා ගැනීමට සුදුසුකම් ඇත.

context:
Service: FCRDI-Field Crops: Providing breeder seeds of OFC
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Procedure for Purchasing Maize Parental Lines and Contact Information
---
The procedure of purchasing maize parental lines Request should be made in writing to Director, Field crop Research and Development Institute, Mahailuppallama. Signing of an agreement to produce hybrid seeds with the Director General of Agriculture/ Department of Agriculture. Technical knowhow will be given from the FCRDI to the seed producers

From where maize parental lines can be purchased Contact Director, Field Crops Research and Development Institute, Mahailuppallama

Price Rs 500/= (Per Kg) for maize
question_en: What is the price per kilogram for purchasing maize parental lines?
answer_en: The price for purchasing maize parental lines is Rs 500/= per kilogram.
question_ta: சோள பெற்றோர் வகைகளை ஒரு கிலோகிராம் வாங்க எவ்வளவு விலை?
answer_ta: சோள பெற்றோர் வகைகளை ஒரு கிலோகிராம் வாங்க ரூ. 500/= ஆகும்.
question_si: බඩ ඉරිඟු මාතෘ රේඛා මිලදී ගැනීම සඳහා කිලෝග්‍රෑමයක මිල කොපමණද?
answer_si: බඩ ඉරිඟු මාතෘ රේඛා මිලදී ගැනීම සඳහා කිලෝග්‍රෑමයක මිල රුපියල් 500/= කි.

context:
Service: RRDI-Rice: Dissemination of proven technologies and newly improved rice varieties
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries Development
Topic: Beneficiaries and Requesting Services
---
To Whom / Beneficiary: All rice growing farmers, and Officers, Students & Teachers who need information on rice cultivation

How to obtain the service:? (i) Request by a letter to get permission to visit the Institute (ii) Request to participate training programs as a group

Fees payable to obtain ervices: (i)Free of charge for the officers who work in the Department of Agriculture, University and school students, Government Officers who participate as a group (ii) Charges for NGOs and private sector -Rs. 1200/= per day per seminar room for the group. -Rs. 1000/= per day for using multimedia projector. -Honorarium for Resource Person, if possible.

Time for submitting request: During office hours in working days 8.30am – 4.15 pm

Time for supplying the services: At the earliest

The responsible institute: Rice research and Development Institute, Bathalagoda, Ibbagamuwa TP? 037-2259881, 037-2258560, 037-2258561, 037-2258562 email rice@sltnet.lk

Staff Officer in charge of the service: Mr. BM Abeyrathne Assistant Director of Agriculture 94-37-2258562
question_en: What is the name of the institute responsible for providing the RRDI-Rice service?
answer_en: The Rice Research and Development Institute (RRDI) located at Bathalagoda, Ibbagamuwa is responsible for providing this service.
question_ta: RRDI-அரிசி சேவையை வழங்கும் பொறுப்புள்ள நிறுவனத்தின் பெயர் என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவையை வழங்குவதற்கு பத்தலஹோடா, இப்பாகமுவாவில் அமைந்துள்ள அரிசி ஆராய்ச்சி மற்றும் மேம்பாட்டு நிறுவனம் பொறுப்பாகும்.
question_si: RRDI-සහල් සේවාව සැපයීමට වගකිවයුතු ආයතනයේ නම කුමක්ද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සැපයීමට බතලගොඩ, ඉබ්බාගමුව හි පිහිටා ඇති සහල් පර්යේෂණ හා සංවර්ධන ආයතනය වගකිව යුතුය.

question_en: Who is the staff officer responsible for providing the license to manufacture or import animal feed, and what are their contact details?

question_ta: விலங்கு தீவனத்தை உற்பத்தி செய்ய அல்லது இறக்குமதி செய்ய உரிமம் வழங்குவதற்குப் பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி யார், அவர்களின் தொடர்பு விவரங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: டாக்டர் என். பிரியங்காரகே, விலங்கு தீவனப் பதிவாளர், இதற்குப் பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி ஆவார். அவர்களை 0812-385061 என்ற தொலைபேசி எண்ணிலோ அல்லது daph.animalfeed@gmail.com என்ற மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரியிலோ தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: සත්ව ආහාර නිෂ්පාදනයට හෝ ආනයනයට බලපත්‍ර ලබා දීමේ වගකීම දරන නිලධාරියා කවුද, සහ ඔවුන්ගේ සම්බන්ධතා තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: සත්ව ආහාර ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ නිලධාරී ලෙස නම් කර ඇති ආචාර්ය එන්. ප්‍රියංකරගේ මහතා මෙම සේවාව සඳහා වගකිවයුතු නිලධාරියා වේ. ඔහුව 0812-385061 ඔස්සේ දුරකථනයෙන් හෝ daph.animalfeed@gmail.com යන විද්‍යුත් තැපෑලෙන් සම්බන්ධ කරගත හැක.

context:
Service: Obtaining Permits for Transporting Timber
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Permits & Licenses
Topic: විශේෂ කරුණු (Part 2), සුදුසුකම් සහ සීමාවලට යටත් වන ගස්
---
බලපත්‍රයේ සඳහන් කරුණු ලැබූ කාලය වාහනයේ දෝෂයක් නිසා අතරමගදී වැඩිපුර කාලයක් ගත වන්නේ නම් අදාළ ප්‍රදේශයේ පොලීසියට දැනුම් දී අදාළ ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යලයට තමා සතු බලපත්‍රය පොලිස් වාර්තාව ඉදිරිපත් කොට අවසර ලබා ගත යුතු වේ.

සුදුසුකම්
ඉහත සඳහන් සීමාවලට යටත් වන දැව හැර වෙනත් දැව විය යුතුයි.
දැව ලබා ගන්නා ඉඩම පෞද්ගලික ඉඩමක් විය යුතුයි.

සීමාවලට යටත් වන ගස්
සීමිත දැව ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා බලපත්‍ර නිකුත් කරනු ලබන්නේ වන සංරක්ෂණ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවෙනි. ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යලය මගින් සීමිත යටත් නොවන දැව ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා බලපත්‍ර ලබාදේ.

සීමාවලට යටත් වන ගස් පහත සඳහන් වේ.
එබනි
කළු මැදිරිය
බුරුත
හුලංහික්
පලූ
සූරිය මාර
ගම් මාළු
හල්මිල්ල

question_en: Which government departments are responsible for issuing permits for timber transport based on whether the timber is restricted or not?
answer_en: The Forest Conservation Department issues permits for transporting restricted timber, while the Divisional Secretariat issues permits for transporting unrestricted timber.
question_ta: கட்டுப்படுத்தப்பட்ட அல்லது கட்டுப்படுத்தப்படாத மரங்களுக்கான போக்குவரத்து அனுமதிகளை வழங்கும் அரசுத் திணைக்களங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: கட்டுப்படுத்தப்பட்ட மரங்களை கொண்டு செல்வதற்கான அனுமதியை வனப் பாதுகாப்புத் திணைக்களம் வழங்குகிறது, அதே நேரத்தில் கட்டுப்படுத்தப்படாத மரங்களை கொண்டு செல்வதற்கான அனுமதியை பிரதேச செயலகம் வழங்குகிறது.
question_si: සීමිත හෝ සීමාවලට යටත් නොවන දැව ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා බලපත්‍ර නිකුත් කිරීමේ වගකීම කුමන රජයේ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවලට අයත්ද?
answer_si: සීමිත දැව ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා බලපත්‍ර වන සංරක්ෂණ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව විසින් නිකුත් කරනු ලබන අතර, සීමාවලට යටත් නොවන දැව ප්‍රවාහනය සඳහා බලපත්‍ර ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලය විසින් ලබා දේ.

context:

question_en: What are the required certificates or documents for obtaining approval for the importation of frozen fish and fish products?
answer_en: The required certificates include the Application form, Profoma Invoice, Specimen of the International Veterinary Health Certificate from the exporting country, Microbiological test report, and approval given by the Fisheries Department.
question_ta: உறைந்த மீன் மற்றும் மீன் பொருட்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான ஒப்புதலைப் பெறுவதற்குத் தேவையான சான்றிதழ்கள் அல்லது ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தேவையான சான்றிதழ்கள் விண்ணப்பப் படிவம், புரோஃபார்மா விலைப்பட்டியல், ஏற்றுமதி செய்யும் நாட்டிலிருந்து சர்வதேச கால்நடை சுகாதார சான்றிதழின் மாதிரி, நுண்ணுயிரியல் சோதனை அறிக்கை மற்றும் மீன்வளத் துறையால் வழங்கப்பட்ட ஒப்புதல் ஆகியவை அடங்கும்.
question_si: ශීත කළ මාළු සහ මාළු නිෂ්පාදන ආනයනය සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය සහතිකපත් හෝ ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: අවශ්‍ය සහතිකපත් අතර අයදුම් පත්‍රය, ප්‍රොෆෝමා ඉන්වොයිසිය, අපනයනය කරන රටෙන් ජාත්‍යන්තර පශු වෛද්‍ය සෞඛ්‍ය සහතිකයේ ආදර්ශයක්, ක්ෂුද්‍රජීවී පරීක්ෂණ වාර්තාව සහ ධීවර දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව විසින් ලබා දෙන ලද අනුමැතිය ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Obtaining a Training Program on Cinnamon Peeling
Main Category: Agriculture, Livestock & Fisheries
Subcategory: Training & Extension Services
Topic: Training Program on Cinnamon Peeling: Eligibility, Nature, and Application
---
Who can apply: Cinnamon Farmers, Farmer Groups or Community Based Organizations who are interested in learning recommended hygenic method of cinnamon peeling

Nature of the Service: Practical Training on cinnamon peeling is given by a group of skilled cinnamon peelers in selected cinnamon gardens

How to apply for the service: Request by a letter, Fax, TP call or by personelly visiting the Extension Officer based at the nearest Agrarian Service Centre (only on wednesdays 8.30 a.m - 4.15 p.m) or request to the District Assistant Director. Priority is given for the requests from Southern, Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces Requests can also be made to the Research Officer-In Charge, Cinnamon Research Station, Pallolpitiya, Thihagoda
question_en: Who is eligible to apply for the Training Program on Cinnamon Peeling and how can they apply for this service?
answer_en: Cinnamon Farmers, Farmer Groups, or Community Based Organizations who are interested in learning the recommended hygienic method of cinnamon peeling are eligible. They can apply by a letter, fax, telephone call, or by personally visiting the Extension Officer at the nearest Agrarian Service Centre (only on Wednesdays from 8:30 a.m. to 4:15 p.m.) or by requesting the District Assistant Director. Requests can also be made to the Research Officer-In Charge, Cinnamon Research Station, Pallolpitiya, Thihagoda.
question_ta: கறுவா உரிக்கும் பயிற்சித் திட்டத்திற்கு யார் விண்ணப்பிக்கத் தகுதியானவர்கள் மற்றும் இந்த சேவைக்கு அவர்கள் எவ்வாறு விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம்?
answer_ta: பரிந்துரைக்கப்பட்ட சுகாதாரமான கறுவா உரிக்கும் முறையைக் கற்க ஆர்வமுள்ள கறுவா விவசாயிகள், விவசாயக் குழுக்கள் அல்லது சமூக அடிப்படையிலான நிறுவனங்கள் தகுதியானவர்கள். அவர்கள் கடிதம், தொலைநகல், தொலைபேசி அழைப்பு மூலமாக அல்லது அருகிலுள்ள விவசாய சேவை மையத்தில் உள்ள விரிவாக்க அலுவலரை புதன்கிழமைகளில் காலை 8:30 மணி முதல் மாலை 4:15 மணி வரை நேரில் சந்திப்பதன் மூலமாக அல்லது மாவட்ட உதவி இயக்குநரைத் தொடர்புகொள்வதன் மூலமாக விண்ணப்பிக்கலாம். பல்லொல்பிட்டிய, திஹாகொடயில் உள்ள கறுவா ஆராய்ச்சி நிலையத்தின் பொறுப்பு ஆராய்ச்சி அதிகாரிக்கும் கோரிக்கைகளைச் சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம்.
question_si: කුරුඳු තැලීමේ පුහුණු වැඩසටහන සඳහා අයදුම් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද සහ ඔවුන්ට මෙම සේවාව සඳහා අයදුම් කළ හැක්කේ කෙසේද?
answer_si: නිර්දේශිත සෞඛ්‍යාරක්ෂිත කුරුඳු තැලීමේ ක්‍රම ඉගෙන ගැනීමට කැමති කුරුඳු ගොවීන්, ගොවි කණ්ඩායම් හෝ ප්‍රජා පාදක සංවිධාන සුදුසුකම් ලබයි. ඔවුන්ට ලිපියක්, ෆැක්ස්, දුරකථන ඇමතුමක් මඟින් හෝ ළඟම ඇති ගොවිජන සේවා මධ්‍යස්ථානයේ දිගුකාලීන නිලධාරීවරයා (බදාදා දිනවල පෙ.ව. 8:30 සිට ප.ව. 4:15 දක්වා පමණක්) පෞද්ගලිකව හමුවීමෙන් හෝ දිස්ත්‍රික් සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයාට ඉල්ලීමක් කිරීමෙන් අයදුම් කළ හැක. පල්ලොල්පිටිය, තිහගොඩ පිහිටි කුරුඳු පර්යේෂණ මධ්‍යස්ථානයේ වගකිවයුතු පර්යේෂණ නිලධාරීවරයාටද ඉල්ලීම් ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකිය.

context:

---
Securities

- Inter-se guarantee of two borrowers or
- Personal guarantee of two persons acceptable to the Bank or
- Any other security acceptable to the Bank

Documents

1. Personal loan application
2. Guarantors' Statements
question_en: What types of securities are acceptable for Krushi Nawodaya loans for agri businesses?
answer_en: Acceptable securities for Krushi Nawodaya loans include inter-se guarantee of two borrowers, personal guarantee of two persons acceptable to the Bank, or any other security acceptable to the Bank.
question_ta: விவசாய வணிகங்களுக்கான கிருஷி நவோதயா கடன்களுக்கு ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளப்படும் பிணையங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: கிருஷி நவோதயா கடன்களுக்கு ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளப்படும் பிணையங்களில் இரண்டு கடன் பெறுபவர்களின் பரஸ்பர உத்தரவாதம், வங்கிக்கு ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளக்கூடிய இரண்டு நபர்களின் தனிப்பட்ட உத்தரவாதம் அல்லது வங்கிக்கு ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளக்கூடிய வேறு எந்தப் பிணையமும் அடங்கும்.
question_si: කෘෂි ව්‍යාපාර සඳහා වන කෘෂි නවෝද්‍යා ණය සඳහා පිළිගත හැකි ඇපකර වර්ග මොනවාද?
answer_si: කෘෂි නවෝද්‍යා ණය සඳහා පිළිගත හැකි ඇපකර අතර ණය ගන්නන් දෙදෙනෙකුගේ අන්තර් ඇපකරය, බැංකුවට පිළිගත හැකි පුද්ගලයන් දෙදෙනෙකුගේ පුද්ගලික ඇපකරය හෝ බැංකුවට පිළිගත හැකි වෙනත් ඕනෑම ඇපකරයක් ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Providing Bonds & Guarantees
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Miscellaneous
Topic: Purpose, Administration and Contractor Registration with the CGF
---
It was in this context that the Construction Guarantee Trust/Fund (CGF) was established in 1999 as an Independent Trust with autonomy. Accordingly, the Trust/Fund is presently administered by a Board of Trustees represented from the Government and Private Sectors, under the Chairmanship of the Secretary to the Ministry incharge of the subject of construction.

The main objective of the Trust/Fund is to provide Bonds & Guarantees to Construction Contractors for them to provide Bonds & Guarantees and such other securities when Bidding & undertaking Construction Contracts and matters connected theirwith.

In order to obtain such securities the Construction Contractors who possess a valid Registration under the National Registration Scheme developed by Institute of Construction Training And Development (ICTAD).

The Construction Contractors who are interest in obtaining the services of CGF have first to register with CGF by providing the Company profile & other relevant details requested therein.
question_en: What is the main objective of the Construction Guarantee Trust/Fund (CGF)?
answer_en: The main objective of the Construction Guarantee Trust/Fund (CGF) is to provide Bonds & Guarantees to Construction Contractors for them to provide Bonds & Guarantees and such other securities when Bidding & undertaking Construction Contracts and matters connected therewith.
question_ta: கட்டுமான உத்தரவாத அறக்கட்டளை/நிதி (CGF) இன் முக்கிய நோக்கம் என்ன?
answer_ta: கட்டுமான ஒப்பந்தக்காரர்கள் கட்டுமான ஒப்பந்தங்களுக்கு ஏலம் எடுக்கும்போதும் மற்றும் மேற்கொள்ளும்போதும் பிணைமுறைகள், உத்தரவாதங்கள் மற்றும் பிற பாதுகாப்புகளை வழங்குவதற்காக, கட்டுமான உத்தரவாத அறக்கட்டளை/நிதி (CGF) அவர்களுக்கு பிணைமுறைகள் மற்றும் உத்தரவாதங்களை வழங்குவதே இதன் முக்கிய நோக்கமாகும்.
question_si: ඉදිකිරීම් ඇපකර භාරය/අරමුදල (CGF) හි ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ඉදිකිරීම් කොන්ත්‍රාත්කරුවන්ට ඉදිකිරීම් කොන්ත්‍රාත්තු සඳහා ලංසු තැබීමේදී සහ ඒවා භාර ගැනීමේදී ඇපකර සහ වෙනත් සුරැකුම්පත් සැපයීම සඳහා ඉදිකිරීම් ඇපකර භාරය/අරමුදල (CGF) විසින් ඇපකර සහ සහතික ලබා දීම ප්‍රධාන අරමුණයි.

context:
Service: Withdrawals from the Savings Accounts
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: Service Details and Limits
---
Staff Officers in charge of the Service

Exceptions or Instances Outside the Above Requirements and Special Information

1. Maximum amount through Post Offices - Rs. 15, 000.00
2. Maximum amount through Sub Post Offices - Rs. 5,000.00
3. No limit for the amounts payable through fax.

Specimen Form of Application: [C.L.G.2](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) Perfected Specimen Application Form
question_en: What are the maximum withdrawal limits for savings accounts through Post Offices and Sub Post Offices?
answer_en: The maximum withdrawal limit through Post Offices is Rs. 15,000.00 and through Sub Post Offices is Rs. 5,000.00.
question_ta: அஞ்சல் அலுவலகங்கள் மற்றும் துணை அஞ்சல் அலுவலகங்கள் மூலம் சேமிப்புக் கணக்குகளிலிருந்து அதிகபட்சமாக எவ்வளவு பணம் எடுக்க முடியும்?
answer_ta: அஞ்சல் அலுவலகங்கள் மூலம் அதிகபட்சமாக ரூ. 15,000.00 மற்றும் துணை அஞ்சல் அலுவலகங்கள் மூலம் ரூ. 5,000.00 எடுக்க முடியும்.
question_si: තැපැල් කාර්යාල සහ උප තැපැල් කාර්යාල හරහා ඉතුරුම් ගිණුම් වලින් ලබාගත හැකි උපරිම මුදල් ප්‍රමාණයන් මොනවාද?
answer_si: තැපැල් කාර්යාල හරහා රුපියල් 15,000.00 ක් සහ උප තැපැල් කාර්යාල හරහා රුපියල් 5,000.00 ක් උපරිම වශයෙන් ලබාගත හැක.

context:
Service: Income Statement
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Loans
Topic: පියවරෙන් පියවර පිළිවෙල සහ සටහන්
---
වැඩකරන වේලාවන්

පෙව 9 සිට ප.ව 4.30

පියවරෙන් පියවර පිළිවෙල (ආදායම් වාර්තාව ඉදිරිපත් කිරීම)

පියවර 1 අයදුම්කරු වලංගු ඉල්ලූම් පත්‍ර පෝරමය ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී තුමාගේ ලබා ගැනීම

පියවර 2 සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අයුද්ම පත්‍රය උපකාරක ලේඛන සමඟ ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම්

තුමා වෙත භාර දීම

සටහන: අවශ්‍ය අමතර ලියකියවිලි 1.5.12.7 අංශයෙන් පිටුව 171

පියවර 4 ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් ඉල්ලූම් පත්‍රයට අනුමැතිය දී ඉල්ලූම්කරුට ගෙවීම් කිරීම දැනුම්

දීම.

සටහන

අයදුම්කරුගේ ආදායම රුපියල් ලක්ෂයකට වඩා වැඩි නම් අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම්ගෙන් රුපියල් ලක්ෂයකට වඩා අඩු ආදායම් ලාභියෙක් නම් සහකාර ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් තුමාට අනුමැතිය දිය හැක.

පියවර 5 අදාළ මුදල් ගෙවීමෙන් පසු ආදායම් වාර්තාව සපයනු ලැබේ.
question_en: Who is responsible for approving the Income Statement application based on the applicant's income level?
answer_en: If the applicant's income is over LKR 100,000, the Divisional Secretary approves it. If the income is less than LKR 100,000, the Assistant Divisional Secretary can approve it.
question_ta: விண்ணப்பதாரரின் வருமான மட்டத்தின் அடிப்படையில் வருமான அறிக்கைப் படிவத்தை யார் அங்கீகரிக்கிறார்?
answer_ta: விண்ணப்பதாரரின் வருமானம் ஒரு இலட்சம் ரூபாய்க்கு மேல் இருந்தால், பிரதேச செயலாளர் அதை அங்கீகரிப்பார். வருமானம் ஒரு இலட்சம் ரூபாய்க்கு குறைவாக இருந்தால், உதவிப் பிரதேச செயலாளர் அதை அங்கீகரிக்கலாம்.
question_si: අයදුම්කරුගේ ආදායම් මට්ටම මත පදනම්ව ආදායම් වාර්තා අයදුම්පත අනුමත කරන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: අයදුම්කරුගේ ආදායම රුපියල් ලක්ෂයකට වඩා වැඩි නම්, ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම්වරයා එය අනුමත කරයි. ආදායම රුපියල් ලක්ෂයකට වඩා අඩු නම්, සහකාර ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම්වරයාට එය අනුමත කළ හැකිය.

context:
Service: Procedures of Bank of Ceylon
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Miscellaneous
Topic: Handling Deceased Account Holder's Funds (Part 2): Estates Above Rs. 500,000 and Joint Accounts
---
If value of deceased estate is more than Rs.500,000/- Testamentary proceeding under Civil law must be followed:

In the Event of Death of a Joint Account Holder Survivor is entitled to the balance standing in the account.Withdrawal from Savings Account in the event of account holder is Hospitalized –Signature of the withdrawal must be certified by the Doctor

Opening of Account to Blind Person

- Can be opened jointly with a close relative Weather money can be withdrawn/deposited to an account at a branch other than the branch whose account is maintained
- Can be withdrawn/deposited at any branch of the bank since all branches are inter-linked through computer network.

Liability of Guarantors: In the event of default of the borrower, liability of guarantor is also as same as liability of borrower.

Effect of Crossing of “Account Payee only” Proceeds of the cheques can be collected only to the payee’s account
question_en: What happens to the balance in a joint account upon the death of one of the account holders?
answer_en: Upon the death of a joint account holder, the survivor is entitled to the balance standing in the account.
question_ta: ஒரு கூட்டுக் கணக்கு வைத்திருப்பவர் மரணமடைந்தால், அந்தக் கணக்கில் உள்ள தொகைக்கு என்ன நடக்கும்?
answer_ta: ஒரு கூட்டுக் கணக்கு வைத்திருப்பவர் மரணமடைந்தால், கணக்கில் உள்ள தொகைக்கு உயிர் பிழைத்தவர் உரிமை பெறுவார்.
question_si: ඒකාබද්ධ ගිණුම් හිමියෙකු මිය ගිය පසු ගිණුමේ ශේෂයට කුමක් සිදුවේද?
answer_si: ඒකාබද්ධ ගිණුම් හිමියෙකු මිය ගිය පසු ගිණුමේ ශේෂය ඉතිරි වූ තැනැත්තාට හිමිවේ.

context:
Service: Ladies' Savings Account
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: Manavi – Ladies’ Savings Account: Eligibility and Required Documents
---
Manavi – Ladies’ Savings Account

1.Eligibility Being a Sri Lankan female above 18 years 2. Documents Required

- National Identity Card / Passport / Driving License
- Duly filled application form – Form A
- Signature card
- Cash credit slip

3.Time Required to Provide the Service 10 Minutes 4.Application Form Template See Individual Savings Accounts (Form A.pdf)
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria and required documents for opening a Manavi – Ladies’ Savings Account?
answer_en: To open a Manavi – Ladies’ Savings Account, an applicant must be a Sri Lankan female above 18 years. The required documents include a National Identity Card, Passport, or Driving License, a duly filled application form (Form A), a signature card, and a cash credit slip.
question_ta: Manavi – Ladies’ சேமிப்புக் கணக்கைத் திறப்பதற்கான தகுதித் தேவைகள் மற்றும் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: Manavi – Ladies’ சேமிப்புக் கணக்கைத் திறக்க, விண்ணப்பதாரர் 18 வயதுக்கு மேற்பட்ட இலங்கை பெண்மணியாக இருக்க வேண்டும். தேவையான ஆவணங்களில் தேசிய அடையாள அட்டை, கடவுச்சீட்டு அல்லது சாரதி அனுமதிப்பத்திரம், முறையாகப் பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட விண்ணப்பப் படிவம் (படிவம் A), கையொப்ப அட்டை மற்றும் பணக் கடன் சீட்டு ஆகியவை அடங்கும்.
question_si: මනාවි – කාන්තා ඉතිරි කිරීමේ ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක සහ අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: මනාවි – කාන්තා ඉතිරි කිරීමේ ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීමට නම්, අයදුම්කරු වයස අවුරුදු 18ට වැඩි ශ්‍රී ලාංකික කාන්තාවක් විය යුතුය. අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන අතර ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පත, විදේශ ගමන් බලපත්‍රය හෝ රියදුරු බලපත්‍රය, නිසි ලෙස සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අයදුම් පත්‍රය (ආකෘති පත්‍රය A), අත්සන් කාඩ්පතක් සහ මුදල් බැර කිරීමේ ස්ලිප් එකක් ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Income Statement
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Loans
Topic: සටහන්, සුදුසුකම්, ගෙවීම් සහ වගකීම
---
සටහන මුදල් ගෙවීම් 1.5.12.6 අංශය

සටහන

අයදුම්කරු ඉල්ලූම් පත්‍රයත් සමඟ උපකාරක ලිපි ඉදිරිපත් කළේ නැත්නම් ඉල්ලූම්

පත්‍රය අවලංගුවේ.

සුදුසුකම්

ඕනෑම ශ්‍රී ලංකා පුරවැසියෙකුට මෙම සේවාව ලබා ගත හැක

සේවය සඳහා ගෙවීම

වලංගු ආදායම් සහතිකයක් සඳහා 1.15 % අයදුම්කරුගේ ආදායමෙන්

සේවය සඳහා වගකීම

තනතුර අංශ භාර

ප්‍රාදේශිය ලේකම් ගරු ප්‍රාදේශිය ලෙකම්

ප්‍රධාන ලිපිකරු අයතන ලද අංශය ලේකම්
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria and payment structure for the Income Statement service, and what is the consequence of not submitting supporting documents?
answer_en: Any Sri Lankan citizen is eligible for the Income Statement service. The payment for a valid income certificate is 1.15% of the applicant's income. If supporting documents are not submitted with the application, the application will be invalidated.
question_ta: வருமான அறிக்கை சேவைக்கான தகுதி மற்றும் கட்டண அமைப்பு என்ன, துணை ஆவணங்களை சமர்ப்பிக்காததற்கான விளைவு என்ன?
answer_ta: எந்தவொரு இலங்கை குடிமகனும் வருமான அறிக்கை சேவைக்கு தகுதியானவர். செல்லுபடியாகும் வருமான சான்றிதழுக்கான கட்டணம் விண்ணப்பதாரரின் வருமானத்தில் 1.15% ஆகும். விண்ணப்பத்துடன் துணை ஆவணங்கள் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்படாவிட்டால், விண்ணப்பம் செல்லாது.
question_si: ආදායම් ප්‍රකාශ සේවාව සඳහා සුදුසුකම් සහ ගෙවීම් ව්‍යුහය කුමක්ද, සහ උපකාරක ලිපි ඉදිරිපත් නොකිරීමේ ප්‍රතිවිපාකය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ඕනෑම ශ්‍රී ලංකා පුරවැසියෙකුට ආදායම් ප්‍රකාශ සේවාව සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ඇත. වලංගු ආදායම් සහතිකයක් සඳහා අයදුම්කරුගේ ආදායමෙන් 1.15%ක් ගෙවිය යුතුය. අයදුම්පත්‍රයත් සමඟ උපකාරක ලිපි ඉදිරිපත් නොකළහොත් ඉල්ලුම් පත්‍රය අවලංගු වේ.

context:
Service: Small and Medium Enterprises (SME) Loan Scheme
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Loans
Topic: Eligibility Criteria and Required Documents for Economic Development Projects
---
To help economy of the country. Eligibility

1. Project assets should be between Rs.10 Mn. to Rs.50 Mn.
2. Project should be financially sound, technically feasible.
3. Project should be engaged in a value added activity.

Security

- Any movable property, immovable property, personal guarantee, etc. acceptable to the Bank.
- All project assets should be adequately insured and the policy should be assigned to the Bank.

Documents

1. [Loan application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/)
2. Personal guarantee application
3. If property mortgage, documents released
question_en: What is the asset value requirement for projects to be eligible for the Small and Medium Enterprises (SME) Loan Scheme?
answer_en: For a project to be eligible for the Small and Medium Enterprises (SME) Loan Scheme, its assets should be between Rs.10 Million to Rs.50 Million.
question_ta: குறு மற்றும் நடுத்தர நிறுவனங்களுக்கான கடன் திட்டத்திற்கு தகுதிபெற திட்டச் சொத்துக்களின் மதிப்பு எவ்வளவு இருக்க வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: குறு மற்றும் நடுத்தர நிறுவனங்களுக்கான கடன் திட்டத்திற்கு தகுதிபெற, திட்டச் சொத்துக்களின் மதிப்பு ரூ.10 மில்லியனிலிருந்து ரூ.50 மில்லியன் வரை இருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: සුළු හා මධ්‍ය පරිමාණ ව්‍යවසාය (SME) ණය යෝජනා ක්‍රමය සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට ව්‍යාපෘති වත්කම්වල වටිනාකම් අවශ්‍යතාවය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: සුළු හා මධ්‍ය පරිමාණ ව්‍යවසාය (SME) ණය යෝජනා ක්‍රමය සඳහා ව්‍යාපෘතියක් සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට නම්, එහි වත්කම් රුපියල් මිලියන 10 ත් 50 ත් අතර විය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Daily Deposit Collection Service
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: About the Door-to-Door Daily Savings Account
---
The Door-to-Door Daily Savings Account offers the convenience of having bank officers visit you daily to handle your banking needs. To benefit from this service, your workplace should be easily accessible within the areas currently covered: Borella, Punchi Borella, and Narahenpita. This service provides a unique blend of accessibility and personalized banking. An account holder who maintains a minimum balance of Rs. 15,000 and is under 75 years of age is eligible to nominate a beneficiary. This beneficiary will receive a life insurance payout of Rs. 25,00 for natural death and Rs. 200,000 for death due to an accident (excluding suicide). The insurance benefit becomes active after 03 months from the account opening date. To open an account, a minimum deposit of Rs. 100 is required. The account holder becomes eligible for the insurance benefit after 03 months, once the account balance reaches Rs. 15,000. For natural death claims, the benefits are available only after 90 days from the date of insuring.

A receipt, signed by a bank officer, will be provided for each day’s deposit. Additionally, the bank will send a monthly statement to each customer, ensuring transparency and easy tracking of account activity.
question_en: What are the insurance benefits offered with the Door-to-Door Daily Savings Account, and what are the eligibility criteria and activation period for these benefits?
answer_en: The Door-to-Door Daily Savings Account offers a life insurance payout of Rs. 25,000 for natural death and Rs. 200,000 for death due to an accident (excluding suicide). To be eligible to nominate a beneficiary for these benefits, an account holder must maintain a minimum balance of Rs. 15,000 and be under 75 years of age. The insurance benefit becomes active after 03 months from the account opening date, and the account balance must reach Rs. 15,000 for eligibility. For natural death claims, benefits are available only after 90 days from the date of insuring.
question_ta: வீட்டு வாசலுக்கே வரும் தினசரி சேமிப்புக் கணக்குடன் வழங்கப்படும் காப்பீட்டுப் பலன்கள் யாவை, மேலும் இந்த பலன்களுக்கான தகுதி மற்றும் செயல்படுத்தும் காலம் என்ன?
answer_ta: வீட்டு வாசலுக்கே வரும் தினசரி சேமிப்புக் கணக்கு இயற்கையான மரணத்திற்கு ரூ. 25,000 மற்றும் விபத்தினால் ஏற்படும் மரணத்திற்கு (தற்கொலை தவிர்த்து) ரூ. 200,000 ஆயுள் காப்பீட்டுப் பலனை வழங்குகிறது. இந்தப் பலன்களுக்கு ஒரு பயனாளிக்கு பரிந்துரைக்க தகுதிபெற, கணக்கு வைத்திருப்பவர் குறைந்தபட்சம் ரூ. 15,000 இருப்பைப் பராமரிக்க வேண்டும் மற்றும் 75 வயதுக்கு உட்பட்டவராக இருக்க வேண்டும். கணக்கு திறக்கப்பட்ட நாளிலிருந்து 03 மாதங்களுக்குப் பிறகு காப்பீட்டுப் பலன் செயல்படத் தொடங்கும், மேலும் தகுதிபெற கணக்கு இருப்பு ரூ. 15,000 ஆக இருக்க வேண்டும். இயற்கையான மரணத்திற்கான கோரிக்கைகளுக்கு, காப்பீடு செய்யப்பட்ட நாளிலிருந்து 90 நாட்களுக்குப் பிறகு மட்டுமே பலன்கள் கிடைக்கும்.
question_si: දොරින් දොරට දෛනික ඉතුරුම් ගිණුම සමඟ ලබා දෙන රක්ෂණ ප්‍රතිලාභ මොනවාද, එම ප්‍රතිලාභ සඳහා සුදුසුකම් සහ සක්‍රීය වන කාලය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: දොරින් දොරට දෛනික ඉතුරුම් ගිණුම ස්වභාවික මරණයක් සඳහා රු. 25,000ක් සහ අනතුරකින් සිදුවන මරණයක් සඳහා (සියදිවි නසාගැනීම් හැර) රු. 200,000ක ජීවිත රක්ෂණ ප්‍රතිලාභයක් ලබා දෙයි. මෙම ප්‍රතිලාභ සඳහා ප්‍රතිලාභියෙකු නම් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට, ගිණුම් හිමියා රු. 15,000ක අවම ශේෂයක් පවත්වාගෙන යා යුතු අතර වයස අවුරුදු 75ට අඩු විය යුතුය. ගිණුම විවෘත කළ දින සිට මාස 03කට පසුව රක්ෂණ ප්‍රතිලාභය සක්‍රිය වන අතර, සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට ගිණුම් ශේෂය රු. 15,000 දක්වා ළඟා විය යුතුය. ස්වභාවික මරණ හිමිකම් සඳහා, රක්ෂණය කළ දින සිට දින 90කට පසුව පමණක් ප්‍රතිලාභ ලබා ගත හැකිය.

context:
Service: GUIDELINES AND CONDITIONS APPLICABLE FOR THE ISSUE OF EXCISE LICENSES
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Taxes & Insurance
Topic: License Renewal and Application Process
---
The present holders of licences will not be entitled to automatic renewal thereof. On termination of the validity of a licence, if Licensee, so desires to renew his licence, an application should be forwarded at least fifteen (15) days prior to the expiry of such licence. Applications will be considered by the Commissioner General of Excise in terms of these guidelines and conditions, and subject to any other directions as stipulated in the Excise Ordinance. The application forms (as set out in Schedule II) must be obtained either from the Excise Head Office or from any Assistant Excise Commissioner's Office situated island wide, on payment of the relevant application fee. However, the issue of an application form to the applicant will not guarantee the grant of a license to such person. Applications must be completed in all respects and all required documents annexed. Incomplete application or applications submitted without the necessary documents and reports or which does not conform to the guidelines and conditions will be rejected . Completed applications should be addressed to the Assistant Excise Commissioner and forwarded under registered cover to the Office of the Assistant Excise Commissioner of the Province where the premises for which application is made on the prescribed form (as set out in Schedule II).
question_en: Where should completed applications for excise license renewal be submitted?
answer_en: Completed applications should be addressed to the Assistant Excise Commissioner and forwarded under registered cover to the Office of the Assistant Excise Commissioner of the Province where the premises for which application is made.
question_ta: மத்திய கலால் உரிமத்தைப் புதுப்பிப்பதற்கான பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட விண்ணப்பங்களை எங்கு சமர்ப்பிக்க வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட விண்ணப்பங்கள் உதவி கலால் ஆணையாளருக்கு முகவரியிடப்பட்டு, விண்ணப்பம் செய்யப்படும் வளாகம் அமைந்துள்ள மாகாணத்தின் உதவி கலால் ஆணையாளர் அலுவலகத்திற்கு பதிவு செய்யப்பட்ட அஞ்சல் மூலம் அனுப்பப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: අවසන් කරන ලද සුරාබදු බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීමේ අයදුම්පත් ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුත්තේ කොතැනටද?
answer_si: සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අයදුම්පත් සහකාර සුරාබදු කොමසාරිස්වරයා වෙත යොමු කර, අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කරන පරිශ්‍රය පිහිටා ඇති පළාතේ සහකාර සුරාබදු කොමසාරිස් කාර්යාලයට ලියාපදිංචි තැපෑලෙන් යැවිය යුතුය.

context:

Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: Eligibility, Application Process, and Fees
---
Eligibility Those who are 16 years or mare of age Minimum amount to the deposited at opening the account is Rs. 5.00

Process of Submitting Application Forms: Only on complaints Places From Where Application Forms can be Obtained: Post offices and Sub Post Offices.

Fees Payable for Obtaining Application Forms: No fee is charged.

Hours During Which Applications are to be Made: From 9:00 a.m to 5:00 p.m.

Fees Payable for Providing the Service : Nil

Time Taken to Provide the Service (Ordinary service and Priority Services) Immediately on submission of application

Supplementary Documents Required : [National Identity card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=723) or any other document t prove identity.

Staff Officers in Charge of the Service

- Single person- [Declaration A](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/)
- Joint Account - [Declaration C](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/)

Perfected Specimen Application Form
question_en: What supplementary documents are required to open a savings account?
answer_en: A National Identity card or any other document to prove identity is required.
question_ta: சேமிப்புக் கணக்கைத் திறக்க என்ன துணை ஆவணங்கள் தேவை?
answer_ta: தேசிய அடையாள அட்டை அல்லது அடையாளத்தை நிரூபிக்க வேறு ஏதேனும் ஆவணம் தேவை.
question_si: ඉතුරුම් ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය අතිරේක ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පතක් හෝ අනන්‍යතාවය ඔප්පු කිරීමට වෙනත් ලියවිල්ලක් අවශ්‍ය වේ.

context:
Service: Personal Loans
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Loans
Topic: Personal Loans: Repayment and Securities
---
Mode of repayment The borrower should agree to settle the loan and interest in equal monthly installments. Further, he should agree to open savings account in the bank and deposit required funds to the said account to settle the loan capital and interest. In addition to this account, the Bank may request to open a build up / compulsory savings accounts where withdrawals are restricted. Securities

- Guarantee of two persons acceptable to the bank.To obtain guarantors who have permanent employment( Government or Private)
- Security over movable assets (Eg. Vehicle/ Machinery etc.) if necessary,
- Other acceptable securities (Eg. Life insurance policy / Share certificate)
question_en: What are the acceptable types of securities required for obtaining a personal loan?
answer_en: For a personal loan, the bank generally requires the guarantee of two persons acceptable to the bank who have permanent employment. Additionally, if necessary, security over movable assets like vehicles or machinery, and other acceptable securities such as a life insurance policy or share certificate can be provided.
question_ta: தனிநபர் கடனைப் பெறுவதற்கு ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளக்கூடிய பாதுகாப்பு வகைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தனிநபர் கடனுக்காக, வங்கி பொதுவாக நிரந்தர வேலைவாய்ப்பு உள்ள மற்றும் வங்கிக்கு ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளக்கூடிய இரண்டு நபர்களின் உத்தரவாதத்தை கோருகிறது. மேலும், தேவைப்பட்டால், வாகனம் அல்லது இயந்திரங்கள் போன்ற அசையும் சொத்துக்களின் மீதான பாதுகாப்பு, மற்றும் ஆயுள் காப்பீட்டுப் பாலிசி அல்லது பங்குச் சான்றிதழ் போன்ற பிற ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளக்கூடிய பாதுகாப்புகள் வழங்கப்படலாம்.
question_si: පුද්ගලික ණයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා පිළිගත හැකි ඇපකර වර්ග මොනවාද?
answer_si: පුද්ගලික ණයක් සඳහා, බැංකුව සාමාන්‍යයෙන් බැංකුවට පිළිගත හැකි ස්ථිර රැකියාවක් ඇති පුද්ගලයන් දෙදෙනෙකුගේ ඇපයක් ඉල්ලා සිටී. ඊට අමතරව, අවශ්‍ය නම්, වාහන හෝ යන්ත්‍රෝපකරණ වැනි චංචල දේපල මත ඇපයක් සහ ජීවිත රක්ෂණ ඔප්පු හෝ කොටස් සහතික වැනි වෙනත් පිළිගත හැකි ඇපකරයන් ලබා දිය හැකිය.

question_ta: ஏற்கனவே வழங்கப்பட்ட TIN சான்றிதழில் பெயர் அல்லது முகவரியை மாற்றுவதற்கான தகுதி அளவுகோல் என்ன?
answer_ta: தங்கள் வணிகப் பெயர்களை அல்லது சான்றிதழில் குறிப்பிடப்பட்டுள்ள வணிக வளாகங்களின் முகவரியை மாற்றிய நபர்கள் தகுதியானவர்கள்.
question_si: දැනටමත් නිකුත් කර ඇති TIN සහතිකයක නම හෝ ලිපිනය වෙනස් කිරීම සඳහා වන සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායකය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: තම ව්‍යාපාරික නම් හෝ සහතිකයේ සඳහන් ව්‍යාපාර පරිශ්‍රයේ ලිපිනය වෙනස් කර ඇති පුද්ගලයින් සුදුසුකම් ලබයි.

context:
Service: Current Accounts  (Demand Deposit)
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: Cheque Validity, Savings Accounts, and Special Cases
---
Effect of "Account Payee only" crossing Proceeds of the cheques can be collected only to the payee's account

Effect of "Not negotiable" crossing Cheque can be negotiated/collected to a third party until notice of defect in previous owner's title to the cheque.

Validity period of a cheque A cheque is valid for a period? of6 months if validity period is not printed on the cheques.

SAVINGS ACCOUNTS

Lost of pass book Inform the Branch in writing obtain relevant formats, complete and return tothe branch to open a new account.

Withdrawal from Savings Account in the event of account holder is hospitalized- Signature of the withdrawal must be certified by the Doctor.

Opening of account to blind person Can be opened jointly with a close relative.
question_en: What is the standard validity period of a cheque if it is not explicitly printed on the cheque itself?
answer_en: If the validity period is not printed on the cheque, it is valid for a period of 6 months.
question_ta: காசோலையில் செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் அச்சிடப்படாவிட்டால், அதன் வழக்கமான செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் என்ன?
answer_ta: காசோலையில் செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் அச்சிடப்படாவிட்டால், அது 6 மாத காலத்திற்கு செல்லுபடியாகும்.
question_si: චෙක්පතක වලංගු කාලය එහි පැහැදිලිව මුද්‍රණය කර නොමැති නම්, එහි සම්මත වලංගු කාලය කොපමණද?
answer_si: චෙක්පතක වලංගු කාලය මුද්‍රණය කර නොමැති නම්, එය මාස 6 ක කාලයක් සඳහා වලංගු වේ.

Leasing Facility This will provide the leasing facility for all kind of vehicles use for both personal & business Purposes. The facility process with less interest & minimum documentation and procession within a reasonable short time period.

Details are attached in Annexure I (Leasing)

Leasing Application for Individual – Form I-E

Leasing Application for Corporate – Form II-E
question_en: What are the key features of the Leasing Facility for Vehicles?
answer_en: The Leasing Facility for Vehicles offers less interest, minimum documentation, and processing within a reasonable short time period for all kinds of vehicles used for both personal and business purposes.
question_ta: வாகனங்களுக்கான குத்தகை வசதியின் முக்கிய அம்சங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: வாகனங்களுக்கான குத்தகை வசதியானது தனிப்பட்ட மற்றும் வணிக நோக்கங்களுக்காகப் பயன்படுத்தப்படும் அனைத்து வகையான வாகனங்களுக்கும் குறைந்த வட்டி, குறைந்தபட்ச ஆவணங்கள் மற்றும் நியாயமான குறுகிய காலத்தில் செயலாக்கத்தை வழங்குகிறது.
question_si: වාහන සඳහා බදු දීමේ පහසුකමේ ප්‍රධාන ලක්ෂණ මොනවාද?
answer_si: වාහන සඳහා බදු දීමේ පහසුකම පුද්ගලික සහ ව්‍යාපාරික කටයුතු සඳහා භාවිතා කරන සියලුම වර්ගවල වාහන සඳහා අඩු පොලී, අවම ලේඛන කටයුතු සහ සාධාරණ කෙටි කාලයක් තුළ සැකසීම සපයයි.

context:
Service: Obtain Micro Finance Facilities
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Loans
Topic: Kantha Ran Diriya and Comprehensive Credit Scheme: Documents and Eligibility
---
Documents required

1. [Loan Application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/)
2. Guarantors' statements or other documents, if property mortgage.

Comprehensive Credit Scheme for Small Enterprises Development (SED) To commence of expand small scale enterprises. Eligibility

1. Should be a account holder of the Bank
2. Be able to bring a minimum equity of 20% of the project cost.
3. Should not be a defaulter of the Bank or any other institution.

Security

- Inter-se guarantee of two borrowers under the scheme.
- Any other security
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria for the Comprehensive Credit Scheme for Small Enterprises Development (SED)?
answer_en: To be eligible for the Comprehensive Credit Scheme for Small Enterprises Development (SED), an applicant should be an account holder of the Bank, be able to bring a minimum equity of 20% of the project cost, and should not be a defaulter of the Bank or any other institution.
question_ta: சிறு தொழில் மேம்பாட்டுக்கான விரிவான கடன் திட்டத்திற்கான (SED) தகுதி வரம்புகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: சிறு தொழில் மேம்பாட்டுக்கான விரிவான கடன் திட்டத்திற்கு (SED) தகுதி பெற, விண்ணப்பதாரர் வங்கியின் கணக்குதாரராக இருக்க வேண்டும், திட்டச் செலவில் குறைந்தபட்சம் 20% மூலதனத்தை வழங்க முடிந்திருக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் வங்கி அல்லது வேறு எந்த நிறுவனத்திற்கும் செலுத்த வேண்டிய தொகையில் தவறியவராக இருக்கக்கூடாது.
question_si: කුඩා ව්‍යාපාර සංවර්ධනය සඳහා වන පුළුල් ණය යෝජනා ක්‍රමය (SED) සඳහා සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක මොනවාද?
answer_si: කුඩා ව්‍යාපාර සංවර්ධනය සඳහා වන පුළුල් ණය යෝජනා ක්‍රමයට (SED) සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට නම්, අයදුම්කරු බැංකුවේ ගිණුම් හිමියෙකු විය යුතුය, ව්‍යාපෘති පිරිවැයෙන් අවම වශයෙන් 20% ක කොටස් ප්‍රාග්ධනයක් ගෙන ඒමට හැකි විය යුතුය, සහ බැංකුවට හෝ වෙනත් කිසිදු ආයතනයකට පෙර පැහැර හරින්නෙකු නොවිය යුතුය.

question_ta: சேமிப்பு சான்றிதழ்கள் அல்லது திறைசேரி பில்களுக்கான கணக்கைத் திறக்க தோராயமான கால அவகாசம் என்ன?
answer_ta: சேமிப்பு சான்றிதழ்கள் அல்லது திறைசேரி பில்களுக்கான கணக்கைத் திறக்க தோராயமான கால அவகாசம் 10 நிமிடங்கள் ஆகும்.
question_si: ඉතිරිකිරීමේ සහතික හෝ භාණ්ඩාගාර බිල්පත් සඳහා ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීමට ආසන්න කාලය කොපමණද?
answer_si: ඉතිරිකිරීමේ සහතික හෝ භාණ්ඩාගාර බිල්පත් සඳහා ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීමට ආසන්න කාලය විනාඩි 10 කි.

context:
Service: Obtain Small & Medium Loans
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Loans
Topic: Eligibility Criteria and Required Documents for Gamata Naya Enterprises
---
Gamata Naya Enterprises, operating outside Colombo and Gampaha Districts Eligibility

1. Total investment Rs.30 Mn. and above.
2. No employment generation should be 200 and above.
3. Preference will be given to projects using local products

Securities

- Movable or immovable property
- Mortgage over project assets property mortgage

Documents

1. [Loan Application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/)
2. Detailed project report
3. Ownership Certificate, Street line, Non-vesting certificates and Deeds for a mortgaged assets property mortgage
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria for Gamata Naya Enterprises to obtain Small & Medium Loans?
answer_en: Gamata Naya Enterprises operating outside Colombo and Gampaha Districts are eligible if their total investment is Rs. 30 Million and above, employment generation is below 200, and preference is given to projects using local products.
question_ta: சிறிய மற்றும் நடுத்தர கடன்களைப் பெறுவதற்கு "கமட்ட நயா" நிறுவனங்களுக்கான தகுதி வரம்புகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: கொழும்பு மற்றும் கம்பஹா மாவட்டங்களுக்கு வெளியே செயல்படும் "கமட்ட நயா" நிறுவனங்கள் ரூ. 30 மில்லியனுக்கும் அதிகமான மொத்த முதலீடு, 200 க்கும் குறைவான வேலைவாய்ப்பு உருவாக்கம் மற்றும் உள்ளூர் தயாரிப்புகளைப் பயன்படுத்தும் திட்டங்களுக்கு முன்னுரிமை அளிக்கப்படும் திட்டங்களுக்குத் தகுதியுடையவை.
question_si: කුඩා හා මධ්‍ය පරිමාණ ණය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ගමට ණය ව්‍යවසායන් සඳහා වන සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක මොනවාද?
answer_si: කොළඹ සහ ගම්පහ දිස්ත්‍රික්කවලින් පිටත ක්‍රියාත්මක වන ගමට ණය ව්‍යවසායන් සඳහා රුපියල් මිලියන 30 ක් හෝ ඊට වැඩි සම්පූර්ණ ආයෝජනයක්, සේවක ජනනය 200 ට අඩු විය යුතු අතර, දේශීය නිෂ්පාදන භාවිතා කරන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා මනාපය ලබා දෙනු ඇත.

Related Services Buy Publications
question_en: What is the specific topic related to RDB Accounts under the Bank Accounts subcategory?

question_ta: வங்கிக் கணக்குகள் துணைப்பிரிவின் கீழ் RDB கணக்குகள் தொடர்பான குறிப்பிட்ட தலைப்பு என்ன?
answer_ta: தலைப்பு 'தொடர்புடைய சேவைகள் மற்றும் வெளியீடுகளை வாங்குதல்' என்பதாகும்.
question_si: බැංකු ගිණුම් උපප්‍රවර්ගය යටතේ RDB ගිණුම් සම්බන්ධ නිශ්චිත මාතෘකාව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: මාතෘකාව 'අදාළ සේවා සහ ප්‍රකාශන මිලදී ගැනීම' වේ.

context:
Service: GUIDELINES AND CONDITIONS APPLICABLE FOR THE ISSUE OF EXCISE LICENSES
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Taxes & Insurance
Topic: Additional Requirements for Retail and Club Licences
---
With regard to retail liquor licences issued to Enterprises such as Super Markets/Grocery Stores and like enterprises proof of turnover should be supported by either a report from a recognized firm of auditors or from the Department of Inland Revenue confirming that the turnover of the applicant or the parent business/company of the applicant exceeded Rs. 72 million for the previous year.
With regard to applications for Club licences, applicants should submit the following reports in addition to the above-mentioned documents and reports.
(a) A Certificate of Registration under the Club Act, 17 of 1975.
(b) Documents to prove the continued existence of the Club for five (5) years immediately preceding the date of application. (This regulation is not applicable to current holders of licences.)
(c) Proof of Operating a Bank Account.
(d) A Certificate of Registration from the Ministry of Sports or Ministry of Social Services.
question_en: What are the additional requirements for obtaining Club Licences according to the guidelines?
answer_en: For Club Licences, applicants must submit a Certificate of Registration under the Club Act, 17 of 1975, documents proving the Club's continuous existence for five years immediately preceding the application date (this regulation is not applicable to current licence holders), proof of operating a bank account, and a Certificate of Registration from the Ministry of Sports or Ministry of Social Services.
question_ta: கிளப் உரிமங்களைப் பெறுவதற்கான மேலதிகத் தேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: கிளப் உரிமங்களுக்கு, விண்ணப்பதாரர்கள் 1975 இன் 17 ஆம் இலக்க கிளப் சட்டத்தின் கீழ் பதிவுச் சான்றிதழ், விண்ணப்பிக்கும் தேதிக்கு உடனடியாக முந்தைய ஐந்து ஆண்டுகளுக்கு கிளப் தொடர்ச்சியாக செயல்பட்டு வந்ததற்கான ஆவணங்கள் (தற்போதைய உரிமதாரர்களுக்கு இந்த விதிமுறை பொருந்தாது), வங்கிக் கணக்கு இயங்குவதற்கான ஆதாரம் மற்றும் விளையாட்டு அமைச்சு அல்லது சமூக சேவைகள் அமைச்சிடமிருந்து பதிவுச் சான்றிதழ் ஆகியவற்றை சமர்ப்பிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: ක්ලබ් බලපත්‍ර ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අමතර අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: ක්ලබ් බලපත්‍ර සඳහා, අයදුම්කරුවන් 1975 අංක 17 දරණ ක්ලබ් පනත යටතේ ලියාපදිංචි සහතිකයක්, අයදුම් කරන දිනට පෙර වසර පහක කාලයක් පුරා ක්ලබ් අඛණ්ඩව පැවති බවට ලේඛන (මෙම රෙගුලාසිය වත්මන් බලපත්‍රලාභීන්ට අදාළ නොවේ), බැංකු ගිණුමක් ක්‍රියාත්මක වන බවට සාක්ෂි, සහ ක්‍රීඩා අමාත්‍යාංශයෙන් හෝ සමාජ සේවා අමාත්‍යාංශයෙන් ලියාපදිංචි සහතිකයක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Small & Medium Scale Loans
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Loans
Topic: Securities and Guarantor Requirements for Loans
---
Securities
- The Bank does not provide facilities to customers with the intention of disposing their assets to recover the loan. However, securities are needed to resort to recovery as final alternative in case the facility is not repaid.

Loan below Rs.100,000/-

- 2 guarantors should be a permanent employee of a government or a corporate body. The salary / income of the guarantor should be over Rs.15000/- p.m. every effort should taken to obtain guarantors who have permanent employment. If the guarantor is not a permanent employee his/ her income / standing should be ascertained by an inspection. (the guarantor should have the capacity to repay the loan)
 
- An assignment of loan protection insurance policy to be obtained through the Bank from the recognized insurance company ( this condition may be waived on the discretion of the loan approving officer)
question_en: What are the guarantor requirements for small and medium-scale loans below Rs. 100,000/-?
answer_en: For small and medium-scale loans below Rs. 100,000/-, two guarantors are required. These guarantors should preferably be permanent employees of a government or a corporate body, with a monthly salary/income exceeding Rs. 15,000/-. If a guarantor is not permanently employed, their income or standing must be ascertained by an inspection to confirm their capacity to repay the loan. Additionally, an assignment of a loan protection insurance policy is generally required, though this condition may be waived at the discretion of the loan approving officer.
question_ta: ரூ. 100,000/- க்கும் குறைவான சிறிய மற்றும் நடுத்தர அளவிலான கடன்களுக்கான உத்தரவாததாரர் தேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: ரூ. 100,000/- க்கும் குறைவான சிறிய மற்றும் நடுத்தர அளவிலான கடன்களுக்கு, இரண்டு உத்தரவாததாரர்கள் தேவை. இந்த உத்தரவாததாரர்கள் அரசாங்க அல்லது பெருநிறுவனத்தின் நிரந்தர ஊழியர்களாக இருக்க வேண்டும், அவர்களின் மாத சம்பளம்/வருமானம் ரூ. 15,000/-க்கு மேல் இருக்க வேண்டும். உத்தரவாததாரர் நிரந்தர ஊழியராக இல்லாவிட்டால், கடனைத் திருப்பிச் செலுத்தும் திறனை உறுதிப்படுத்த அவர்களின் வருமானம் அல்லது நிலை ஆய்வு மூலம் கண்டறியப்பட வேண்டும். மேலும், கடன் பாதுகாப்பு காப்பீட்டுக் கொள்கை நியமிக்கப்பட வேண்டும், இருப்பினும் இந்த நிபந்தனை கடன் அங்கீகரிக்கும் அதிகாரியின் விருப்பத்தின் பேரில் தள்ளுபடி செய்யப்படலாம்.
question_si: රු. 100,000/- ට අඩු සුළු හා මධ්‍ය පරිමාණ ණය සඳහා ඇපකරුවන්ගේ අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: රු. 100,000/- ට අඩු සුළු හා මධ්‍ය පරිමාණ ණය සඳහා ඇපකරුවන් දෙදෙනෙකු අවශ්‍ය වේ. මෙම ඇපකරුවන් රජයේ හෝ සංස්ථාපිත ආයතනයක ස්ථිර සේවකයින් විය යුතු අතර, ඔවුන්ගේ මාසික වැටුප/ආදායම රු. 15,000/- ඉක්මවිය යුතුය. ඇපකරු ස්ථිර සේවකයෙකු නොවේ නම්, ණය ආපසු ගෙවීමට ඔවුන්ට ඇති හැකියාව තහවුරු කර ගැනීම සඳහා ඔවුන්ගේ ආදායම හෝ තත්ත්වය පරීක්ෂාවකින් තහවුරු කර ගත යුතුය. මීට අමතරව, ණය ආරක්ෂණ රක්ෂණ ඔප්පුවක් පැවරීම සාමාන්‍යයෙන් අවශ්‍ය වේ, නමුත් මෙම කොන්දේසිය ණය අනුමත කරන නිලධාරියාගේ අභිමතය පරිදි ඉවත් කළ හැකිය.

context:
Service: Children Accounts
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: Isuru Udana Account Details
---
Isuru Udana

- Designed for the newborn and children upto 5 years of age
- The account can be opened with a minimum deposit of Rs. 100/-
- "Isuru Udana" Gift Certificates in denominations of Rs. 200/- and Rs. 500/- can be? used to open an account or can be credited to an "Isuru Udana" Account
- Exciting gifts in line with the account balance
- Interest over the normal savings
- Obtain an "Isuru Udana" account with a special gift deposit within 5 years of your baby's birth,by presenting baby's birth certificate to the nearest People's Bank branch
- Interest on daily balances



Sisu Udana

- An ideal account for our future generation
- A Sisu Udana Account can be opened for children between 5-18 years of age with a minimum deposit of Rs. 100/-
question_en: What are the different children's accounts offered and their respective age eligibility?
answer_en: The context describes two children's accounts: Isuru Udana, designed for newborns and children up to 5 years, and Sisu Udana, suitable for children between 5 and 18 years of age.
question_ta: வழங்கப்படும் பல்வேறு குழந்தைகள் கணக்குகள் யாவை மற்றும் அவற்றின் வயதுத் தகுதிகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்த சூழலில், இரண்டு குழந்தைகள் கணக்குகள் விவரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளன: பிறந்த குழந்தைகள் மற்றும் 5 வயது வரையிலான குழந்தைகளுக்கான இசுரு உதாரண கணக்கு, மற்றும் 5 முதல் 18 வயது வரையிலான குழந்தைகளுக்கான சிசு உதாரண கணக்கு.
question_si: පිරිනමනු ලබන විවිධ ළමා ගිණුම් මොනවාද සහ ඒවාට අදාළ වයස් සුදුසුකම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම සන්දර්භය තුළ, ළමා ගිණුම් දෙකක් විස්තර කර ඇත: අලුත උපන් දරුවන් සහ වයස අවුරුදු 5 දක්වා ළමුන් සඳහා වන ඉසුරු උදාන ගිණුම සහ වයස අවුරුදු 5 සිට 18 දක්වා ළමුන් සඳහා සුදුසු සිසු උදාන ගිණුම.

context:
Service: Wanitha Shakthi Bank Societies
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: Overview of Wanitha Shakthi Bank Societies and Account Types
---
The Wanitha Shakthi Bank Societies accumulate capital through various sources, including: 1. Membership shares 2. Savings of members 3. Savings of Children 4. Savings of Non members 5. Loan Interests 6. Local and foreign grants. The following types of accounts are available: 1. Members’ Savings Account: Members of Women’s Societies can open this account individually. 2. Non-members’ Savings Account: Non-members of Women’s Societies can open this account. 3. Children’s Savings Account: This account can be opened for the Women’s Societies members’ children. Account holders obtain 6% monthly interest for all types of accounts.

Eligibility requirements include: 1. Applicant residing within the relevant Grama Niladhari Division. 2. Applicant being over 18 years of age (This eligibility is not applicable for Children Savings Account). 3. To open a Member’s Savings Account, the applicant should be a member of a Women’s Society and should be a group or individual shareholder of the Wanitha Bank Society. A group of 5 women is known as one Group Share Holder. 4. To open a Children’s Savings Account, the child’s mother should be a member of Women’s Society and the child should be under 18 years of age. Anyone can apply for a non-members’ Savings Account.
question_en: What are the different types of savings accounts offered by Wanitha Shakthi Bank Societies?
answer_en: The Wanitha Shakthi Bank Societies offer three types of savings accounts: Members’ Savings Account, Non-members’ Savings Account, and Children’s Savings Account.
question_ta: வனிதா சக்தி வங்கி சங்கங்கள் வழங்கும் பல்வேறு வகையான சேமிப்புக் கணக்குகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: வனிதா சக்தி வங்கி சங்கங்கள் மூன்று வகையான சேமிப்புக் கணக்குகளை வழங்குகின்றன: உறுப்பினர்கள் சேமிப்புக் கணக்கு, உறுப்பினரல்லாதோர் சேமிப்புக் கணக்கு மற்றும் குழந்தைகள் சேமிப்புக் கணக்கு.
question_si: වනිtha ශක්ති බැංකු සමිති මගින් ලබා දෙන විවිධ වර්ගයේ ඉතුරුම් ගිණුම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: වනිtha ශක්ති බැංකු සමිති සාමාජික ඉතුරුම් ගිණුම, සාමාජික නොවන ඉතුරුම් ගිණුම සහ ළමා ඉතුරුම් ගිණුම යන ඉතුරුම් ගිණුම් වර්ග තුනක් ලබා දෙයි.

context:

---
ආදායමි සහතිකහක් නිකුත් කිරීම

කාලසීමාව

ක්‍රියාවලියේ කාලසීමාව

ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් ආදායම් වාර්තාව ඉදිරිපත් කිරීම : දවසක් තුළ

ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේ කාලසීමාව

ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යලය වැඩ කරන දවස් හා වේලාවන් තුළදී

වලංගු කාලය

මාස 6

වැඩ කරන දවස් / වේලාවන්

ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලය (පිහිටු වන ලද අංශය) උදේ 9.00 සිට සවස 4.30

සඳුදා බඳාදා

අයදුම්පත් ලබා ගැනීම

අයදුම්කරු ග්‍රාම නිළදාරීතුමා ගෙන් අයදුම්පත් ලබාගත යුතුය

- සියළු තොරතුරු වලින් හා සියළු අවශ්‍යතා අයදුම්පතෙහි සදහන් කල යුතුය අයදුම්පත්ර

වැඩ කරන දින

සදුදා සහ බදාදා
question_en: On which days can an application for an income certificate be submitted at the Divisional Secretariat?
answer_en: Applications for an income certificate can be submitted on Monday and Wednesday.
question_ta: பிரதேச செயலகத்தில் வருமானச் சான்றிதழுக்கான விண்ணப்பத்தை எந்தெந்த நாட்களில் சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம்?
answer_ta: வருமானச் சான்றிதழுக்கான விண்ணப்பங்களை திங்கள் மற்றும் புதன் கிழமைகளில் சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம்.
question_si: ආදායම් සහතිකයක් සඳහා වන අයදුම්පත් ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයට භාර දිය හැකි දින මොනවාද?
answer_si: ආදායම් සහතිකයක් සඳහා වන අයදුම්පත් සඳුදා සහ බදාදා දිනවල භාර දිය හැකිය.

context:

---
Services Available

question_en: What services are available to Bank of Ceylon account holders through Ceybank Insurance Services?
answer_en: Bank of Ceylon account holders can submit their insurance claims directly to the Ceybank Insurance Services Unit and can obtain insurance cover for travel, Motor fire, etc.
question_ta: இலங்கை வங்கி கணக்கு வைத்திருப்பவர்களுக்கு சேவ்பேங்க் காப்பீட்டு சேவைகள் மூலம் கிடைக்கும் சேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: இலங்கை வங்கி கணக்கு வைத்திருப்பவர்கள் தங்கள் காப்பீட்டு கோரிக்கைகளை நேரடியாக சேவ்பேங்க் காப்பீட்டு சேவைகள் பிரிவில் சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம் மற்றும் பயணம், மோட்டார் தீவிபத்து போன்றவற்றுக்கு காப்பீட்டு பாதுகாப்பை பெறலாம்.
question_si: ලංකා බැංකු ගිණුම් හිමියන්ට සෙයිබෑන්ක් රක්ෂණ සේවා මගින් ලබාගත හැකි සේවා මොනවාද?
answer_si: ලංකා බැංකු ගිණුම් හිමියන්ට ඔවුන්ගේ රක්ෂණ හිමිකම් සෙයිබෑන්ක් රක්ෂණ සේවා ඒකකයට කෙලින්ම ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකි අතර, සංචාරක, මෝටර් ගිනි ආවරණ වැනි රක්ෂණ ආවරණ ලබා ගත හැක.

context:
Service: Obtaining Tax Clearance Certificate for Those Who do not have Income Tax File or PAYE File
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Taxes & Insurance
Topic: Remittance Eligibility and Application Submission
---
Ex: Liquor license, leaving the country Remittance of money to the foreign countries

Eligibility
- If total remittance exceeds $ 10,000

Process of Submitting Applications
- Tax Payer Service Unit: 1st Floor, Department of Inland Revenue, Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha, colombo 02

Places from where Applications can be Obtained
- From Tax Payer Service Unit: 1st Floor, Department of Inland Revenue, Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha, colombo 02

Fees Payable for Obtaining Application Forms
- Nil

Hours for Submitting Applications
- From 8:30 a.m. to 4:15 p.m.

Fees Payable to Obtaining the Service
- Nil

Supporting Documents Required
- when leaving the country- attached to the application.
- For other purpose- If person engaged in trade, business, carrier or employment must submit a statement of account.
question_en: Who can obtain the Tax Clearance Certificate service described?
answer_en: This Tax Clearance Certificate service is for individuals who do not have an Income Tax File or PAYE File.
question_ta: விவரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ள வரி அனுமதிச் சான்றிதழ் சேவையை யார் பெறலாம்?
answer_ta: இந்த வரி அனுமதிச் சான்றிதழ் சேவையானது வருமான வரி கோப்பு அல்லது PAYE கோப்பு இல்லாதவர்களுக்கானது.
question_si: විස්තර කර ඇති බදු නිෂ්කාශන සහතික සේවාව ලබා ගත හැක්කේ කාටද?
answer_si: මෙම බදු නිෂ්කාශන සහතික සේවාව ආදායම් බදු ගොනුවක් හෝ PAYE ගොනුවක් නොමැති පුද්ගලයන් සඳහා වේ.

context:
Service: Other Special Savings Accounts Schemes
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: Kantha Ran Ginum & Senior Citizens Fixed Deposit Eligibility
---
Kantha Ran Ginum Eligibility Criteria

- Sri Lankan Women over 18 years of age

Required Documents

1. [National Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=802) or any other documents for identification
2. Duly completed Mandate ( [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) )
3. Initial deposit of Rs.500/-

Time Duration for opening of the A/c

- 10 Minutes approx.

Benefits

- Free Life & Medical Insurance Cover
- Credit Facility for self-employment
- Free Upsara Credit Card

Senior Citizens Fixed Deposit Eligibility Criteria

- Sri Lankan Citizens over 55 years of age
- [National Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=802) or Any other documentary evidence for identification
- Duly completed Mandate( [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) )
- Signature Card

Time Duration for opening of the A/c

- 10 Minutes approx.
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria and benefits for opening a Kantha Ran Ginum account?
answer_en: To open a Kantha Ran Ginum account, Sri Lankan women over 18 years of age are eligible. Benefits include Free Life & Medical Insurance Cover, Credit Facility for self-employment, and a Free Upsara Credit Card.
question_ta: காந்த ரன் கணக்கைத் திறப்பதற்கான தகுதிகள் மற்றும் நன்மைகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: காந்த ரன் கணக்கைத் திறக்க, 18 வயதுக்கு மேற்பட்ட இலங்கை பெண்கள் தகுதியுடையவர்கள். நன்மைகளில் இலவச ஆயுள் மற்றும் மருத்துவ காப்பீடு, சுயதொழிலுக்கான கடன் வசதி மற்றும் இலவச உப்சரா கடன் அட்டை ஆகியவை அடங்கும்.
question_si: කාන්තා රන් ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් සහ ප්‍රතිලාභ මොනවාද?
answer_si: කාන්තා රන් ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීම සඳහා වයස අවුරුදු 18ට වැඩි ශ්‍රී ලාංකික කාන්තාවන් සුදුසුකම් ලබයි. ප්‍රතිලාභ අතර නොමිලේ ජීවිත හා වෛද්‍ය රක්ෂණ ආවරණය, ස්වයං රැකියාවන් සඳහා ණය පහසුකම් සහ නොමිලේ උප්සරා ක්‍රෙඩිට් කාඩ්පතක් ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Ordinary Savings Accounts
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Bank Accounts
Topic: Cooperative Society Accounts: Eligibility, Documents and Application
---
(d) Cooperative Society Accounts 1.Eligibility Being registered as a cooperative society in Sri Lanka 2.Documents Required •Duly filled application form – Form C •Signature Cards (one per each person operating the account) •Cash credit slip •A certified copy of the Annual General Meeting 3.time Required to Provide the Service 15 Minutes 4.Application Form Template Form C_en.pdf
question_en: What documents are required to open a Cooperative Society Account?
answer_en: To open a Cooperative Society Account, you need a duly filled application form (Form C), signature cards (one per each person operating the account), a cash credit slip, and a certified copy of the Annual General Meeting.
question_ta: கூட்டுறவு சங்க கணக்கைத் திறக்க என்னென்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவை?
answer_ta: கூட்டுறவு சங்க கணக்கைத் திறக்க, முறையாக நிரப்பப்பட்ட விண்ணப்பப் படிவம் (படிவம் C), கையொப்ப அட்டைகள் (கணக்கை இயக்கும் ஒவ்வொருவருக்கும் ஒன்று), ரொக்கக் கடன் சீட்டு மற்றும் ஆண்டுப் பொதுக் கூட்டத்தின் சான்றளிக்கப்பட்ட நகல் ஆகியவை தேவை.
question_si: සමුපකාර සමිති ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි මොනවාද?
answer_si: සමුපකාර සමිති ගිණුමක් විවෘත කිරීමට, නිසි පරිදි සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අයදුම් පත්‍රය (ආකෘති පත්‍රය C), අත්සන් කාඩ්පත් (ගිණුම ක්‍රියාත්මක කරන සෑම පුද්ගලයෙකුටම එක බැගින්), මුදල් ණය පත්‍රිකාවක් සහ වාර්ෂික මහා සභා රැස්වීමේ සහතික කළ පිටපතක් අවශ්‍ය වේ.

context:
Service: Obtaining Detailed Meteorological Reports for Insurance Claims
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Taxes & Insurance
Topic: Eligibility, Requesting Procedure, and Application Details
---
Eligibility: Any person or institute can be obtained this service by making payments.

Requesting Procedure:

Application Counters: It is most suitable to contact the Meteorologist in Charge in NMC

Payments for Application Forms: None

Time to Submit the Application Forms: 9:00am to 3:00pm on week days

Service Charges: Payment depends on the time period of the weather report.

The Time for the Service (Normal and Prime Services): The time will be decided on the data and information in the report.

Required Documents: It is necessary to providing a complete description about the Time Period or Time, Location and Area (Sea – Land) of weather report is needed by the person/institute with Telephone, Fax numbers and Address Responsible Executive Officers:
question_en: What documents are required to obtain Detailed Meteorological Reports for Insurance Claims?
answer_en: To obtain detailed meteorological reports, it is necessary to provide a complete description about the time period or time, location and area (sea – land) of the weather report. Additionally, the person or institute needs to provide their telephone, fax numbers, and address.
question_ta: காப்பீட்டு உரிமைகோரல்களுக்கான விரிவான வானிலை அறிக்கைகளைப் பெற என்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவை?
answer_ta: விரிவான வானிலை அறிக்கைகளைப் பெற, வானிலை அறிக்கையின் காலம் அல்லது நேரம், இருப்பிடம் மற்றும் பகுதி (கடல் - நிலம்) பற்றிய முழுமையான விளக்கத்தை வழங்குவது அவசியம். கூடுதலாக, தனிநபர் அல்லது நிறுவனம் தங்கள் தொலைபேசி, தொலைநகல் எண்கள் மற்றும் முகவரியை வழங்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: රක්ෂණ හිමිකම් සඳහා සවිස්තරාත්මක කාලගුණ විද්‍යා වාර්තා ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: සවිස්තරාත්මක කාලගුණ විද්‍යා වාර්තා ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා, කාලගුණ වාර්තාවේ කාලය හෝ වේලාව, ස්ථානය සහ ප්‍රදේශය (මුහුද - ගොඩබිම) පිළිබඳ සම්පූර්ණ විස්තරයක් සැපයීම අවශ්‍ය වේ. ඊට අමතරව, පුද්ගලයා හෝ ආයතනය ඔවුන්ගේ දුරකථන, ෆැක්ස් අංක සහ ලිපිනය සැපයිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Obtain Loans for Agri Businesses
Main Category: Banking, Tax & Insurance
Subcategory: Loans
Topic: Kapruka Loan Scheme: Eligibility and Securities
---
“Kapruka” Loan Scheme A loan scheme to promote Coconut Development in collaboration with Coconut Cultivation Board. Eligibility

- Be an account holder of the Bank
- Not be a defaulter of the Bank or any other financial institutions.
- Be able to bring 25% of the project cost.

Securities

- Two other borrowers or Guarantee of two persons accepted to the Bank
- Any other security acceptable to the Bank.
question_en: What is the primary objective of the "Kapruka" Loan Scheme and which board does it collaborate with?
answer_en: The primary objective of the "Kapruka" Loan Scheme is to promote Coconut Development, and it collaborates with the Coconut Cultivation Board.
question_ta: "கப்ருகா" கடன் திட்டத்தின் முதன்மை நோக்கம் என்ன, மேலும் இது எந்த சபையுடன் இணைந்து செயல்படுகிறது?
answer_ta: "கப்ருகா" கடன் திட்டத்தின் முதன்மை நோக்கம் தென்னை அபிவிருத்தியை மேம்படுத்துவதாகும், மேலும் இது தென்னைச் செய்கை சபையுடன் இணைந்து செயல்படுகிறது.
question_si: "කප්රුක" ණය යෝජනා ක්‍රමයේ ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ කුමක්ද සහ එය කුමන මණ්ඩලයක් සමඟ සහයෝගයෙන් ක්‍රියාත්මක වේද?
answer_si: "කප්රුක" ණය යෝජනා ක්‍රමයේ ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ පොල් සංවර්ධනය ප්‍රවර්ධනය කිරීම වන අතර, එය පොල් වගා කිරීමේ මණ්ඩලය සමඟ සහයෝගයෙන් ක්‍රියාත්මක වේ.
