question_ta: வெளிநாட்டு பண அஞ்சல் ஆணைகள் மற்றும் பிரிட்டிஷ் அஞ்சல் ஆணைகள் சேவை மூலம் பணம் மோசடியாகப் பெறப்பட்டால் யாரைத் தொடர்புகொள்ள வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: பணம் மோசடியாகப் பெறப்பட்டால், அஞ்சல் திணைக்களத்தின் விசாரணைக் கட்டுப்பாட்டாளரிடம் இந்த விடயம் தெரிவிக்கப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: විදේශ මුදල් ඇණවුම් සහ බ්‍රිතාන්‍ය තැපැල් ඇණවුම් සේවාව හරහා මුදල් වංචනික ලෙස ලබාගෙන තිබේ නම් සම්බන්ධ කරගත යුත්තේ කවුද?
answer_si: මුදල් වංචනික ලෙස ලබාගෙන තිබේ නම්, තැපැල් දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ විමර්ශන පාලක වෙත මෙම කාරණය යොමු කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Department of Motor Traffic
Main Category: Communication & Media
Subcategory: Licenses & Permits
Topic: Overview of the Department of Motor Traffic and its Functions
---
The Department of Motor Traffic was established in 1928 with a view of performing the functions stipulated under the Motor Traffic Act. Its functions assigned under the Act are:

Functions

- The registration and transfer of ownership of motorized vehicles in terms of the regulations under the MTA.
- The licensing of drivers of motor vehicles on certification of competence.
- The monitoring of the operation of vehicles in terms of road worthiness and pollution.
- The investigation of vehicles involved in road accidents.
- Updating the regulations with respect to standards in the registration and operation of all motorized vehicles.
- The collection of relevant taxes based on motor vehicle

Contact Details : Department of Motor Traffic No. 341, Alvitigala Mawatha, Narahenpita. Colombo-5.

Website :- [www.motortraffic.gov.lk](http://www.motortraffic.gov.lk)

Tel: +94-11-2694331 / +94-11-2694332 / +94-11-2694333 / +94-11-2694334 / +94-11-2694335 Fax: +94-11-11-2694338
question_en: When was the Department of Motor Traffic established and what is its primary purpose?
answer_en: The Department of Motor Traffic was established in 1928 with the primary purpose of performing the functions stipulated under the Motor Traffic Act.
question_ta: மோட்டார் போக்குவரத்து திணைக்களம் எப்போது நிறுவப்பட்டது மற்றும் அதன் முதன்மை நோக்கம் என்ன?
answer_ta: மோட்டார் போக்குவரத்து திணைக்களம் 1928 இல் நிறுவப்பட்டது மற்றும் மோட்டார் போக்குவரத்துச் சட்டத்தின் கீழ் குறிப்பிடப்பட்டுள்ள பணிகளைச் செய்வதே அதன் முதன்மை நோக்கமாகும்.
question_si: මෝටර් රථ ප්‍රවාහන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව ස්ථාපිත කරන ලද්දේ කවදාද සහ එහි ප්‍රාථමික අරමුණ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: මෝටර් රථ ප්‍රවාහන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව 1928 දී ස්ථාපිත කරන ලද අතර, මෝටර් රථ ප්‍රවාහන පනත යටතේ නියම කර ඇති කාර්යයන් ඉටු කිරීම එහි ප්‍රාථමික අරමුණයි.

context:
Service: Re-validating of a Lapsed Money Order
Main Category: Communication & Media
Subcategory: Postal Service
Topic: Eligibility, Application Process and Fees
---
Eligibility The complaint can be made by the person who sent the money order or the person in favour of whom it was sent or any other person connected with it.

Process of Submitting Applications Places From Where Applications can be Obtained Controller of Money Order Services, All Post Offices, Sub Post Office and Agency Post Offices.

Fees for Obtaining Application Forms : Nil

Hours for Submitting Applications Any time during which the above Post Offices including the Money Order Services Office are open.

Fees Payable for Obtaining the Service : Revalidation fees

Time Taken for Providing the Service (Ordinary Services and Priority Services): Approximately two weeks.
question_en: What is the service described, and who is eligible to make a complaint or request for it?
answer_en: The service described is 'Re-validating of a Lapsed Money Order'. The complaint can be made by the person who sent the money order, the person in whose favour it was sent, or any other person connected with it.
question_ta: விவரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ள சேவை என்ன, அதற்கு யார் தகுதியானவர்கள்?
answer_ta: விவரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ள சேவை 'காலாவதியான பண அஞ்சலை மறு செல்லுபடியாக்குதல்' ஆகும். பண அஞ்சலை அனுப்பியவர், யாருக்கு அது அனுப்பப்பட்டதோ அவர் அல்லது அதனுடன் தொடர்புடைய வேறு எவரேனும் அதற்கான புகாரை அளிக்கலாம்.
question_si: විස්තර කර ඇති සේවාව කුමක්ද, සහ ඒ සඳහා පැමිණිල්ලක් කිරීමට හෝ ඉල්ලීමක් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: විස්තර කර ඇති සේවාව 'කල් ඉකුත් වූ මුදල් ඇණවුමක් නැවත වලංගු කිරීම' වේ. මුදල් ඇණවුම යැවූ තැනැත්තාට, එය යවනු ලැබූ තැනැත්තාට හෝ ඊට සම්බන්ධ වෙනත් ඕනෑම පුද්ගලයෙකුට පැමිණිල්ලක් කළ හැකිය.

context:
Service: Renewal of Licenses - Repairers, Manufacturers and Sellers
Main Category: Communication & Media
Subcategory: Licenses & Permits
Topic: Eligibility and Submission Procedures for License Renewals
---
Eligibility Renewal of Repairers License Applicable to the individual/agency concerned who is a Repair license holder registered with Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. Renewal of Manufacturers License Applicable to the manufacturer/company who is a manufacturing license holder registered with the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. Renewal of Seller License Applicable to the retailer/seller registered with the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. Submission Procedure Renewal of Repairers License Obtain an Application Form The license holder would receive the Application Form via Mail the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. Support Documents required No support documents are required Hand over application form The applicant must fill the application form and submit it to the Department Officer Renewal of Manufacturers License Obtain an Application Form The license holder would receive the Application Form via Mail after informing the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department Support Documents required No support documents are required Hand over application form The applicant must fill the application form and submit it to the Department Officer.
question_en: Who is eligible to renew licenses under the "Renewal of Licenses - Repairers, Manufacturers and Sellers" service?
answer_en: Eligibility applies to individuals or agencies holding a Repair license, manufacturers or companies holding a manufacturing license, and retailers or sellers, all of whom must be registered with the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department.
question_ta: “பழுதுபார்ப்பவர்கள், உற்பத்தியாளர்கள் மற்றும் விற்பனையாளர்கள் உரிமங்களைப் புதுப்பித்தல்” சேவையின் கீழ் உரிமங்களைப் புதுப்பிக்க யார் தகுதியானவர்கள்?
answer_ta: அளவீட்டு அலகுகள், தரநிலைகள் மற்றும் சேவைகள் திணைக்களத்தில் பதிவுசெய்யப்பட்ட பழுதுபார்ப்பு உரிமம் வைத்திருக்கும் தனிநபர்கள்/நிறுவனங்கள், உற்பத்தி உரிமம் வைத்திருக்கும் உற்பத்தியாளர்கள்/நிறுவனங்கள் மற்றும் சில்லறை விற்பனையாளர்கள்/விற்பனையாளர்களுக்கு தகுதி பொருந்தும்.
question_si: “අළුත්වැඩියා කරන්නන්, නිෂ්පාදකයින් සහ විකුණුම්කරුවන්ගේ බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීම” සේවාව යටතේ බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: මිනුම් ඒකක, ප්‍රමිති සහ සේවා දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ ලියාපදිංචි අලුත්වැඩියා බලපත්‍රයක් හිමි පුද්ගලයන්/ආයතන, නිෂ්පාදන බලපත්‍රයක් හිමි නිෂ්පාදකයින්/සමාගම් සහ සිල්ලර වෙළෙන්දන්/විකුණුම්කරුවන් සඳහා සුදුසුකම් අදාළ වේ.

context:
Service: PMU - Functions and Services
Main Category: Communication & Media
Subcategory: Information Services
Topic: Planning and Monitoring Unit Functions and Services
---
Planning & [Monitoring](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) Unit Functions and Services

1. [Data](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) Collection, tabulation, [analysis](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) storing and distribution of [information](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)
2. Encourage and motivates to obtain [information](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) by modern technology techniques
3. [Monitoring](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) of development activities for achieving targets
4. Formulation of future development projects and assist in obtaining necessary resources
5. Compilation of annual action plan
6. Preparation of institutional work plan in accordance with the government projects (Mahinda Chintana, Dhannyagara, Village reawakening)
7. Preparing of [progress](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)  [reports](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) on monthly, quarterly and annual basis and review of the projects
8. Furnish [information](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) for donor agencies and government institutes (Central Bank, Dept. of Census and Statistics)
9. Updating and maintaining of Mahaweli Development [web](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)  [site](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) and providing [internet](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) facilities
10. Release of present development activities on Mahaweli programme
11. Compiling and publishing of Mahaweli [publications](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)
12. Designing of [web](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)  [site](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) for other institutes
13. Continuation of Coordination with State Agencies.
14. Maintains Technical [Library](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) of Mahaweli Authority of Sri Lanka

Telephone No  - 0112698957 e-mail addresses - pmumasl2000@yahoo.co.uk / pmumasl@gmail.com
question_en: What are some of the core functions of the Planning and Monitoring Unit (PMU)?
answer_en: The Planning and Monitoring Unit (PMU) is primarily responsible for data collection, tabulation, analysis, storing, and distribution of information. It also monitors development activities to achieve targets, formulates future development projects, and compiles annual action plans.
question_ta: திட்டமிடல் மற்றும் கண்காணிப்பு பிரிவின் (PMU) சில முக்கிய செயல்பாடுகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: திட்டமிடல் மற்றும் கண்காணிப்பு பிரிவு (PMU) முதன்மையாக தரவுகளை சேகரித்தல், அட்டவணைப்படுத்துதல், பகுப்பாய்வு செய்தல், சேமித்தல் மற்றும் தகவல்களை விநியோகித்தல் ஆகியவற்றிற்கு பொறுப்பாகும். மேலும், இது இலக்குகளை அடைவதற்காக மேம்பாட்டு நடவடிக்கைகளை கண்காணிப்பதுடன், எதிர்கால மேம்பாட்டு திட்டங்களை வகுத்து, வருடாந்திர செயல் திட்டங்களையும் தொகுக்கிறது.
question_si: සැලසුම්කරණ හා අධීක්ෂණ ඒකකයේ (PMU) ප්‍රධාන කාර්යයන් කිහිපයක් මොනවාද?
answer_si: සැලසුම්කරණ හා අධීක්ෂණ ඒකකය (PMU) ප්‍රධාන වශයෙන් දත්ත රැස්කිරීමට, සටහන් කිරීමට, විශ්ලේෂණය කිරීමට, ගබඩා කිරීමට සහ තොරතුරු බෙදාහැරීමට වගකිව යුතුය. එමෙන්ම එය ඉලක්ක සපුරා ගැනීම සඳහා සංවර්ධන කටයුතු අධීක්ෂණය කරන අතර, අනාගත සංවර්ධන ව්‍යාපෘති සකස් කරන අතර වාර්ෂික ක්‍රියාකාරී සැලසුම් ද සම්පාදනය කරයි.

question_ta: பழுதுபார்ப்பவர்கள், உற்பத்தியாளர்கள் மற்றும் விற்பனையாளர்களுக்கான உரிமங்களை புதுப்பிப்பதற்கான பதிவு கட்டணம் எவ்வளவு?
answer_ta: இந்த உரிமங்களைப் புதுப்பிப்பதற்கான பதிவு கட்டணம் ரூ. 300/= ஆகும்.
question_si: අලුත්වැඩියා කරන්නන්, නිෂ්පාදකයින් සහ විකුණුම්කරුවන්ගේ බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීම සඳහා ලියාපදිංචි ගාස්තුව කොපමණද?
answer_si: මෙම බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීම සඳහා ලියාපදිංචි ගාස්තුව රුපියල් 300/= කි.

context:
Service: Sales Counters
Main Category: Communication & Media
Subcategory: Information Services
Topic: Locations and Hours of Department Sales Counters
---
Sales counters of the Department are located in Colombo, Matara, Puttalam, Polonnaruwa, and Kandy districts. In Colombo district, sales counter is located at the 5th Floor of the Unity Plaza Building, Colombo 04. The sales counters of Matara, Puttalam, Polonnaruwa, and Kandy are located at the respective District Secretariats. The general public can purchase Departmental publications from these counters from 8.30 a.m. to 4.00 p.m. on working days of the week. Further, an updated list of the publications of the Department and their prices is available in the page “Publications” of the DCS web site of Department.

Staff Officers in Charge of the Service

question_en: Who are the staff officers in charge of the sales counters in Matara and Kandy, and what are their contact email addresses?
answer_en: Mr. K.S.R.Kottahachchi is the Statistician in charge of the Matara District Sales Counter with the email matara@statistics.gov.lk. Mr. G.W.Gunasekera is the Statistician in charge of the Kandy District Sales Counter with the email kandy@statistics.gov.lk.
question_ta: மாத்தறை மற்றும் கண்டி மாவட்ட விற்பனை நிலையங்களின் பொறுப்பான உத்தியோகத்தர்கள் யார், அவர்களின் மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: மாத்தறை மாவட்ட விற்பனை நிலையத்தின் பொறுப்பான உத்தியோகத்தர் திரு. K.S.R.கோத்தாஹச்சி, அவரின் மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரி matara@statistics.gov.lk ஆகும். கண்டி மாவட்ட விற்பனை நிலையத்தின் பொறுப்பான உத்தியோகத்தர் திரு. G.W.குணசேகர, அவரின் மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரி kandy@statistics.gov.lk ஆகும்.
question_si: මාතර සහ මහනුවර විකුණුම් කවුන්ටර භාර නිලධාරීන් කවුද, ඔවුන්ගේ විද්‍යුත් තැපැල් ලිපිනයන් මොනවාද?
answer_si: මාතර දිස්ත්‍රික් විකුණුම් කවුන්ටරය භාර සංඛ්‍යාලේඛනඥයා වන්නේ matara@statistics.gov.lk යන විද්‍යුත් තැපැල් ලිපිනය සහිත K.S.R. කෝට්ටාහච්චි මහතා ය. මහනුවර දිස්ත්‍රික් විකුණුම් කවුන්ටරය භාර සංඛ්‍යාලේඛනඥයා වන්නේ kandy@statistics.gov.lk යන විද්‍යුත් තැපැල් ලිපිනය සහිත G.W. ගුණසේකර මහතා ය.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Communication & Media
Subcategory: Information Services
Topic: Application Fees, Service Times, and Required Documents
---
Application Fees Application forms for investment are issued free of charge.

Time allotted for provision of Advice On public working days, from 8.30AM to 4.30PM. Officials are bound to meet investors out side working hours (ie. after 4.30PM on working days and during daytime on week-ends and public holidays) as well, on special occasions.

Time allotted for submitting of Applications On public working days, from 8.30AM to 4.30PM, at offices given above.

Service Charges

For Provision of advice : No fee is charged for provision of advice.

For Application Processing: Fees for processing of investment application under Section 16 & 17 of the BOI Law is as follows.

(These payments can be made in Sri Lanka Rupees as well)

1. Fees charged Under Section 17 of the BOI Law : US $ 200 + (excluding government taxes).

2. Fees charged Under Section 16 of the BOI Law : US $ 200 + (excluding government taxes) .

Time Taken to Provide Services (General and priority services)

For Provision of advice: • Ten (10) to thirty (30) minutes for general information on investment promotion. • More time will be taken to provide more information.
question_en: What are the application processing fees for investment projects under Section 16 or 17 of the BOI Law?
answer_en: The fee for processing an investment application under Section 16 or 17 of the BOI Law is US $ 200, excluding government taxes. These payments can also be made in Sri Lanka Rupees.
question_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 16 அல்லது 17 இன் கீழ் முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்கான விண்ணப்பச் செயலாக்கக் கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 16 அல்லது 17 இன் கீழ் முதலீட்டு விண்ணப்பத்தைச் செயலாக்குவதற்கான கட்டணம் அமெரிக்க டாலர் 200 ஆகும், இது அரசாங்க வரிகளைத் தவிர்த்து. இந்தக் கொடுப்பனவுகளை இலங்கை ரூபாயிலும் செலுத்தலாம்.
question_si: BOI නීතියේ 16 හෝ 17 වගන්ති යටතේ ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා අයදුම්පත් සැකසීමේ ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: BOI නීතියේ 16 හෝ 17 වගන්ති යටතේ ආයෝජන අයදුම්පතක් සැකසීම සඳහා වන ගාස්තුව එක්සත් ජනපද ඩොලර් 200ක් වන අතර, රජයේ බදු හැර. මෙම ගෙවීම් ශ්‍රී ලංකා රුපියල් වලින්ද සිදු කළ හැක.

question_en: What documents are required when importing books or magazines in bulk from other countries, and who is the staff officer in charge of this service?
answer_en: When importing books or magazines in bulk from other countries, you need the original notification sent to the addressee, an Identity Card issued by the Department for Registration of Persons, a Passport, and a Postal Identity Card. The staff officer in charge is M.H.M.Aslam, Asst. Supdt. (Foreign Mail).
question_ta: வெளிநாடுகளில் இருந்து மொத்தமாக புத்தகங்கள் அல்லது சஞ்சிகைகளை இறக்குமதி செய்யும் போது, தேவைப்படும் ஆவணங்கள் யாவை? இந்த சேவைக்கான பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி யார்?
answer_ta: வெளிநாடுகளில் இருந்து மொத்தமாக புத்தகங்கள் அல்லது சஞ்சிகைகளை இறக்குமதி செய்யும் போது, முகவரிக்கு அனுப்பப்பட்ட அறிவிப்பின் அசல், நபர்கள் பதிவுத் திணைக்களத்தால் வழங்கப்பட்ட அடையாள அட்டை, கடவுச்சீட்டு மற்றும் அஞ்சல் அடையாள அட்டை ஆகியவை தேவைப்படும். இந்த சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி வெளிநாட்டு அஞ்சல் உதவி கண்காணிப்பாளர் எம்.எச்.எம். அஸ்லாம் ஆவார்.
question_si: වෙනත් රටවලින් පොත්පත් හෝ සඟරා තොග වශයෙන් ආනයනය කිරීමේදී අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි මොනවාද? මෙම සේවාව සඳහා භාරව සිටින නිලධාරියා කවුද?
answer_si: වෙනත් රටවලින් පොත්පත් හෝ සඟරා තොග වශයෙන් ආනයනය කිරීමේදී, ලිපිනයට යවන ලද දැනුම්දීමේ මුල් පිටපත, පුද්ගලයන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවෙන් නිකුත් කරන ලද හැඳුනුම්පත, ගමන් බලපත්‍රය සහ තැපැල් හැඳුනුම්පත අවශ්‍ය වේ. මෙම සේවාව භාර නිලධාරියා වන්නේ විදේශ තැපැල් සහකාර අධිකාරී එම්.එච්.එම්. අස්ලාම් මහතායි.

context:
Service: Placement for Employment
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Employment Guidance Programme for Technical College Graduates
---
A programme will be held to direct the students who completed the full time courses for employment as follows;

- Obtaining information of students who completed the training in by the Carrier Guidance Centres of Colleges of Technology/Technical Colleges.
- Thereafter comparing with the vacancies in the information system of Carrier Guidance Centre and direct to the employment.
- When no vacancies in the information system of Colleges of Technology/Technical Colleges, Then students name list will be submitted to the Industrial Liaison and Carrier Guidance Division of the Department and direct to the relevant employment.
- Direct the students, who completed the course, to the training programmes of Foreign Employment Bureau and direct to foreign employment through the registered employment institutions.
- Direct the particulars of students, after completion of training to Jobs Net.
question_en: What are the main steps involved in the Employment Guidance Programme for Technical College Graduates?
answer_en: The Employment Guidance Programme for Technical College Graduates involves several steps: obtaining information of students from Carrier Guidance Centres of Colleges of Technology/Technical Colleges, comparing this with available vacancies and directing students to employment. If no vacancies are found in the information system, student name lists are submitted to the Industrial Liaison and Carrier Guidance Division of the Department. Additionally, students can be directed to training programmes of the Foreign Employment Bureau for foreign employment through registered institutions, and their particulars are submitted to Jobs Net.
question_ta: தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்லூரிப் பட்டதாரிகளுக்கான வேலைவாய்ப்பு வழிகாட்டல் திட்டத்தில் உள்ள முக்கிய படிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்லூரிப் பட்டதாரிகளுக்கான வேலைவாய்ப்பு வழிகாட்டல் திட்டத்தில் பல படிகள் உள்ளன: தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்லூரிகளின் தொழில் வழிகாட்டல் மையங்களில் இருந்து மாணவர்களின் தகவல்களைப் பெறுதல், கிடைக்கும் காலியிடங்களுடன் ஒப்பிட்டு மாணவர்களை வேலைவாய்ப்புகளுக்கு வழிநடத்துதல். தகவல் அமைப்பில் காலியிடங்கள் இல்லாவிட்டால், மாணவர்களின் பெயர் பட்டியல்கள் துறையின் தொழில்துறை தொடர்பு மற்றும் தொழில் வழிகாட்டல் பிரிவுக்குச் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்படும். கூடுதலாக, மாணவர்கள் வெளிநாட்டு வேலைவாய்ப்புப் பணியகத்தின் பயிற்சித் திட்டங்களுக்கும், பதிவுசெய்யப்பட்ட நிறுவனங்கள் மூலம் வெளிநாட்டு வேலைவாய்ப்புகளுக்கும் அனுப்பப்படலாம், மேலும் அவர்களின் விவரங்கள் வேலைவாய்ப்பு இணையதளத்திற்குச் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்படும்.
question_si: තාක්ෂණික විද්‍යාල උපාධිධාරීන් සඳහා වන රැකියා මඟ පෙන්වීම් වැඩසටහනේ ප්‍රධාන පියවර මොනවාද?
answer_si: තාක්ෂණික විද්‍යාල උපාධිධාරීන් සඳහා වන රැකියා මඟ පෙන්වීම් වැඩසටහනට පියවර කිහිපයක් ඇතුළත් වේ: තාක්ෂණික විද්‍යාලවල වෘත්තීය මාර්ගෝපදේශන මධ්‍යස්ථානවලින් සිසුන්ගේ තොරතුරු ලබා ගැනීම, පවතින පුරප්පාඩු සමඟ සසඳා සිසුන් රැකියා සඳහා යොමු කිරීම. තොරතුරු පද්ධතියේ පුරප්පාඩු නොමැති නම්, සිසුන්ගේ නාම ලේඛන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ කාර්මික සම්බන්ධතා සහ වෘත්තීය මාර්ගෝපදේශන අංශයට ඉදිරිපත් කෙරේ. තවද, සිසුන් විදේශ සේවා නියුක්ති කාර්යාංශයේ පුහුණු වැඩසටහන් වෙත සහ ලියාපදිංචි ආයතන හරහා විදේශ රැකියා සඳහා යොමු කළ හැකි අතර, ඔවුන්ගේ විස්තර Jobs Net වෙත ඉදිරිපත් කරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Provision of Books for Libraries
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Education Publications
Topic: Requesting Ayurveda Books for Public Libraries
---
If books on the subject of Ayurveda are required for libraries maintained at a temple, school, Damma school or any other public place, a written request should be made to the commissioner of Ayurveda for this purpose. Such request should be made either on a letter head of any society or voluntary organization or on a letter with rubber seal.
question_en: What is the procedure for requesting Ayurveda books for public libraries?
answer_en: To request Ayurveda books for libraries maintained at a temple, school, Damma school, or any other public place, a written request should be made to the Commissioner of Ayurveda. This request should be made either on a letterhead of any society or voluntary organization or on a letter with a rubber seal.
question_ta: பொது நூலகங்களுக்கு ஆயுர்வேத புத்தகங்களை எவ்வாறு கோருவது?
answer_ta: கோயில், பள்ளி, தம்மப் பள்ளி அல்லது வேறு எந்தப் பொது இடத்திலும் உள்ள நூலகங்களுக்கு ஆயுர்வேத புத்தகங்கள் தேவைப்பட்டால், ஆயுர்வேத ஆணையரிடம் எழுத்துப்பூர்வ கோரிக்கை விடுக்கப்பட வேண்டும். அத்தகைய கோரிக்கை ஒரு சங்கம் அல்லது தன்னார்வ அமைப்பின் கடிதத் தலைப்பிலோ அல்லது ரப்பர் முத்திரையுடன் கூடிய கடிதத்திலோ செய்யப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: පොදු පුස්තකාල සඳහා ආයුර්වේද පොත් ඉල්ලුම් කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer_si: පන්සලක, පාසලක, දහම් පාසලක හෝ වෙනත් පොදු ස්ථානයක පවත්වාගෙන යනු ලබන පුස්තකාල සඳහා ආයුර්වේද විෂය පිළිබඳ පොත් අවශ්‍ය නම්, මේ සඳහා ආයුර්වේද කොමසාරිස්වරයා වෙත ලිඛිත ඉල්ලීමක් කළ යුතුය. එවැනි ඉල්ලීමක් යම් සමාජයක හෝ ස්වේච්ඡා සංවිධානයක ලිපි ශීර්ෂයකින් හෝ රබර් මුද්‍රාවක් සහිත ලිපියකින් කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Services of Establishment Unit of Educational Publications Department
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Education Publications
Topic: Departmental Administration and Record Keeping
---
1. Maintaining the personal files of the officers and other employees of the department and helping in administration.
2. Registration of book sellers.
3. Administrave duties of the current employees of the department
4. Maintaining the warehouses of the department.
question_en: What are the primary services provided by the Establishment Unit of the Educational Publications Department under Departmental Administration and Record Keeping?
answer_en: The primary services include maintaining personal files of officers and employees, registering book sellers, performing administrative duties for current employees, and maintaining department warehouses.
question_ta: கல்வி வெளியீட்டுத் திணைக்களத்தின் ஸ்தாபனப் பிரிவினால் திணைக்கள நிர்வாகம் மற்றும் ஆவணப் பதிவேட்டுடன் தொடர்புடைய முதன்மைச் சேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: முதன்மைச் சேவைகளில் உத்தியோகத்தர்கள் மற்றும் ஊழியர்களின் தனிப்பட்ட கோப்புகளைப் பராமரித்தல், புத்தக விற்பனையாளர்களைப் பதிவு செய்தல், தற்போதைய ஊழியர்களுக்கான நிர்வாகக் கடமைகளைச் செய்தல் மற்றும் திணைக்களக் கிடங்குகளைப் பராமரித்தல் ஆகியவை அடங்கும்.
question_si: අධ්‍යාපන ප්‍රකාශන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ ස්ථාපන ඒකකය විසින් දෙපාර්තමේන්තු පරිපාලනය සහ වාර්තා තබා ගැනීම යටතේ සපයනු ලබන ප්‍රාථමික සේවා මොනවාද?
answer_si: ප්‍රාථමික සේවාවන් අතර නිලධාරීන්ගේ සහ සේවකයන්ගේ පෞද්ගලික ලිපිගොනු පවත්වාගෙන යාම, පොත් වෙළෙන්දන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම, වත්මන් සේවකයන්ගේ පරිපාලන රාජකාරි ඉටු කිරීම සහ දෙපාර්තමේන්තු ගබඩා පවත්වාගෙන යාම ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Recognition of Prior Learning
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: NVQ Certificate Issuance and Required Documents
---
This is a service to issue NVQ Certifiate to people who does not have a formal training.

Required Documents [National Identy Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=1166)

Related Services Payment of Employees’ Provident Fund Benefits upon Completion of Age
question_en: What is the primary function of the "Recognition of Prior Learning" service, and what document is required for it?
answer_en: The primary function of the "Recognition of Prior Learning" service is to issue NVQ Certificates to individuals who do not have formal training. The National Identity Card is the required document.
question_ta: "முன்னறிவின் அங்கீகாரம்" சேவையின் முக்கிய செயல்பாடு என்ன, அதற்குத் தேவைப்படும் ஆவணம் யாது?
answer_ta: "முன்னறிவின் அங்கீகாரம்" சேவையின் முக்கிய செயல்பாடு முறையான பயிற்சி இல்லாதவர்களுக்கு NVQ சான்றிதழ்களை வழங்குவதாகும். தேசிய அடையாள அட்டை தேவைப்படும் ஆவணமாகும்.
question_si: "පෙර ඉගෙනුම හඳුනාගැනීම" සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන කාර්යය කුමක්ද, ඒ සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිල්ල කුමක්ද?
answer_si: "පෙර ඉගෙනුම හඳුනාගැනීම" සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන කාර්යය වන්නේ විධිමත් පුහුණුවක් නොමැති පුද්ගලයන්ට NVQ සහතික නිකුත් කිරීමයි. ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පත අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිල්ල වේ.

context:
Service: Obtaining Certificates and Endorsements From the Engineering Department
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Additional Requirements and Certificates for Specific Ship Types
---
(2) Candidates who have not satisfied the standard of competence set out in section A-III/1 in the STCW Code for the operation and maintenance of steam boilers shall be issued with a certificate of Competency which may not be valid for service on ships in which steam boilers form part of ship’s machinery until the engineer officer meets the required standard of competence. (3) The Certificate of Competency may be issued as applicable to motor ships or steam ships depending on whether the candidate has completed the approved seagoing service specified in regulation (1) (b) above, on motor ships or steam ships respectively. (4) Combined Certificate of Competency as applicable to motor and steam ships may be issued, if the candidate has completed the required seagoing service specified in regulation (1)(b) above, in each of the motor ships and steam ships. D. (1) Every candidate for the issue of Certificate of competency as Chief Engineer Officer on ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000KW engaged on near coastal voyages shall: (a) hold certificates of competency or an endorsement as second engineer officer on ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000KW engaged on near coastal voyages; (b) have completed approved seagoing service of not less than twelve months as an officer in-charge of as an engineering watch on international voyages or as a Second Engineer Officer on ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000KW engaged on near coastal voyages; (c) pass an examination conducted by the chief examiner meeting the standard of competency specified in section – A-III/3 in the STCW Code for Certificate of competency- Chief Engineer officer, limited to ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000KW engaged on near coastal voyages. E. (1) Every candidate for the issue of Certificate of competency as a second engineer Officer on ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000 KW engaged on near coastal voyages shall: (a) hold a certificate of competency as officer in-charge of an engineering watch limited to ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000 KW engaged on near coastal voyages; (b) have completed approved seagoing service as an officer in-charge of an engineering watch on ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000 KW for a period of not less than twelve months; and (c) have completed approved education, training, examination and assessment meeting the standard of competence specified in section A –III/2 in the STCW Code for chief Engineer Officer and second Engineer Officers on ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000 KW.
question_en: Under what condition might a Certificate of Competency be issued as not valid for service on ships where steam boilers are part of the machinery?
answer_en: A Certificate of Competency may be issued as not valid for service on ships where steam boilers are part of the ship's machinery if the candidate has not satisfied the standard of competence for the operation and maintenance of steam boilers as set out in section A-III/1 in the STCW Code.
question_ta: நீராவி கொதிகலன்கள் கப்பல் இயந்திரங்களின் ஒரு பகுதியாக இருக்கும் கப்பல்களில் சேவைக்குச் செல்ல தகுதியில்லாத ஒரு சான்றிதழ் என்ன நிபந்தனையின் கீழ் வழங்கப்படலாம்?
answer_ta: STCW குறியீட்டின் பிரிவு A-III/1 இல் குறிப்பிடப்பட்டுள்ள நீராவி கொதிகலன்களின் செயல்பாடு மற்றும் பராமரிப்புக்கான தகுதித் தரத்தை வேட்பாளர்கள் பூர்த்தி செய்யாத பட்சத்தில், அத்தகைய கப்பல்களில் சேவைக்குச் செல்ல தகுதியில்லாத ஒரு சான்றிதழ் வழங்கப்படலாம்.
question_si: වාෂ්ප බොයිලේරු නෞකාවල යාන්ත්‍රණයේ කොටසක් වන නෞකා වල සේවය සඳහා වලංගු නොවන නිපුණතා සහතිකයක් නිකුත් කරනු ලබන්නේ කුමන කොන්දේසියක් යටතේද?
answer_si: වාෂ්ප බොයිලේරු ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීම සහ නඩත්තු කිරීම සඳහා වන STCW සංග්‍රහයේ A-III/1 වගන්තියේ දක්වා ඇති නිපුණතා ප්‍රමිතිය අපේක්ෂකයින් සපුරා නොමැති නම්, වාෂ්ප බොයිලේරු නෞකාවල යාන්ත්‍රණයේ කොටසක් වන නෞකා වල සේවය සඳහා වලංගු නොවන නිපුණතා සහතිකයක් නිකුත් කරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Information Systems
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: TVEC Website and TVET Guide
---
Information Systems

TVEC web site ( [http://www.tvec.gov.lk](http://www.tvec.gov.lk) )

TVEC maintains a website with the view of providing latest information on activities of TVET. It carries application forms required for registration of institutions and accreditation of courses. The major components of the website are as follows;

1. Labour Market Information
2. NVQ information
3. Online TVET Guide
4. Assessors’ Registry
5. Directory of registered TVET institutions
6. Directory of accredited courses
7. Vocational Education & Training (VET) Plans
8. Various application formats & supporting documents as downloadable files
9. TVEC contact information

Prepare and publish TVET Guide

In order to provide details of TVET programs and institutions recognized by the TVEC, a TVET Guide is published annually. Anyone can refer TVET guide form TVEC website or Available for purchase at the Library of TVEC.
question_en: What are some of the major components available on the TVEC website?
answer_en: The major components of the TVEC website include Labour Market Information, NVQ information, the Online TVET Guide, and a Directory of registered TVET institutions.
question_ta: TVEC இணையதளத்தில் கிடைக்கும் சில முக்கிய கூறுகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: TVEC இணையதளத்தின் முக்கிய கூறுகள் தொழிலாளர் சந்தை தகவல், NVQ தகவல், ஆன்லைன் TVET வழிகாட்டி மற்றும் பதிவு செய்யப்பட்ட TVET நிறுவனங்களின் அடைவு ஆகியவை ஆகும்.
question_si: TVEC වෙබ් අඩවියේ ඇති ප්‍රධාන අංග කිහිපයක් මොනවාද?
answer_si: TVEC වෙබ් අඩවියේ ප්‍රධාන අංග අතර ශ්‍රම වෙළඳපල තොරතුරු, NVQ තොරතුරු, මාර්ගගත TVET මාර්ගෝපදේශය සහ ලියාපදිංචි TVET ආයතන නාමාවලිය ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Providing vocational training for the youths
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Course Information and Application Submission Process
---
[Full Time Courses](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/includes/PDF/fulltimecourses.pdf)

[Part Time Course](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/includes/PDF/parttimecourse.pdf)

[Qualification](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/includes/PDF/qualification.pdf)

Process of Submitting Applications Courses are commenced   in  2nd week of January and July every year and application should be sent to the National  vocational training centers or the District Offices before 15th December and 15th June. Places from Where Applications can be Obtained National  vocational training centers, District officers, Rural centers, from newspapers and the gazette. Free Payable for Obtaining Application Form Issued free. Candidate also can prepare the application form by himself Time for Submission For one year courses    : 01st Dec – 15th Dec. every year. For 6 months courses    : 01st June – 15th June and 01st Dec to 15th Dec. Fees Payable for Obtaining Service Supporting Documents Required 1.    Educational certificates 2.    Certificate of Grama Niladhari 3. [Birth certificate](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=367&task=info&back=0&pid=773) Staff Officers in charge of the Services •    Director (Training) Vocational Training Authority of Sri Lanka 354/2, "Nipunatha Piyasa", Narahenpita, Colombo 05. •    Deputy Director (Training) •    Assistant Director (Training) •    All Assistant Director , National Vocational Training centers and District offices
question_en: What is the application process for vocational training courses, including submission deadlines and required documents?
answer_en: Applications for vocational training courses should be sent to National vocational training centers or District Offices before December 15th and June 15th annually. Courses start in the 2nd week of January and July. For one-year courses, submission is from December 1st to December 15th. For six-month courses, submission is from June 1st to June 15th and December 1st to December 15th. Application forms are issued free, and required documents include educational certificates, a Grama Niladhari certificate, and a birth certificate.
question_ta: தொழிற்கல்வி பயிற்சி நெறிகளுக்கான விண்ணப்ப செயல்முறை, சமர்ப்பிப்பு காலக்கெடு மற்றும் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தொழிற்கல்வி பயிற்சி நெறிகளுக்கான விண்ணப்பங்கள் ஒவ்வொரு ஆண்டும் டிசம்பர் 15 மற்றும் ஜூன் 15 ஆம் தேதிக்கு முன்னர் தேசிய தொழிற்கல்வி பயிற்சி மையங்கள் அல்லது மாவட்ட அலுவலகங்களுக்கு அனுப்பப்பட வேண்டும். பாடநெறிகள் ஜனவரி மற்றும் ஜூலை மாதங்களின் இரண்டாவது வாரத்தில் தொடங்குகின்றன. ஒரு வருட பாடநெறிகளுக்கு, விண்ணப்பங்கள் டிசம்பர் 1 முதல் டிசம்பர் 15 வரை சமர்ப்பிக்கப்படலாம். ஆறு மாத பாடநெறிகளுக்கு, ஜூன் 1 முதல் ஜூன் 15 வரையிலும், பின்னர் டிசம்பர் 1 முதல் டிசம்பர் 15 வரையிலும் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்படலாம். விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்கள் இலவசமாக வழங்கப்படுகின்றன, மேலும் கல்விச் சான்றிதழ்கள், கிராம உத்தியோகத்தர் சான்றிதழ் மற்றும் பிறப்புச் சான்றிதழ் ஆகியவை தேவையான ஆவணங்களாகும்.
question_si: වෘත්තීය පුහුණු පාඨමාලා සඳහා අයදුම් කිරීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය, අයදුම්පත් භාරගැනීමේ අවසන් දින සහ අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: වෘත්තීය පුහුණු පාඨමාලා සඳහා වන අයදුම්පත් සෑම වසරකම දෙසැම්බර් 15 සහ ජූනි 15 ට පෙර ජාතික වෘත්තීය පුහුණු මධ්‍යස්ථාන හෝ දිස්ත්‍රික් කාර්යාල වෙත යැවිය යුතුය. පාඨමාලා සෑම වසරකම ජනවාරි සහ ජූලි දෙවන සතියේ ආරම්භ වේ. වසරක පාඨමාලා සඳහා, අයදුම්පත් දෙසැම්බර් 1 සිට දෙසැම්බර් 15 දක්වා භාර දිය හැක. මාස හයක පාඨමාලා සඳහා, අයදුම්පත් ජූනි 1 සිට ජූනි 15 දක්වා සහ දෙසැම්බර් 1 සිට දෙසැම්බර් 15 දක්වා භාර දිය හැක. අයදුම්පත් නොමිලේ නිකුත් කරන අතර, අවශ්‍ය ලේඛනවලට අධ්‍යාපන සහතික, ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී සහතිකයක් සහ උප්පැන්න සහතිකයක් ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Re-validation of Continuous Discharge Certificate (CDC)
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Required Documents and Responsible Officers
---
Documents Required [Application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/CDC Revalidation.pdf) Continuous Discharge Certificate (CDC)     Valid Medical Certificate issued by a medical practitioner approved by Merchant Shipping Division     Valid Mandatory Short Courses Certificates       Elementary First Aid     Personal Survival Techniques     Fire Prevention and Fire Fighting       Receipt of Payment     Officers to hold a valid COC  Responsible Officers                            Position             Name             Telephone              E-Mail             Fax                               Director (Administration)             Mr. Mr.C.Jayasuriya            ++94 112 380764             dmsmos@sltnet.lk             +94 11 2435160                               Asst. Shipping Officer             Mr. B S K S Ratna Bharathie             +94 11 2435127             dmsmos@sltnet.lk             +94 11 2435160                               Asst. Shipping Officer (Acting)             Mr. Ranjith Ranasinghe             +94 11 2435127             dmsmos@sltnet.lk             +94 11 2435160                Other Information Not Applicable
question_en: What are the essential documents required for the re-validation of a Continuous Discharge Certificate (CDC)?
answer_en: To re-validate a Continuous Discharge Certificate (CDC), applicants need to provide an application, the Continuous Discharge Certificate (CDC) itself, a valid medical certificate, valid mandatory short courses certificates (Elementary First Aid, Personal Survival Techniques, Fire Prevention and Fire Fighting), and a receipt of payment. Officers must also hold a valid COC.
question_ta: தொடர்ச்சியான பணி நீக்கச் சான்றிதழை (CDC) மீண்டும் சரிபார்ப்பதற்குத் தேவையான அத்தியாவசிய ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தொடர்ச்சியான பணி நீக்கச் சான்றிதழை (CDC) மீண்டும் சரிபார்க்க, ஒரு விண்ணப்பம், CDC சான்றிதழ், ஒரு செல்லுபடியாகும் மருத்துவச் சான்றிதழ், செல்லுபடியாகும் கட்டாயச் சிறுகாலப் பயிற்சிச் சான்றிதழ்கள் (முதலுதவி, தனிநபர் உயிர்வாழும் நுட்பங்கள், தீ தடுப்பு மற்றும் தீயணைப்பு), மற்றும் பணம் செலுத்திய ரசீது ஆகியவை தேவை. அதிகாரிகளும் செல்லுபடியாகும் COC ஐ வைத்திருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: අඛණ්ඩ සේවා නිදහස් සහතිකයක් (CDC) නැවත වලංගු කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය අත්‍යවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: අඛණ්ඩ සේවා නිදහස් සහතිකයක් (CDC) නැවත වලංගු කිරීමට අයදුම්පතක්, CDC සහතිකයම, වලංගු වෛද්‍ය සහතිකයක්, වලංගු අනිවාර්ය කෙටි පාඨමාලා සහතික (ප්‍රාථමික ප්‍රථමාධාර, පුද්ගලික පැවැත්මේ ශිල්ප ක්‍රම, ගිනි වැළැක්වීම සහ ගිනි නිවීම), සහ ගෙවීම් රිසිට්පතක් අවශ්‍ය වේ. නිලධාරීන්ට වලංගු COC සහතිකයක් ද තිබිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Courses for Human Resource Management
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Education for Government Officers
Topic: Overview of Diploma and Certificate Courses in Human Resource Management
---
Diploma and Certificate Courses on Human Resource Management together with short term training courses and training workshops are conducted by the National Institute of Labour Studies (NILS). Prospective candidates for the Diploma Courses are graduates from recognized Universities possessing appropriate work experience. However, middle level and mid carrier executives of both private and public sector organizations are encouraged to register without a basic degree, recognizing the exposure and experience in the subject area. Resource Persons technically contributing to these programs are Professors and Lecturers from Universities and National Level Institutes possessing appropriate National and International exposure. Also Professional Practitioners such as present and former Senior Officials from public and private sector organizations and Consultants possessing adequate educational background and several years of experience serve as Resource Persons in applicable training programs sharing their experiences with the trainees.

Diploma Courses

[Human Resource Management](javascript:void(null);)

For Whom

Managers, Executives, Supervisors, Administrators, Trade Unionists and others who aspire to hold managerial positions.
question_en: Who is the target audience for the Diploma Courses in Human Resource Management?
answer_en: The Diploma Courses in Human Resource Management are intended for Managers, Executives, Supervisors, Administrators, Trade Unionists, and others who aspire to hold managerial positions.
question_ta: மனித வள முகாமைத்துவம் தொடர்பான டிப்ளோமா பாடநெறிகள் யாருக்காக வடிவமைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளன?
answer_ta: மனித வள முகாமைத்துவம் தொடர்பான டிப்ளோமா பாடநெறிகள் முகாமையாளர்கள், நிறைவேற்று அதிகாரிகள், மேற்பார்வையாளர்கள், நிர்வாகத்துறை அதிகாரிகள், தொழிற்சங்கவாதிகள் மற்றும் முகாமையாளர் பதவிகளை வகிக்க விரும்பும் பிறருக்காக வடிவமைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளன.
question_si: මානව සම්පත් කළමනාකරණය පිළිබඳ ඩිප්ලෝමා පාඨමාලා සඳහා ඉලක්කගත ප්‍රේක්ෂක පිරිස කවුද?
answer_si: මානව සම්පත් කළමනාකරණය පිළිබඳ ඩිප්ලෝමා පාඨමාලා කළමනාකරුවන්, විධායක නිලධාරීන්, අධීක්ෂකවරුන්, පරිපාලකයින්, වෘත්තීය සමිති සාමාජිකයින් සහ කළමනාකාර තනතුරු දැරීමට අපේක්ෂා කරන අනෙකුත් පුද්ගලයින් සඳහා අදහස් කෙරේ.

question_ta: கல்வி வெளியீட்டுத் திணைக்களத்தின் திட்டமிடல் பிரிவின் பாடநூல் உற்பத்தி மற்றும் தர மேம்பாட்டுத் திட்டங்கள் தொடர்பான முக்கிய பொறுப்புகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: திட்டமிடல் பிரிவு பாடநூல்கள் தயாரித்தல், அவற்றின் உள்ளீட்டுத் தரத்தை மேம்படுத்துதல், அத்துடன் அவற்றைப் பாதுகாத்தல் மற்றும் மறுபயன்பாடு செய்தல் தொடர்பான திட்டமிடல் நடைமுறைகளுக்கான திட்டங்களை வகுத்து ஒழுங்கமைக்கிறது.
question_si: අධ්‍යාපන ප්‍රකාශන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ සැලසුම් ඒකකයේ පෙළපොත් නිෂ්පාදනය සහ තත්ත්ව වැඩිදියුණු කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන් සම්බන්ධ ප්‍රධාන වගකීම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: සැලසුම් ඒකකය පෙළපොත් නිෂ්පාදනය, ඒවායේ ගුණාත්මක දායකත්වය වැඩිදියුණු කිරීම සහ ඒවා සංරක්ෂණය කිරීම හා නැවත භාවිතය සහතික කිරීම සඳහා වැඩසටහන් සැලසුම් කිරීම සහ සංවිධානය කිරීම සිදු කරයි.

question_ta: அதிகாரத்தால் வழங்கப்படும் தொழிற்கல்வி மற்றும் பயிற்சி மையங்கள் பற்றிய மேலதிக விவரங்களை எங்கு பெறலாம்?
answer_ta: தொழிற்கல்வி மற்றும் பயிற்சி மையங்கள் பற்றிய மேலதிக விவரங்களை தலைமை அலுவலகம், மாவட்ட அதிகாரிகள் அல்லது வழங்கப்பட்ட 'பயிற்சி மையம்' PDF ஆவணத்தைப் பார்ப்பதன் மூலம் பெறலாம்.
question_si: අධිකාරිය විසින් සපයනු ලබන වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන සහ පුහුණු මධ්‍යස්ථාන පිළිබඳ වැඩිදුර තොරතුරු ලබාගත හැක්කේ කොහෙන්ද?
answer_si: වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන සහ පුහුණු මධ්‍යස්ථාන පිළිබඳ වැඩිදුර තොරතුරු ප්‍රධාන කාර්යාලයෙන්, දිස්ත්‍රික් නිලධාරීන්ගෙන් හෝ ලබා දී ඇති 'පුහුණු මධ්‍යස්ථාන' PDF ලේඛනය වෙත යොමු වීමෙන් ලබාගත හැක.

1. Isurupaya, Pelawattha, Baththaramulla. 011-2785141-50, ext - 1009

3. NIE, Maharagama - 011-2665527
4. South Asian Centre for Teacher Development, Meepe. 011-3084639
5. Jaffna Central College, Jaffna.
6. Rajawasa building, Economic centre, Narahenpita. (9.00 A.M - 6.00 P.M)

20% discount is levied/ given to the below mentioned institutions when buying the books included in the catalogue.

- All the book shops registered under the Educational [Publications](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) Department.
- Co-operative shops and school co-operative shops registered under Co-operative Development Department.
- Government institutions such as Ministries, Departments, Corporations, Authorities etc. ( books must be ordered by the heads of the government institutions)
- Provincial Councils, Divisional Secretariats, Provincial Administrative Institutions and the libraries maintained by them.
- Educational institutions including universities, Colleges of Education, Technical Colleges, Medical Colleges, Nurses’ Training Schools, Government Schools, Government assisted Private Schools and Pirivenas. Books must be ordered officially by the principals or the heads of those institutions.

answer_ta: கல்விப் பிரசுரத் திணைக்களம் 6 புத்தக விற்பனை நிலையங்களைப் பராமரிக்கிறது. விற்பனைக்காக அச்சிடப்பட்ட பாடசாலைப் பாடப்புத்தகங்கள் மற்றும் துணை வாசிப்புப் புத்தகங்களை இந்த நிலையங்களில் வாங்கலாம்.
question_si: අධ්‍යාපන ප්‍රකාශන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව විසින් පවත්වාගෙන යනු ලබන පොත් අලෙවිසැල් කීයක් තිබේද, එමෙන්ම එතැනින් මිලදී ගත හැකි පොත් වර්ග මොනවාද?
answer_si: අධ්‍යාපන ප්‍රකාශන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව පොත් අලෙවිසැල් 6ක් පවත්වාගෙන යයි. විකිණීම සඳහා මුද්‍රණය කර ඇති පාසල් පෙළපොත් සහ අතිරේක කියවීමේ පොත් මෙම අලෙවිසැල්වලින් මිලදී ගත හැකිය.

context:
Service: Research Cell
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Objectives of the Research Cell for TVET Promotion
---
The Research Cell will continue work towards achievement of following three objectives.

Objective 01

To foster conducting and promotion of research related to TVET  issues.

It is observed that many researches are done in education and higher education sector. However, a very few or minimum number of researches are done in TVET sector. Therefore, it is vital to foster conducting and promotion of research related to TVET through inculcation or research culture in the TVET sector of Sri Lanka. Due to the low prominence given to research, the officers of training institutions undertake no research or engage in TVET research at low level. The research will conduct in a way that proposes recommendations for strengthening policy and planning of TVET. Therefore, it is timely to engage in TVET research activities at institute level and national level.

Objective 02

To be the key partner of facilitation for TVET research.

The Research Cell will facilitate undertaking research through dissemination of TVET information among interested parties, especially among TVET researchers. Therefore, it is necessary to introduce mechanisms to disseminate research information in the TVET sector.

Objective 03

To create beneficial linkages with local and international research Institutes.

One important strategy for increasing the quality of TVET research is to foster linkages with local and international research organizations like Centre for Policy Research, National Science Foundation are local such organizations and the NCVER at Australia, PCTRT of the RMIT University are such international organizations with which building linkages would be useful. Therefore, in this 5-year Strategic Plan, action will be taken to make links with these organizations which are beneficial for development of TVET research in Sri Lanka.
question_en: What are the primary objectives of the Research Cell for TVET Promotion?
answer_en: The Research Cell for TVET Promotion has three primary objectives: to foster conducting and promotion of research related to TVET issues, to be the key partner for facilitating TVET research through information dissemination, and to create beneficial linkages with local and international research institutes for quality improvement.
question_ta: தொழிற்கல்வி மற்றும் பயிற்சி (TVET) மேம்பாட்டிற்கான ஆராய்ச்சிக் கலத்தின் முக்கிய குறிக்கோள்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தொழிற்கல்வி மற்றும் பயிற்சி மேம்பாட்டிற்கான ஆராய்ச்சிக் கலத்தின் முக்கிய குறிக்கோள்கள் மூன்று ஆகும்: தொழிற்கல்வி மற்றும் பயிற்சி தொடர்பான ஆராய்ச்சிகளை மேற்கொள்வதையும் மேம்படுத்துவதையும் ஊக்குவித்தல், தொழிற்கல்வி மற்றும் பயிற்சி ஆராய்ச்சிக்கான வசதி வழங்குவதில் முக்கிய பங்காளியாக இருத்தல், மற்றும் உள்ளூர் மற்றும் சர்வதேச ஆராய்ச்சி நிறுவனங்களுடன் பயனுள்ள தொடர்புகளை உருவாக்குதல்.
question_si: වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන හා පුහුණු (TVET) ප්‍රවර්ධනය සඳහා වන පර්යේෂණ ඒකකයේ ප්‍රධාන අරමුණු මොනවාද?
answer_si: වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන හා පුහුණු ප්‍රවර්ධනය සඳහා වන පර්යේෂණ ඒකකයේ ප්‍රධාන අරමුණු තුනක් ඇත: වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන හා පුහුණු ගැටළු සම්බන්ධ පර්යේෂණ පැවැත්වීම සහ ප්‍රවර්ධනය කිරීම, වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන හා පුහුණු පර්යේෂණ සඳහා පහසුකම් සැපයීමේ ප්‍රධාන හවුල්කරු වීම, සහ දේශීය හා ජාත්‍යන්තර පර්යේෂණ ආයතන සමඟ ප්‍රයෝජනවත් සම්බන්ධතා ඇති කර ගැනීම.

context:

---
Functions of the section 1.Conducting lectures – Snakes, Mammals, Butterflies, Elephants etc.

2.Guided Tours

Graduates) Exhibition                  -   Rs.   2000. 00 Guided Tours             -  Rs.   300.00 Animal keeper            -  Rs .1500.00 Other Information •    Books published by the zoo – about snakes, endemic birds, endemic fish and many more – from souvenir shop •    Posters, Zoo CD / VCD, gifts, T- shirts etc
question_en: What are the charges for educational services provided by the Zoo's Education section, specifically for B. Sc. graduates attending lectures, exhibitions, and guided tours?
answer_en: The charges are Rs. 2000.00 for lectures (1 to 2 hrs) for B. Sc. graduates, Rs. 2000.00 for exhibitions, and Rs. 300.00 for guided tours.
question_ta: விலங்கியல் பூங்காவின் கல்விப் பிரிவால் வழங்கப்படும் கல்விச் சேவைகளுக்கான கட்டணங்கள் யாவை, குறிப்பாக பி.எஸ்சி பட்டதாரிகளுக்கு விரிவுரைகள், கண்காட்சிகள் மற்றும் வழிகாட்டப்பட்ட சுற்றுப்பயணங்களுக்கான கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: பி.எஸ்சி பட்டதாரிகளுக்கு விரிவுரைகளுக்கு (1 முதல் 2 மணி நேரம்) ரூ. 2000.00, கண்காட்சிகளுக்கு ரூ. 2000.00 மற்றும் வழிகாட்டப்பட்ட சுற்றுப்பயணங்களுக்கு ரூ. 300.00 ஆகும்.
question_si: සත්වෝද්‍යානයේ අධ්‍යාපන අංශය විසින් සපයනු ලබන අධ්‍යාපන සේවා සඳහා වන ගාස්තු මොනවාද, විශේෂයෙන් B. Sc. උපාධිධාරීන් සඳහා දේශන, ප්‍රදර්ශන සහ මඟ පෙන්වන සංචාර සඳහා?
answer_si: B. Sc. උපාධිධාරීන් සඳහා දේශන (පැය 1 සිට 2 දක්වා) සඳහා රු. 2000.00ක්, ප්‍රදර්ශන සඳහා රු. 2000.00ක් සහ මඟ පෙන්වන සංචාර සඳහා රු. 300.00ක් අය කෙරේ.

question_ta: தகவல் அமைப்புகளின் பணிப்பாளர் யார்? அவர்களின் சேவைப் பொறுப்புகள் மற்றும் தொடர்பு விவரங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: திரு. ஜே.ஏ.டி.ஜே. ஜெயலத் தகவல் அமைப்புகளின் பணிப்பாளர் ஆவார். இணையதளம், LMI மற்றும் TVET வழிகாட்டி இவர்களின் சேவைப் பொறுப்புகள் ஆகும். இவரின் தொலைபேசி எண் +94(0) 115849069 மற்றும் மின்னஞ்சல் jayalath@tvec.gov.lk ஆகும்.
question_si: තොරතුරු පද්ධති අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා කවුද සහ ඔහුගේ සේවා වගකීම් මෙන්ම සම්බන්ධතා තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: ජේ.ඒ.ඩී.ජේ. ජයලත් මහතා තොරතුරු පද්ධති අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා වේ. වෙබ් අඩවිය, LMI සහ TVET මාර්ගෝපදේශය ඔහුගේ සේවා වගකීම් වේ. ඔහුගේ දුරකථන අංකය +94(0) 115849069 වන අතර ඔහුගේ ඊමේල් ලිපිනය jayalath@tvec.gov.lk වේ.

question_ta: வர்த்தகப் பரீட்சைகளை நடத்துவதற்குப் பொறுப்பான உத்தியோகத்தர்கள் யார்?
answer_ta: வர்த்தகப் பரீட்சைகளை நடத்துவதற்குப் பொறுப்பான உத்தியோகத்தர்கள் நாரஹென்பிட்டி, ரத்மலானை மற்றும் ஒறுகொடவத்தையில் உள்ள தேசிய தொழிற்பயிற்சி நிறுவனங்களின் உதவிப் பணிப்பாளர்கள் ஆவர்.
question_si: වෙළඳ පරීක්ෂණ පැවැත්වීමට වගකිව යුතු කාර්ය මණ්ඩල නිලධාරීන් කවුද?
answer_si: වෙළඳ පරීක්ෂණ පැවැත්වීමට වගකිව යුතු කාර්ය මණ්ඩල නිලධාරීන් වන්නේ නාරාහෙන්පිට, රත්මලාන සහ ඔරුගොඩවත්ත යන ජාතික වෘත්තීය පුහුණු ආයතනවල සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂවරුන් ය.

context:
Service: Consultancy
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Education for Government Officers
Topic: Consultancy Services Offered by the Institute
---
Since the inception of the institute, consultancy assignments have been conducted on the request of State, Semi-Government, Corporate Sector and International Organizations. Experience of the institute includes preparation of corporate plans, feasibility studies, research project proposals, management design proposals, implementation road maps, strategic plans, procedure manuals, financial reviews at competitive prices. In addition to expertise available in the institute, there is a pool of experts in all relevant subject areas whose services are on-call.
question_en: What types of organizations seek consultancy services from the institute, and what specific assignments does the institute undertake?
answer_en: The institute provides consultancy services to State, Semi-Government, Corporate Sector, and International Organizations. Its assignments include preparing corporate plans, conducting feasibility studies, developing research project proposals, management design proposals, implementation road maps, strategic plans, procedure manuals, and financial reviews.
question_ta: நிறுவனத்திடம் இருந்து எந்த வகையான நிறுவனங்கள் ஆலோசனை சேவைகளைக் கோருகின்றன, மேலும் நிறுவனம் என்னென்ன குறிப்பிட்ட பணிகளை மேற்கொள்கிறது?
answer_ta: நிறுவனம் அரசு, அரை அரசு, பெருநிறுவனத் துறை மற்றும் சர்வதேச நிறுவனங்களுக்கு ஆலோசனை சேவைகளை வழங்குகிறது. நிறுவன திட்டங்கள் தயாரித்தல், சாத்தியக்கூறு ஆய்வுகள் நடத்துதல், ஆராய்ச்சி திட்ட முன்மொழிவுகளை உருவாக்குதல், மேலாண்மை வடிவமைப்பு முன்மொழிவுகள், செயலாக்க வரைபடங்கள், மூலோபாய திட்டங்கள், நடைமுறை கையேடுகள் மற்றும் நிதி ஆய்வுகளை மேற்கொள்வது ஆகியவை இதன் பணிகளில் அடங்கும்.
question_si: ආයතනයෙන් උපදේශන සේවා ලබා ගන්නේ කුමන වර්ගයේ සංවිධානද, එම ආයතනය මගින් සිදු කරන නිශ්චිත කාර්යයන් මොනවාද?
answer_si: ආයතනය රාජ්‍ය, අර්ධ රාජ්‍ය, ආයතනික අංශය සහ ජාත්‍යන්තර සංවිධාන වෙත උපදේශන සේවා සපයයි. එහි පැවරුම් අතරට ආයතනික සැලසුම් සකස් කිරීම, ශක්‍යතා අධ්‍යයන පැවැත්වීම, පර්යේෂණ ව්‍යාපෘති යෝජනා සංවර්ධනය කිරීම, කළමනාකරණ සැලසුම් යෝජනා, ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීමේ මාර්ග සිතියම්, උපායමාර්ගික සැලසුම්, ක්‍රියාපටිපාටි අත්පොත් සහ මූල්‍ය සමාලෝචන ඇතුළත් වේ.

question_ta: தொலைதூரக் கல்விப் பாடத்திட்டங்கள் பயிற்சி பெறுபவர்களுக்கு எந்தெந்த மொழிகளில் கிடைக்கின்றன?
answer_ta: தொலைதூரக் கல்விப் பாடத்திட்டங்கள் சிங்கள மற்றும் தமிழ் மொழிகளில் பயிற்சி பெறுபவர்களுக்குக் கிடைக்கின்றன.
question_si: දුරස්ථ අධ්‍යාපන මොඩියුල ආධුනිකයන්ට ලබා දෙන්නේ කුමන භාෂාවලින්ද?
answer_si: දුරස්ථ අධ්‍යාපන මොඩියුල ආධුනිකයන්ට සිංහල සහ දෙමළ මාධ්‍යයෙන් ලබා දේ.

context:
Service: Services of Production Unit of Educational Publications Department
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Education Publications
Topic: Textbook Printing Statistics and Approvals
---
1. Obtaining the statistics related to the textbooks to be printed from the I.T. Unit.
2. Getting approval for the specifications prepared according to the information obtained.
3. Obtaining the edited copies of textbooks and supplementary reading books which are being compiled by the Development Unit.
4. Providing C.D. s / manuscripts of books to the printers after the tender procedure.
5. Keeping record of the dated on which proof copies of the books are handed over to the Department.
6. Forwarding the proof copies of the books for discussion and recommendation of the relevant subject coordinating officers.
7. Handing over the proof read copies of textbooks or supplementary reading books to the printers for printing forward copies.
8. Getting approval for printing those forward copies from the relevant subject coordinating officers and handing them over to the press.
9. Providing forward copies of books to the library and to the relevant officers of the department.
question_en: What is the primary service offered by the Production Unit of the Educational Publications Department?
answer_en: The Production Unit of the Educational Publications Department provides services related to textbook printing statistics and approvals, encompassing the entire process from obtaining statistics to distributing printed books.
question_ta: கல்வி வெளியீட்டுத் திணைக்களத்தின் உற்பத்திப் பிரிவின் முதன்மைச் சேவை என்ன?
answer_ta: கல்வி வெளியீட்டுத் திணைக்களத்தின் உற்பத்திப் பிரிவு, பாடநூல் அச்சிடல் புள்ளிவிவரங்கள் மற்றும் அனுமதிகள் தொடர்பான சேவைகளை வழங்குகிறது. இதில் புள்ளிவிவரங்களைப் பெறுவது முதல் அச்சிடப்பட்ட நூல்களை விநியோகிப்பது வரை முழு செயல்முறையையும் நிர்வகித்தல் அடங்கும்.
question_si: අධ්‍යාපන ප්‍රකාශන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ නිෂ්පාදන ඒකකයේ ප්‍රධාන සේවාව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: අධ්‍යාපන ප්‍රකාශන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ නිෂ්පාදන ඒකකය මඟින් පෙළපොත් මුද්‍රණ සංඛ්‍යා ලේඛන සහ අනුමැතිය සම්බන්ධ සේවා සපයනු ලැබේ. මෙයට සංඛ්‍යා ලේඛන ලබාගැනීමේ සිට මුද්‍රිත පොත් බෙදාහැරීම දක්වා සම්පූර්ණ ක්‍රියාවලිය කළමනාකරණය කිරීම ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Accreditation of TVET courses
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Criteria and Approval Process for Course Accreditation
---
5. The basis for course accreditation shall be based on the Criteria for Accreditation decided by the TVEC
6. All applications for course accreditation shall be processed through the submission of a recommendation report to the Commission by the Director General for review and approval based on the following,
    - Suitability of the establishment including the facilities available, and the adequacy of the staff of the establishment.
    - Its ability to adequately provide technical and vocational education and training.
    - Ability to deliver the full content of the accredited course.
    - Its conformity with the National Vocational Qualifications of Sri Lanka.
7. Following the approval of application by the Commission, the Director General shall award course accreditation to such establishment, under such name and style specified by the Commission.
8. Periodically monitor and audit the progress of the registered institutions delivering accredited courses as per the process for monitoring and auditing of the TVEC quality Assurance policy.
9. The TVEC Commission may impose conditions in accrediting courses.

Policy on Accreditation of Establishment to Conduct Competency Based Assessments

1. Offer Assessment services to employers and their employees and, to trainees undertaking work experience and, who wish to have skills gained in the workplace assessed and recognized.
2. Accredit establishments which comply with the following,
question_en: What are the key factors considered by the Director General when recommending an application for TVET course accreditation to the Commission?
answer_en: When recommending an application for TVET course accreditation to the Commission, the Director General considers the suitability of the establishment including its facilities and adequacy of staff, its ability to adequately provide technical and vocational education and training, its ability to deliver the full content of the accredited course, and its conformity with the National Vocational Qualifications of Sri Lanka.
question_ta: தொழில் மற்றும் தொழிற்கல்வி பாடநெறி அங்கீகாரத்திற்கான விண்ணப்பத்தை ஆணையத்திற்கு பரிந்துரைக்கும்போது, பொது இயக்குனர் கருத்தில் கொள்ளும் முக்கிய காரணிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தொழில் மற்றும் தொழிற்கல்வி பாடநெறி அங்கீகாரத்திற்கான விண்ணப்பத்தை ஆணையத்திற்கு பரிந்துரைக்கும்போது, பொது இயக்குனர் நிறுவனத்தின் பொருத்தப்பாடு (வசதிகள் மற்றும் ஊழியர் போதுமான தன்மை உட்பட), தொழில்நுட்ப மற்றும் தொழிற்கல்வியை போதுமான அளவில் வழங்கக்கூடிய திறன், அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட பாடநெறியின் முழு உள்ளடக்கத்தையும் வழங்கக்கூடிய திறன், மற்றும் இலங்கையின் தேசிய தொழில்சார் தகுதிகளுடன் அதன் இணக்கம் ஆகியவற்றை கருத்தில் கொள்கிறார்.
question_si: TVET පාඨමාලා ප්‍රතීතනය සඳහා වන අයදුම්පතක් කොමිෂන් සභාවට නිර්දේශ කිරීමේදී අධ්‍යක්ෂ ජනරාල් විසින් සලකා බලන ප්‍රධාන සාධක මොනවාද?
answer_si: TVET පාඨමාලා ප්‍රතීතනය සඳහා වන අයදුම්පතක් කොමිෂන් සභාවට නිර්දේශ කිරීමේදී, අධ්‍යක්ෂ ජනරාල් විසින් ආයතනයේ යෝග්‍යතාවය (පවතින පහසුකම් සහ කාර්ය මණ්ඩලයේ ප්‍රමාණවත් බව ඇතුළුව), තාක්ෂණික හා වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපනය හා පුහුණුව ප්‍රමාණවත් ලෙස සැපයීමට ඇති හැකියාව, ප්‍රතීතනය ලත් පාඨමාලාවේ සම්පූර්ණ අන්තර්ගතය ලබා දීමේ හැකියාව සහ ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ජාතික වෘත්තීය සුදුසුකම් සමඟ එහි අනුකූලතාව සලකා බලනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Obtaining Certificates and Endorsements From the Engineering Department
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Requirements for Officer in Charge of Engineering Watch and Rating Forming Part of an Engine Room Watch
---
F. (1) Every candidate for the Certificate of Competency as Officer-in-charge of an Engineering watch limited to ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000 KW on near coastal voyages shall: (a) be not less than 18 years of age on the date of commencement of the examination for the issue of the certificate; (b) have completed: thirty months of training which includes onboard training duly documented in an approved training record book; not less than six months approved seagoing service in the engine department closely supervised and monitored by a certified engineer officer abroad the ship in which the seagoing service is performed, is adequately documented in an approved training record book; produce documentary evidence of having successfully completed approved training in Personal safety and social responsibility(A-VI/1-4 in STCW Code), Proficiency in survival Craft and rescue boats (A-VI/2-1 in STCW Code) Advanced fire fighting (A-VI/3 in STCW Code) and Medical first aid (A-VI/4-1 in STCW Code) before he or she can considered as having qualified for issue of the Certificate of Competency – Officer in charge of an engineering watch limited to ships of propulsion power of between 750KW and 3000KW on near coastal voyages; and (c) approved education, training, examination and assessment meeting the standard of competence specified in section A –III/I of the STCW Code as applicable for ships engaged on near coastal voyages; (2) candidates who have not satisfied the standard of competency specified in section A-III/1 of STCW Code for the operation and maintenance of steam boilers may be issued with a Certificate of Competency which shall not be valid for service on ships in which steam boilers form part of ship’s machinery until the engineer officer meets the required standard of competence. G (1) every candidate for the issue of Certificate as Rating forming part of an engineering watch on ships of propulsion power 750KW or more shall: a) not be less than 18years of age on the date of the commencement of the examination for the issue of the certificate; b) have completed: at least nine months training and experience relevant to engineering watch keeping as approved by the Chief examiner on vessels of propulsion power 750KW or more: or a period of approved sea going service of not less than 5 months on ships of 750KW or more and a period of approved special training of not less than two months; or not less than twelve months seagoing service on ships of propulsion power 750KW or more in a relevant capacity in the engine department during the period from 01.08.1993 to 01.08.1998, and Provided that those ratings who do not possess twelve months of sea service during preceding five years from the date of examination shall follow a special refresher Course as approved by the Chief Examiner. c) produce documentary evidence of having successfully completed the approved training in Personal Survival Techniques (A-VI/1-1 in STCW Code), fire prevention and fire fighting (A-VI/1-2 in STCW Code), Elementary First Aid (A-VI/1-3 in STCW Code) and Personal safety and social Responsibilities, (A-VI/1-4 in STCW Code), before he or she can be considered as having qualified for issue of the Certificate as rating forming a part of an engine room watch; and d) Meet the standard of competence specified in section A-III/4 of the STCW Code.
question_en: What are the age and training requirements for a candidate to obtain a Certificate of Competency as an Officer-in-charge of an Engineering watch for ships operating on near coastal voyages with propulsion power between 750KW and 3000KW?
answer_en: To obtain this certificate, a candidate must be at least 18 years old and have completed thirty months of training, including onboard training, and not less than six months of approved seagoing service in the engine department. Additionally, they must have successfully completed approved training in Personal Safety and Social Responsibility, Proficiency in Survival Craft and Rescue Boats, Advanced Fire Fighting, and Medical First Aid, meeting the standard of competence specified in section A-III/I of the STCW Code.
question_ta: 750KW மற்றும் 3000KW இடையில் உந்துசக்தி கொண்ட அருகாமையிலுள்ள கடற்கரைப் பயணக் கப்பல்களில் ஒரு பொறி இயந்திரப் பிரிவின் பொறுப்பாளர் அதிகாரியாகத் திறமைக்கான சான்றிதழைப் பெறுவதற்கான வயது மற்றும் பயிற்சித் தேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: இச்சான்றிதழைப் பெற, ஒரு வேட்பாளர் குறைந்தது 18 வயதுடையவராக இருக்க வேண்டும் மற்றும் கப்பலில் ஆவணப்படுத்தப்பட்ட பயிற்சி உட்பட முப்பது மாதப் பயிற்சி மற்றும் இயந்திரப் பிரிவில் ஆறு மாதங்களுக்குக் குறையாத அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட கடல்சார் சேவையை நிறைவு செய்திருக்க வேண்டும். கூடுதலாக, அவர்கள் தனிப்பட்ட பாதுகாப்பு மற்றும் சமூகப் பொறுப்பு, உயிர் பிழைக்கும் படகுகள் மற்றும் மீட்புப் படகுகளில் நிபுணத்துவம், மேம்பட்ட தீயணைப்பு மற்றும் முதலுதவி மருத்துவத்தில் அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட பயிற்சியை வெற்றிகரமாக முடித்திருக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் STCW குறியீட்டின் பிரிவு A-III/I இல் குறிப்பிடப்பட்டுள்ள தகுதித் தரத்தை பூர்த்தி செய்ய வேண்டும்.
question_si: 750KW සහ 3000KW අතර ප්‍රචාලන බලයක් සහිත වෙරළබඩ යාත්‍රා වල ඉංජිනේරු මුර සංචාරයක නිලධාරියා වශයෙන් නිපුණතා සහතිකයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා වයස් සහ පුහුණු අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම සහතිකය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා, අපේක්ෂකයෙකුට අවම වශයෙන් වයස අවුරුදු 18 ක් විය යුතු අතර, නෞකාවේ පුහුණුව ඇතුළුව මාස තිහක පුහුණුවක් සහ, එන්ජින් දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ අනුමත මුහුදු සේවාවක් මාස හයකට නොඅඩු කාලයක් සම්පූර්ණ කර තිබිය යුතුය. තවද, පුද්ගලික ආරක්ෂාව සහ සමාජ වගකීම්, ජීවිතාරක්ෂක යාත්‍රා සහ මුදාගැනීමේ බෝට්ටු පිළිබඳ ප්‍රවීණතාවය, උසස් ගිනි නිවීම සහ වෛද්‍ය ප්‍රථමාධාර පිළිබඳ අනුමත පුහුණුව සාර්ථකව සම්පූර්ණ කර තිබිය යුතු අතර, STCW කේතයේ A-III/I වගන්තියේ දක්වා ඇති නිපුණතා ප්‍රමිතිය සපුරාලිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Register all TVET institutions
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Additional Fees, Payment Methods and Contact Information
---
- [Registration application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/registration_application.pdf) must be forwarded with the minimum fee of Rs. 1000/= and the balance, if any, after determining the category of registration. Re-inspection due to inadequacies of training institute Rs. 1000/=. (Both public & private institutes)
- [Registration application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/registration_application.pdf) must be forwarded with the registration fee of Rs 1000.00 and the balance, if any after determining the category of registration will be required to pay later.

[Registration application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/registration_application.pdf)

- Registration can be download form TVEC web site or you can get it from TVEC office.

Payment of Registration fee

- Money order prepared in favour of Deputy Director (Finance) Tertiary and Vocational Education Commission and paying office as "Narahenpita"
- Direct cash payment to The commission office at Narahenpita.

Service responsibilities

Mr. W.K.D. Harischandra Programme Officer Tel: +94(0)115867713 Email: [harischandra@tvec.gov.lk](mailto:harischandra@tvec.gov.lk)
question_en: What are the initial fees and payment methods for registering vocational education and training institutions?
answer_en: The minimum registration fee is Rupees 1000. Re-inspection due to inadequacies costs Rupees 1000. Payment can be made via a money order favouring Deputy Director (Finance), Tertiary and Vocational Education Commission at Narahenpita, or through a direct cash payment at the commission office in Narahenpita.
question_ta: தொழிற்கல்வி மற்றும் பயிற்சி நிறுவனங்களைப் பதிவு செய்வதற்கான ஆரம்பக் கட்டணங்கள் மற்றும் கட்டணம் செலுத்தும் முறைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: குறைந்தபட்ச பதிவு கட்டணம் ரூபாய் 1000 ஆகும். பயிற்சி நிறுவனங்களின் குறைபாடுகளால் மறு ஆய்வு கட்டணம் ரூபாய் 1000 ஆகும். கட்டணத்தை நாராஹென்பிட்டாவில் உள்ள மூன்றாம் நிலை மற்றும் தொழிற்கல்வி ஆணையத்தின் நிதி உதவி இயக்குனருக்கு பண அஞ்சல் மூலம் செலுத்தலாம் அல்லது ஆணையத்தின் அலுவலகத்தில் நேரடியாகப் பணமாகச் செலுத்தலாம்.
question_si: වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන හා පුහුණු ආයතන ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා වන ආරම්භක ගාස්තු සහ ගෙවීමේ ක්‍රම මොනවාද?
answer_si: අවම ලියාපදිංචි ගාස්තුව රුපියල් 1000 කි. පුහුණු ආයතනවල අඩුපාඩු හේතුවෙන් නැවත පරීක්ෂා කිරීමේ ගාස්තුව රුපියල් 1000 කි. ගෙවීම් නාරාහේන්පිට පිහිටි තෘතීයික හා වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන කොමිෂන් සභාවේ නියෝජ්‍ය අධ්‍යක්ෂ (මුල්‍ය) වෙත මුදල් ඇනවුමක් මගින් හෝ කොමිෂන් සභා කාර්යාලයට සෘජු මුදල් ගෙවීමකින් සිදු කළ හැක.

context:
Service: Enrollment of Students for the Courses of Colleges of Technology/Technical Colleges
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Course Fees and Benefits for Trainees
---
Course Fees

- No fees will be charged for fulltime courses. But fees will be charged as follows from the students who follow the part time/evening courses.
- Rs. 2000.00 per annum for part time/evening courses of more than one year.
- Rs. 1500.00 per annum for part time/evening courses of one year or less short term courses.

Benefits for Trainees, within the Training Period

- Allowance of Rs. 20.00 per day (only for full time day courses (subject to maximum Rs. 450.00 per month).
- Annual bursary of Rs. 2500.00 for lower income students.
- Have opportunity to applying for a Diploma, Higher Diploma and Technology Degree through the obtaining of certificate of National Vocational Qualification.
- Able to follow the courses under Competency Based Training (CBT).
- CTB season tickets on concessionary amount.
- Obtaining carrier Guidance services and professional English knowledge.
- Obtaining entrepreneurship training.
- Obtaining Vocational Compentencies.
question_en: What are the key benefits provided to trainees during their training period in the courses offered by Colleges of Technology/Technical Colleges?
answer_en: Trainees receive an allowance of Rs. 20.00 per day for full-time day courses (subject to a maximum of Rs. 450.00 per month). Lower income students are eligible for an annual bursary of Rs. 2500.00. Other benefits include the opportunity to apply for Diploma, Higher Diploma, and Technology Degrees, Competency Based Training, concessionary CTB season tickets, career guidance services, professional English knowledge, entrepreneurship training, and the acquisition of Vocational Competencies.
question_ta: தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்லூரிகள்/தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்லூரிகளால் வழங்கப்படும் படிப்புகளில் பயிற்சியாளர்களுக்குப் பயிற்சி காலத்தில் வழங்கப்படும் முக்கியப் பலன்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: முழுநேர பகல்நேரப் படிப்புகளுக்கு பயிற்சியாளர்களுக்கு ஒரு நாளைக்கு ரூ. 20.00 கொடுப்பனவு வழங்கப்படும் (மாதத்திற்கு அதிகபட்சம் ரூ. 450.00க்கு உட்பட்டு). குறைந்த வருமானம் கொண்ட மாணவர்களுக்கு ஆண்டுக்கு ரூ. 2500.00 புலமைப்பரிசில் வழங்கப்படும். டிப்ளோமா, உயர் டிப்ளோமா மற்றும் தொழில்நுட்பப் பட்டங்களுக்கு விண்ணப்பிக்கும் வாய்ப்பு, திறன் அடிப்படையிலான பயிற்சி, சலுகை விலையில் CTB பருவச் சீட்டுகள், தொழில் வழிகாட்டல் சேவைகள், தொழில்முறை ஆங்கில அறிவு, தொழில்முனைவோர் பயிற்சி மற்றும் தொழில் திறன்களைப் பெறுதல் ஆகியவை மற்ற பலன்களாகும்.
question_si: තාක්ෂණික විද්‍යාල/තාක්ෂණික විද්‍යාල මගින් පිරිනමන පාඨමාලා වල පුහුණු කාලය තුළදී ආධුනිකයන්ට ලැබෙන ප්‍රධාන ප්‍රතිලාභ මොනවාද?
answer_si: පූර්ණකාලීන දෛනික පාඨමාලා සඳහා ආධුනිකයන්ට දිනකට රු. 20.00 ක දීමනාවක් (මාසයකට උපරිම රු. 450.00 කට යටත්ව) ලැබේ. අඩු ආදායම්ලාභී සිසුන් සඳහා රු. 2500.00 ක වාර්ෂික ශිෂ්‍යත්වයක් හිමිවේ. ඩිප්ලෝමා, උසස් ඩිප්ලෝමා සහ තාක්ෂණික උපාධි සඳහා අයදුම් කිරීමට අවස්ථාව, නිපුණතා පදනම් වූ පුහුණුව, සහනදායී CTB වාර ප්‍රවේශපත්, වෘත්තීය මාර්ගෝපදේශන සේවා, වෘත්තීය ඉංග්‍රීසි දැනුම, ව්‍යවසායකත්ව පුහුණුව සහ වෘත්තීය නිපුණතා ලබාගැනීම අනෙකුත් ප්‍රතිලාභ අතර වේ.

context:
Service: NVQ certificates
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: NVQ Certificate Processing and Issuance
---
1. Process, Print & issue NVQ certificates

- Receive data of certificate holders from training providers
- Process data
- Print certificates
- Issue certificates to training providers
- Maintain a database of NVQ certificate holders
- Inquiries of certificates
question_en: What are the key steps involved in the NVQ Certificate Processing and Issuance service?
answer_en: The key steps include receiving data of certificate holders from training providers, processing the data, printing certificates, issuing certificates to training providers, maintaining a database of NVQ certificate holders, and handling inquiries related to certificates.
question_ta: NVQ சான்றிதழ் செயலாக்கம் மற்றும் வழங்குதல் சேவையில் உள்ள முக்கிய படிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: பயிற்சி வழங்குநர்களிடமிருந்து சான்றிதழ் வைத்திருப்பவர்களின் தரவைப் பெறுதல், தரவைச் செயலாக்குதல், சான்றிதழ்களை அச்சிடுதல், பயிற்சி வழங்குநர்களுக்கு சான்றிதழ்களை வழங்குதல், NVQ சான்றிதழ் வைத்திருப்பவர்களின் தரவுத்தளத்தைப் பராமரித்தல் மற்றும் சான்றிதழ்கள் தொடர்பான விசாரணைகளைக் கையாளுதல் ஆகியவை முக்கிய படிகள் ஆகும்.
question_si: NVQ සහතික සැකසීමේ සහ නිකුත් කිරීමේ සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන පියවර මොනවාද?
answer_si: පුහුණු සැපයුම්කරුවන්ගෙන් සහතික හිමියන්ගේ දත්ත ලබා ගැනීම, දත්ත සැකසීම, සහතික මුද්‍රණය කිරීම, පුහුණු සැපයුම්කරුවන්ට සහතික නිකුත් කිරීම, NVQ සහතික හිමියන්ගේ දත්ත ගබඩාවක් පවත්වාගෙන යාම සහ සහතික පිළිබඳ විමසීම් හැසිරවීම ප්‍රධාන පියවර වේ.

context:

Preparing the Technical Education courses as relevant to industrial needs and it is confirmed that the Technical Education Institutions are necessities for industry needs.
question_en: What is the primary objective of the Development Programmes for Private Public Partnership under the topic of 'Technical Education and Industrial Needs'?
answer_en: The primary objective is to prepare Technical Education courses that are relevant to industrial needs and to confirm the necessity of Technical Education Institutions for industry needs.
question_ta: 'தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்வி மற்றும் தொழில்துறை தேவைகள்' என்ற தலைப்பின் கீழ் தனியார் பொதுப் பங்களிப்புக்கான மேம்பாட்டுத் திட்டங்களின் முதன்மை நோக்கம் என்ன?
answer_ta: தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்விப் படிப்புகளைத் தொழில்துறை தேவைகளுக்கு ஏற்றவாறு தயாரிப்பதும், தொழில்துறை தேவைகளுக்குத் தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்வி நிறுவனங்களின் அவசியத்தை உறுதிப்படுத்துவதும் இதன் முதன்மை நோக்கமாகும்.
question_si: 'තාක්ෂණික අධ්‍යාපනය සහ කාර්මික අවශ්‍යතා' යන මාතෘකාව යටතේ පෞද්ගලික රාජ්‍ය හවුල්කාරිත්වය සඳහා වූ සංවර්ධන වැඩසටහන් වල ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ වන්නේ කාර්මික අවශ්‍යතාවලට අදාළ වන පරිදි තාක්ෂණික අධ්‍යාපන පාඨමාලා සකස් කිරීම සහ කර්මාන්ත අවශ්‍යතා සඳහා තාක්ෂණික අධ්‍යාපන ආයතනවල අවශ්‍යතාවය තහවුරු කිරීමයි.

question_ta: தேசிய தொழிற்கல்வித் தேர்வுச் சேவையின் கீழ் விண்ணப்பங்களைச் சமர்ப்பிப்பதன் நோக்கம் என்ன?
answer_ta: பட்டியலிடப்பட்ட தொழில்களில் ஈடுபட்டுள்ளவர்கள் தேசிய அளவிலான திறன் சான்றிதழைப் பெறுவதற்காக விண்ணப்பங்களைச் சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம்.
question_si: ජාතික වෘත්තීය පරීක්ෂණ සේවාව යටතේ අයදුම්පත් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේ අරමුණ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ලැයිස්තුගත වෘත්තීන්හි නියැලී සිටින පුද්ගලයන්ට ජාතික මට්ටමේ නිපුණතා සහතිකයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අයදුම්පත් ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකිය.

question_ta: "தேர்வு கட்டணம் செலுத்துதல்" சேவையைப் பெறுவதற்கு செலுத்த வேண்டிய கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?

question_si: "විභාග ගාස්තු ගෙවීම" සේවාව ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ගෙවිය යුතු ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
