context:
Service: Awareness Programme for Entrepreneurship Development
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Entrepreneurship Development Programmes for Certificate Holders and Youth
---
Entrepreneurship Development Programmes will be implemented as follows by the Carrier Guidance Unit for certificate holders who complete the vocational education and youth who wish to commence the self employment and already engaged in self employment.

• Awareness Programmes of Entrepreneurship Development is conducting for all students, studing in Colleges of Technology/Technical Colleges.

• Thereafter, held the 14 days entrepreneurship training programme for students wish to work as a enterpreneur.

• Assist to obtain required loan for trained enterpreneur.

A guide line for Entrepreneurship Development is published by the Skills Development Project. Further clarifications, can be obtained by the Carrier Guidance Unit of the nearest College of Technology/Technical College.
question_en: What are the main components or steps involved in the Entrepreneurship Development Programmes?
answer_en: The Entrepreneurship Development Programmes involve three main components: conducting awareness programmes for students in Colleges of Technology/Technical Colleges, holding a 14-day entrepreneurship training programme for interested students, and assisting trained entrepreneurs to obtain necessary loans.
question_ta: தொழில்முனைவோர் மேம்பாட்டுத் திட்டங்களில் உள்ள முக்கிய கூறுகள் அல்லது படிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தொழில்முனைவோர் மேம்பாட்டுத் திட்டங்களில் மூன்று முக்கிய கூறுகள் அடங்கும்: தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்லூரிகள்/தொழில்நுட்பக் கல்லூரிகளில் படிக்கும் மாணவர்களுக்கான விழிப்புணர்வு நிகழ்ச்சிகளை நடத்துதல், ஆர்வமுள்ள மாணவர்களுக்கு 14 நாட்கள் தொழில்முனைவோர் பயிற்சித் திட்டத்தை நடத்துதல், மற்றும் பயிற்சி பெற்ற தொழில்முனைவோருக்குத் தேவையான கடன்களைப் பெற உதவுதல்.
question_si: ව්‍යවසායකත්ව සංවර්ධන වැඩසටහන් වල අන්තර්ගත ප්‍රධාන අංග හෝ පියවර මොනවාද?
answer_si: ව්‍යවසායකත්ව සංවර්ධන වැඩසටහන් ප්‍රධාන අංග තුනකින් සමන්විත වේ: තාක්ෂණික විද්‍යාල/තාක්ෂණික විද්‍යාලවල සිසුන් සඳහා දැනුවත් කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන් පැවැත්වීම, උනන්දුවක් දක්වන සිසුන් සඳහා දින 14ක ව්‍යවසායකත්ව පුහුණු වැඩසටහනක් පැවැත්වීම, සහ පුහුණුව ලැබූ ව්‍යවසායකයින්ට අවශ්‍ය ණය ලබා ගැනීමට සහාය වීම.

context:
Service: Vocational Education Training (VET) Plans
Main Category: Education & Training
Subcategory: Vocational Education & Training
Topic: Vocational Education Training (VET) Plans and Responsibilities of the Tertiary & Vocational Education Commission
---
Vocational Education Training (VET) Plans

Prepare and update Vocational Education Training (VET) Plans for growing industry sectors and specific geographic areas to coordinate training efforts by private & public sector training institutions in a way that meet skills requirements of the industry and economy.

- One of the key responsibilities of the Tertiary & Vocational Education Commission is to provide the training providers with strategic advice about the future needs of the training system.
- In fulfilling this role, the Commission develops planning documents, which detail the strategies, priority areas and specific initiatives of training of persons needed for the industry. Based on that, the training programmes could be organized by the training providers.
- Up to 2008, the under mentioned VET plans have been developed in the industry sectors specified below. Training activities proposed in those plans are being implemented utilizing financial grants scheme operated by the TVEC. Under that, financial assistance is given on priority basis to public sector training institutions to implement training programs suggested.
question_en: What is the primary purpose of Vocational Education Training (VET) Plans?
answer_en: The primary purpose of Vocational Education Training (VET) Plans is to prepare and update plans for growing industry sectors and specific geographic areas to coordinate training efforts by private and public sector training institutions, ensuring they meet the skills requirements of the industry and economy.
question_ta: தொழிற்கல்வி பயிற்சி (VET) திட்டங்களின் முக்கிய நோக்கம் என்ன?
answer_ta: தொழிற்கல்வி பயிற்சி (VET) திட்டங்களின் முக்கிய நோக்கம், வளர்ந்து வரும் தொழில் துறைகள் மற்றும் குறிப்பிட்ட புவியியல் பகுதிகளுக்கான திட்டங்களைத் தயாரித்து புதுப்பிப்பதாகும். இதன்மூலம் தனியார் மற்றும் பொதுத்துறை பயிற்சி நிறுவனங்களின் பயிற்சி முயற்சிகளை ஒருங்கிணைத்து, தொழில் மற்றும் பொருளாதாரத்தின் திறன் தேவைகளைப் பூர்த்தி செய்வதே ஆகும்.
question_si: වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන පුහුණු (VET) සැලසුම් වල ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: වෘත්තීය අධ්‍යාපන පුහුණු (VET) සැලසුම් වල ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ වන්නේ වර්ධනය වන කර්මාන්ත ක්ෂේත්‍ර සහ විශේෂිත භූගෝලීය ප්‍රදේශ සඳහා සැලසුම් සකස් කර යාවත්කාලීන කිරීමයි. මෙය පුද්ගලික සහ රාජ්‍ය අංශයේ පුහුණු ආයතනවල පුහුණු ප්‍රයත්නයන් සම්බන්ධීකරණය කිරීමට උපකාරී වන අතර, එමගින් කර්මාන්තයේ සහ ආර්ථිකයේ නිපුණතා අවශ්‍යතා සපුරාලීම සහතික කෙරේ.

context:
Service: Widows/Widowers and Orphans Pension Scheme
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: විශේෂ කරුණු (Part 2) සහ පියවරෙන් පියවර පිළිවෙල
---
මාසික විශ්‍රාම වැටුපෙන් අඩු කරනු නොලැබේ)

වයස අවුරුදු 21-26 අතර අනාථ වුවන්ට විශ්‍රාමික වැටුප් ගෙවීමි

අනාථ රැකියාවක් නොකරන සහ අධ්‍යාපන කටයුතු වල යෙදෙන ඔහු හෝ ඇය ග්‍රාමසේවක නිලධාරී මහතා මගින් සනාථ කර ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි තුමා හට දැන්විම

සටහන 1 අනාථ වයස අවුරුදු 21 පිරුණු අය පුද්ගලිකව ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි තුමා හමු වී විශ්‍රාම වැටුප දීර්ග කිරීමේ පෝරමය පිරවිය යුතුය

සටහන 2 පාස්පෝටි ප්‍රමාණයේ ඡායාරූප 3 ක් ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි තුමා වෙත ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමෙන් විශ්‍රාමක හැදුනුමි පතක් ලබා ගත හැක

සටහන 3 අනාථ දරුවෙක් ඉගනීමට හෝ රැකියාවක් කිරීමට බලාපොරොත්තු වන්නේ නමි (ඔ ආර් පි 7) පොරමය ලබාගෙන ඵය පුරවා සාමදාන විනිශ්‍යකරුවකු ලවා ඵය සහතික කර ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමිතුමා වෙත භාර දිය යුතුය

සටහන 4 අනාථ ඵම වයස් කාණ්ඩයේ පසුවන අයට විශ්‍රාමික වැටුප් වෙන් වෙන්ව ලබා ගත හැක

සටහන 5 යමි විදියකින් වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂයා නැවත කසාදයක් කර ගත හොත් මුල් කසාදයේ ළමයින් හට විශ්‍රාමක වැටුප ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්ය නමි ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි තුමා හට දැනුමි දීමෙන් ඵය බෙදා වෙන් කර ගත හැක

පියවරෙන් පියවර පිලිවෙල (වැන්දබු වැන්දබුව රැක බලා ගැනීම හා අනාථ විශ්‍රාමික යෝජනා ක්රමය)

පියවර 1:වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂයන් ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි වෙත මරණය දැනුමි දීම

පියවර 2:වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂ ප්‍රකාශය සහ අවශ්‍ය උපදෙස් ලබා දීම

සටහන -:වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂ විසින් දෙන ලද ප්‍රකාශය ග්‍රාමසේවක මහතා විසින් සහතික කිරීම
question_en: What conditions must orphans aged 21-26 meet to receive a pension under the Widows/Widowers and Orphans Pension Scheme?
answer_en: Orphans aged between 21 and 26 who are not employed and are engaged in educational activities are eligible to receive pension payments. This must be confirmed by the Grama Niladhari officer and reported to the Divisional Secretary.
question_ta: விதவைகள்/விதவர்கள் மற்றும் அனாதைகள் ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டத்தின் கீழ் 21-26 வயதுடைய அனாதைகள் ஓய்வூதியம் பெற என்ன நிபந்தனைகள் உள்ளன?
answer_ta: 21 முதல் 26 வயதுக்குட்பட்ட, வேலை செய்யாத மற்றும் கல்வி நடவடிக்கைகளில் ஈடுபட்டுள்ள அனாதைகள் ஓய்வூதிய கொடுப்பனவுகளைப் பெற தகுதியுடையவர்கள். இதை கிராம சேவை அதிகாரி உறுதிப்படுத்தி பிரதேச செயலாளருக்கு அறிவிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: වැන්දඹු/වැන්දඹුවන් සහ අනාථ දරුවන් සඳහා වන විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රමය යටතේ වයස අවුරුදු 21-26 අතර අනාථ දරුවන්ට විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ලැබීමට ඇති කොන්දේසි මොනවාද?
answer_si: වයස අවුරුදු 21 ත් 26 ත් අතර රැකියාවක් නොකරන සහ අධ්‍යාපන කටයුතු වල යෙදෙන අනාථ දරුවන් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ගෙවීම් සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලබයි. මෙය ග්‍රාමසේවක නිලධාරී මහතා මගින් සනාථ කර ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් තුමා හට දැන්විය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Change of officers of a registered Trade Union
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Seminars, Workshops & Training Programmes
Topic: Eligibility and Application Information
---
eligibility
- The constitutionality of the change of officers should have been confirmed.

Places where application form could be obtained :-
- 7th floor, Trade Union Division, Labour Secretariat. Required application forms can be downloaded from website: labourdept.gov.lk

Payment for application :-
No charge.

Time to submit application :-
Within 7 days after change of officers.

Fees paying to obtain this service :-
No.

Period taken to provide the Service (Ordinary Service and Priority Service)
- Approval will be granted according to the accuracy of the information applied.

Necessary Supporting documents
- The Attendance sign-in sheet to prove that a meeting with the quorum was held constitutionally
- A copy of the meeting minutes certified by secretary
- Duly completed [form ‘L’](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/l%20form.pdf)
question_en: What is the deadline for submitting the application for changing officers of a registered Trade Union, and where can the application form be obtained?
answer_en: The application should be submitted within 7 days after the change of officers. The application forms can be obtained from the 7th floor, Trade Union Division, Labour Secretariat, or downloaded from labourdept.gov.lk.
question_ta: பதிவுசெய்யப்பட்ட தொழிற்சங்க அதிகாரிகளை மாற்றுவதற்கான விண்ணப்பத்தை சமர்ப்பிப்பதற்கான காலக்கெடு என்ன, மேலும் விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தை எங்கிருந்து பெறலாம்?
answer_ta: அதிகாரிகள் மாற்றப்பட்ட 7 நாட்களுக்குள் விண்ணப்பம் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும். விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்களை தொழிலாளர் செயலகத்தின், தொழிற்சங்கப் பிரிவின் 7வது தளத்தில் பெறலாம் அல்லது labourdept.gov.lk என்ற இணையதளத்தில் இருந்து பதிவிறக்கம் செய்யலாம்.
question_si: ලියාපදිංචි වෘත්තීය සමිති නිලධාරීන් වෙනස් කිරීම සඳහා වන අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේ අවසන් දිනය කවදාද, සහ අයදුම්පත්‍රය ලබා ගත හැක්කේ කොතැනින්ද?
answer_si: නිලධාරීන් වෙනස් කිරීමෙන් දින 7ක් ඇතුළත අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය. අයදුම්පත්‍ර ශ්‍රම ලේකම් කාර්යාලයේ, වෘත්තීය සමිති අංශයේ 7 වන මහලෙන් ලබා ගත හැකි අතර, labourdept.gov.lk වෙබ් අඩවියෙන් බාගත කර ගත හැක.

context:
Service: Agricultural Education for School Drop-outs
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Seminars, Workshops & Training Programmes
Topic: Selection Process and Application Submission
---
Candidates who score highest marks on district basis at the competitive examination to be held in August-September of each year will be called for an interview in January of the following year. Admission of new students will be made at the end of March in that year. Process of submitting applications. (Places from where applications can be obtained, Place, Counter and time at which applications should be submitted.) 1.Applications for admission to the course will be called during the period April-June in each year by a Gazette notification 2.Applications should be made in accordance with the Gazette notifications. Applications should be sent by registered post to the address given in the Gazette notification on or before the closing date mentioned in the notification. Fees payable to obtain the service Time taken to provide the service.(Ordinary service and Priority service) Exceptions or Instances outside the above requirements and special information [Specimen application form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) Candidate should prepare the application himself in accordance with the specimen form and instructions given in the Gazette notification. Perfected specimen application form
question_en: When are applications for the Agricultural Education course for school drop-outs typically called each year, and how should they be submitted?
answer_en: Applications for admission to the Agricultural Education course for school drop-outs are called during the period April-June each year by a Gazette notification. Applicants must prepare their applications according to the specimen form and instructions in the Gazette and send them by registered post to the address given in the Gazette notification on or before the closing date.
question_ta: பள்ளி இடைநின்றோருக்கான விவசாயக் கல்விப் படிப்புக்கான விண்ணப்பங்கள் ஒவ்வொரு ஆண்டும் எப்போது அழைக்கப்படுகின்றன, அவை எவ்வாறு சமர்ப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: பள்ளி இடைநின்றோருக்கான விவசாயக் கல்விப் படிப்பில் சேர்வதற்கான விண்ணப்பங்கள் ஒவ்வொரு ஆண்டும் ஏப்ரல்-ஜூன் காலப்பகுதியில் வர்த்தமானி அறிவிப்பு மூலம் கோரப்படுகின்றன. விண்ணப்பதாரர்கள் வர்த்தமானி அறிவிப்பில் உள்ள மாதிரிப் படிவம் மற்றும் அறிவுறுத்தல்களின்படி தங்கள் விண்ணப்பங்களைத் தயாரித்து, அறிவிப்பில் குறிப்பிடப்பட்டுள்ள இறுதித் தேதிக்கு முன்னதாக வர்த்தமானி அறிவிப்பில் கொடுக்கப்பட்டுள்ள முகவரிக்கு பதிவுத் தபால் மூலம் அனுப்ப வேண்டும்.
question_si: පාසල් හැරගිය අය සඳහා වන කෘෂිකාර්මික අධ්‍යාපන පාඨමාලාව සඳහා අයදුම්පත් සාමාන්‍යයෙන් සෑම වසරකම කැඳවනු ලබන්නේ කවදාද, ඒවා ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුත්තේ කෙසේද?
answer_si: පාසල් හැරගිය අය සඳහා වන කෘෂිකාර්මික අධ්‍යාපන පාඨමාලාවට ඇතුළත් කිරීම සඳහා අයදුම්පත් සෑම වසරකම අප්‍රේල්-ජුනි කාලය තුළ ගැසට් නිවේදනයක් මගින් කැඳවනු ලැබේ. අයදුම්කරුවන් ගැසට් නිවේදනයේ ඇති ආදර්ශ පත්‍රිකාව සහ උපදෙස් අනුව අයදුම්පත් සකස් කර, නිවේදනයේ සඳහන් අවසන් දිනයට පෙර ගැසට් නිවේදනයේ දක්වා ඇති ලිපිනයට ලියාපදිංචි තැපෑලෙන් යැවිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Civil Pension Schemes
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: හිඟ මුදල් ලබා ගැනීම - අමතර සටහන් සහ පියවරෙන් පියවර පිළිවෙල (මාසික විශ්‍රාමික ගෙවීම්)
---
සටහන 1 -: අතපසු වු ගෙවීමි වල වටිනාකම බැංකුවට හෝ තැපැල් කාර්ය්‍යලයට ලැබී නැත්නමි අයදුම්කරු විසින් ඵය අදාල ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේනමි කාර්ය්‍යලයට දැන්විය යුතුය

සටහන 2 -: අයදුම් පත භාරදී දින තුනකට පසු අයදුමිකරු අතපසු වු ගෙවිමි චෙක් පත ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි කාර්ය්‍යලයෙන් ලබා ගත හැක

පියවරෙන් පියවර පිළිවෙල (මාසික විශ්‍රාමික ගෙවීමි)

පියවර 1 :අයදුමි කරු ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි කාර්ය්‍යලයට පැමිණිය යුතුයි සේවය කරන ලද ස්ථානයෙන් ලබා ගත් ලිපියක් සමග

පියවර 2 :අයදුමිකරු අදාල අයදුමි පත්‍ර අදාල ස්ථානයෙන් ලබා ගෙන පිරවිය යුතුය

සටහන -: අයදුමිකරු විසින් සදහන් කල යුතුයි ඔහු හෝ ඇය විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ලබාගන්න ස්ථානය(තැපැල් කාර්ය්‍යලය හෝ බැංකු)

3 පියවර :අයදුමිකරු අයදුමි පත්‍රය භාරදිය යුත්තේ පාස්පෝටි ප්‍රමානයේ ඡායාරූප තුනක් සමග විශ්‍රාමික අංශයටය
question_en: What is the initial process for an applicant to obtain monthly pension payments or arrears according to the provided steps?
answer_en: An applicant must first visit the Divisional Secretariat with a letter from their previous workplace. They then need to obtain and fill out the relevant application forms, indicating their preferred pension payment location (Post Office or Bank). Finally, the completed application, along with three passport-sized photographs, must be submitted to the Pensions Division.
question_ta: வழங்கப்பட்ட வழிமுறைகளின்படி, மாதாந்திர ஓய்வூதிய கொடுப்பனவுகள் அல்லது நிலுவைத் தொகையைப் பெறுவதற்கான ஆரம்ப செயல்முறை என்ன?
answer_ta: ஒரு விண்ணப்பதாரர் முதலில் தனது முந்தைய பணியிடத்திலிருந்து பெற்ற கடிதத்துடன் பிரதேச செயலகத்திற்குச் செல்ல வேண்டும். பின்னர், அவர்கள் உரிய விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்களைப் பெற்று நிரப்ப வேண்டும், அதில் தங்கள் விருப்பமான ஓய்வூதியக் கொடுப்பனவு இடத்தைக் (தபால் அலுவலகம் அல்லது வங்கி) குறிப்பிட வேண்டும். இறுதியாக, பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட விண்ணப்பம், மூன்று கடவுச்சீட்டு அளவு புகைப்படங்களுடன், ஓய்வூதியப் பிரிவில் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: සපයන ලද පියවරවලට අනුව, මාසික විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ගෙවීම් හෝ හිඟ මුදල් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අයදුම්කරුවෙකුට ඇති මූලික ක්‍රියාවලිය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: අයදුම්කරුවෙකුට මුලින්ම ඔහුගේ හෝ ඇයගේ පෙර සේවා ස්ථානයෙන් ලබාගත් ලිපියක් සමඟ ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයට පැමිණිය යුතුය. ඉන්පසුව, ඔවුන් අදාළ අයදුම්පත් ලබාගෙන පුරවා, ඔවුන් කැමති විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ගෙවන ස්ථානය (තැපැල් කාර්යාලය හෝ බැංකුව) සඳහන් කළ යුතුය. අවසාන වශයෙන්, සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අයදුම්පත, ගමන් බලපත්‍ර ප්‍රමාණයේ ඡායාරූප තුනක් සමඟ විශ්‍රාමික අංශයට භාර දිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Payment of Employees’ Provident Fund Benefits on Migration for Permanent Residence
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: Processing Time and Required Documents
---
03 weeks, if all documents are completed

- Application certified by last employer, “B” cards relevant to membership numbers, National Identity card and a copy of National Identity card certified by the employer; a copy of the bank pass book; and
- Valid permanent residency visa, and valid passport
- If the claim application of a member who has citizenship for permanent residency in a foreign country is handed over by another person, the copy of permanent visa and passport should have been certified by the Sri Lanka embassy of that particular country. And the finger mark and signature in the authority granting letter or in the request letter of the member and in form “K” should have been certified by the Sri Lanka embassy of that particular country.
question_en: What is the processing time for the payment of Employees’ Provident Fund benefits on migration for permanent residence, if all required documents are completed?
answer_en: The processing time is 03 weeks if all documents are completed.
question_ta: நிரந்தர வதிவிடக் குடியேற்றத்திற்கான ஊழியர் சேமலாப நிதிப் பலன்களைப் பெறுவதற்கான செயலாக்க நேரம் எவ்வளவு, அனைத்து தேவையான ஆவணங்களும் முழுமையாக இருந்தால்?
answer_ta: அனைத்து ஆவணங்களும் முழுமையாக இருந்தால், செயலாக்க நேரம் 03 வாரங்கள் ஆகும்.
question_si: ස්ථිර පදිංචිය සඳහා සංක්‍රමණය වන සේවක අර්ථසාධක අරමුදල් ප්‍රතිලාභ ගෙවීම සඳහා, අවශ්‍ය සියලුම ලේඛන සම්පූර්ණ නම්, සැකසීමට ගතවන කාලය කොපමණද?
answer_si: සියලුම ලේඛන සම්පූර්ණ නම්, සැකසීමට සති 03 ක් ගතවේ.

context:
Service: Renewing Licenses of the Foreign Recruitment Agencies
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Foreign Employment
Topic: Renewing a Foreign Employment License for Recruitment Agencies
---
Renewing a License for recruitment agency You can renew your agency license by submitting the completed application form available at the Sri Lanka Bureau of Foreign Employment (SLBFE). You must remember to submit the renewal application 30 days before the license expires and the SLBFE would then evaluate your performances of past consecutive two years (if none of recruitment was done, renewal will be not granted.) inspect your office, equipment, records, extended bank guarantee and grant approval for the renewal of the license. If you wish to shift your recruiting agency to a new location, you should obtain the approval of the License Division of the SLBFE by submitting and application along with the following documents:

- Location of the new office
- Proof of legal occupancy of such premises
- Revised business registration certificate with the details of the new premises
- Renewal fee - Rupees Fifty thousand (Rs.50,000 /= excluding NBT+VAT)
question_en: When should a foreign recruitment agency submit its application to renew its foreign employment license?
answer_en: A foreign recruitment agency must submit its renewal application 30 days before the license expires.
question_ta: வெளிநாட்டு ஆட்சேர்ப்பு முகவர் நிறுவனம் அதன் வெளிநாட்டு வேலைவாய்ப்பு உரிமத்தைப் புதுப்பிப்பதற்கான விண்ணப்பத்தை எப்போது சமர்ப்பிக்க வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: ஒரு வெளிநாட்டு ஆட்சேர்ப்பு முகவர் நிறுவனம் உரிமம் காலாவதியாவதற்கு 30 நாட்களுக்கு முன் புதுப்பித்தல் விண்ணப்பத்தை சமர்ப்பிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: විදේශ බඳවා ගැනීමේ නියෝජිත ආයතනයක් සිය විදේශ සේවා නියුක්ති බලපත්‍රය අලුත් කිරීමේ අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුත්තේ කවදාද?
answer_si: විදේශ බඳවා ගැනීමේ නියෝජිත ආයතනයක් බලපත්‍රය කල් ඉකුත් වීමට දින 30කට පෙර අලුත් කිරීමේ අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Providing Bonds & Guarantees
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Private Employees
Topic: Administration, Objective, and Registration with the Construction Guarantee Fund
---
Accordingly, the Trust/Fund is presently administered by a Board of Trustees represented from the Government and Private Sectors, under the Chairmanship of the Secretary to the Ministry incharge of the subject of construction. The main objective of the Trust/Fund is to provide Bonds & Guarantees to Construction Contractors for them to provide Bonds & Guarantees and such other securities when Bidding & undertaking Construction Contracts and matters connected theirwith. In order to obtain such securities the Construction Contractors who possess a valid Registration under the National Registration Scheme developed by Institute of Construction Training And Development (ICTAD). The Construction Contractors who are interest in obtaining the services of CGF have first to register with CGF by providing the Company profile & other relevant details requested therein.
question_en: What are the requirements for Construction Contractors to obtain services from the Construction Guarantee Fund (CGF)?
answer_en: Construction Contractors must possess a valid Registration under the National Registration Scheme developed by the Institute of Construction Training And Development (ICTAD) and first register with CGF by providing the Company profile and other relevant details.
question_ta: கட்டுமான உத்தரவாத நிதியத்திலிருந்து (CGF) சேவைகளைப் பெறுவதற்கு கட்டுமான ஒப்பந்தக்காரர்களுக்கு என்ன தேவைகள் உள்ளன?
answer_ta: கட்டுமான ஒப்பந்தக்காரர்கள் கட்டுமானப் பயிற்சி மற்றும் மேம்பாட்டு நிறுவனம் (ICTAD) உருவாக்கிய தேசியப் பதிவுத் திட்டத்தின் கீழ் செல்லுபடியாகும் பதிவு வைத்திருக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் முதலில் தங்கள் நிறுவனத்தின் சுயவிவரம் மற்றும் கோரப்பட்ட பிற தொடர்புடைய விவரங்களை வழங்குவதன் மூலம் CGF உடன் பதிவு செய்ய வேண்டும்.
question_si: ඉදිකිරීම් කොන්ත්‍රාත්කරුවන්ට ඉදිකිරීම් ඇප අරමුදලින් (CGF) සේවා ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: ඉදිකිරීම් කොන්ත්‍රාත්කරුවන් ඉදිකිරීම් පුහුණු හා සංවර්ධන ආයතනය (ICTAD) විසින් සංවර්ධනය කරන ලද ජාතික ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ වලංගු ලියාපදිංචියක් තිබිය යුතු අතර, මුලින්ම ඔවුන්ගේ සමාගම් පැතිකඩ සහ ඉල්ලා ඇති අනෙකුත් අදාළ විස්තර ලබා දීමෙන් CGF සමඟ ලියාපදිංචි විය යුතුය.

1.7.7. Disengagement of seafarers 1.7.7.1. Qualifications 1. Should have been engaged through the Shipping Office 2. Masters endorsement along with date of release should be placed in the CDC and agent’s letter requesting the Shipping Officer for the release 1.7.7.2. Application process 1.7.7.2.1. Places where application form could be obtained :No application form. Continuous Discharge Certificate (CDC) 2. question_en: What documents are required for the disengagement of seafarers?
answer_en: The documents required for the disengagement of seafarers are the Continuous Discharge Certificate (CDC) and an agent’s letter requesting the Shipping Officer for the release.
question_ta: கடலோடிகளை விடுவிப்பதற்கான சேவைக்குத் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: கடலோடிகளை விடுவிப்பதற்கான சேவைக்குத் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் தொடர்ச்சியான வெளியேற்றச் சான்றிதழ் (CDC) மற்றும் கப்பல் அதிகாரியிடம் விடுவிப்பைக் கோரும் முகவரின் கடிதம் ஆகும்.
question_si: නාවිකයින් මුදා හැරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි මොනවාද?
answer_si: නාවිකයින් මුදා හැරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි වන්නේ අඛණ්ඩ විසර්ජන සහතිකය (CDC) සහ නාවික නිලධාරියාගෙන් මුදා හැරීම ඉල්ලා නියෝජිතයාගේ ලිපියයි.

context:
Service: Civil Pension Schemes
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: විශේෂ කරුණු - විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ලබා ගැනීමට නොහැකි වීම සහ ගෙවීම් ප්‍රමාද වීම
---
2:විශ්රාමික පුද්ගලයා විශ්රාම වැටුප ලබා ගැනිමට තැපැල් කාර්ය්යලයට පැමිනීමට අපොහොසත් වුවහොත්.

විශ්රාමක පුද්ගලයා ඔහුගේ හැදුනුමි පත මුරකරවෙත බාර දී තැපැල් කාර්ය්යලය මගින් නිකුත් කල විශ්රාම වැටුප් කුවිතාන්සිය ලබා ගැනීමට මුරකරු විසින් විශ්රාමකයා අතට ලබා දෙන කුවතාන්සිය විශ්රාම විටුප ලබා ගන්නා විට ඵය නැවත තැපැල් කාර්ය්යලයට භාර දී අවසර ගත යුතුය

සටහන -: විශ්රාම වැටුල් කුවිතාන්සිය තැපැල් කාර්ය්යලයට භාරදීමට පෙර ග්රාමනිලධාරී මහතා හෝ සාමදාන විනිශ්චකාර තුමා විසින් සහතික කල යුතුය

3.ගෙවීම පූමාද විම

අදාල ප්රාදේශීය ලේකමිකාර්ය්යලය විසින් ගෙවීමි ප්රමාද වන කාලයට 7 ක පොළියක් විශ්රාම වැටුපට එකතු කරයි
question_en: What is the procedure for a retired person to obtain their pension receipt if they are unable to visit the post office in person?
answer_en: If a retired person cannot visit the post office, they can give their ID card to a caretaker. The caretaker will then obtain the pension receipt issued by the post office and deliver it to the retired person. This pension receipt must be certified by a Grama Niladhari or Justice of the Peace before being returned to the post office when collecting the pension.
question_ta: ஓய்வு பெற்ற ஒருவர் நேரில் தபால் அலுவலகத்திற்குச் செல்ல முடியாவிட்டால், தனது ஓய்வூதிய ரசீதைப் பெறுவதற்கான செயல்முறை என்ன?
answer_ta: ஒரு ஓய்வு பெற்றவர் தபால் அலுவலகத்திற்குச் செல்ல முடியாவிட்டால், அவர் தனது அடையாள அட்டையை ஒரு பராமரிப்பாளரிடம் ஒப்படைக்கலாம். பராமரிப்பாளர் தபால் அலுவலகத்தால் வழங்கப்படும் ஓய்வூதிய ரசீதைப் பெற்று ஓய்வு பெற்றவரிடம் வழங்குவார். ஓய்வூதியத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கு முன், இந்த ரசீது கிராம அலுவலர் அல்லது சமாதான நீதிபதியால் சான்றளிக்கப்பட்டு தபால் அலுவலகத்திற்குத் திரும்ப ஒப்படைக்கப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: විශ්‍රාමික පුද්ගලයාට තැපැල් කාර්යාලයට පැමිණීමට නොහැකි වුවහොත් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් කුවිතාන්සිය ලබා ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: විශ්‍රාමික පුද්ගලයාට තැපැල් කාර්යාලයට පැමිණීමට නොහැකි වුවහොත්, ඔහුට තම හැඳුනුම්පත මුරකරු වෙත භාර දිය හැක. මුරකරු තැපැල් කාර්යාලයෙන් නිකුත් කරන විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් කුවිතාන්සිය ලබාගෙන එය විශ්‍රාමිකයාට ලබා දෙනු ඇත. විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ලබා ගැනීමට පෙර, මෙම කුවිතාන්සිය ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී මහතා හෝ සාමදාන විනිශ්චයකාර තුමා විසින් සහතික කර නැවත තැපැල් කාර්යාලයට භාර දිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Carrying out of Inspections on a complaint made by an employee on Termination of his employment
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Employment Statistics
Topic: Eligibility Criteria for Application under Termination of Employment Act
---
To submit an application under the Termination of Employment of Workmen (Special Provisions) (Amendment) Act No. 45 of 1971, certain qualifications must be met. The applicant should be an employee engaged in employment covered by the following acts:

- Shop and Office Employees Act
- Wages Boards Ordinance (Employment in any trade Gazette under section 6.2 of this ordinance)
- Factories Ordinance

The institution where the employee served should have at least 15 employees at any point during the 6 months preceding the date of termination. The employer must have terminated the employee's employment. Complaints regarding approved terminations or potential future terminations are not permissible.

However, certain employees are not eligible for relief under this Act. These include:

- Employees who have resigned
- Employees served under fixed term contract of employment and terminated the employment at the end of the contract period.
- Employees retired upon reaching the retirement age mentioned in the contract of employment.
- Employees dismissed from employment as a disciplinary punishment.
- Employees engaged in Government corporations, Statutory boards, statutory authorities, institutions took over by Government, Provincial councils, Local authorities and Cooperative societies.
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria for an employee to submit an application under the Termination of Employment of Workmen (Special Provisions) (Amendment) Act No. 45 of 1971?
answer_en: To be eligible, an employee must be engaged in employment covered by the Shop and Office Employees Act, Wages Boards Ordinance, or Factories Ordinance. Additionally, the institution must have had at least 15 employees at any point during the 6 months prior to termination, and the employer must have initiated the termination.
question_ta: வேலைவாய்ப்பு முடிவுக்குக் கொண்டுவரப்பட்ட தொழிலாளர் (சிறப்பு ஏற்பாடுகள்) (திருத்தம்) சட்டம் எண் 45, 1971 இன் கீழ் விண்ணப்பம் சமர்ப்பிக்க ஒரு பணியாளருக்கான தகுதி அளவுகோல்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தகுதியுடையவராக இருக்க, ஒரு பணியாளர் கடை மற்றும் அலுவலக ஊழியர்கள் சட்டம், ஊதிய வாரியங்கள் கட்டளை அல்லது தொழிற்சாலைகள் கட்டளை ஆகியவற்றின் கீழ் வரும் வேலைவாய்ப்பில் ஈடுபட்டிருக்க வேண்டும். மேலும், நிறுவனம் பணிநீக்கத்திற்கு முந்தைய ஆறு மாத காலப்பகுதியில் குறைந்தது 15 பணியாளர்களைக் கொண்டிருக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் முதலாளி பணிநீக்கத்தைத் தொடங்கியிருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: 1971 අංක 45 දරන සේවක සේවය අවසන් කිරීමේ (විශේෂ විධිවිධාන) (සංශෝධන) පනත යටතේ අයදුම්පත්‍රයක් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමට සේවකයෙකුට ඇති සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක මොනවාද?
answer_si: සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට නම්, සේවකයෙකු සාප්පු සහ කාර්යාල සේවක පනත, වේතන මණ්ඩල ආඥාපනත හෝ කර්මාන්තශාලා ආඥාපනත යටතේ ආවරණය වන රැකියාවක නිරත විය යුතුය. ඊට අමතරව, සේවය අවසන් කිරීමට පෙර මාස 6ක කාලය තුළ ආයතනයේ අවම වශයෙන් සේවකයින් 15ක් සිටිය යුතු අතර, සේවායෝජකයා විසින් සේවය අවසන් කිරීම ආරම්භ කර තිබිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Widows/Widowers and Orphans Pension Scheme
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: නුසුදුසුකම්
---
සටහන -:නුසුදුසුකමි

වැන්දඹු කාන්තාව හෝ පුරුෂයා නැවත විවාහ වුවහොත් ඔහු හෝ ඇය විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ලබා ගැනීමට නුසුදුස්සෙක් වේ විවාහ සහතිකය / දරුවන්ගේ උප්පැන්න සහතිකය හෝ ඡන්ද නාම ලේබනය වැනි ලියවිලි නිවැරදි නොවන බව ඔප්පුවුවහොත් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ගෙවීම නතර කරනු ලැබේ

රුපියල් 100 කට වඩා වැඩිනමිල විශ්‍රාමික වැටුප් රිසිටි පතේ රුපියල් 2 ක මුද්දර අලවා ඵය මත අත්සන් කල යුතුය
question_en: What are the conditions that lead to disqualification from the Widows/Widowers and Orphans Pension Scheme?
answer_en: A widow or widower will be disqualified from receiving the pension if they remarry. Furthermore, pension payments will be stopped if documents such as marriage certificates, children's birth certificates, or electoral rolls are proven to be incorrect.
question_ta: விதவைகள்/விதவர்கள் மற்றும் அனாதைகள் ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டத்திலிருந்து தகுதியிழப்பிற்கு வழிவகுக்கும் நிபந்தனைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: ஒரு விதவை அல்லது விதவர் மறுமணம் செய்தால் ஓய்வூதியம் பெறுவதற்கு தகுதியற்றவராவார். மேலும், திருமணச் சான்றிதழ்கள், குழந்தைகளின் பிறப்புச் சான்றிதழ்கள் அல்லது வாக்காளர் பட்டியல் போன்ற ஆவணங்கள் தவறானவை என நிரூபிக்கப்பட்டால் ஓய்வூதியக் கொடுப்பனவுகள் நிறுத்தப்படும்.
question_si: වැන්දඹු/වැන්දඹුවන් සහ අනාථ දරුවන් සඳහා වන විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රමයෙන් නුසුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට හේතුවන කොන්දේසි මොනවාද?
answer_si: වැන්දඹු කාන්තාවක් හෝ පුරුෂයෙක් නැවත විවාහ වුවහොත් ඔවුන් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ලබා ගැනීමට නුසුදුසුකම් ලබයි. තවද, විවාහ සහතික, දරුවන්ගේ උප්පැන්න සහතික හෝ ඡන්ද නාම ලේඛන වැනි ලේඛන වැරදි බව ඔප්පු වුවහොත් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ගෙවීම නවත්වනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Training for foreign employment
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Foreign Employment
Topic: Training Programmes Offered by SLBFE
---
The Training Division conducts various training programmes, including: Housekeeping Assistant Course for Middle East Countries (40 days), Caregiver Training Programme for Singapore, Hong Kong, Cyprus, Maldives, and Malaysia (35 days), Caregiver Training Programme for Israel (45 days), RPL Training Programme (10 days), and Literacy Training Programme (Sinhala/Tamil – 18 days, English – 120 hours).

To be recruited for training, applicants must complete the application form available at the Training Division and fulfill the following requirements: 1. Height should be more than 4.5 feet. 2. Visible front teeth without any defect. 3. Pleasant appearance. 4. [National Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=17) (NIC) and a certified copy of the NIC. 5. If the applicant is over 50 years of age, a medical report obtained for visa purposes is required. 6. If the applicant is migrating through a licensed recruitment agent, relevant documents are required. The course fee, uniform fee, and NVQ Examination fee are to be paid by the applicant for the training programme. This service is available on working days (Monday to Friday) from 8.30 a.m. to 16.30 p.m. at the Training Division or Training Centers. The service is closed on Public and Mercantile Holidays.
question_en: What are the various training programmes offered by the SLBFE for foreign employment, along with their durations and target countries?
answer_en: The SLBFE's Training Division conducts various programmes, including: Housekeeping Assistant Course for Middle East Countries (40 days), Caregiver Training Programme for Singapore, Hong Kong, Cyprus, Maldives, and Malaysia (35 days), Caregiver Training Programme for Israel (45 days), RPL Training Programme (10 days), and Literacy Training Programme (Sinhala/Tamil – 18 days, English – 120 hours).
question_ta: வெளிநாட்டு வேலைவாய்ப்புக்காக SLBFE வழங்கும் பல்வேறு பயிற்சித் திட்டங்கள் யாவை, அவற்றின் கால அளவுகள் மற்றும் இலக்கு நாடுகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: SLBFE இன் பயிற்சிப் பிரிவு பல திட்டங்களை வழங்குகிறது: மத்திய கிழக்கு நாடுகளுக்கான வீட்டுப் பணி உதவியாளர் படிப்பு (40 நாட்கள்), சிங்கப்பூர், ஹொங்கொங், சைப்ரஸ், மாலைத்தீவுகள் மற்றும் மலேசியாவுக்கான பராமரிப்பாளர் பயிற்சித் திட்டம் (35 நாட்கள்), இஸ்ரேலுக்கான பராமரிப்பாளர் பயிற்சித் திட்டம் (45 நாட்கள்), RPL பயிற்சித் திட்டம் (10 நாட்கள்), மற்றும் எழுத்தறிவு பயிற்சித் திட்டம் (சிங்களம்/தமிழ் – 18 நாட்கள், ஆங்கிலம் – 120 மணிநேரம்).
question_si: විදේශ රැකියා සඳහා SLBFE විසින් පිරිනමනු ලබන විවිධ පුහුණු වැඩසටහන් මොනවාද, ඒවායේ කාල සීමාවන් සහ ඉලක්ක රටවල් මොනවාද?
answer_si: SLBFE හි පුහුණු අංශය විවිධ පුහුණු වැඩසටහන් පවත්වයි: මැදපෙරදිග රටවල් සඳහා ගෘහ සේවිකා සහායක පාඨමාලාව (දින 40), සිංගප්පූරුව, හොංකොං, සයිප්‍රසය, මාලදිවයින සහ මැලේසියාව සඳහා සත්කාරක පුහුණු වැඩසටහන (දින 35), ඊශ්‍රායලය සඳහා සත්කාරක පුහුණු වැඩසටහන (දින 45), RPL පුහුණු වැඩසටහන (දින 10) සහ සාක්ෂරතා පුහුණු වැඩසටහන (සිංහල/දෙමළ – දින 18, ඉංග්‍රීසි – පැය 120).

context:
Service: PMU - Functions and Services
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Publications on Career Information
Topic: Functions and Services of the Planning & Monitoring Unit
---
Planning & [Monitoring](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) Unit Functions and Services

1. [Data](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) Collection, tabulation, [analysis](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) storing and distribution of [information](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)
2. Encourage and motivates to obtain [information](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) by modern technology techniques
3. [Monitoring](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) of development activities for achieving targets
4. Formulation of future development projects and assist in obtaining necessary resources
5. Compilation of annual action plan
6. Preparation of institutional work plan in accordance with the government projects (Mahinda Chintana, Dhannyagara, Village reawakening)
7. Preparing of [progress](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)  [reports](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) on monthly, quarterly and annual basis and review of the projects
8. Furnish [information](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) for donor agencies and government institutes (Central Bank, Dept. of Census and Statistics)
9. Updating and maintaining of Mahaweli Development [web](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)  [site](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) and providing [internet](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) facilities
10. Release of present development activities on Mahaweli programme
11. Compiling and publishing of Mahaweli [publications](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)
12. Designing of [web](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176)  [site](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) for other institutes
13. Continuation of Coordination with State Agencies.
14. Maintains Technical [Library](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1176) of Mahaweli Authority of Sri Lanka

Telephone No  - 0112698957 e-mail addresses - pmumasl2000@yahoo.co.uk / pmumasl@gmail.com
question_en: What are some of the key functions performed by the Planning & Monitoring Unit (PMU)?
answer_en: The Planning & Monitoring Unit (PMU) performs various key functions including data collection, tabulation, analysis, storing and distribution of information; monitoring of development activities; formulation of future development projects; compilation of annual action plans; preparation of institutional work plans; preparing progress reports; furnishing information for donor agencies and government institutes; updating and maintaining the Mahaweli Development web site; releasing present development activities on the Mahaweli programme; compiling and publishing Mahaweli publications; designing web sites for other institutes; coordination with State Agencies; and maintaining a Technical Library.
question_ta: திட்டமிடல் மற்றும் கண்காணிப்புப் பிரிவின் (PMU) சில முக்கிய செயல்பாடுகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: திட்டமிடல் மற்றும் கண்காணிப்புப் பிரிவு (PMU) தகவல் சேகரிப்பு, அட்டவணைப்படுத்துதல், பகுப்பாய்வு செய்தல், சேமித்தல் மற்றும் விநியோகித்தல்; மேம்பாட்டு நடவடிக்கைகளைக் கண்காணித்தல்; எதிர்கால மேம்பாட்டுத் திட்டங்களை உருவாக்குதல்; ஆண்டு செயல் திட்டங்களைத் தொகுத்தல்; நிறுவனப் பணித் திட்டங்களைத் தயாரித்தல்; முன்னேற்ற அறிக்கைகளைத் தயாரித்தல்; நன்கொடை வழங்கும் நிறுவனங்கள் மற்றும் அரசு நிறுவனங்களுக்குத் தகவல்களை வழங்குதல்; மகாவலி மேம்பாட்டு வலைத்தளத்தைப் புதுப்பித்து பராமரித்தல்; மகாவலி திட்டத்தின் தற்போதைய மேம்பாட்டு நடவடிக்கைகளை வெளியிடுதல்; மகாவலி வெளியீடுகளைத் தொகுத்து வெளியிடுதல்; பிற நிறுவனங்களுக்கு வலைத்தளங்களை வடிவமைத்தல்; அரசு நிறுவனங்களுடன் ஒருங்கிணைத்தல்; மற்றும் ஒரு தொழில்நுட்ப நூலகத்தைப் பராமரித்தல் போன்ற பல்வேறு முக்கிய செயல்பாடுகளைச் செய்கிறது.
question_si: සැලසුම් හා අධීක්ෂණ ඒකකය (PMU) විසින් සිදුකරන ප්‍රධාන කාර්යයන් කිහිපයක් මොනවාද?
answer_si: සැලසුම් හා අධීක්ෂණ ඒකකය (PMU) විසින් දත්ත එකතු කිරීම, වගුගත කිරීම, විශ්ලේෂණය කිරීම, තොරතුරු ගබඩා කිරීම හා බෙදා හැරීම; සංවර්ධන කටයුතු අධීක්ෂණය කිරීම; අනාගත සංවර්ධන ව්‍යාපෘති සැකසීම; වාර්ෂික ක්‍රියාකාරී සැලසුම් සම්පාදනය කිරීම; ආයතනික වැඩ සැලසුම් සකස් කිරීම; ප්‍රගති වාර්තා සැකසීම; පරිත්‍යාගශීලී ආයතන හා රාජ්‍ය ආයතන සඳහා තොරතුරු සැපයීම; මහවැලි සංවර්ධන වෙබ් අඩවිය යාවත්කාලීන කිරීම හා නඩත්තු කිරීම; මහවැලි වැඩසටහනේ වත්මන් සංවර්ධන කටයුතු නිකුත් කිරීම; මහවැලි ප්‍රකාශන සම්පාදනය කිරීම හා ප්‍රකාශයට පත් කිරීම; වෙනත් ආයතන සඳහා වෙබ් අඩවි නිර්මාණය කිරීම; රාජ්‍ය ආයතන සමඟ සම්බන්ධීකරණය පවත්වාගෙන යාම; සහ තාක්ෂණික පුස්තකාලයක් නඩත්තු කිරීම වැනි විවිධ ප්‍රධාන කාර්යයන් සිදු කරයි.

context:
Service: Payment of Employees’ Provident Fund Benefits on Medical grounds
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: Instructions for Obtaining and Submitting Form M
---
Hand over form “Health 307” obtained by a medical officer in a government hospital, to the labour office in the area and get the form “M” and instructions.

N:B: It is compulsory to have been left the employment at the time of claiming for benefits.

Counter on the ground floor of the Head office, all District offices and Labour sub offices, and website: [labourdept.gov.lk](https://labourdept.gov.lk/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=67&Itemid=61&lang=en)

No charge

Completed application form should, by the member himself/herself, be handed over to the nearest District labour office or labour sub office in the district where he/she resides, during the office hours of a working day.

No service charge

03 weeks, if all documents are completed.

- Application certified by the last employer, “B” cards relevant to membership members, National Identity card and a copy of National Identity card certified by the employer, copy of the bank pass book; and
- Form “M” approved by the medical board
question_en: What is the initial step to claim Employees' Provident Fund (EPF) benefits on medical grounds?
answer_en: The initial step is to obtain form “Health 307” from a medical officer in a government hospital, and then hand it over to the labour office in the area to receive form “M” and instructions.
question_ta: மருத்துவ காரணங்களுக்காக ஊழியர் சேமலாப நிதி (EPF) நன்மைகளைக் கோருவதற்கான முதல் படி என்ன?
answer_ta: முதல் படி என்னவென்றால், ஒரு அரசு மருத்துவமனையில் உள்ள மருத்துவ அதிகாரியிடம் இருந்து “Health 307” படிவத்தைப் பெறுவது, பின்னர் அதை அப்பகுதியில் உள்ள தொழிலாளர் அலுவலகத்தில் சமர்ப்பித்து “M” படிவம் மற்றும் வழிமுறைகளைப் பெறுவதாகும்.
question_si: වෛද්‍ය හේතු මත සේවක අර්ථසාධක අරමුදල් (EPF) ප්‍රතිලාභ ඉල්ලීමට මුලික පියවර කුමක්ද?
answer_si: මුලික පියවර වන්නේ රජයේ රෝහලක වෛද්‍ය නිලධාරියෙකුගෙන් “Health 307” පෝරමය ලබා ගැනීමයි. පසුව එය අදාළ ප්‍රදේශයේ කම්කරු කාර්යාලයට භාර දී “M” පෝරමය සහ උපදෙස් ලබා ගැනීමයි.

context:
Service: Registration and Re-registration of Employees
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Government Employees
Topic: Required Documents for Government Organizations and Contact Information
---
- A copy of the document containing cabinet approval for the project
- A copy of the letter for relevant staff, issued by the department of Management services
- A copy of the appointment letter of the director and its Chairman of the project
- A copy of the letter of treasury approval
- A written request made by Director and Chairman of the project, to below mentioned address in order to register in Employees’ Provident Fund

Staff Officers in charge of the Service

Designation | Division | Telephone | Fax | E-mail
--- | --- | --- | --- | ---
Assistant Commissioner of Labour | EPF Registration Branch | 011-2 369190 |  |
question_en: Who is the staff officer in charge of the Employee Registration and Re-registration service, and what is their contact number?
answer_en: The Assistant Commissioner of Labour in the EPF Registration Branch is in charge of the service. Their telephone number is 011-2369190.
question_ta: ஊழியர்களைப் பதிவுசெய்தல் மற்றும் மறுபதிவு செய்தல் சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி யார், அவர்களின் தொலைபேசி எண் என்ன?
answer_ta: ஊழியர் சேமலாப நிதிப் பதிவுப் பிரிவின் உதவி தொழிலாளர் ஆணையாளர் இச்சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பாவார். அவர்களின் தொலைபேசி எண் 011-2369190 ஆகும்.
question_si: සේවක ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සහ නැවත ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සේවාව භාරව සිටින නිලධාරියා කවුද, ඔහුගේ දුරකථන අංකය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: සේවක අර්ථසාධක අරමුදල් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ ශාඛාවේ සහකාර කම්කරු කොමසාරිස් මෙම සේවාව භාරව සිටී. ඔහුගේ දුරකථන අංකය 011-2369190 වේ.

context:
Service: Pension Scheme for Journalists
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: Pension Scheme for Journalists: Purpose and Target Groups
---
This Pension schme is provided by Ministry of Mass Media & Information and Ministry of Social Services and Social Welfare Social Security Board to offer Social Service benefit to Journalists This comducted under the act of 2006-NO26 Social Security benefit scheme for Journalists.

Purpose : The purpose of pension scheme to offer benefits in order to their social security of Journalists in Media Institutions.

Target Groups

- Journalists who works in a Media Institutons and

1. A Permanent Journalists of that Media Institute or
2. A Temperery Journalists of that Media Institute or
3. A Free Journalists of that Media Institute.

- Age between 18-50 Years and
question_en: What is the main purpose of the Pension Scheme for Journalists and who are its target beneficiaries?
answer_en: The main purpose of this pension scheme is to offer social security benefits to journalists in Media Institutions. The target groups include permanent, temporary, or free journalists working in a Media Institution, aged between 18 and 50 years.
question_ta: பத்திரிகையாளர்களுக்கான ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டத்தின் முக்கிய நோக்கம் என்ன, மேலும் அதன் இலக்கு பயனாளிகள் யார்?
answer_ta: இந்த ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டத்தின் முக்கிய நோக்கம் ஊடக நிறுவனங்களில் பணிபுரியும் பத்திரிகையாளர்களுக்கு சமூக பாதுகாப்பு நலன்களை வழங்குவதாகும். இலக்கு குழுக்களில் ஒரு ஊடக நிறுவனத்தில் பணிபுரியும் நிரந்தர, தற்காலிக அல்லது சுயாதீன பத்திரிகையாளர்கள், 18 முதல் 50 வயதுக்கு உட்பட்டவர்கள் அடங்குவர்.
question_si: මාධ්‍යවේදීන් සඳහා වන විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රමයේ ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ කුමක්ද සහ එහි ඉලක්කගත ප්‍රතිලාභීන් කවුද?
answer_si: මෙම විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රමයේ ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ වන්නේ මාධ්‍ය ආයතනවල සේවය කරන මාධ්‍යවේදීන්ට සමාජ ආරක්ෂණ ප්‍රතිලාභ ලබා දීමයි. වයස අවුරුදු 18 ත් 50 ත් අතර මාධ්‍ය ආයතනයක සේවය කරන ස්ථීර, තාවකාලික හෝ නිදහස් මාධ්‍යවේදීන් ඉලක්කගත කණ්ඩායම් වලට ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Welfare facilities for migrant workers
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Foreign Employment
Topic: Pre-Departure Loan: Requirements and Documents
---
Required documents –

1. Passport
2. Job Agreement
3. Visa
4. Grama Niladari Certificate
5. Training Certificate
6. Letter from the recruitment agent
7. First Approval
8. Bank Receipt

The Bureau will bear 2/3 of the interest payable by the migrant worker for the bank loan. Housing Loan: The Housing Loan Scheme is implemented with the purpose of assisting migrant workers who are migrating for employment overseas with the expectation of building a house to build their dream home in Sri Lanka while their employed abroad. Information and details should be obtained before applying for the loan from Bank of Ceylon or Peoples Bank or National Savings Bank and mortgage another immovable property which is acceptable to the bank as a guarantee for repayment of outstanding amount when applying for the loan. Loans offered to migrant workers –

01. Bank - Peoples Bank

- Type of Loan- Pre-departure loan
- Loan Amount= 50,000.00
- Repayment years = 3
- Interest rate payable by the applicant - 9%
- Interest rate born by the Bureau - 7%
- Total Interest Rate - 16%
question_en: What are the required documents for obtaining a Pre-Departure Loan under the welfare facilities for migrant workers?
answer_en: The required documents for a Pre-Departure Loan are Passport, Job Agreement, Visa, Grama Niladari Certificate, Training Certificate, Letter from the recruitment agent, First Approval, and Bank Receipt.
question_ta: புலம்பெயர் தொழிலாளர்களுக்கான நலன்புரி வசதிகளின் கீழ் முன்-புறப்பாட்டு கடனைப் பெறுவதற்குத் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: முன்-புறப்பாட்டு கடனுக்குத் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் கடவுச்சீட்டு, வேலை ஒப்பந்தம், விசா, கிராம அலுவலர் சான்றிதழ், பயிற்சிச் சான்றிதழ், ஆட்சேர்ப்பு முகவரின் கடிதம், முதல் அனுமதி மற்றும் வங்கி ரசீது.
question_si: සංක්‍රමණික ශ්‍රමිකයන් සඳහා වන සුභසාධන පහසුකම් යටතේ පිටත්වීමට පෙර ණය ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: පිටත්වීමට පෙර ණය සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන වන්නේ විදේශ ගමන් බලපත්‍රය, රැකියා ගිවිසුම, වීසා බලපත්‍රය, ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී සහතිකය, පුහුණු සහතිකය, බඳවා ගැනීමේ නියෝජිතයාගේ ලිපිය, පළමු අනුමැතිය සහ බැංකු රිසිට්පතයි.

context:
Service: Widows/Widowers and Orphans Pension Scheme
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: පියවරෙන් පියවර පිළිවෙල (Part 2) සහ සුදුසුකම්
---
පියවර 3: අයදුමි කරු පාස්පෝටි ප්‍රමාණයේ ඡායාරූප 3 ක් සමග අයදුම් පත විශ්‍රාමික වැටුප් අංශයට භාර දීම

පියවර 4: ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි විසින් වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂගේ හැදුනුම්පත සකසා ඔහුට / ඇයට තැපැල් කිරීම

පියවර 5: ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි විසින් අවශ්‍යය ලිය කියවිලි සහතික කර තැපැල් කාර්ය්‍යලයට භාර දිම

පියවර 6: අයදුමි කරු තමා විසින් සහතික කළ ස්ථානයෙන් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ලබා ගනි

සටහන 1-: වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂයා ඉල්ලූම් කල බැංකුවක් ඇත්නමි ඔහු හෝ ඇය විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ඵකතු කර ගැනිම සදහා ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි කාර්ය්‍යලය මගින් නිකුත් කළ විශ්‍රාම වාටුප් කුවිතාන්සිය ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය

සටහන 2-: වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂයා ඉල්ලූම් කල තැපැල් කාර්ය්යලයක් ඇත්නමි ඔහු හෝ ඇය විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ඵකතු කර ගැනිම සදහා ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි කාර්ය්‍යලය මගින් නිකුත් කළ විශ්‍රාමික හැදුනුමි පත ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය

සටහන 3-: වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂයා සතුව ආබාධිත දරුවෙක් සිටීනමි ඔවුන්ගේ ව්ශ්‍රාමික වැටුප ළමයා ජීවත්ව ඉන්නතාක්කල් දිය හැක

සටහන 4-: වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂයා නැවත වරක් විවාහ වුවහොත් ඵ් බව සාමදාන විනිසුරු කෙනෙකු මගින් සහතික කර දිවුරුමි ප්‍රකාශයක් මගින් දන්වා ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි තුමා වෙත භාරදිය යුතුය

සටහන 5-: සේවා කාළය තුලදි විශ්‍රාමික වැටුප් ක්‍රමයේ ලියාපදිංචි වූ අයෙක් ඵම කාල සීමාව තුලදී මැරුනොත් වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී / පුරුෂයා හෝ ලමයෙක් සිටීනමි පාරිතෝෂිත මුදල් වශයෙන් අවුරුදු දෙකක පඩියෙන් 90වක් ලබා ගත හැක (මෙම පාරිතෝෂිතය මාසික විශ්‍රාම වැටුපෙන් අඩු කරනු නොලැබේ)

සුදුසුකමි

*   රජයේ සේවකයන් ඔවුන්ගේ සේවා කාලය තුලදී වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රී/පුරුෂ සහ අනත් දරු විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් වැඩසටහනට ලියාපදිංචි වි තිබිය යුතූය
*   වැන්දඹු ස්ත්‍රීය හෝ වැන්දඹු පුරුෂයා නීත්‍යානුකූලව විශ්‍රාම්කයා සමග විවාහ වී සිටිය යුතුය
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria for the Widows/Widowers and Orphans Pension Scheme?
answer_en: To be eligible for the Widows/Widowers and Orphans Pension Scheme, government employees must have registered for the program during their service period, and the widow or widower must have been legally married to the deceased pensioner.
question_ta: விதவைகள்/விதவர் மற்றும் அநாதைப் பிள்ளைகள் ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டத்திற்கான தகுதி அளவுகோல்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: விதவைகள்/விதவர் மற்றும் அநாதைப் பிள்ளைகள் ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டத்திற்கு தகுதியைப் பெற, அரசு ஊழியர்கள் தங்கள் சேவைக்காலத்தில் இத்திட்டத்தில் பதிவு செய்திருக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் விதவை அல்லது விதவர் இறந்த ஓய்வூதியதாரருடன் சட்டப்பூர்வமாக திருமணம் செய்திருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: වැන්දඹු/වැන්දඹුවන් සහ අනාථ දරුවන්ගේ විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රමය සඳහා සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක මොනවාද?
answer_si: වැන්දඹු/වැන්දඹුවන් සහ අනාථ දරුවන්ගේ විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රමය සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට නම්, රාජ්‍ය සේවකයින් ඔවුන්ගේ සේවා කාලය තුළදී මෙම වැඩසටහන සඳහා ලියාපදිංචි වී තිබිය යුතු අතර, වැන්දඹුව හෝ වැන්දඹුව මියගිය විශ්‍රාමිකයා සමඟ නීත්‍යානුකූලව විවාහ වී සිටිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: How to obtaining a Licence for a new recruitment agency
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Foreign Employment
Topic: Application Process and Required Documents for a New Recruitment Agency Licence (Part 2)
---
The new licensee fee is Rupees Two hundred thousand (Rs.200,000/= excluding NBT+ VAT). You should also furnish documents for yourself and all partners/directors:

- Birth Certificate(s)
- Personal bio-data(s)
- Photocopies of their National Identity Card(s) or Passport
- Police clearance reports from the nearest police station
- A passport size photograph of the officer in charge of the agency

After submitting the required documents, a team from the SLBFE will inspect the premises and verify the authenticity of the documents before granting approval for the license. The license is valid for one year from the date of issue.
question_en: What is the new licensee fee for obtaining a recruitment agency licence?
answer_en: The new licensee fee is Rupees Two hundred thousand (Rs.200,000/= excluding NBT+ VAT).
question_ta: புதிய ஆள்சேர்ப்பு முகவர் நிறுவன உரிமத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான புதிய உரிமக் கட்டணம் எவ்வளவு?
answer_ta: புதிய உரிமக் கட்டணம் இரண்டு இலட்சம் ரூபாய்கள் (ரூ.200,000/= NBT + VAT நீங்கலாக).
question_si: නව බඳවා ගැනීමේ නියෝජිතායතන බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා නව බලපත්‍ර ගාස්තුව කොපමණද?
answer_si: නව බලපත්‍ර ගාස්තුව රුපියල් දෙලක්ෂයකි (රු.200,000/= NBT + VAT හැර).

context:
Service: Engagement of Seafarers
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Employment Opportunities
Topic: Seafarer Qualifications and Application Process
---
Qualifications
*   Should have valid CDC issued by Merchant Shipping Division of Sri Lanka
*   Receipt of Payment
*   should not to be blacklisted
*   a letter requesting to the shipping officer to sign on by the authorize shipping agent along with schedule which mention the details of seafarer and vessel
*   Certificate of Competency/Watch keeping Certificate (if necessary)
*   Valid Mandatory Short Courses Certificates (if necessary)
*   Validity of al above documents should not last till the end of proposed contract period
Application Process
*   Application forms should be obtain from relevant Shipping Agent
*   Fees for Application Form: Not Applicable
*   During the working hours: In emergency required services can be obtained by contacting the Shipping Officer or Asst. Shipping Officer during the public holidays or after office hours
*   Fees will be borne by the relevant Shipping Agent (both of Engagement and Disengagement)
*   Time Line Half an hour
question_en: Who is responsible for bearing the fees related to the engagement and disengagement of seafarers?
answer_en: The fees for both engagement and disengagement of seafarers will be borne by the relevant Shipping Agent.
question_ta: கடல்சார் பணியாளர்களை பணியமர்த்துவது மற்றும் பணிநீக்கம் செய்வது தொடர்பான கட்டணங்களை யார் பொறுப்பேற்கிறார்கள்?
answer_ta: கடல்சார் பணியாளர்களை பணியமர்த்துவது மற்றும் பணிநீக்கம் செய்வது ஆகிய இரண்டிற்குமான கட்டணங்களை சம்பந்தப்பட்ட கப்பல் முகவர் ஏற்றுக்கொள்வார்.
question_si: නාවිකයන් බඳවා ගැනීම සහ සේවයෙන් ඉවත් කිරීම සම්බන්ධ ගාස්තු දැරීමට වගකිව යුත්තේ කවුද?
answer_si: නාවිකයන් බඳවා ගැනීම සහ සේවයෙන් ඉවත් කිරීම යන දෙකටම අදාළ ගාස්තු අදාළ නාවික නියෝජිතයා විසින් දරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Carrying out of Inspections on a complaint made by an employee on Termination of his employment
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Employment Statistics
Topic: Application Submission Details and Required Information
---
There is no specific application form. However, any complaint made should include the following information:

- Full name of the employee
- Permanent Address
- Appointment date
- Designation
- Date of birth of employee
- EPF Number

In addition to the above, the complaint should also include:

- The date of termination of employment
- The reason for termination of employment
- The names and addresses of the director/owner/share holder of the institution

There are no payments required for the application, and there are no specific time constraints for submitting the application. No fees are associated with obtaining this service, and the period taken to provide the service (whether ordinary or priority) is not relevant in this context.
question_en: What specific details are required from an employee when making a complaint about the termination of their employment?
answer_en: When an employee makes a complaint about the termination of their employment, they must provide their full name, permanent address, appointment date, designation, date of birth, EPF number, the date and reason for termination of employment, and the names and addresses of the institution's director/owner/shareholder.
question_ta: ஒரு ஊழியர் தனது பணிநீக்கம் குறித்து புகார் அளிக்கும்போது என்ன குறிப்பிட்ட விவரங்கள் தேவை?
answer_ta: ஒரு ஊழியர் தனது பணிநீக்கம் குறித்து புகார் அளிக்கும்போது, அவர் தனது முழுப் பெயர், நிரந்தர முகவரி, நியமன தேதி, பதவி, பிறந்த தேதி, EPF எண், பணிநீக்கம் செய்யப்பட்ட தேதி மற்றும் அதற்கான காரணம், அத்துடன் நிறுவனத்தின் இயக்குனர்/உரிமையாளர்/பங்குதாரரின் பெயர்கள் மற்றும் முகவரிகளை சேர்க்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: සේවකයෙකු තම සේවා කාලය අවසන් කිරීම සම්බන්ධයෙන් පැමිණිල්ලක් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේදී අවශ්‍ය නිශ්චිත තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: සේවකයෙකු තම සේවා කාලය අවසන් කිරීම සම්බන්ධයෙන් පැමිණිල්ලක් ඉදිරිපත් කරන විට, ඔවුන් තම සම්පූර්ණ නම, ස්ථිර ලිපිනය, පත්වීම් දිනය, තනතුර, උපන් දිනය, EPF අංකය, සේවය අවසන් කළ දිනය සහ හේතුව මෙන්ම ආයතනයේ අධ්‍යක්ෂ/හිමිකරු/කොටස් හිමියාගේ නම් සහ ලිපිනයන් ඇතුළත් කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Find Employment through the “BOI On-line Job Bank”
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Employment Opportunities
Topic: Qualifications and Age Requirements for Job Bank Registration
---
Qualifications required

- Qualifications are determined based on the nature of the vacancies existing in factories or institutions.
- The minimum educational qualifications upto the level of grade eight (8) is preferred.
- The candidates should be over nineteen (19) years of age to be eligible to get registered in the “Central [Job Bank](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=1273) ”.
- Should have educational qualifications upto G. C. E. (O/L) for employment as Machine Operators and Helpers.
- For the post of Quality Checker, the candidates should have educational qualifications upto G. C. E. (A/L).

question_en: What are the minimum age and preferred educational qualifications required to register with the "BOI On-line Job Bank"?
answer_en: To be eligible to register with the "BOI On-line Job Bank", candidates should be over nineteen (19) years of age, and a minimum educational qualification up to grade eight (8) is preferred.
question_ta: BOI இணைய வேலைவாய்ப்பு வங்கியில் பதிவு செய்ய தேவையான குறைந்தபட்ச வயது மற்றும் விரும்பப்படும் கல்வித் தகைமைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: BOI இணைய வேலைவாய்ப்பு வங்கியில் பதிவு செய்வதற்கு, விண்ணப்பதாரர்கள் பத்தொன்பது (19) வயதுக்கு மேற்பட்டவர்களாக இருக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் எட்டாம் (8) வகுப்பு வரையிலான குறைந்தபட்ச கல்வித் தகைமை விரும்பப்படுகிறது.
question_si: BOI ඔන්ලයින් රැකියා බැංකුවේ ලියාපදිංචි වීම සඳහා අවශ්‍ය අවම වයස සහ කැමති අධ්‍යාපන සුදුසුකම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: BOI ඔන්ලයින් රැකියා බැංකුවේ ලියාපදිංචි වීමට සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට නම්, අපේක්ෂකයින් වයස අවුරුදු දහනවයට (19) වඩා වැඩි විය යුතු අතර, අටවන (8) ශ්‍රේණිය දක්වා අවම අධ්‍යාපන සුදුසුකම් තිබීම වඩාත් සුදුසුය.

context:
Service: Payment of Employees’ Provident Fund Benefits upon Completion of Age
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: Eligibility and Application Submission for Employee Benefits
---
Eligibility

If a male employee, 55 years of age should be completed.

If a female employee, 50 years of age should be completed.

N:B: It is compulsory to have been left the employment at the time of claiming for benefits.



Counter on the ground floor of the Head office, all District offices and Sub Labour offices and website [labourdept.gov.lk](https://labourdept.gov.lk/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=67&Itemid=61&lang=en)

No charge

Completed application form should, by the member himself/herself be handed over to the nearest District labour office or Labour sub office where he/she resides, during the office hours of a working day.

No service charge

03 weeks, if all the document are completed
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria for claiming Employees' Provident Fund (EPF) benefits upon reaching the specified age?
answer_en: To claim EPF benefits upon age completion, a male employee must have completed 55 years of age, and a female employee must have completed 50 years of age. Additionally, it is compulsory to have left employment at the time of claiming these benefits.
question_ta: தேவையான வயதை அடைந்த பிறகு ஊழியர் சேமலாப நிதி (EPF) சலுகைகளைப் பெறுவதற்கான தகுதிகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: வயது பூர்த்தியான பிறகு EPF சலுகைகளைப் பெற, ஒரு ஆண் ஊழியர் 55 வயது பூர்த்தி செய்திருக்க வேண்டும், மற்றும் ஒரு பெண் ஊழியர் 50 வயது பூர்த்தி செய்திருக்க வேண்டும். கூடுதலாக, சலுகைகளைப் கோரும் நேரத்தில் வேலையை விட்டு விலகி இருப்பது கட்டாயமாகும்.
question_si: නිශ්චිත වයස සම්පූර්ණ කිරීමෙන් පසු සේවක අර්ථසාධක අරමුදල් (EPF) ප්‍රතිලාභ ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක මොනවාද?
answer_si: වයස සම්පූර්ණ කිරීමෙන් පසු EPF ප්‍රතිලාභ ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා, පිරිමි සේවකයෙකු වයස අවුරුදු 55 සම්පූර්ණ කර තිබිය යුතු අතර, කාන්තා සේවිකාවක් වයස අවුරුදු 50 සම්පූර්ණ කර තිබිය යුතුය. මීට අමතරව, ප්‍රතිලාභ ඉල්ලන අවස්ථාවේ රැකියාවෙන් ඉවත්ව සිටීම අනිවාර්ය වේ.

context:
Service: Find Employment through  “BOI Zonal Job Banks”
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Private Employees
Topic: Application Submission and Service Details
---
Self prepared application forms as per the specimen form should be forwarded to the above Job Bank Offices.

Application Fees : No fees charged

Time Allotted for Submitting of Application : From 8:30 am to 4:30 pm on public working days.

Service Charges : No fees charged.

Time taken to Provide Services : (General and priority services) • Registration in the “Job Bank” is done as soon as the application is received. • The time taken to secure employment is determined by the nature of the vacancy and the number of vacancies available. • There is a possibility of holding interview on the same day, for available vacancies. • In the alternative, applicants will be called for interviews later.

Required Documents : (Bring originals along with photocopies) • [Birth certificate](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=367&task=info&back=0&pid=1274) , • [Educational certificates](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=23&task=info&back=0&pid=1274) , • Work experience certificates (If any), • Grama Niladari’s certificate, • [National Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=1274) or any equivalent Identity Card.
question_en: What documents are required to apply for employment through BOI Zonal Job Banks, and are there any associated fees for the application or service?
answer_en: To apply for employment through BOI Zonal Job Banks, applicants need to bring originals along with photocopies of their Birth certificate, Educational certificates, Work experience certificates (if any), Grama Niladari’s certificate, and National Identity Card or any equivalent Identity Card. There are no application or service fees charged for this service.
question_ta: BOI வலய வேலைவாய்ப்பு வங்கிகள் மூலம் வேலைவாய்ப்புக்கு விண்ணப்பிக்கத் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் யாவை, மேலும் விண்ணப்பம் அல்லது சேவைக்கான கட்டணங்கள் ஏதேனும் உள்ளதா?
answer_ta: BOI வலய வேலைவாய்ப்பு வங்கிகள் மூலம் வேலைவாய்ப்புக்கு விண்ணப்பிக்க, விண்ணப்பதாரர்கள் பிறப்புச் சான்றிதழ், கல்விச் சான்றிதழ்கள், பணி அனுபவச் சான்றிதழ்கள் (ஏதேனும் இருந்தால்), கிராம நிலதாரி சான்றிதழ் மற்றும் தேசிய அடையாள அட்டை அல்லது அதற்கு இணையான அடையாள அட்டை ஆகியவற்றின் அசல் மற்றும் புகைப்பட நகல்களை கொண்டு வர வேண்டும். இந்த சேவைக்கு விண்ணப்பம் அல்லது சேவை கட்டணங்கள் எதுவும் வசூலிக்கப்படுவதில்லை.
question_si: BOI කලාපීය රැකියා බැංකු හරහා රැකියාවක් සඳහා ඉල්ලුම් කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි මොනවාද, සහ අයදුම්පත්‍රය හෝ සේවාව සඳහා කිසියම් ගාස්තුවක් අය කරනු ලබනවාද?
answer_si: BOI කලාපීය රැකියා බැංකු හරහා රැකියාවක් සඳහා ඉල්ලුම් කිරීමට, අයදුම්කරුවන් විසින් උප්පැන්න සහතිකය, අධ්‍යාපන සහතික, සේවා පළපුරුදු සහතික (ඇත්නම්), ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී සහතිකය සහ ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පත හෝ ඊට සමාන හැඳුනුම්පතක මුල් පිටපත් සහ ඡායා පිටපත් රැගෙන ආ යුතුය. මෙම සේවාව සඳහා අයදුම්පත් හෝ සේවා ගාස්තු අය නොකෙරේ.

context:
Service: Registration and Re-registration of Employees
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Private Employees
Topic: Required Documents for EPF Registration (Part 2)
---
In addition to these forms, if the institution/ business is;

- A individual business (sole proprietorship),   
    - A photocopy of a Business Registration certificate
    - A photocopy of the National Identity card of the owner of the institution or business

A photocopy of the National Identity card will be adequate in case of an unregistered company.

- A partnership business,   
    - A photocopy of Business Registration certificate
    - Photocopies of National Identity cards of all the partners of the institution or business
- A Limited or private limited,   
    - A true copy of Business Registration certificate or certificate of incorporation
    - A copy of the true copy of form 01,05 or form 20,40 which contain information on the board of directors of the institution or company certified by company registrar
question_en: What documents are required for EPF registration if the institution is an individual business (sole proprietorship)?
answer_en: For EPF registration, an individual business (sole proprietorship) requires a photocopy of a Business Registration certificate and a photocopy of the National Identity card of the owner. If the company is unregistered, a photocopy of the National Identity card will be adequate.
question_ta: தனிநபர் வணிகமாக (தனி உரிமையாளர்) ஒரு நிறுவனம் இருந்தால், EPF பதிவு செய்ய என்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவை?
answer_ta: EPF பதிவு செய்ய, ஒரு தனிநபர் வணிகம் (தனி உரிமையாளர்) ஒரு வணிக பதிவு சான்றிதழின் நகல் மற்றும் நிறுவன உரிமையாளரின் தேசிய அடையாள அட்டையின் நகல் தேவை. பதிவு செய்யப்படாத நிறுவனமாக இருந்தால், தேசிய அடையாள அட்டையின் நகல் போதுமானது.
question_si: ආයතනය තනි ව්‍යාපාරයක් (තනි හිමිකාරත්වයක්) නම්, EPF ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි මොනවාද?
answer_si: EPF ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා, තනි ව්‍යාපාරයකට (තනි හිමිකාරත්වයකට) ව්‍යාපාර ලියාපදිංචි සහතිකයේ ඡායා පිටපතක් සහ ආයතනයේ හෝ ව්‍යාපාරයේ හිමිකරුගේ ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පතේ ඡායා පිටපතක් අවශ්‍ය වේ. ලියාපදිංචි නොකළ සමාගමක් නම්, ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පතේ ඡායා පිටපතක් ප්‍රමාණවත් වේ.

context:
Service: Providing Bonds & Guarantees
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Private Employees
Topic: Registration and Application Forms Available from CGF
---
The Registration and other related Forms: 

1. [(COIN)](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/Contractor_Information_-_updated_01-01-2012.pdf) - to Register with the CGF

2. (A-BB) - Application for Bid Bond (to be used at the time of Bidding/Tendering)

3. (A-PA) - Application for Performance Bond/Advance Payment Guarantee

4. (A-MRC) - Application for Maintenance/Retention/Combined Bond

5. (CI) - information required yearly or at times where there are changes/amendments to the company Profile

6. (LA) - Contractors undertaking to maintain financial discipline – (Letter of Undertaking)

7. (A) , (B) , (C) , (D) - opening of Project/Lien Account. All formats are attached with [(A-PA)](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/APPLICATION FOR PB, AB.pdf) & [(A-MRC)](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/APPLICATION_FOR_MB,_RB,_CB.pdf)

8. (IN-PAMRC) - Indemnity attached with all Applications – (BB), [(A-PA)](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/APPLICATION FOR PB, AB.pdf) & [(A-MRC)](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/APPLICATION_FOR_MB,_RB,_CB.pdf)

9. (Ext) - to be used when extension of time required for the existing Bonds/Guarantees – (Application for Extension)

10. (DOF) - to be used when apply to release funds from Lien/Project Account- (Disbursement of Funds)

11. (MPR) - format to be used by the Contractors to submit the Monthly Progress of the Project – this is a requirement – (Monthly Progress Report)

12. (MP) - information to the contractors-to understand the specific areas concern/monitor by the CGF– (Guide Line for Monitoring of Projects)

13. (GL) - additional information to Contractor to understand the CGF Management Guide Lines/Instructions–to all Contractors
question_en: What is the main topic covered by the registration and application forms available from CGF?
answer_en: The main topic is "Registration and Application Forms Available from CGF", which are related to the service of "Providing Bonds & Guarantees" for "Private Employees".
question_ta: CGF இலிருந்து கிடைக்கும் பதிவு மற்றும் விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்களால் உள்ளடக்கப்பட்ட முக்கிய தலைப்பு என்ன?
answer_ta: முக்கிய தலைப்பு "CGF இலிருந்து கிடைக்கும் பதிவு மற்றும் விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்கள்" என்பதாகும், இது "பிணைப்பத்திரங்கள் மற்றும் உத்தரவாதங்களை வழங்குதல்" என்ற சேவைக்கும் "தனியார் ஊழியர்களுக்கும்" தொடர்புடையது.
question_si: CGF වෙතින් ලබාගත හැකි ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සහ අයදුම්පත් ආවරණය කරන ප්‍රධාන මාතෘකාව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ප්‍රධාන මාතෘකාව වන්නේ "CGF වෙතින් ලබාගත හැකි ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සහ අයදුම්පත්" යන්නයි. මෙය "බැඳුම්කර සහ ඇපකර සැපයීම" යන සේවාවට සහ "පෞද්ගලික සේවකයින්ට" අදාළ වේ.

question_ta: பீப்பிள்ஸ் வங்கி வழங்கும் வீட்டு கடனின் கடன் தொகை, திருப்பிச் செலுத்தும் ஆண்டுகள் மற்றும் மொத்த வட்டி விகிதம் என்ன?
answer_ta: பீப்பிள்ஸ் வங்கி வழங்கும் வீட்டு கடனின் கடன் தொகை 250,000.00, திருப்பிச் செலுத்தும் ஆண்டுகள் 5, மற்றும் மொத்த வட்டி விகிதம் 16% ஆகும்.
question_si: මහජන බැංකුව මගින් ලබා දෙන නිවාස ණයේ ණය මුදල, ආපසු ගෙවීමේ වසර ගණන සහ මුළු පොලී අනුපාතය කොපමණද?
answer_si: මහජන බැංකුව මගින් ලබා දෙන නිවාස ණයේ ණය මුදල 250,000.00 ක් වන අතර, ආපසු ගෙවීමේ වසර ගණන 5 ක් සහ මුළු පොලී අනුපාතය 16% කි.

context:
Service: Civil Pension Schemes
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Pensions, EPF, ETF & Other
Topic: විශේෂ කරුණු - මරණය සහ මාසික වැටුප් නොලැබීම හේතුවෙන් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප අවලංගු කිරීම
---
ඉ. ඵවැන් අවස්ථාවක විශ්රාමිකයාගේ ඥාාතියකු විසින් ප්රාදේශීය ලේකමි තුමා වෙත හෝ තැපැල් ස්ථානාධිපති තුමා වෙත මරණ සහතිකය ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමෙන් විශ්රාමික ඔහුගේ හෝ ඇයගේ මරණය සහතික කරයි

ජ.මාස තුනක් ඇතුලත විශ්රාමක වැටුප ලබා නොගත්තේ නමි විශ්රාමික වැටුප අවලංගු වේ

සටහන -:විශ්රාමක ඔහු හෝ ඇය විසින් මාස 3 ක් ඇතුලත ඔහු හෝ ඇය විසින් ප්රාදේශීය ලේකමි තුමා වෙත ලිපියක් මාර්ගයෙන් විශ්රාමක වැටුප ලබා නොගැනීමට හේතු දන්වා සිටිය යුතුය

හිඟ මුදල් ලබා ගැනීම

-විශ්රාමකයා විසින් ලබා නොගත් හිග මුදල් දින 30 ක් ඇතුලත ලබා නොගත හොත් බැංකුව විසින් ඵම චෙක් පත ප්රාදේශීය ලේකමි කාර්ය්යලය වෙත ඵවනු ලබයි ඉන් පසු විශ්රාමකයා විසින් ප්රාදේශීය ලේකමි තුමා හමු වි ඵය ලබා නොගැනීමට හේතු දන්වා සිටිය යුතුය
question_en: Under what circumstances can a Civil Pension Scheme be cancelled according to the provided information?
answer_en: A Civil Pension Scheme can be cancelled if the pensioner passes away, or if the monthly pension is not claimed within three months. If the pension is not claimed, the pensioner must inform the Divisional Secretary in writing within three months, stating the reasons.
question_ta: வழங்கப்பட்ட தகவல்களின்படி, ஒரு சிவில் ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டம் எந்த சூழ்நிலைகளில் ரத்து செய்யப்படலாம்?
answer_ta: ஓய்வூதியதாரர் இறந்துவிட்டால் அல்லது மூன்று மாதங்களுக்குள் மாதாந்திர ஓய்வூதியம் கோரப்படாவிட்டால் ஒரு சிவில் ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டம் ரத்து செய்யப்படலாம். ஓய்வூதியம் கோரப்படாவிட்டால், ஓய்வூதியதாரர் மூன்று மாதங்களுக்குள் அதற்கான காரணங்களைத் தெரிவித்து பிரதேச செயலாளருக்கு எழுத்துப்பூர்வமாக அறிவிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: ලබා දී ඇති තොරතුරු අනුව, සිවිල් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රමයක් අවලංගු කළ හැක්කේ කුමන තත්වයන් යටතේද?
answer_si: විශ්‍රාමිකයා මිය ගියහොත් හෝ මාස තුනක් ඇතුළත මාසික විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ඉල්ලා නොසිටියහොත් සිවිල් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රමයක් අවලංගු කළ හැක. විශ්‍රාම වැටුප ඉල්ලා නොසිටින්නේ නම්, විශ්‍රාමිකයා මාස තුනක් ඇතුළත හේතු දක්වමින් ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම්වරයාට ලිඛිතව දැනුම් දිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Registration and Re-registration of Employees
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Government Employees
Topic: Required Documents for EPF Registration (Part 1)
---
Necessary Supporting documents

- 02 originals of form “D” completed by employer
- In addition to form “D”, 02 originals of “D” annexure certified with official seal should be produced in case of number of employees in the institution is 10 or less than 10
- If the number of employees is more than 10, the list of employees including full name of employee, age, nature of employment, wage and date of appointment should be produced. (The person who certified form “D” should certify and affix the seal)
- A written statement containing reasons, should be produced by employer if the gap between the date of commencement or registration of the institution/ business and the date of registration in Employees’ Provident Fund is more than 02 years
- Form “D” or “D” annexures should be certified by the owner of the institution or a partner (if it is a joint venture). If another person sign, he should have power of Attorney and a copy of it should be produced. Other kinds of Authority granting letters will not be accepted in place of power of Attorney (Except in projects connected with government institutions)
question_en: What are the specific document requirements for EPF registration based on the number of employees in an institution?
answer_en: For institutions with 10 or fewer employees, 02 originals of form “D” and 02 originals of “D” annexure certified with an official seal are required. If the number of employees is more than 10, a list of employees including full name, age, nature of employment, wage, and date of appointment should be produced, certified by the person who certified form “D”.
question_ta: ஒரு நிறுவனத்தில் உள்ள பணியாளர்களின் எண்ணிக்கையின் அடிப்படையில் EPF பதிவுக்கான குறிப்பிட்ட ஆவணத் தேவைகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: 10 அல்லது அதற்கும் குறைவான பணியாளர்களைக் கொண்ட நிறுவனங்களுக்கு, படிவம் “D” இன் 02 அசல் பிரதிகள் மற்றும் அதிகாரப்பூர்வ முத்திரையுடன் சான்றளிக்கப்பட்ட “D” இணைப்பின் 02 அசல் பிரதிகள் தேவை. பணியாளர்களின் எண்ணிக்கை 10 ஐ விட அதிகமாக இருந்தால், படிவம் “D” ஐ சான்றளித்தவரால் சான்றளிக்கப்பட்ட பணியாளர்களின் முழுப் பெயர், வயது, வேலைவாய்ப்பின் தன்மை, ஊதியம் மற்றும் நியமன தேதி உள்ளிட்ட பட்டியல் தயாரிக்கப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: ආයතනයක සේවක සංඛ්‍යාව මත පදනම්ව EPF ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා අවශ්‍ය නිශ්චිත ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: සේවකයින් 10ක් හෝ ඊට අඩු සංඛ්‍යාවක් සිටින ආයතන සඳහා, “D” පත්‍රිකාවේ මුල් පිටපත් 02ක් සහ නිල මුද්‍රාවකින් සහතික කරන ලද “D” උපලේඛනයේ මුල් පිටපත් 02ක් අවශ්‍ය වේ. සේවක සංඛ්‍යාව 10ට වැඩි නම්, සේවකයාගේ සම්පූර්ණ නම, වයස, රැකියාවේ ස්වභාවය, වැටුප සහ පත්වීම් දිනය ඇතුළත් සේවක ලැයිස්තුවක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතු අතර, එය “D” පත්‍රිකාව සහතික කළ තැනැත්තා විසින් සහතික කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: To Become a Supplier
Main Category: Employment Information
Subcategory: Employment Opportunities
Topic: Supplier Registration Requirements for the Department of Ayurveda
---
If a person wants to be a supplier of the Department of Ayruveda such person should register with the Central Bank as a Government supplier. All the required details in this regard are published in National news papers at the beginning of the year.

But a person who supplies dried/raw/finished drugs is not required to register with the Central Bank and such person should register with the Department of Ayurveda. All the required details in this regard are published in National news papers at the beginning of the year.

Apart From this, it is possible for the Government or Semi Government institutions to engage in supplying without being registered.

For instance- State Printing corporation in case of printing.

Contact Chief Accountant Tel : +94-11-2840582
question_en: What are the registration requirements for a person supplying dried, raw, or finished drugs to the Department of Ayurveda?
answer_en: A person who supplies dried, raw, or finished drugs to the Department of Ayurveda is not required to register with the Central Bank. Instead, they should register directly with the Department of Ayurveda. All necessary details are published in national newspapers at the beginning of the year.
question_ta: ஆயுர்வேத திணைக்களத்திற்கு உலர்ந்த, மூல அல்லது பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட மருந்துகளை வழங்கும் ஒருவருக்கு பதிவு செய்வதற்கான தேவைகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: ஆயுர்வேத திணைக்களத்திற்கு உலர்ந்த, மூல அல்லது பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட மருந்துகளை வழங்கும் ஒருவருக்கு மத்திய வங்கியில் பதிவு செய்ய வேண்டிய அவசியம் இல்லை. அதற்குப் பதிலாக, அவர்கள் நேரடியாக ஆயுர்வேத திணைக்களத்தில் பதிவு செய்ய வேண்டும். தேவையான அனைத்து விவரங்களும் ஆண்டின் தொடக்கத்தில் தேசிய செய்தித்தாள்களில் வெளியிடப்படும்.
question_si: ආයුර්වේද දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවට වියළි, අමු හෝ නිමි ඖෂධ සපයන පුද්ගලයෙකුට ලියාපදිංචි වීමට අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: ආයුර්වේද දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවට වියළි, අමු හෝ නිමි ඖෂධ සපයන පුද්ගලයෙකුට මහ බැංකුවේ ලියාපදිංචි වීමට අවශ්‍ය නොවේ. ඒ වෙනුවට, ඔවුන් ආයුර්වේද දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ සෘජුවම ලියාපදිංචි විය යුතුය. අවශ්‍ය සියලු විස්තර වසර ආරම්භයේදී ජාතික පුවත්පත්වල පළ කරනු ලැබේ.

context:

Main Category: Employment Information

---
අයදුම්පත්‍ර ලබා ගැනීම

-රජයේ විශ්රාමික සේවකයෙක් තැපැල් මගින් දැන්වීම් කළ යුතුය.  විශ්රාමික පිළිවෙල පිලිබඳව රජයේ ආදායම් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා

-පසුකාලයේදී විශ්රාමික රජයේ සේවකයෙක් අදාල විෂයට සම්බන්ධ ප්රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලට අදාල අයදුම් පත්රය ලබා ගැනිම සදහා පැමිණිය යුතුයි.

අයදුම් පත්රය

විශ්රාම පඩිය ගෙවීම්

අවශ්ය උපකාරක ලියවිලි

-විශ්රාමික කාලය

-ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පත්

-ඉල්ලූම් කළ ලිපිය

සටහන 1.5.30.7හි උපකාරක ලියවිලි සලකා බලන්න

අයදුම් පත්ර භාර දිම

-රජයේ විශ්රාමික සේවකයන් පුරවන ලද අයදුම් පත්රය ප්රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලයේ අදාල විෂයට සම්බන්ධ ස්ථානයට භාර දිය යුතු අතර, එම ස්ථානයට ඔහුට හෝ ඇයට විශ්රාම ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්ය බව දැන්විය යුතුය.

වැඩ කරන දින : සඳුදා සහ බඳාදා

වැඩ කරන වේලාවල් :පෙ.ව. 9.00 සිට ප.ව. 4.30 දක්වා

සටහන :

-විශ්රාමික සේවකයාට විෂයට අදාළ ප්රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලයට යාමට අසමත් වුවහොත්, ඔහු හෝ ඇය ලිපියක් මගින් ඉල්ලීම් කළ යුතුය.  ඔහු හෝ ඇය ලිපියක් ඉල්ලූම් කළ යුතු අතර තම ලිපිය රැගෙන එන තැනැත්තාගේ අනන්යතාවය තහවුරු කළ ලිපියක් ප්රදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලය වෙත භාර දිය යුතුය
question_en: What is the process for obtaining and submitting application forms for Civil Pension Schemes, including required documents and working hours?
answer_en: To obtain an application, a retired government employee should notify by post for pension arrangements, then visit the relevant Divisional Secretariat office. For submission, the filled form along with supporting documents like the retirement period, National Identity Card, and a requested letter must be submitted to the relevant section of the Divisional Secretariat office. Working days are Monday and Wednesday, from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. If unable to attend, a letter confirming the identity of the person submitting it can be sent.
question_ta: சிவில் ஓய்வூதியத் திட்டங்களுக்கான விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்களைப் பெறுவதற்கும் சமர்ப்பிப்பதற்கும் என்ன செயல்முறை, தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் மற்றும் வேலை நேரம் என்ன?
answer_ta: விண்ணப்பத்தைப் பெற, ஓய்வுபெற்ற அரசு ஊழியர் ஓய்வூதிய ஏற்பாடுகளுக்காக தபால் மூலம் அறிவிக்க வேண்டும், பின்னர் சம்பந்தப்பட்ட பிரதேச செயலக அலுவலகத்திற்கு செல்ல வேண்டும். விண்ணப்பத்தைச் சமர்ப்பிக்க, பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட படிவம், ஓய்வூதியக் காலம், தேசிய அடையாள அட்டை மற்றும் கோரப்பட்ட கடிதம் போன்ற துணை ஆவணங்களுடன் சம்பந்தப்பட்ட பிரதேச செயலக அலுவலகத்தின் தொடர்புடைய பிரிவில் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும். வேலை நாட்கள் திங்கள் மற்றும் புதன், காலை 9:00 மணி முதல் மாலை 4:30 மணி வரை. நேரில் செல்ல இயலாவிட்டால், கடிதத்தைச் சமர்ப்பிக்கும் நபரின் அடையாளத்தை உறுதிப்படுத்தும் கடிதத்தை அனுப்பலாம்.
question_si: සිවිල් විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් ක්‍රම සඳහා අයදුම්පත් ලබා ගැනීම සහ භාර දීම සඳහා වන ක්‍රියාවලිය, අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි සහ වැඩ කරන වේලාවන් කවරේද?
answer_si: අයදුම්පතක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා, විශ්‍රාමික රජයේ සේවකයෙකු විශ්‍රාම වැටුප් කටයුතු සඳහා තැපැල් මගින් දැනුම් දී, පසුව අදාළ ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයට පැමිණිය යුතුය. අයදුම්පත් භාර දීම සඳහා, පුරවන ලද අයදුම්පත විශ්‍රාමික කාලය, ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පත සහ ඉල්ලූම් කළ ලිපිය වැනි ආධාරක ලේඛන සමඟ ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයේ අදාළ අංශයට භාර දිය යුතුය. වැඩ කරන දින සඳුදා සහ බදාදා වන අතර, වැඩ කරන වේලාවන් පෙ.ව. 9:00 සිට ප.ව. 4:30 දක්වා වේ. පැමිණීමට නොහැකි නම්, ලිපිය ඉදිරිපත් කරන පුද්ගලයාගේ අනන්‍යතාවය තහවුරු කරන ලිපියක් යැවිය හැකිය.
