question_en: Who is the permanent legal officer in charge of the bureau for reporting human rights violations?
answer_en: Uma Wijesinghe is the permanent legal officer in charge of the bureau.
question_ta: மனித உரிமை மீறல்களைப் புகாரளிக்கும் பணியகத்தின் நிரந்தர சட்ட அதிகாரி யார்?
answer_ta: உமா விஜேசிங்கே என்பவர் பணியகத்தின் நிரந்தர சட்ட அதிகாரியாவார்.
question_si: මානව හිමිකම් උල්ලංඝනයන් වාර්තා කිරීම සඳහා වන කාර්යාංශයේ ස්ථිර නීති නිලධාරියා කවුද?
answer_si: උමා විජේසිංහ මහත්මිය කාර්යාංශයේ ස්ථිර නීති නිලධාරිනියයි.

context:
Service: Legal Aid for Consumers
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Consumer Protection
Topic: Overview of Consumer Protection Activities
---
The consumer protection activities have now emerged as a major public services component in the society. With the enactment of the Consumer Affairs Law No.9 of 2003 and the appointment of the Consumer Affairs Authority, the general awareness of the consumer rights has become important for the benefit of the general public.

The UN principles on consumer protection form the basis of the consumer law in Sri Lanka whereby not only the consumers but also the integrity of manufacturers, traders and service providers are also protected.

The Consumer Protection Desk of the Legal Aid Commission liaises closely with the Consumer Affairs Authority and conduct awareness programs through the 34 Legal Aid Centers islandwide. The target groups for the awareness programs are 6,500 Elders’ Societies, 14,200 Grama Niladharies and 100 Law Circles in schools in different provinces.

The Head of the Consumer Protection Desk is Lasanthi Palapaththwela, Attorney-at-Law who coordinates with the Consumer Affairs Authority and conduct awareness programs. She is also responsible for advising consumers who are victimized by traders in violation of the Consumer Affairs Law and seek redress from the Authority. Procedure Please follow the [Common Procedure](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=430&task=info&back=0&pid=1334)

Related Services Obtain Legal Aid Common Procedure
question_en: Who is responsible for coordinating consumer protection awareness programs and advising victimized consumers at the Legal Aid Commission?
answer_en: Lasanthi Palapaththwela, Attorney-at-Law, who heads the Consumer Protection Desk of the Legal Aid Commission, is responsible for coordinating awareness programs and advising consumers victimized by traders.
question_ta: சட்ட உதவி ஆணைக்குழுவில் நுகர்வோர் பாதுகாப்பு விழிப்புணர்வு நிகழ்ச்சிகளை ஒருங்கிணைப்பதற்கும் பாதிக்கப்பட்ட நுகர்வோருக்கு ஆலோசனை வழங்குவதற்கும் பொறுப்பானவர் யார்?
answer_ta: சட்ட உதவி ஆணைக்குழுவின் நுகர்வோர் பாதுகாப்புப் பிரிவின் தலைவரான சட்டத்தரணி லசந்தி பாலபத்வேல, விழிப்புணர்வு நிகழ்ச்சிகளை ஒருங்கிணைப்பதற்கும் வர்த்தகர்களால் பாதிக்கப்பட்ட நுகர்வோருக்கு ஆலோசனை வழங்குவதற்கும் பொறுப்பாவார்.
question_si: නීති ආධාර කොමිෂන් සභාවේ පාරිභෝගික ආරක්ෂණ දැනුවත් කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන් සම්බන්ධීකරණය කිරීම සහ අසාධාරණයට ලක් වූ පාරිභෝගිකයින්ට උපදෙස් දීම භාරව සිටින්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: නීති ආධාර කොමිෂන් සභාවේ පාරිභෝගික ආරක්ෂණ අංශයේ ප්‍රධානියා වන නීතිඥ ලසන්ති පලපත්වල මහත්මිය දැනුවත් කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන් සම්බන්ධීකරණය කිරීම සහ වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් අසාධාරණයට ලක් කරන ලද පාරිභෝගිකයින්ට උපදෙස් දීම භාරව සිටී.

context:
Service: Complain Relating to Missing Driving Licenses
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Complaints & Grievances
Topic: Extract of Complaint and Required Documents (Part 2)
---
Some departments which require extract of complaints are listed below:

National Identity Card | Grama Niladari / Department of Registration of Persons
--- | ---
Passport | Department of Immigration and Emigration
Driving Licenses | Department of Motor Vehicles

Note 01: Likewise there are other departments and organizations which require a copy of the extract of complaints which the person involved has to produce to complete the procedure. Documents Required [NIC](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=457) Number [Passport](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=399&task=info&back=0&pid=457) Number Previous Driving License Number Handover Application Submit Extract of Complain copy along with filled application form presented by Department of Motor Vehicles to Department of Motor Vehicles. Application Form No application forms to be filled by the person concerned at the Police Station but the respective departments will provide forms to be filled and submitted. Shown below is an Extract of Complain Form given by the Police Station for ( [NIC](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=457) , [Passport](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=399&task=info&back=0&pid=457) and Driving License ).
question_en: What documents are required to process a complaint relating to a missing driving license?
answer_en: To process a complaint relating to a missing driving license, the required documents include the NIC Number, Passport Number, Previous Driving License Number, and a copy of the extract of the complaint along with the filled application form provided by the Department of Motor Vehicles.
question_ta: காணாமல் போன சாரதி அனுமதிப்பத்திரம் தொடர்பான புகாரைச் செயல்படுத்த என்னென்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவை?
answer_ta: காணாமல் போன சாரதி அனுமதிப்பத்திரம் தொடர்பான புகாரைச் செயல்படுத்த, தேசிய அடையாள அட்டை எண், கடவுச்சீட்டு எண், முந்தைய சாரதி அனுமதிப்பத்திர எண் மற்றும் மோட்டார் போக்குவரத்துத் திணைக்களத்தால் வழங்கப்படும் பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்துடன் புகாரின் நகல் ஆகியவை தேவை.
question_si: අතුරුදහන් වූ රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් සම්බන්ධ පැමිණිල්ලක් ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: අතුරුදහන් වූ රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් සම්බන්ධ පැමිණිල්ලක් ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීමට ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පත් අංකය, විදේශ ගමන් බලපත්‍ර අංකය, පෙර රියදුරු බලපත්‍ර අංකය සහ මෝටර් රථ ප්‍රවාහන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව විසින් සපයන ලද සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අයදුම්පත්‍රය සමඟ පැමිණිල්ලේ සාරාංශයේ පිටපතක් අවශ්‍ය වේ.

context:
Service: Obtaining of Procession Permits
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Law & Order
Topic: Additional Information: Application, Timeline, and Costs
---
Application Form No applications are needed for this service Note : The Applicant or organizer is requested to submit a hand written request to the respective Police station justifying his reasons for need to request for a Procession Permit. Timeline Process Time Two to three hours Working Hours A.S.P Office:8.00am – 4.30pm Monday / Friday Police Station:24 / 7 / 365 days Cost related to the service No cost involved for this service Fines and Surcharges Not applicable for this type of Service Note 01 : The Office in Charge can take action if the procession gets out of control. Support Documents Required [National Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=467) Details of Residential and Office Address Details of Place of Employment If applicant/organizer is a part of a political party, the party should be mentioned to the Police Station. Copies of Poster, Fliers and other Materials to be used for Procession Service Responsibility Assistant Superintendent of Police Note 01 : The ASP of the region has to issue the Permit. Office in Charge Note 02 : The Office in Charge of the region has to certify the Permit request to be transferred to the ASP. Special Cases Not applicable for this type of service Sample Form with Dummy Data Not provided by the Department of Police due to confidential Information
question_en: What is the cost associated with obtaining a Procession Permit?
answer_en: There is no cost involved for obtaining a Procession Permit.
question_ta: ஊர்வல அனுமதிப்பத்திரத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கு ஆகும் செலவு என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவைக்கு எந்தச் செலவும் இல்லை.
question_si: පෙළපාලි බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අදාළ පිරිවැය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා කිසිදු පිරිවැයක් ඇතුළත් නොවේ.

context:
Service: Complain Relating to Missing Passports.
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Complaints & Grievances
Topic: Service Responsibility, Special Cases, and Related Services
---
Service Responsibility Matrix For all the operations concerned with this department the person concerned reports to the Office in Charge of the respective Police Station. Note: Due to the fact that there are 401 police stations island wide, it is unable to assign a single responsible person for a service pertaining to this division. Special Cases Not applicable for this service Sample form with Dummy Data Not provided by the Police Station due to confidential Information

Related Services Obtaining a Certification for Driving License
---
question_en: To whom should a complaint regarding a missing passport be reported?
answer_en: A complaint regarding a missing passport should be reported to the Office in Charge of the respective Police Station.
question_ta: காணாமல் போன கடவுச்சீட்டு தொடர்பான புகாரை யாரிடம் தெரிவிக்க வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: காணாமல் போன கடவுச்சீட்டு தொடர்பான புகாரை அந்தந்த பொலிஸ் நிலையத்தின் பொறுப்பதிகாரியிடம் தெரிவிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: අතුරුදහන් වූ ගමන් බලපත්‍රයක් සම්බන්ධ පැමිණිල්ලක් වාර්තා කළ යුත්තේ කාටද?
answer_si: අතුරුදහන් වූ ගමන් බලපත්‍රයක් සම්බන්ධ පැමිණිල්ලක් අදාළ පොලිස් ස්ථානයේ ස්ථානාධිපතිවරයා වෙත වාර්තා කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Consumer Education, Empowerment and Promoting the Establishment of Consumer Societies
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Consumer Protection
Topic: Timelines, Costs, and Support for Consumer Programs
---
Time Line : Process Time Line: Applicants have to forward the request 1 month ahead of the scheduled date of the proposed program

Submission Time Line: Working days - Monday – Friday Counter open hours - 8:30 to 4:15 hrs Holidays -Public and Mercantile holidays

Validity Time Line: There is no validity time line

Cost Related to the Services: Cost: Cost is borne by the Authority. Fee: There is no fee involved in this service Penalty: No Penalty Surcharges: No Surcharges

Support Documents: No support documents are required in obtaining this service

Special Cases : A group of consumers can form a consumer organisation as per the constitution designed for the consumer organisation and register their organisation at the CAA.
question_en: What are the costs associated with the Consumer Education, Empowerment, and Promoting the Establishment of Consumer Societies service?
answer_en: There are no fees, penalties, or surcharges for this service, as the cost is borne by the Authority.
question_ta: நுகர்வோர் கல்வி, அதிகாரமளித்தல் மற்றும் நுகர்வோர் சங்கங்கள் நிறுவுதலை ஊக்குவிக்கும் சேவைக்கான செலவுகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவைக்கு நுகர்வோருக்கு எந்த கட்டணமும், அபராதமும் அல்லது கூடுதல் கட்டணங்களும் இல்லை. இதற்கான செலவை அதிகாரசபையே ஏற்கிறது.
question_si: පාරිභෝගික අධ්‍යාපනය, සවිබල ගැන්වීම සහ පාරිභෝගික සමිති පිහිටුවීම ප්‍රවර්ධනය කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා වන වියදම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා කිසිදු ගාස්තුවක්, දඩයක් හෝ අමතර ගාස්තුවක් අය නොකෙරේ. පිරිවැය අධිකාරිය විසින් දරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Preparation of deeds by the legal division in terms of the urban development authority act
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Law & Order
Topic: Introduction to UDA Act Service and Eligibility
---
Introduction This service is provided under Section 18(1) of the UDA Act Eligibility Presentation of tender papers How to obtain the service The service can be obtained by visiting the Legal Division on week days during working hours - 9.00 a.m to 4.00 p.m Service Charge No fees are charged for the service.When deeds are prepared, relevant stamp fees and other charges should be paid to the UDA. Time taken to provider the service It is possible to send the Deed for registration within 3 weeks after obtaining the particulars for the preparation of the deed and paying the fees payable to Legal Division. Supporting documents required 1.Honorable Minister’s approval, 2.Approval of the Cabinet, 3.Approval of the Board of Management, 4.Certificate of Land Acquisition, 5.Plans and List of allotments of land, 6.Receipt of the payment for the land
question_en: Under which section of the UDA Act is the service for preparation of deeds provided?
answer_en: The service for preparation of deeds is provided under Section 18(1) of the UDA Act.
question_ta: நகர அபிவிருத்தி அதிகார சபை சட்டத்தின் எந்தப் பிரிவின் கீழ் பத்திரம் தயாரிக்கும் சேவை வழங்கப்படுகிறது?
answer_ta: நகர அபிவிருத்தி அதிகார சபை சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 18(1) இன் கீழ் பத்திரம் தயாரிக்கும் சேவை வழங்கப்படுகிறது.
question_si: නාගරික සංවර්ධන අධිකාරී පනතේ කුමන වගන්තිය යටතේ ඔප්පු සකස් කිරීමේ සේවාව සපයනු ලබන්නේද?
answer_si: ඔප්පු සකස් කිරීමේ සේවාව නාගරික සංවර්ධන අධිකාරී පනතේ 18(1) වගන්තිය යටතේ සපයනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Implementation of the Soil Conservation Act
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Legislature & Executive
Topic: Application Submission and Service Details
---
Eligibility Process of submitting applications. (Places from where [application form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) can be obtained, Place, Counter and time at which applications should be submitted.) Service can be claimed by sending a letter with details to the following address. Additional Director National Resource Management Centre. Sarasavi Mawatha,Peradeniya. question_en: Who is the staff officer in charge of the Implementation of the Soil Conservation Act service, and how can they be contacted?

question_ta: மண் பாதுகாப்புச் சட்டத்தை நடைமுறைப்படுத்தும் சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான அதிகாரி யார், அவரை எவ்வாறு தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்?
answer_ta: மண் மற்றும் நீர் மேலாண்மைப் பிரிவின் உதவி வேளாண்மைப் பணிப்பாளர் திரு. ஏ.ஜி. சந்திரபால இந்தப் சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பானவர். அவரை +94-812-388355 என்ற தொலைபேசி எண்ணிலோ அல்லது nrmc@doa.gov.lk என்ற மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரியிலோ தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: පාංශු සංරක්ෂණ පනත ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීමේ සේවාව භාර නිලධාරියා කවුද සහ ඔහුව සම්බන්ධ කර ගත හැක්කේ කෙසේද?
answer_si: පස හා ජල කළමනාකරණ අංශයේ කෘෂිකර්ම සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂ, ඒ.ජී. චන්ද්‍රපාල මහතා මෙම සේවාව භාරව සිටී. ඔහුව +94-812-388355 දුරකථන අංකයෙන් හෝ nrmc@doa.gov.lk විද්‍යුත් තැපෑලෙන් සම්බන්ධ කර ගත හැක.

context:
Service: Payment of Motor Vehicle Fines
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Law & Order
Topic: Traffic Fine Payment Details
---
Eligibility: Within 14 days from the date of issue of the fine form

Process of Submitting Applications Forms : May be paid to any post office. Place From Where Application Forms can be Obtained

Fees Payable for Obtaining Applications

Hours During Which They Should be Submitted : From 09:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.

Fees Payable for Obtaining the Service : Amount of the five and 10% as service charges should be paid

Time Taken for Providing the Service

Supporting Documents Required : Fine from should be produced.

Exceptions or Instances Outside the Above Requirements and Special Information

Specimen Application Form Perfected Specimen Application
question_en: What is the eligibility period for paying a motor vehicle fine?
answer_en: Motor vehicle fines must be paid within 14 days from the date of issue of the fine form.
question_ta: மோட்டார் வாகன அபராதத்தைச் செலுத்துவதற்கான காலக்கெடு என்ன?
answer_ta: அபராத படிவம் வழங்கப்பட்ட நாளிலிருந்து 14 நாட்களுக்குள் மோட்டார் வாகன அபராதம் செலுத்தப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: මෝටර් රථ දඩ මුදල් ගෙවීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමේ කාලය කොපමණද?
answer_si: දඩ පත්‍රිකාව නිකුත් කළ දින සිට දින 14ක් ඇතුළත මෝටර් රථ දඩ මුදල් ගෙවිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Investigations on Anti-competitive Practices
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Consumer Protection
Topic: Overview of Anti-Competitive Practices and Eligibility for Complaints
---
This service is provided by the Consumer Affairs Authority in order to prevent anticompetitive practices within Sri Lanka.

An Anti-competitive Practice can be Described as: When a person / a group of people - in the course of business - pursues a conduct which has or is intended to have the effect of restricting, distorting or preventing the competition in connection with the productions, supply or acquisition of goods or the supply or securing of services.

Eligibility Any trader, trader or organization of traders or an association of traders has the eligibility of applying for this service by forwarding complaints against anticompetitive practices.

Support Documents

- Agreements
- Production of documents or records.
- Invoices
question_en: Who provides the service for investigating anti-competitive practices in Sri Lanka and what is its primary purpose?
answer_en: The service for investigating anti-competitive practices in Sri Lanka is provided by the Consumer Affairs Authority, and its primary purpose is to prevent anti-competitive practices within the country.
question_ta: இலங்கையில் போட்டி எதிர்ப்பு நடைமுறைகள் குறித்த விசாரணைகளுக்கான சேவையை வழங்குவது யார், அதன் முதன்மை நோக்கம் என்ன?
answer_ta: இலங்கையில் போட்டி எதிர்ப்பு நடைமுறைகள் குறித்த விசாரணைகளுக்கான சேவையை நுகர்வோர் அலுவல்கள் அதிகார சபை வழங்குகிறது, அதன் முதன்மை நோக்கம் நாட்டில் போட்டி எதிர்ப்பு நடைமுறைகளைத் தடுப்பதாகும்.
question_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ තරඟකාරී නොවන භාවිතයන් පිළිබඳ විමර්ශන සේවාව සපයන්නේ කවුද සහ එහි ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ තරඟකාරී නොවන භාවිතයන් පිළිබඳ විමර්ශන සේවාව පාරිභෝගික කටයුතු අධිකාරිය විසින් සපයනු ලබන අතර, එහි ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ වන්නේ රට තුළ තරඟකාරී නොවන භාවිතයන් වැළැක්වීමයි.

context:
Service: Obtain Pattern Approval for weights, Measures, Measuring instruments
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Consumer Protection
Topic: Pattern Approval for Weights, Measures, and Instruments - Eligibility and Submission
---
Pattern Approval for weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments. The Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department holds the authority to approve weights, measures and weighing or measuring instruments that are manufactured or imported according to OIML 76 standards. However, the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department selects and applies only some of the OIML 76 standards that are appropriate for Sri Lanka. Eligibility A manufacturer or seller who prefers to obtain this service should be in the following criteria. Applicant must possess a repair license In the case of approving an imported instrument, the company or individual that sells the instrument should be identified as an authorized dealer with the manufacturers company. Note: If the applicant does not have a repair license he/she must apply for one from the Department of Measurement Units, Standards and Services.

Submission Procedure

Submit Request Letter

- A request letter must be addressed to the Director of the Department.
- The Applicant must indicate in the Application the type of scale, model and range of measurement instrument.
question_en: What are the eligibility criteria for obtaining Pattern Approval for weights, measures, or measuring instruments?
answer_en: To obtain Pattern Approval, an applicant must possess a repair license. If approving an imported instrument, the company or individual selling it must be identified as an authorized dealer with the manufacturer's company. If an applicant does not have a repair license, he/she must apply for one from the Department of Measurement Units, Standards and Services.
question_ta: எடைகள், அளவுகள் அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகளுக்கான மாதிரி அங்கீகாரத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான தகுதி அளவுகோல்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: மாதிரி அங்கீகாரத்தைப் பெற, விண்ணப்பதாரர் பழுதுபார்க்கும் உரிமத்தைப் பெற்றிருக்க வேண்டும். இறக்குமதி செய்யப்பட்ட கருவிக்கு ஒப்புதல் அளிக்கும் பட்சத்தில், அதை விற்கும் நிறுவனம் அல்லது தனிநபர் உற்பத்தியாளர் நிறுவனத்தின் அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட டீலராக அடையாளம் காணப்பட வேண்டும். விண்ணப்பதாரரிடம் பழுதுபார்க்கும் உரிமம் இல்லை என்றால், அவர் அளவீட்டு அலகுகள், தரநிலைகள் மற்றும் சேவைகள் துறையிலிருந்து அதைப் பெற விண்ணப்பிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: බර, මිනුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ සඳහා රටා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක මොනවාද?
answer_si: රටා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා, අයදුම්කරුවෙකුට අලුත්වැඩියා බලපත්‍රයක් තිබිය යුතුය. ආනයනික උපකරණයක් අනුමත කිරීමේදී, එම උපකරණය විකුණන සමාගම හෝ පුද්ගලයා නිෂ්පාදකයාගේ සමාගමේ බලයලත් නියෝජිතයෙකු ලෙස හඳුනාගත යුතුය. අයදුම්කරුට අලුත්වැඩියා බලපත්‍රයක් නොමැති නම්, ඔහු/ඇය මිනුම් ඒකක, ප්‍රමිති සහ සේවා දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවෙන් ඒ සඳහා අයදුම් කළ යුතුය.

context:

question_ta: மோட்டார் விபத்துகளை ஆய்வு செய்யும் சேவைக்குத் தேவையான துணை ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தேவையான துணை ஆவணங்கள் ஓட்டுநர் உரிமம், வருவாய் உரிமம் மற்றும் காப்பீட்டுச் சான்றிதழ் (கிடைத்தால்) ஆகும்.
question_si: “මෝටර් රථ අනතුරු පරීක්ෂා කිරීම” සේවාව සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ආධාරක ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: අවශ්‍ය ආධාරක ලේඛන වන්නේ රියදුරු බලපත්‍රය, ආදායම් බලපත්‍රය සහ රක්ෂණ සහතිකය (තිබේ නම්) ය.

context:
Service: Filing action by legal division in terms of the urban development act
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Law & Order
Topic: Introduction to Unauthorized Development Services by the UDA
---
Introduction Provide services (sub-division of lands, constructions and change of use) for the unauthorized development activities carried out in the declared areas of the UDA in terms of Section 3 of the Urban Development Authority Act

Eligibility Be a Sri Lankan Citizen Procedure for Submitting Applications There is no specific application for this but informing by a letter is sufficient. If not, a complaint can be made by either a telegram or a telephone call. It is easy to take action if unauthorized development activities are immediately reported.In this connection it is important to include the name and address of the unauthorized developer. Member of the public can make anonymous complaints as well. Hours for submitting Complaints in respect of the services mentioned here will be entertained during office hours (9.00 am - 4.00 p.m.)of the week and on Wednesday of the week,in particular, one can obtain this service by paying a visit to the Legal Division. Service Charge No charges are made for this service. However, if the Authority is required to bear an enormous cost in removing an unauthorized development activity on the basis of a complaint made, then, with the consent of that complainant, he/she will be notified to share a part of that cost.For activities of this nature,it is compulsory to obtain the approval of the Chairman/Director General of the UDA.
question_en: What types of unauthorized development activities does the Urban Development Authority (UDA) address under Section 3 of the Urban Development Authority Act?
answer_en: The Urban Development Authority (UDA) addresses unauthorized development activities such as sub-division of lands, constructions, and change of use, within its declared areas.
question_ta: நகர அபிவிருத்தி அதிகாரசபை (UDA) சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 3 இன் கீழ், நகர அபிவிருத்தி அதிகாரசபை (UDA) அங்கீகரிக்கப்படாத எத்தகைய அபிவிருத்தி நடவடிக்கைகளை கையாள்கிறது?
answer_ta: நகர அபிவிருத்தி அதிகாரசபை (UDA) தனது அறிவிக்கப்பட்ட பகுதிகளில் நிலங்களை துணைப்பிரிவாக்குதல், கட்டுமானங்கள் மற்றும் பயன்பாட்டில் மாற்றம் போன்ற அங்கீகரிக்கப்படாத அபிவிருத்தி நடவடிக்கைகளை கையாள்கிறது.
question_si: නාගරික සංවර්ධන අධිකාරී (UDA) පනතේ 3 වන වගන්තියට අනුව, නාගරික සංවර්ධන අධිකාරී (UDA) විසින් විසඳනු ලබන අනවසර සංවර්ධන කටයුතු මොනවාද?
answer_si: නාගරික සංවර්ධන අධිකාරී (UDA) විසින් එහි ප්‍රකාශිත ප්‍රදේශවල ඉඩම් උප බෙදීම, ඉදිකිරීම් සහ භාවිතයේ වෙනස් කිරීම් වැනි අනවසර සංවර්ධන කටයුතු විසඳනු ලබයි.

context:
Service: Apply for Postal Voting
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Rights
Topic: Postal Voting Eligibility and Application Process
---
Only Public Sector employees are entiled for postal voting

Collect an application from a displaying centers or District elections office

Find out your registration details from the Electoral Registers displyed at the centres

Dully fill it - Polling Division name, polling district number, Gramaniladari division, village name, house number, your name, serial number assign for you in the particular register should be accuaratly write down in the application.  

Your place of work, designation and service and the Class/Grade should be clearly indicated

Then sign the application

Hand over to PV Certifying Officer

He/she should certify the application and  send them by post or by hand to the particular District Elections office.
question_en: Who is eligible to apply for postal voting?
answer_en: Only Public Sector employees are entitled to apply for postal voting.
question_ta: அஞ்சல் மூலம் வாக்களிக்க விண்ணப்பிக்க தகுதியுடையவர்கள் யார்?
answer_ta: பொதுத்துறை ஊழியர்கள் மட்டுமே அஞ்சல் மூலம் வாக்களிக்க தகுதியுடையவர்கள்.
question_si: තැපැල් ඡන්දය සඳහා අයදුම් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: තැපැල් ඡන්දය සඳහා අයදුම් කිරීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ රාජ්‍ය අංශයේ සේවකයින් පමණි.

context:
Service: Objection on Inclusion of a Name
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Legislature & Executive
Topic: Validity, Costs, and Penalties Related to Voter Registration
---
Validity Time Line Objections for registration may be proffered to the registering officer (District Secretary/Government Agent) only within the period of such exhibit (28 days).

Costs related to the service Cost : All services are provided free of charge Fee : Free Penalties: None

Surcharge

- If the voter is unable to submit his/her election registration form there will be no fine or surcharge, nevertheless that individual looses his/her chance to vote for at an elections until the next revision take place.
- According to the Section 12(4) of registration of electors Act, No. 44 of 1988

Every person who, fails to give required information to the registering officer or to any person appointed by the registering officer for the purpose, or willfully gives any false information shall be guilty of an offence and shall, on conviction before a magistrate, be liable to a fine not exceeding five hundred rupees, or to imprisonment of either description for a term not exceeding one month or to both such fine and imprisonment
question_en: What are the penalties for providing false information during voter registration according to the Registration of Electors Act?
answer_en: According to Section 12(4) of the Registration of Electors Act, No. 44 of 1988, a person who willfully gives false information is guilty of an offence. On conviction, they are liable to a fine not exceeding five hundred rupees, or imprisonment not exceeding one month, or both.
question_ta: வாக்காளர் பதிவுச் சட்டத்தின்படி, வாக்காளர் பதிவின்போது வேண்டுமென்றே தவறான தகவல்களை வழங்குவதற்கான அபராதங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: வாக்காளர் பதிவுச் சட்டம், எண் 44, 1988 இன் பிரிவு 12(4) இன் படி, ஒரு நபர் வேண்டுமென்றே தவறான தகவல்களை வழங்கினால் குற்றவாளி ஆவார். தண்டனை விதிக்கப்பட்டால், ஐநூறு ரூபாய்க்கு மிகாத அபராதம் அல்லது ஒரு மாதத்திற்கு மிகாத சிறைத்தண்டனை அல்லது இரண்டும் விதிக்கப்படலாம்.
question_si: ඡන්දදායකයන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ පනතට අනුව, ඡන්දදායක ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේදී හිතාමතාම වැරදි තොරතුරු සැපයීම සඳහා දඬුවම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: 1988 අංක 44 දරන ඡන්දදායකයන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ පනතේ 12(4) වගන්තියට අනුව, යම් පුද්ගලයෙකු හිතාමතාම වැරදි තොරතුරු ලබා දෙන්නේ නම් එය වරදකි. වරදකරු කරනු ලැබීමෙන් පසු, රුපියල් පන්සියයක් නොඉක්මවන දඩයකට, හෝ මාසයක් නොඉක්මවන සිරදඬුවමකට, හෝ දඩය සහ සිරදඬුවම් දෙකටම යටත් විය හැකිය.

context:
Service: Stabilisation of Prices of Essential Commodities
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Consumer Protection
Topic: Further Documentation and Consequences of Incomplete Submissions
---
*   Distributor / Dealer and retailer margins.
*   Charge for taxes.
*   Copy of the latest Audited Final accounts with notes and schedules for the present period and the period applicable for determining the current price.

A “SPECIMEN COST SHEET” is available upon request and can be modified to suit specific product or industry characteristics.

If information or documents are incomplete, the applicant will be asked to provide the missing information by a specified date.

Failure to furnish the documents/information on time, or to provide any required assistance, will result in the issuance of an “Interim Order” under Section 18(4) of the Act, prohibiting the applicant from increasing the price until the Authority makes a decision.
question_en: What is the consequence if an applicant fails to furnish the required documents or information on time for the stabilisation of essential commodity prices?
answer_en: Failure to furnish the documents or information on time will result in the issuance of an 'Interim Order' under Section 18(4) of the Act, prohibiting the applicant from increasing the price until the Authority makes a decision.
question_ta: அத்தியாவசியப் பொருட்களின் விலையை உறுதிப்படுத்துவதற்காகத் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் அல்லது தகவல்களை விண்ணப்பதாரர் சரியான நேரத்தில் சமர்ப்பிக்கத் தவறினால் என்ன விளைவு ஏற்படும்?
answer_ta: ஆவணங்கள் அல்லது தகவல்களை சரியான நேரத்தில் சமர்ப்பிக்கத் தவறினால், சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 18(4) இன் கீழ் 'இடைக்கால உத்தரவு' பிறப்பிக்கப்படும், மேலும் அதிகாரிகள் ஒரு முடிவை எடுக்கும் வரை விண்ணப்பதாரர் விலையை உயர்த்த தடை விதிக்கப்படும்.
question_si: අත්‍යවශ්‍ය භාණ්ඩවල මිල ස්ථාවර කිරීම සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන හෝ තොරතුරු නියමිත වේලාවට ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමට අයදුම්කරුවෙකු අපොහොසත් වුවහොත් ඇතිවන ප්‍රතිවිපාකය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: නියමිත වේලාවට ලේඛන හෝ තොරතුරු ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමට අපොහොසත් වුවහොත්, පනතේ 18(4) වගන්තිය යටතේ 'අතුරු නියෝගයක්' නිකුත් කරනු ලබන අතර, අධිකාරිය තීරණයක් ගන්නා තෙක් අයදුම්කරුට මිල ඉහළ නැංවීම තහනම් කරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Consumer Education, Empowerment and Promoting the Establishment of Consumer Societies
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Consumer Protection
Topic: Consumer Education and Awareness Programs (Part 2): Eligibility and Procedure
---
Eligibility : Any interested individual consumer /group of Consumers / Schools can make a request to the Authority. Submission Procedure Request should be made to the Director General of the Consumer Affairs Authority.

Application Forms: There is no predesigned [application form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/applicationCA&I.pdf) Applicants can forward their request by a letter. After the establishment of a Consumer Organization it has to be registered at the CAA.

Procedure : Step 1:Applicant forward a request to the Director General Consumer Affairs Authority Step 2:Consumer Affairs and Information Division designs the program. Step 3:Decide on venue, date & time of the program Step 4:Assign a team to conduct the Program Step 5:Feed back and monitoring Step 6:If the Consumers interested to form a Society, Setup a Consumer Organization
question_en: Who is eligible to request Consumer Education and Awareness Programs, and what is the initial procedure for submitting a request?
answer_en: Any interested individual consumer, group of consumers, or schools are eligible to request these programs. The initial procedure involves forwarding a request by letter to the Director General of the Consumer Affairs Authority.
question_ta: நுகர்வோர் கல்வி மற்றும் விழிப்புணர்வு திட்டங்களை கோர யார் தகுதியானவர்கள், மற்றும் கோரிக்கை சமர்ப்பிப்பதற்கான ஆரம்ப செயல்முறை என்ன?
answer_ta: ஆர்வமுள்ள தனிப்பட்ட நுகர்வோர், நுகர்வோர் குழுக்கள் அல்லது பள்ளிகள் இத்திட்டங்களை கோர தகுதியானவர்கள். ஆரம்ப செயல்முறையானது நுகர்வோர் அலுவல்கள் அதிகார சபையின் பணிப்பாளர் நாயகத்திடம் கடிதம் மூலம் ஒரு கோரிக்கையை சமர்ப்பிப்பதாகும்.
question_si: පාරිභෝගික අධ්‍යාපන සහ දැනුවත් කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන් ඉල්ලා සිටීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද, සහ ඉල්ලීමක් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේ ආරම්භක ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: උනන්දුවක් දක්වන ඕනෑම තනි පාරිභෝගිකයෙකුට, පාරිභෝගික කණ්ඩායම්වලට හෝ පාසල්වලට මෙම වැඩසටහන් ඉල්ලා සිටීමට සුදුසුකම් ඇත. ආරම්භක ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය වන්නේ පාරිභෝගික කටයුතු අධිකාරියේ අධ්‍යක්ෂ ජනරාල් වෙත ලිපියක් මගින් ඉල්ලීමක් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමයි.

context:
Service: Obtaining of Loud Speaker Permits
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Law & Order
Topic: Loud Speaker Permit Application Process - Steps 1 to 4
---
Step 1 : Applicant or organizer must obtain application form from the respective police station Step 2 : The applicant or Organizer has to fill a hand written Loud Speaker Permit Application form. The applicant has to attach the following documents when requesting for permit. Note 01 : If meeting is to be held in a particular site, the applicant has to get a consent letter from the owner of the site. Note 02 : If meeting is to be held in a vehicle , the applicant has to get consent letter from the owner of the vehicle. Note 03 : Letter of consent of the person installing the equipments Step 3 : The OIC of the respective Police station will decide on whether the Permit is possible to be certified by the A.S.P Step 4 : The issuing authority ( A.S.P in charge of Locality ) approves the permit and instructs the applicant or organizer on terms and conditions to be followed.
question_en: What are the initial steps an applicant must take to obtain a Loud Speaker Permit, and what specific consent letters are required during the application process?
answer_en: Initially, an applicant or organizer must obtain and fill out a hand-written application form from the respective police station. During the application, they must attach a consent letter from the owner of the site if the meeting is to be held there, a consent letter from the owner of the vehicle if the meeting is in a vehicle, and a letter of consent from the person installing the equipment.
question_ta: ஒலிபெருக்கி அனுமதி பெறுவதற்கு விண்ணப்பதாரர் எடுக்க வேண்டிய ஆரம்ப கட்ட நடவடிக்கைகள் யாவை, மேலும் விண்ணப்ப செயல்முறையின் போது என்னென்ன குறிப்பிட்ட சம்மதக் கடிதங்கள் தேவைப்படுகின்றன?
answer_ta: ஆரம்பத்தில், விண்ணப்பதாரர் அல்லது ஏற்பாட்டாளர் அந்தந்த காவல் நிலையத்தில் இருந்து விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தைப் பெற்று கையால் பூர்த்தி செய்ய வேண்டும். விண்ணப்பிக்கும் போது, கூட்டம் ஒரு குறிப்பிட்ட இடத்தில் நடைபெற இருந்தால், அந்த இடத்தின் உரிமையாளரிடமிருந்து ஒரு சம்மதக் கடிதம், கூட்டம் ஒரு வாகனத்தில் நடைபெற இருந்தால், அந்த வாகனத்தின் உரிமையாளரிடமிருந்து ஒரு சம்மதக் கடிதம், மற்றும் உபகரணங்களை நிறுவும் நபரிடமிருந்து ஒரு சம்மதக் கடிதம் ஆகியவற்றை இணைக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: ශබ්ද විකාශන බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අයදුම්කරුවෙකු ගත යුතු ආරම්භක පියවර මොනවාද, සහ අයදුම් කිරීමේ ක්‍රියාවලියේදී අවශ්‍ය වන විශේෂිත කැමැත්ත ලිපි මොනවාද?
answer_si: මුලින්ම, අයදුම්කරුවෙකු හෝ සංවිධායකයෙකු අදාළ පොලිස් ස්ථානයෙන් අයදුම් පත්‍රයක් ලබාගෙන එය අතින් පිරවිය යුතුය. අයදුම් කිරීමේදී, රැස්වීමක් යම් ස්ථානයක පැවැත්වීමට නම් එම ස්ථානයේ හිමිකරුගෙන් කැමැත්ත ලිපියක්, රැස්වීමක් වාහනයක පැවැත්වීමට නම් එම වාහනයේ හිමිකරුගෙන් කැමැත්ත ලිපියක්, සහ උපකරණ සවි කරන්නාගේ කැමැත්ත ලිපියක් අමුණා තිබිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Complain Regarding a Child Used as Servant or Laborer
Main Category: Justice, Law & Rights
Subcategory: Complaints & Grievances
Topic: Special Cases, Awareness Programs, and Other Related Information
---
Special cases The child will be taken into the child protection authority & statements taken from the child will be captured on tape. Awareness programs conducted for students, Gramaseva offices, Samurdi offices, Teachers, Nurses, and Employees of trade zone. Sample form with dummy data There is no application form to be filled by the victim

Related Services Medical Assistance for Heart Surgeries
question_en: For which groups are awareness programs conducted concerning the issue of child labor?
answer_en: Awareness programs are conducted for students, Gramaseva offices, Samurdi offices, Teachers, Nurses, and Employees of trade zones.
question_ta: குழந்தை தொழிலாளர் பிரச்சனை குறித்து விழிப்புணர்வு நிகழ்ச்சிகள் எந்தெந்த குழுக்களுக்காக நடத்தப்படுகின்றன?
answer_ta: விழிப்புணர்வு நிகழ்ச்சிகள் மாணவர்கள், கிராமசேவை அலுவலகங்கள், சமுர்த்தி அலுவலகங்கள், ஆசிரியர்கள், செவிலியர்கள் மற்றும் வர்த்தக மண்டல ஊழியர்களுக்காக நடத்தப்படுகின்றன.
question_si: ළමා ශ්‍රමය පිළිබඳ දැනුවත් කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන් පවත්වනු ලබන්නේ කුමන කණ්ඩායම් සඳහාද?
answer_si: දැනුවත් කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන් සිසුන්, ග්‍රාමසේවා කාර්යාල, සමෘද්ධි කාර්යාල, ගුරුවරුන්, හෙදියන් සහ වෙළඳ කලාපයේ සේවකයින් සඳහා පවත්වනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: The Unauthorized Developed Land Obtaining on Lease
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Assistance, Training & Development
Topic: අනවසර ඉඩම් බදු මත ලබා ගැනීම - ගැලීම් සටහන (පියවර 1-3)
---
ගැලීම් සටහන

පියවරෙන් පියවර (සංවර්ධනය කරනු ලැබූ අනවසර ඉඩම් බදු මත ලබා ගැනීම)

පියවර 1: ඉල්ලූම්කරු තමා විසින් සංවර්ධනය කරනු ලැබූ තමා බලාපොරොත්තු වන ඉඩම

  පිළිබඳ සම්පූර්ණ විස්තර සහිත ඉල්ලූම් පත්‍ර ලිපියක් සකස් කර ගත යුතුය.

පියවර 2: ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී තුමාගෙන් වාර්තාවක් ලබාගත යුතුය.

 සැ.යු. ග්‍රාම නිලධාරීඉඩම පිළිබඳ තොරතුරු සොයා බැලීමට ක්‍රියාමාර්ග ගනු

 ඇත.

පියවර 3: ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී තුමාගේ වාර්තාව සමඟ ඉල්ලූම් පත්‍රය ඉල්ලූම්කරු විසින් ප්‍රාදේශීය

 ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යලය වෙත යොමු කරනු ලැබීම.
question_en: What is the initial step an applicant must complete to obtain unauthorized developed land on lease?
answer_en: The applicant must prepare an application letter containing complete details of the unauthorized developed land they wish to obtain on lease.
question_ta: அங்கீகரிக்கப்படாத மேம்படுத்தப்பட்ட நிலத்தை குத்தகைக்கு பெற விண்ணப்பதாரர் முதலில் செய்ய வேண்டியது என்ன?
answer_ta: விண்ணப்பதாரர் குத்தகைக்கு பெற விரும்பும் அங்கீகரிக்கப்படாத மேம்படுத்தப்பட்ட நிலம் பற்றிய முழுமையான விவரங்களுடன் ஒரு விண்ணப்ப கடிதத்தை தயாரிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: අනවසරයෙන් සංවර්ධනය කරන ලද ඉඩමක් බදු මත ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ඉල්ලූම්කරුවෙකු මුලින්ම සම්පූර්ණ කළ යුතු පියවර කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ඉල්ලූම්කරු තමා බදු මත ලබා ගැනීමට අපේක්ෂා කරන අනවසරයෙන් සංවර්ධනය කරන ලද ඉඩම පිළිබඳ සම්පූර්ණ විස්තර සහිත ඉල්ලූම් පත්‍ර ලිපියක් සකස් කර ගත යුතුය.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Information
Topic: Investor Requirements and Application Details
---
Following qualifying criteria have to be satisfied by the potential investor/s for investing in Sri Lanka.

1. Forward an Application filled with details of the proposed investment project to the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka as per the Rules and Regulations stipulated by the BOI.

2. After approval is granted for the investment proposal, an agreement should be signed by the Potential investor/s with the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka as per the Rules and Regulations stipulated by the BOI.

3. Potential investor/s should be able to furnish the details of required monetary provisions for the proposed investment.

4. Expression of interest, keenness, knowledge and experience for investing in Sri Lanka is to be shown.

Contact the staff officers listed below , classified as per the Priority Sectors identified for investment in Sri Lanka, to obtain the details of minimum investment amount required for granting approval under Section 17 of the BOI Law.
question_en: Who should potential investors contact to obtain details about the minimum investment amount required for approval under Section 17 of the BOI Law for incentivised projects in Sri Lanka?
answer_en: Potential investors should contact the staff officers, classified as per the Priority Sectors identified for investment in Sri Lanka, to obtain details of the minimum investment amount required for granting approval under Section 17 of the BOI Law.
question_ta: இலங்கையில் ஊக்கமளிக்கப்பட்ட முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்கு BOI சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 17 இன் கீழ் அனுமதி வழங்குவதற்குத் தேவையான குறைந்தபட்ச முதலீட்டுத் தொகை பற்றிய விவரங்களைப் பெற சாத்தியமான முதலீட்டாளர்கள் யாரைத் தொடர்பு கொள்ள வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 17 இன் கீழ் அனுமதி வழங்குவதற்குத் தேவையான குறைந்தபட்ச முதலீட்டுத் தொகை பற்றிய விவரங்களைப் பெற, இலங்கையில் முதலீட்டிற்காக அடையாளம் காணப்பட்ட முன்னுரிமைத் துறைகளின்படி வகைப்படுத்தப்பட்ட ஊழியர் அதிகாரிகளை சாத்தியமான முதலீட்டாளர்கள் தொடர்பு கொள்ள வேண்டும்.
question_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ දිරිගැන්වූ ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා BOI නීතියේ 17 වන වගන්තිය යටතේ අනුමැතිය ලබා දීම සඳහා අවශ්‍ය අවම ආයෝජන ප්‍රමාණය පිළිබඳ විස්තර ලබා ගැනීමට අනාගත ආයෝජකයින් සම්බන්ධ කර ගත යුත්තේ කවුරුන්ද?
answer_si: BOI නීතියේ 17 වන වගන්තිය යටතේ අනුමැතිය ලබා දීම සඳහා අවශ්‍ය අවම ආයෝජන ප්‍රමාණය පිළිබඳ විස්තර ලබා ගැනීමට, ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ආයෝජනය සඳහා හඳුනාගත් ප්‍රමුඛතා අංශ අනුව වර්ගීකරණය කරන ලද කාර්ය මණ්ඩල නිලධාරීන් අනාගත ආයෝජකයින් සම්බන්ධ කර ගත යුතුය.

context:
Service: Grant approval to sell finished products in the Local Market
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: Special Circumstances and Application Form
---
Exceptional and special circumstances : Granting of approval depends on the nature of the items applied for.

Specimen application form : (Annex an application form) Application form Number 14, used for the Sale of Finished Products in the Local market.

Perfected specimen application form : (Annex a perfected application form) Not attached herewith, as the information are confidential.
question_en: For the service of granting approval to sell finished products in the Local Market, which application form number is used, and what are the special considerations for approval?
answer_en: Application form Number 14 is used for the service of granting approval to sell finished products in the Local Market. The granting of approval depends on the nature of the items applied for.
question_ta: உள்ளூர் சந்தையில் முடிக்கப்பட்ட பொருட்களை விற்க அனுமதி வழங்கும் சேவைக்கு, எந்த விண்ணப்பப் படிவ எண் பயன்படுத்தப்படுகிறது, மேலும் அனுமதி வழங்குவதற்கான சிறப்புப் பரிசீலனைகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: உள்ளூர் சந்தையில் முடிக்கப்பட்ட பொருட்களை விற்க அனுமதி வழங்கும் சேவைக்கு விண்ணப்பப் படிவம் எண் 14 பயன்படுத்தப்படுகிறது. அனுமதி வழங்குதல் விண்ணப்பிக்கப்பட்ட பொருட்களின் தன்மையைப் பொறுத்தது.
question_si: දේශීය වෙළඳපොලේ නිමි භාණ්ඩ විකිණීමට අනුමැතිය ලබා දීමේ සේවාව සඳහා භාවිතා කරන අයදුම්පත්‍ර අංකය කුමක්ද, සහ අනුමැතිය ලබා දීම සඳහා ඇති විශේෂ කරුණු මොනවාද?
answer_si: දේශීය වෙළඳපොලේ නිමි භාණ්ඩ විකිණීමට අනුමැතිය ලබා දීමේ සේවාව සඳහා අංක 14 දරණ අයදුම්පත්‍රය භාවිතා කරයි. අනුමැතිය ලබා දීම ඉල්ලුම් කරන ලද භාණ්ඩවල ස්වභාවය මත රඳා පවතී.

context:
Service: Import of Vehicles Under Gift Scheme - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Application Procedures
---
Importation of Motor Vehicle under the Gift Scheme from a Family Member | Importation of Motor Vehicle under the Gift Scheme for Temples and Organizations
--- | ---
Application for a License to import vehicles under Gift Scheme from a Family Member | Applicant for the importation of vehicles under the Gift Scheme for Temples and Organizations

Procedure

Step 1: Obtain the Application Form from Unit 02. Step 2: Submission of filled Application Form and the relevant Support documents to Unit 02. Step 3: If all the support documents are submitted and application is filled properly,the applicant is submitted to Asst. controller approve.. Step 4: Applicant pays the license fee to the Cashier and submits the invoice to Unit 02 Step 5: Issue the license.

Note:

- If the relevant support documents are not submitted then notify applicant about the required documents.
- If the Application Form is not filled properly, assist the applicant to fill the Form.
question_en: What are the main steps involved in the application procedure for importing vehicles under the Gift Scheme?
answer_en: The main steps include obtaining the application form from Unit 02, submitting the filled form with relevant support documents, getting approval from the Assistant Controller, paying the license fee to the Cashier, and finally, receiving the license.
question_ta: பரிசுத் திட்டத்தின் கீழ் வாகனங்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான விண்ணப்ப செயல்முறையில் உள்ள முக்கிய படிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: முக்கிய படிகள் அலகு 02 இலிருந்து விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தைப் பெறுதல், பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட படிவத்தை துணை ஆவணங்களுடன் சமர்ப்பித்தல், உதவி கட்டுப்பாட்டாளரிடம் ஒப்புதல் பெறுதல், காசாளரிடம் உரிமக் கட்டணத்தைச் செலுத்துதல் மற்றும் இறுதியாக, உரிமத்தைப் பெறுதல் ஆகும்.
question_si: තෑගි යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ වාහන ආනයනය කිරීමේ අයදුම් ක්‍රියාපටිපාටියේ ප්‍රධාන පියවර මොනවාද?
answer_si: ප්‍රධාන පියවර වන්නේ 02 වන ඒකකයෙන් අයදුම්පත්‍රය ලබා ගැනීම, පිරවූ අයදුම්පත්‍රය අදාළ ආධාරක ලේඛන සමඟ ඉදිරිපත් කිරීම, සහකාර පාලකගෙන් අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම, මුදල් අයකැමි වෙත බලපත්‍ර ගාස්තුව ගෙවීම සහ අවසානයේ බලපත්‍රය ලබා ගැනීමයි.

context:
Service: Registering a New Motor Vehicle
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Surcharge Information and Required Support Documents (Part 1)
---
Surcharge If any changes have to be made in the Certificate of Registration, an amount Rs.150.00 has to be paid and the voucher has to be submitted at New Registration Counter. If an owner requires a specific number (a number of choice) for number plate, an extra amount of Rs.7500.00 has to be paid at the New Registration Counter and then submit the voucher to obtain his number plate.

Support Documents Required

- 2 copies of the owner’s photograph (size 3.5*2.5cm) should be endorsed overleaf by Grama Sevaka or Importer. If the owner personally produces the application, the photograph could be endorsed by Supervising Officer of the relevant section on producing is [Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=408) .
- Photocopy of the Owner’s [Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=408) / [Driving License](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=390&task=info&back=0&pid=408) / [Passport](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=399&task=info&back=0&pid=408) .
- Custom Clearance Documents.
- Original Payment Receipt of Custom Duty.
question_en: What is the extra amount required to obtain a specific number for a number plate when registering a new motor vehicle?
answer_en: An extra amount of Rs. 7500.00 has to be paid at the New Registration Counter to obtain a specific number for a number plate.
question_ta: புதிய மோட்டார் வாகனத்தை பதிவு செய்யும்போது ஒரு குறிப்பிட்ட இலக்கத்தை வாகன இலக்கத் தகட்டிற்குப் பெறுவதற்கு செலுத்தப்பட வேண்டிய மேலதிக தொகை எவ்வளவு?
answer_ta: வாகன இலக்கத் தகட்டிற்கு ஒரு குறிப்பிட்ட இலக்கத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கு புதிய பதிவு கவுண்டரில் ரூ. 7500.00 மேலதிகமாக செலுத்த வேண்டும்.
question_si: නව මෝටර් රථයක් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේදී, අංක තහඩුව සඳහා විශේෂ අංකයක් ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය අමතර මුදල කොපමණද?
answer_si: අංක තහඩුව සඳහා විශේෂ අංකයක් ලබා ගැනීමට නව ලියාපදිංචි කවුන්ටරයේදී රුපියල් 7500.00 ක අමතර මුදලක් ගෙවිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Renewal of Licenses - Repairers, Manufacturers and Sellers
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Registrations - Industrial
Topic: Eligibility and Submission Procedures for License Renewals
---
Eligibility Renewal of Repairers License Applicable to the individual/agency concerned who is a Repair license holder registered with Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. Renewal of Manufacturers License Applicable to the manufacturer/company who is a manufacturing license holder registered with the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. Renewal of Seller License Applicable to the retailer/seller registered with the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. Submission Procedure Renewal of Repairers License Obtain an Application Form The license holder would receive the Application Form via Mail the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. Support Documents required No support documents are required Hand over application form The applicant must fill the application form and submit it to the Department Officer Renewal of Manufacturers License Obtain an Application Form The license holder would receive the Application Form via Mail after informing the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department Support Documents required No support documents are required Hand over application form The applicant must fill the application form and submit it to the Department Officer. Renewal of Sellers License
question_en: What is the primary service discussed in this document?
answer_en: The primary service discussed is the renewal of licenses for Repairers, Manufacturers, and Sellers.
question_ta: இந்த ஆவணத்தில் விவாதிக்கப்படும் முதன்மைச் சேவை என்ன?
answer_ta: விவாதிக்கப்படும் முதன்மைச் சேவை பழுதுபார்ப்பவர்கள், உற்பத்தியாளர்கள் மற்றும் விற்பனையாளர்களுக்கான உரிமங்களை புதுப்பித்தல் ஆகும்.
question_si: මෙම ලේඛනයේ සාකච්ඡා කර ඇති ප්‍රධාන සේවාව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: සාකච්ඡා කර ඇති ප්‍රධාන සේවාව වන්නේ අලුත්වැඩියා කරන්නන්, නිෂ්පාදකයින් සහ විකුණුම්කරුවන් සඳහා බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීමයි.

context:
Service: The Unauthorized Developed Land Obtaining on Lease
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Assistance, Training & Development
Topic: අනවසර ඉඩම් බදු මත ලබා ගැනීම - ගැලීම් සටහන (පියවර 4-6) සහ සටහන්
---
පියවර 4: ප්‍රදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යලය මගින් ඉල්ලූම්කරු සම්මුබ පරීක්ෂණය සඳහා කැඳවනු

 ලැබේ.

පියවර 5: අදාළ ඉඩම නගරයක පිහිටා ඇති නම්, අදාළ ප්‍රදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යලය මගින්

පළාත් ඉඩම් කොමසාරිස් තුමාගේ අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ඉඩමී තක්සේරු වාර්තාව යවනු ලැබේ.

පියවර 6: ඉඩම් කොමසාරිස් අනුමැතිය ලැබුණු පසු ඉල්ලූම්කරුට ප්‍රදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලය

මගින් බලපත්‍රය ලබා ගත හැක.

සැ.යු. ඉඩම් කොමසාරිස් තුමාගේ අනුමැතිය නොලැබුණ හොත් අයදුම්කරුගේ ඉල්ලීම

ප්‍රතිකේ‍ෙෂ්ප වේ.

සටහන 1: බලපත්‍රය අවුරුදු පතා අලූත් කළ යුතුය. අවුරුදු පතා ගාස්තු ගෙවා බලපත්‍රය අලූත්

නොකළ හොත් එම බලපත්‍රය අවුරුද්ද අවසානයේ අවලංගු වේ. බදු ඔප්පු මුදල් ග්‍රාම නිලධාරීයාට ගෙවිය යුතුය.

සටහන 2: අදාළ ඉඩම ග්‍රාමීය ප්‍රදේශයක පිහිටා ඇත්නම් ඉඩමේ වටිනාකම සොයා නොබලනු

ඇත. ස්වර්ණ භූමි ජය භූමි ප්‍රදානය යටතේ එම ඉඩම ඔහුට පවරනු ඇත. පළාත් ඉඩම් කොමසාරිස් ඒ ඉඩම අනුමත කරන්නේ නම් අවුරුදු පතා ගෙවීම් අනවශ්යය.

සටහන 3: ස්වර්ණ භූමි ජය භූමි ඉඩම් පැවරීම තාවකාලිකව නතර කර අලූත් ක්‍රමයක් නැවත

ආරම්භ කරනු ඇත.
question_en: What is the final step to obtain the license for unauthorized developed land after the Land Commissioner's approval, and what happens if the approval is not received?
answer_en: After receiving the Land Commissioner's approval, the applicant can obtain the license from the Divisional Secretariat. If the Land Commissioner's approval is not received, the applicant's request will be rejected.
question_ta: காணி ஆணையாளரின் அனுமதி கிடைத்த பிறகு, அங்கீகரிக்கப்படாத அபிவிருத்தி செய்யப்பட்ட காணிக்கு உரிமம் பெறுவதற்கான இறுதிப் படிநிலை என்ன, மேலும் அனுமதி கிடைக்கவில்லை என்றால் என்ன நடக்கும்?
answer_ta: காணி ஆணையாளரின் அனுமதி கிடைத்த பிறகு, விண்ணப்பதாரர் பிரதேச செயலகத்திடம் இருந்து உரிமத்தைப் பெறலாம். காணி ஆணையாளரின் அனுமதி கிடைக்கவில்லை என்றால், விண்ணப்பதாரரின் கோரிக்கை நிராகரிக்கப்படும்.
question_si: ඉඩම් කොමසාරිස්වරයාගේ අනුමැතිය ලැබීමෙන් පසු අනවසරයෙන් සංවර්ධනය කරන ලද ඉඩම සඳහා බලපත්‍රය ලබා ගැනීමේ අවසාන පියවර කුමක්ද, සහ අනුමැතිය නොලැබුණහොත් කුමක් සිදුවේද?
answer_si: ඉඩම් කොමසාරිස්වරයාගේ අනුමැතිය ලැබුණු පසු, අයදුම්කරුට ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයෙන් බලපත්‍රය ලබා ගත හැක. ඉඩම් කොමසාරිස්වරයාගේ අනුමැතිය නොලැබුණහොත්, අයදුම්කරුගේ ඉල්ලීම ප්‍රතික්ෂේප වේ.

context:
Service: Tea Certification
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Standards
Topic: Product Certification Scheme for Tea (PCST) - Overview and Scope
---
Sri Lanka Standards Institution (SLSI) in association with the Sri Lanka Tea Board (SLTB) operates a Product Certification Scheme to certify the manufacturing process and the final product, i.e. Black Tea. The scheme is based on applicable standards (Sri Lanka Standard SLS 135:2009; Specifications for black tea and ISO 3720:1986; Black tea- Definition and basic requirement) and the connected Tea Board regulations. SLSI – SLTB: Product Certification Scheme for Tea (PCST) is designed to meet the specific needs of the tea plantation sector and to provide an internationally recognized third party guarantee to customers. SLSI - SLTB Product Certification for Tea (PCST) is therefore comprehensive and it includes the following:

- Applicable Tea Board Regulations & Sri Lanka Tea Board Standards/ Guidelines for Sri Lankan Origin Tea.
- Sri Lanka Standard SLS 135:2009; Specifications for black tea and ISO 3720:1986; Black tea- Definition
- Industry related code of Practices: (SLS 1315: 2007; Code of practice for Tea Industry - Part 1& Part 2)

This scheme is essentially voluntary in nature, and is largely based on ISO/ IEC Guide 65: 1996; General requirements for bodies operating product certification systems, which provides general rules for third party certification of determining with standards through initial testing and assessment of a factory Quality Management system and its acceptance followed by surveillance that takes into account the factory Quality Management System and the testing of sample from the factory and the open market. The scheme is centered around essential elements of the Quality Management System combined with additional requirements on process control and product testing as specified in the relevant standards along with applicable legal requirements. SLSI - SLTB Tea Product Certification Scheme operates in an impartial, non discriminatory and transparent manner to provide third party guarantee of quality Black Tea to the ultimate customer.
question_en: Who operates the Product Certification Scheme for Tea (PCST) and what does it primarily certify?
answer_en: The Product Certification Scheme for Tea (PCST) is operated by the Sri Lanka Standards Institution (SLSI) in association with the Sri Lanka Tea Board (SLTB). It primarily certifies the manufacturing process and the final product, i.e., Black Tea.
question_ta: தேயிலைக்கான உற்பத்திச் சான்றிதழ் திட்டத்தை (PCST) யார் இயக்குகிறார்கள் மற்றும் அது எதை முதன்மையாகச் சான்றளிக்கிறது?
answer_ta: தேயிலைக்கான உற்பத்திச் சான்றிதழ் திட்டம் (PCST) இலங்கைத் தர நிர்ணய நிறுவனத்தால் (SLSI) இலங்கை தேயிலை வாரியத்துடன் (SLTB) இணைந்து இயக்கப்படுகிறது. இது உற்பத்தி செயல்முறை மற்றும் இறுதி தயாரிப்பு, அதாவது கருப்பு தேயிலை ஆகியவற்றை முதன்மையாகச் சான்றளிக்கிறது.
question_si: තේ සඳහා නිෂ්පාදන සහතික කිරීමේ යෝජනා ක්‍රමය (PCST) ක්‍රියාත්මක කරන්නේ කවුද සහ එය ප්‍රධාන වශයෙන් සහතික කරන්නේ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: තේ සඳහා නිෂ්පාදන සහතික කිරීමේ යෝජනා ක්‍රමය (PCST) ශ්‍රී ලංකා ප්‍රමිති ආයතනය (SLSI) විසින් ශ්‍රී ලංකා තේ මණ්ඩලය (SLTB) සමඟ එක්ව ක්‍රියාත්මක කරනු ලබයි. එය ප්‍රධාන වශයෙන් නිෂ්පාදන ක්‍රියාවලිය සහ අවසාන නිෂ්පාදනය වන කළු තේ සහතික කරයි.

context:
Service: Consumer Education, Empowerment and Promoting the Establishment of Consumer Societies
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Trade Promotion
Topic: Consumer Education and Awareness Programmes (Part 2)
---
Eligibility : Any interested individual consumer /group of Consumers / Schools can make a request to the Authority. Submission Procedure Request should be made to the Director General of the Consumer Affairs Authority.

Application Forms: There is no predesigned [application form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/applicationCA&I.pdf) Applicants can forward their request by a letter. After the establishment of a Consumer Organization it has to be registered at the CAA.

Procedure : Step 1:Applicant forward a request to the Director General Consumer Affairs Authority Step 2:Consumer Affairs and Information Division designs the program. Step 3:Decide on venue, date & time of the program Step 4:Assign a team to conduct the Program Step 5:Feed back and monitoring Step 6:If the Consumers interested to form a Society, Setup a Consumer Organization
question_en: Who is eligible to request Consumer Education and Awareness Programmes from the Authority?
answer_en: Any interested individual consumer, group of Consumers, or Schools can make a request to the Authority.
question_ta: அதிகாரசபையிடம் நுகர்வோர் கல்வி மற்றும் விழிப்புணர்வு நிகழ்ச்சிகளைக் கோர யார் தகுதியானவர்கள்?
answer_ta: ஆர்வமுள்ள எந்தவொரு தனிப்பட்ட நுகர்வோர், நுகர்வோர் குழுக்கள் அல்லது பள்ளிகள் அதிகாரசபையிடம் ஒரு கோரிக்கையைச் செய்யலாம்.
question_si: අධිකාරියෙන් පාරිභෝගික අධ්‍යාපන හා දැනුවත් කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන් ඉල්ලා සිටීමට සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: උනන්දුවක් දක්වන ඕනෑම තනි පාරිභෝගිකයෙකුට, පාරිභෝගික කණ්ඩායමකට හෝ පාසල්වලට අධිකාරියට ඉල්ලීමක් කළ හැක.

question_ta: தொழிற்சாலைகள் பதிவு சேவைக்குத் தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?

answer_si: කර්මාන්තශාලා ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන අතර කර්මාන්තශාලා ආඥා පනතේ සඳහන් ලේඛන සහ කර්මාන්තශාලා/වැඩබිම් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ පෝරමය- C.F.I.E.-4 ඇතුළත් වේ.

question_ta: ஆடைத் துறையில் ஊக்கமளிக்கப்பட்ட முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்கான பிரிவு குழுத் தலைவர் யார், அவர்களின் முதன்மை தொடர்பு எண் என்ன?

answer_si: ඇඟලුම් කර්මාන්තයේ දිරිගන්වන ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා අංශ කණ්ඩායම් ප්‍රධානීවරයා වන්නේ එච්. සෙනෙවිරත්න මහතා වන අතර, ඔහුගේ ප්‍රාථමික සම්බන්ධතා අංකය +94-11-2434342 වේ.

context:
Service: Factory Registration
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Registrations - Establishments
Topic: Eligibility and Required Documents for Registering a New Tea Factory
---
Registering a new factory

- The place where the factory is located must be the applicant’s own possession and in order to prove that a document certified by the Divisional Secretary must be provided.
- The area shouldn’t have any risk of flood and it has to be proved by forwarding a document which was recommended by the Divisional Secretary through Grama Niladhari.
- There should not be any other tea factory within the area of 5 Km.
- The applicant should have a building and machinery plan approved by the Tea Research Institute.
- Sufficient clarification is needed regarding the way of providing green leaves according to the capacity and transporting them to the factory without any harm for the other factories.

Registering a bought factory

- Should present a deed registered in the Department of Land Registration that the bought tea factory is a possession of the applicant.
- In case, there is an arrears of payment for the green leaves suppliers, a document should be forwarded clarifying the way of solving that matter.
question_en: What are some key eligibility requirements for registering a new tea factory?
answer_en: To register a new tea factory, the factory location must be the applicant's own possession, there should be no risk of flood, and no other tea factory should exist within a 5 km radius. Additionally, the applicant needs a building and machinery plan approved by the Tea Research Institute.
question_ta: புதிய தேயிலை தொழிற்சாலையை பதிவு செய்வதற்கான சில முக்கிய தகுதித் தேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: புதிய தேயிலை தொழிற்சாலையைப் பதிவு செய்ய, தொழிற்சாலை அமைந்துள்ள இடம் விண்ணப்பதாரரின் சொந்த உடமையாக இருக்க வேண்டும், வெள்ள அபாயம் இருக்கக்கூடாது, மேலும் 5 கி.மீ சுற்றளவுக்குள் வேறு எந்த தேயிலை தொழிற்சாலையும் இருக்கக்கூடாது. அத்துடன், விண்ணப்பதாரருக்கு தேயிலை ஆராய்ச்சி நிறுவனத்தால் அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட கட்டிடம் மற்றும் இயந்திரத் திட்டம் தேவை.
question_si: නව තේ කර්මාන්ත ශාලාවක් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා වන ප්‍රධාන සුදුසුකම් අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: නව තේ කර්මාන්ත ශාලාවක් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා, කර්මාන්ත ශාලාව පිහිටා ඇති ස්ථානය අයදුම්කරුගේම සන්තකයේ තිබිය යුතු අතර, ගංවතුර අවදානමක් නොතිබිය යුතු අතර, කිලෝමීටර් 5ක් ඇතුළත වෙනත් තේ කර්මාන්ත ශාලාවක් නොතිබිය යුතුය. තවද, අයදුම්කරුට තේ පර්යේෂණ ආයතනය විසින් අනුමත කරන ලද ගොඩනැගිලි සහ යන්ත්‍රෝපකරණ සැලැස්මක් තිබිය යුතුය.

context:

question_ta: புகையிரத பருவகால பயணச்சீட்டுகளைப் பெறுவதற்கான கட்டணங்கள் குறித்த தகவல்களை எங்கு பெற்றுக்கொள்ளலாம்?
answer_ta: புகையிரத பருவகால பயணச்சீட்டுகளுக்கான கட்டணத் தகவல்களை குறிப்பிட்ட நிலையங்களில் பெற்றுக்கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: දුම්රිය වාර ප්‍රවේශපත්‍ර නිකුත් කිරීම සඳහා ගෙවිය යුතු ගාස්තු පිළිබඳ තොරතුරු ලබාගත හැක්කේ කොතැනින්ද?
answer_si: දුම්රිය වාර ප්‍රවේශපත්‍ර සඳහා වන ගෙවීම් තොරතුරු අදාළ දුම්රිය ස්ථානවලින් ලබාගත හැක.

question_ta: சப்ளையர்களைப் பதிவு செய்வதற்கான கட்டணம் என்ன?

answer_si: සැපයුම්කරුවන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා ගාස්තුව රු. 500.00/= කි, මෙය අයදුම්පත් ගාස්තුව පමණි.

context:
Service: Obtain Conductors License
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Transport Services
Topic: බස් කොන්දොස්තර බලපත්‍රය - සටහන, සුදුසුකම් සහ සේවා ගාස්තු
---
තවද සටහනක් මෙසේ දැක්වේ. අයදුම්කරු අවශ්‍ය උපකාරක ලිපි සැපයුවේ නැති නම් අදාල ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යලය විසින් දැනුම් දෙනු ලැබේ. අවශ්‍ය ලිපි ලේබණ සම්පූර්ණ කර භාර දීමෙන් අනතුරුව බලපත්‍රය නිකුත් කරනු ලැබේ. සුදුසුකම් යටතේ, ඉල්ලූම්කරු අවුරුදු 18 වැඩි විය යුතුය. ඉල්ලූම්කරු 8 ශ්‍රේණිය සිංහල /දෙමළ / ඉංග්‍රීසි භාෂාවකින් සමත් විය යුතුයි. සෞබ්‍ය සම්පන්න සදාචාර සම්පන්න කෙනෙකු වීමද අත්‍යාවශ්‍ය වේ. සේවය සඳහා ගෙවීම් ලෙස කොන්දොස්තර බලපත්‍රය හෝ ටිකට් පරීක්ෂක බල පත්‍රය සඳහා රුපියල් 100 ක් ගෙවිය යුතුය.
question_en: What are the eligibility requirements to obtain a conductor's license?
answer_en: To obtain a conductor's license, an applicant must be over 18 years old, have passed Grade 8 in Sinhala, Tamil, or English, and be a healthy and morally sound person.
question_ta: நடத்துனர் உரிமம் பெறுவதற்கான தகுதிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: நடத்துனர் உரிமம் பெற, விண்ணப்பதாரர் 18 வயதுக்கு மேற்பட்டவராக இருக்க வேண்டும், சிங்களம், தமிழ் அல்லது ஆங்கிலத்தில் 8 ஆம் வகுப்பு தேர்ச்சி பெற்றிருக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் ஆரோக்கியமான மற்றும் ஒழுக்கமான நபராக இருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: කොන්දොස්තර බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අවශ්‍ය සුදුසුකම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: කොන්දොස්තර බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අයදුම්කරු අවුරුදු 18 වැඩි විය යුතුය. අයදුම්කරු 8 ශ්‍රේණිය සිංහල, දෙමළ හෝ ඉංග්‍රීසි භාෂාවකින් සමත් විය යුතු අතර සෞඛ්‍ය සම්පන්න සහ සදාචාර සම්පන්න පුද්ගලයෙකු විය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Implementation of Technical Education Development Programmes - Specialized for North East Provinces
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Assistance, Training & Development

---
These programes will be implemented from the year 2006, allied to proposals for Technical Education Development, which mentioned in “Mahinda Chinthana Programme”.
question_en: When were the Technical Education Development Programmes, specialized for North East Provinces, scheduled to be implemented and what national program are they allied with?
answer_en: These programmes were scheduled to be implemented from the year 2006 and are allied to proposals for Technical Education Development mentioned in the “Mahinda Chinthana Programme”.
question_ta: வடகிழக்கு மாகாணங்களுக்கான சிறப்பு தொழில்நுட்ப கல்வி மேம்பாட்டு திட்டங்கள் எந்த ஆண்டில் இருந்து செயல்படுத்தப்பட உள்ளன, மேலும் அவை எந்த தேசிய திட்டத்துடன் இணைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளன?
answer_ta: இந்த திட்டங்கள் 2006 ஆம் ஆண்டு முதல் செயல்படுத்தப்பட உள்ளன, மேலும் அவை 'மஹிந்த சிந்தன திட்டத்தில்' குறிப்பிடப்பட்டுள்ள தொழில்நுட்ப கல்வி மேம்பாட்டு முன்மொழிவுகளுடன் இணைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளன.
question_si: උතුරු නැගෙනහිර පළාත් සඳහා වූ තාක්ෂණික අධ්‍යාපන සංවර්ධන වැඩසටහන් ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීමට නියමිතව ඇත්තේ කුමන වර්ෂයේ සිටද සහ ඒවා කුමන ජාතික වැඩසටහනකට අනුබද්ධිතද?
answer_si: මෙම වැඩසටහන් 2006 වර්ෂයේ සිට ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීමට නියමිත අතර, ඒවා 'මහින්ද චින්තන වැඩසටහනේ' සඳහන් තාක්ෂණික අධ්‍යාපන සංවර්ධනය සඳහා වූ යෝජනා හා අනුබද්ධිත වේ.

context:
Service: Verifications of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Regulation of Trade
Topic: Initial Stamping Procedure
---
Step-by-Step Procedure

Step 1 : The individual or organization sends a request letter to Department addressed to the Director requesting the stamping of their instrument Note: If an individual or organization buys a new measuring instrument, they should be checked to see whether they are stamped. Otherwise it must be stamped by the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department Step 2: The Department will inform the requester via mail or phone the time, date and location where the Inspectors will test the quality of the measuring equipment Step 3: The applicant arrives at the specified venue with the measuring instrument Step 4: The Inspector examines and verifies the instrument Step 5: If the instrument meets the requirements, the Department stamps the instrument and a certificate is issued to the party concerned. Note: During stamping if an inspector finds a particular instrument does not meet the requirements, the retailer/manufacturer is directed to a Technical Officer to make required adjustments to the instrument. If minor amendments need to be made, the Retailer/Manufacture can get it fixed and get it inspected again at that time. If it’s a major amendment it cannot be fixed on the spot. The Retailer/Manufacture will have to get it fixed by an authorized person / agency.

Time line

Process Time Line : Applicant can get this service within 2 days. Submission Time Line Submit request letter Working days – Monday to Friday Counter open hours – 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays Validity Time Line : Not applicable.
question_en: What is the primary purpose of the "Initial Stamping Procedure" service?
answer_en: The primary purpose of the "Initial Stamping Procedure" service is the verification and stamping of weights, measures, and weighing or measuring instruments to ensure they meet required standards.
question_ta: "ஆரம்ப முத்திரையிடும் நடைமுறை" சேவையின் முதன்மை நோக்கம் என்ன?
answer_ta: "ஆரம்ப முத்திரையிடும் நடைமுறை" சேவையின் முதன்மை நோக்கம், எடை, அளவீடுகள் மற்றும் எடை அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகள் தேவையான தரநிலைகளை பூர்த்தி செய்கின்றன என்பதை உறுதிப்படுத்த அவற்றை சரிபார்த்து முத்திரையிடுவதாகும்.
question_si: "ආරම්භක මුද්‍රා තැබීමේ ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය" සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: "ආරම්භක මුද්‍රා තැබීමේ ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය" සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන අරමුණ වන්නේ බර, මිනුම් සහ කිරුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ අවශ්‍ය ප්‍රමිතීන්ට අනුකූලදැයි තහවුරු කර ඒවා මුද්‍රා තැබීමයි.

context:
Service: Product Certification Scheme (SLS Marks scheme)
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Standards
Topic: SLS Marks Scheme - Overseas: Grant of License and Surveillance Audit (Part 1)
---
3 . Grant Of License 3.1The sample (s) shall be drawn by SLSI or the National Standards Body in the exporting country or any other accredited inspection agency appointed by SLSI to monitor conformance of the product to the relevant Sri Lanka Standard. The cost of testing of the sample (s) will be borne by the applicant.. The product may be tested in Sri Lanka or in the applicant’s country and the discretion to choose the laboratory will rest with SLSI. 3.2If two consecutive samples comply with the requirements of the relevant Sri Lanka Standard and the company has a Quality Management System in compliance with ISO 9001/2000, the permit to use the SLS Certification Mark will be granted to the manufacturer. 3.3The permit shall be valid for a period of three years.

4. Surveillance Audit 4.1 The sample (s) shall be drawn by SLSI or the National Standards Body in the exporting country or any other accredited inspection agency appointed by SLSI to monitor conformance of the product to the relevant Sri Lanka Standard.
question_en: For how long is the permit to use the SLS Certification Mark valid?
answer_en: The permit to use the SLS Certification Mark is valid for a period of three years.
question_ta: SLS சான்றிதழ் குறியீட்டைப் பயன்படுத்தும் அனுமதி எவ்வளவு காலம் செல்லுபடியாகும்?
answer_ta: SLS சான்றிதழ் குறியீட்டைப் பயன்படுத்தும் அனுமதி மூன்று வருட காலத்திற்கு செல்லுபடியாகும்.
question_si: SLS සහතික කිරීමේ ලකුණ භාවිතා කිරීමට අවසරය කොපමණ කාලයක් සඳහා වලංගුද?
answer_si: SLS සහතික කිරීමේ ලකුණ භාවිතා කිරීමට අවසරය වසර තුනක කාලයක් සඳහා වලංගු වේ.

context:
Service: Control/Eliminate Restrictive Trade Agreements Among Traders
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Standards
Topic: Appeals, Time Line, and Costs
---
The trader / manufacturer can appeal against the Authority’s decision in the Court of Appeal, if the trader/manufacturer is unsatisfied with the outcome.

Time Line Process Time Line : The Council will take two months time for investigate and give their recommendations. The Authority will take one month time for execute those recommendations.

Submission Time Line: Working days - Monday to Friday Counter open hours - 8:15 to 4:15 hrs Holidays - Public & Mercantile Holidays

Cost Related to the Services Cost: Cost is borne by the Authority Fee: There is no fee involved in this service Penalty: No fines involved in providing the service Surcharges: No additional costs involved in the service
question_en: What are the costs and fees involved for a trader when utilizing the service to control or eliminate restrictive trade agreements?
answer_en: There is no fee involved for the trader, as the cost for this service is borne by the Authority. Additionally, there are no fines or surcharges associated with providing this service.
question_ta: கட்டுப்பாடான வர்த்தக ஒப்பந்தங்களை கட்டுப்படுத்த அல்லது நீக்க ஒரு வர்த்தகர் இச்சேவையைப் பயன்படுத்தும் போது உள்ள செலவுகள் மற்றும் கட்டணங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: வர்த்தகருக்கு எந்த கட்டணமும் இல்லை, ஏனெனில் இச்சேவையின் செலவு அதிகாரசபையால் ஏற்கப்படும். மேலும், இச்சேவையுடன் தொடர்புடைய அபராதங்களோ அல்லது கூடுதல் கட்டணங்களோ இல்லை.
question_si: වෙළෙඳ ගිවිසුම් පාලනය කිරීමට හෝ ඉවත් කිරීමට වෙළෙන්දෙකු මෙම සේවාව භාවිතා කරන විට අදාළ වන වියදම් සහ ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: වෙළෙන්දාට කිසිදු ගාස්තුවක් අදාළ නොවේ, මන්ද මෙම සේවාවේ පිරිවැය අධිකාරිය විසින් දරනු ලබන බැවිනි. තවද, මෙම සේවාව සැපයීම සඳහා දඩ හෝ අමතර ගාස්තු නොමැත.

question_ta: திருத்தப்பட்ட தகவலுடன் புதிய ஓட்டுநர் உரிமம் பெறுவதற்கான உரிமப் பிரிவின் மேலதிக ஆணையாளர் யார், அவர்களின் தொடர்பு எண்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: உரிமப் பிரிவின் மேலதிக ஆணையாளர் திரு. கண்ணங்கரா ஆவார், மற்றும் அவர்களின் தொடர்பு எண்கள் +94-11-2556856 மற்றும் +94-11-2516404 ஆகும்.
question_si: සංශෝධිත තොරතුරු සහිත නව රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා බලපත්‍රකරණ අංශයේ අතිරේක කොමසාරිස්වරයා කවුද සහ ඔවුන්ගේ සම්බන්ධතා අංක මොනවාද?
answer_si: බලපත්‍රකරණ අංශයේ අතිරේක කොමසාරිස්වරයා වන්නේ කන්නංගර මහතා වන අතර, ඔවුන්ගේ සම්බන්ධතා අංක +94-11-2556856 සහ +94-11-2516404 වේ.

context:
Service: Tea Certification
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Standards
Topic: Corrective Action, Changes to Rules, Publicity, Appeals and Obligations
---
14.0 CORRECTIVE ACTION A certified company shall be responsible for taking prompt and adequate action to correct any contravention of the system rules, and for normally notifying the certifying authority of the corrective actions proposed or taken. 14.0 CHANGES TO THE CERTIFICATION SYSTEM RULES In the event of any changes being required to the Tea Product Certification rules, the SLTPCC shall: a) Provide opportunity for the affected companies to submit comments on the proposed changes. b) Effective dates for the changes shall be fixed by mutual agreement to allow sufficient time for the company to amend their Tea Product Certification System.

PUBLICITY 16.1 SLSI and SLTB shall publish a directory of certified companies under this certificate scheme. 16.2 A certified company is entitled to:

-  Inform prospective customers, purchasers or purchasing authorities of the full and exact details of the certification.
-  Display the certification document.
-  Use of the Tea Product Certification Mark as specifically authorized.

APPEALS 17.1 If the certificate holder is not satisfied with the decision taken on PCST, the certification holder is eligible to appeal, in writing to the Chairman, SLTPCC, Governing Board for the PCST within 14 days of receipt of such decision. 17.2 The decision of the SLTPCC for the PCST on any such appeal shall be final and conclusive. 18.0 OBLIGATIONS The certificate holder shall
question_en: What is the process for a certificate holder to appeal a decision taken on the Tea Product Certification Scheme (PCST)?
answer_en: If a certificate holder is not satisfied with a decision taken on PCST, they are eligible to appeal, in writing, to the Chairman, SLTPCC, Governing Board for the PCST within 14 days of receipt of such decision. The decision of the SLTPCC on any such appeal shall be final and conclusive.
question_ta: தேயிலை உற்பத்தி சான்றிதழ் திட்டத்தின் (PCST) முடிவை எதிர்த்து சான்றிதழ் பெற்றவர் மேல்முறையீடு செய்வதற்கான செயல்முறை என்ன?
answer_ta: PCST மீதான முடிவில் சான்றிதழ் பெற்றவர் திருப்தி அடையவில்லை என்றால், அந்த முடிவைப் பெற்ற 14 நாட்களுக்குள் PCST க்கான நிர்வாகக் குழுவின் தலைவர், SLTPCC இடம் எழுத்துப்பூர்வமாக மேல்முறையீடு செய்யலாம். அத்தகைய மேல்முறையீட்டின் மீதான SLTPCC இன் முடிவு இறுதியானது மற்றும் திட்டவட்டமானது.
question_si: තේ නිෂ්පාදන සහතික කිරීමේ යෝජනා ක්‍රමය (PCST) සම්බන්ධයෙන් ගනු ලබන තීරණයකට එරෙහිව සහතික හිමියෙකුට අභියාචනයක් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: සහතික හිමියා PCST පිළිබඳ තීරණයකින් සෑහීමකට පත් නොවන්නේ නම්, එම තීරණය ලැබී දින 14ක් ඇතුළත, PCST සඳහා වූ SLTPCC පාලක මණ්ඩලයේ සභාපති වෙත ලිඛිතව අභියාචනයක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකිය. එවැනි අභියාචනයක් පිළිබඳ SLTPCC හි තීරණය අවසානාත්මක සහ නිශ්චිත වේ.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Information
Topic: Required Documents and Staff Officers In-Charge
---
Required Documents

Provision of advice: No specific documents are required for obtaining advisory services, apart from identification documents. The visitors to the Board of Investment for advisory services, exchange their Business Cards with BOI officers.

When submitting Applications: 1. Perfected application form. 2. Project report (based on the nature of the project). 3. Statements from the Bankers to prove the financial status of the investors. 4. The particulars of the land or site intended for the project (or factory).

question_en: What documents are required when submitting applications for incentivised investment projects?
answer_en: When submitting applications, the required documents are: a perfected application form, a project report (based on the nature of the project), statements from bankers to prove the financial status of the investors, and particulars of the land or site intended for the project.
question_ta: ஊக்குவிக்கப்பட்ட முதலீட்டு திட்டங்களுக்கான விண்ணப்பங்களை சமர்ப்பிக்கும்போது என்னென்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவைப்படுகின்றன?
answer_ta: விண்ணப்பங்களை சமர்ப்பிக்கும்போது, பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட விண்ணப்பப் படிவம், திட்ட அறிக்கை (திட்டத்தின் தன்மைக்கு ஏற்ப), முதலீட்டாளர்களின் நிதி நிலையை நிரூபிக்க வங்கி அறிக்கைகள், மற்றும் திட்டத்திற்காக உத்தேசிக்கப்பட்ட நிலம் அல்லது இடத்தின் விவரங்கள் ஆகியவை தேவைப்படுகின்றன.
question_si: ප්‍රතිලාභී ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා අයදුම්පත් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේදී අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: අයදුම්පත් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේදී, සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අයදුම් පත්‍රයක්, ව්‍යාපෘති වාර්තාවක් (ව්‍යාපෘතියේ ස්වභාවය අනුව), ආයෝජකයන්ගේ මූල්‍ය තත්ත්වය සනාථ කිරීම සඳහා බැංකුකරුවන්ගේ ප්‍රකාශන සහ ව්‍යාපෘතිය සඳහා අදහස් කරන ඉඩමේ හෝ ස්ථානයේ විස්තර අවශ්‍ය වේ.

context:

Topic: කාලසීමාව - කර්මාන්තපුරයකට සහ ගැලීම් සටහන - සාමාන්‍ය පුරවැසියන්
---
• කර්මාන්තපුරයකට

ක්‍රියාවලිය සඳහා කාලසීමාව

මාස තුන ඇතුළත

ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමේ කාලසීමාව

අදාළ නොවේ

සටහන: කර්මාන්ත, සංචාරක සහ ආයෝජන ප්‍රවර්ධන අමාත්‍යාංශය මගින් භාර ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය කරගෙන යනු ලැබේ.

වලංගු කාලසීමාව

අවුරුදු පතා බලපත්‍රය අලූත් කිරීම

ඉඩමේ වටිනාකම අවුරුදු 5 කට වරක් ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමී කාර්ය්‍යලය අලූත් කරනු ලැබේ

වැඩ කරන කාලය හා දින

ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්‍යලයේ රජයේ ඉඩම් කටයුතු අංශය

පෙ.ව. 9.00 _ 4.30 දක්වා

ගැලීම් සටහන

• සාමාන්‍ය පුරවැසියන්

පියවරෙන් පියවර ක්‍රියා මාර්ගය (රජයේ ඉඩම් බදු මත ලබා දීම - සාමාන්‍ය පුරවැසියන් )

පියවර 1: සංවර්ධනය කරන ලද ඉඩම පිළිබඳ සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද විස්තර ඇති ලිපියක්

පිළියෙල කර ගැනීම

පියවර 2: ග්‍රාම නිලධාරියාගේ වාර්තාවක් ඉල්ලූම්කරු ලබා ගැනීම

සටහන: ඉල්ලූම්කරු විසින් සපයන ලද තොරතුරු නිවැරදිදැයි සොයා බැලීමට ග්‍රාම

නිලධාරී ක්‍රියා මාර්ග ගනී.
question_en: What is the processing time for obtaining government lands on lease for an industrial zone?
answer_en: The processing time for obtaining government lands on lease for an industrial zone is within three months.
question_ta: ஒரு தொழில்துறை மண்டலத்திற்கு அரசாங்க நிலங்களை குத்தகைக்கு பெறுவதற்கான செயலாக்க நேரம் என்ன?
answer_ta: ஒரு தொழில்துறை மண்டலத்திற்கு அரசாங்க நிலங்களை குத்தகைக்கு பெறுவதற்கான செயலாக்க நேரம் மூன்று மாதங்களுக்குள் இருக்கும்.
question_si: කර්මාන්තපුරයකට රජයේ ඉඩම් බදු පදනම මත ලබා ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය සඳහා කාලසීමාව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: කර්මාන්තපුරයකට රජයේ ඉඩම් බදු පදනම මත ලබා ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය සඳහා කාලසීමාව මාස තුනක් ඇතුළත වේ.

question_en: Which organization is responsible for providing NDT Inspection Services, as introduced in this context?
answer_en: The National Centre for Non Destructive Testing (NCNDT), operating under the Sri Lanka Atomic Energy Board, is responsible for providing NDT Inspection Services.
question_ta: இந்தச் சூழலில் குறிப்பிடப்பட்டுள்ளபடி, NDT ஆய்வுச் சேவைகளை வழங்குவதற்குப் பொறுப்பான அமைப்பு எது?
answer_ta: இலங்கை அணுசக்தி சபையின் கீழ் இயங்கும் அழிவற்ற பரிசோதனைக்கான தேசிய மையம் (NCNDT) NDT ஆய்வுச் சேவைகளை வழங்குவதற்குப் பொறுப்பாகும்.
question_si: මෙම සන්දර්භයෙහි හඳුන්වා දී ඇති පරිදි, NDT පරීක්ෂණ සේවා සැපයීම සඳහා වගකිව යුතු ආයතනය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකා පරමාණුක බලශක්ති මණ්ඩලය යටතේ ක්‍රියාත්මක වන ජාතික විනාශකාරී නොවන පරීක්ෂණ මධ්‍යස්ථානය (NCNDT) NDT පරීක්ෂණ සේවා සැපයීම සඳහා වගකිව යුතුයි.

question_en: What types of products are eligible for the On-Line Trading service, and who can utilize this service?
answer_en: The On-Line Trading service accepts any export product except perishables and valuables, and it is available for Sri Lankan exporters.
question_ta: ஆன்லைன் வர்த்தக சேவைக்கு எந்த வகையான பொருட்கள் தகுதியுடையவை, மற்றும் இந்த சேவையை யார் பயன்படுத்த முடியும்?
answer_ta: ஆன்லைன் வர்த்தக சேவை அழிந்துபோகும் பொருட்கள் மற்றும் மதிப்புமிக்க பொருட்களைத் தவிர வேறு எந்த ஏற்றுமதிப் பொருளையும் ஏற்றுக்கொள்கிறது, மேலும் இது இலங்கை ஏற்றுமதியாளர்களுக்காகக் கிடைக்கிறது.
question_si: මාර්ගගත වෙළඳ සේවාව සඳහා සුදුසු නිෂ්පාදන වර්ග මොනවාද, සහ මෙම සේවාව භාවිතා කළ හැක්කේ කාටද?
answer_si: මාර්ගගත වෙළඳ සේවාව සඳහා ඉක්මනින් නරක් වන භාණ්ඩ සහ වටිනා භාණ්ඩ හැර ඕනෑම අපනයන නිෂ්පාදනයක් සුදුසු වන අතර, එය ශ්‍රී ලංකා අපනයනකරුවන් සඳහා ලබා ගත හැකිය.

question_ta: முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களை அமைக்க அனுமதி வழங்கும் சேவையின் முக்கிய வகை என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவையின் முக்கிய வகை வர்த்தகம், வணிகம் மற்றும் தொழில் ஆகும்.
question_si: ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති පිහිටුවීමට අනුමැතිය ලබාදීමේ සේවාවට අදාළ ප්‍රධාන කාණ්ඩය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාවට අදාළ ප්‍රධාන කාණ්ඩය වන්නේ වෙළඳාම, ව්‍යාපාර සහ කර්මාන්ත යි.

question_ta: இணைய வர்த்தக ஆதரவிற்காக உதவி இயக்குநர் திரு. சண்டிமா கிரேரோவின் தொடர்பு விவரங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: இணைய வர்த்தக ஆதரவிற்காக, உதவி இயக்குநர் திரு. சண்டிமா கிரேரோவை 0112305209 என்ற தொலைபேசி எண்ணிலும், 2305211 அல்லது 2300715 என்ற தொலைநகல் எண்ணிலும், cgrero@edb.gov.lk என்ற மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரியிலும் தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: ඔන්ලයින් වෙළඳාම් සහාය සඳහා සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂ චන්දිම ග්‍රේරෝ මහතාගේ සම්බන්ධතා තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: ඔන්ලයින් වෙළඳාම් සහාය සඳහා, සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂ චන්දිම ග්‍රේරෝ මහතා 0112305209 දුරකථනයෙන්, 2305211 හෝ 2300715 ෆැක්ස් මගින් සහ cgrero@edb.gov.lk විද්‍යුත් තැපෑලෙන් සම්බන්ධ කර ගත හැක.
