answer_en: There are no application fees for this service. The service charge is Rs. 650.00, which is subject to change. The estimated time taken to provide the service is approximately 35 minutes.
question_ta: 'உள்நாட்டு சந்தையில் தேவையற்ற பொருட்களை விற்பனை செய்வதற்கான அனுமதி வழங்குதல்' சேவைக்கான விண்ணப்ப கட்டணங்கள், சேவை கட்டணங்கள் மற்றும் சேவை வழங்க எடுக்கும் மதிப்பிடப்பட்ட நேரம் என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவைக்கு விண்ணப்ப கட்டணம் எதுவும் இல்லை. சேவை கட்டணம் ரூ. 650.00 ஆகும், இது மாற்றத்திற்கு உட்பட்டது. சேவை வழங்குவதற்கான மதிப்பிடப்பட்ட நேரம் சுமார் 35 நிமிடங்கள் ஆகும்.
question_si: 'දේශීය වෙළඳපොලේ අනවශ්‍ය භාණ්ඩ විකිණීම සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා දීම' සේවාව සඳහා අයදුම්පත් ගාස්තු, සේවා ගාස්තු සහ සේවාව ලබා දීමට ගතවන ආසන්න කාලය කොපමණද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා අයදුම්පත් ගාස්තු නොමැත. සේවා ගාස්තුව රු. 650.00 ක් වන අතර එය වෙනස් විය හැක. සේවාව සැපයීමට ගතවන ආසන්න කාලය මිනිත්තු 35 කි.

context:
Service: Tea Exporter Registration
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Registrations - Industrial
Topic: Eligibility and Required Documents for Tea Warehouses, Packers and Importers (Part 2)
---
- Appropriate drainage system in order to maintain hygienic standard and to maintain the moisture level for storing of tea.  - Storing capacity at 720 Kgs per square feet.  - A clean environment with required road access.  - Toilets away from the warehouse.  - A scale with weighing capacity of 50 Kgs or more.  - A minimum floor area of 1 square meters for 16 tea chests (Tea boxes) together with adequate room for handling tea  chests for export or local sales.

Registration of Tea Packers - Applicant should hold valid business registration certificates issued by the registrar of companies or provincial registrar of business names. If the packing of tea for local market is done using a transparent material like polythene, then it is not required to register as a tea packer at the Sri Lanka Tea Board. Else the registration is necessary.

Registration of Tea Importers - Applicant should be a registered tea exporter at the Sri Lanka Tea Board before taking the registration the tea importer. Applicant should have pre records to prove that he has worked as a tea exporter.
question_en: Under what specific condition is a tea packer not required to register with the Sri Lanka Tea Board?
answer_en: A tea packer is not required to register with the Sri Lanka Tea Board if they are packing tea for the local market using a transparent material like polythene.
question_ta: எந்த குறிப்பிட்ட நிபந்தனையின் கீழ் ஒரு தேயிலை பொதியிடுபவர் இலங்கை தேயிலை வாரியத்தில் பதிவு செய்ய வேண்டிய அவசியம் இல்லை?
answer_ta: உள்ளூர் சந்தைக்கான தேயிலையை பொலித்தீன் போன்ற வெளிப்படையான பொருளைப் பயன்படுத்தி பொதியுறும்போது, ஒரு தேயிலை பொதியிடுபவர் இலங்கை தேயிலை வாரியத்தில் பதிவு செய்ய வேண்டிய அவசியமில்லை.
question_si: තේ ඇසුරුම්කරුවෙකුට ශ්‍රී ලංකා තේ මණ්ඩලයේ ලියාපදිංචි වීමට අවශ්‍ය නොවන විශේෂිත කොන්දේසිය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: දේශීය වෙළඳපොළ සඳහා තේ ඇසුරුම් කිරීම පොලිතින් වැනි විනිවිද පෙනෙන ද්‍රව්‍යයක් භාවිතයෙන් සිදු කරන්නේ නම්, තේ ඇසුරුම්කරුවෙකුට ශ්‍රී ලංකා තේ මණ්ඩලයේ ලියාපදිංචි වීමට අවශ්‍ය නොවේ.

context:
Service: Importation of Used Motor Cycles and Cars for Re-export After Repairing - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Timeline, Costs, and Penalties
---
Time Line

Process Time Line : One to Two days

Submission Time Line Obtain [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/DepImportExportForm2.pdf)

Counter | – Unit 02
--- | ---
Time | – 9:00 am to 4:45 pm
Working Days | – Monday to Friday
Holidays | – Public and Mercantile Holidays

Making Payments

Counter | – Cashier
--- | ---
Time | – 9:00 am to 3:00 pm
Working Days | – Monday to Friday
Holidays | – Public and Mercantile Holidays

Submission of [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/DepImportExportForm2.pdf) , Request Letter and Support Documents

Counter | – Unit 01
--- | ---
Time | – 9:00 am to 4:45 pm
Working Days | – Monday to Friday
Holidays | – Public and Mercantile Holidays

Validity Time Line : The validity period for this service is 03 months.

Costs Related to the Service

Cost : No cost involved in obtaining [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/DepImportExportForm2.pdf) s

Fee: Fee would be 0.1 % of the CIF value

Penalties

- If the real value of the exported items exceeds the value stated in the invoice the difference should be settled then and there.
- If imports have been made without licenses, a fee amounting to 5%-10% of the CIF value will be charged from the applicant. The value will be decided by the Controller.

Surcharge : Not Applicable
question_en: What are the associated fees and potential penalties for the service of importing used motor cycles and cars for re-export after repairing?
answer_en: The fee for this service is 0.1% of the CIF value. Penalties include settling the difference if the real value of exported items exceeds the value stated in the invoice, and a charge of 5%-10% of the CIF value if imports are made without licenses.
question_ta: பழுதுபார்ப்புக்குப் பிறகு மீண்டும் ஏற்றுமதி செய்வதற்காகப் பயன்படுத்தப்பட்ட மோட்டார் சைக்கிள்கள் மற்றும் கார்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான சேவையுடன் தொடர்புடைய கட்டணங்கள் மற்றும் சாத்தியமான அபராதங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவைக்கான கட்டணம் CIF மதிப்பில் 0.1% ஆகும். ஏற்றுமதி செய்யப்பட்ட பொருட்களின் உண்மையான மதிப்பு ரசீது மதிப்பை விட அதிகமாக இருந்தால் வேறுபாட்டைச் செலுத்துவது, மற்றும் உரிமங்கள் இல்லாமல் இறக்குமதி செய்யப்பட்டால் CIF மதிப்பில் 5%-10% கட்டணம் வசூலிப்பது ஆகியவை அபராதங்களில் அடங்கும்.
question_si: අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීමෙන් පසු නැවත අපනයනය සඳහා භාවිතා කරන ලද යතුරුපැදි සහ මෝටර් රථ ආනයනය කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා අදාළ ගාස්තු සහ විය හැකි දඬුවම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා ගාස්තුව CIF අගයෙන් 0.1% කි. අපනයනය කරන ලද භාණ්ඩවල සැබෑ වටිනාකම ඉන්වොයිසියේ සඳහන් වටිනාකම ඉක්මවා ගියහොත් වෙනස පියවීම සහ බලපත්‍ර නොමැතිව ආනයන සිදු කර ඇත්නම් CIF අගයෙන් 5%-10% ක ගාස්තුවක් අය කිරීම දඬුවම්වලට ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Importation of Chemicals (Chemicals, Animal Products and Herbal Products Import License) - Unit 3
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: License Application: Eligibility and Required Documents
---
Eligibility
Applicant should have the [Business Registration Certificate](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=482&task=info&back=0&pid=428)
Applicant should have the approval from the relevant authority

Support Documents Required

- Four copies of the Proforma Invoices
- [Business Registration Certificate](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=482&task=info&back=0&pid=428)
- 4 copies of the indent form
- Approval letter from relevant authority

Type of import | Relevant Authority
--- | ---
Insecticides and pesticides substances | Pesticide Control Registrar's Office
Animals and animal products and live animals | Dept. of Animal Production and Health
Crude Oils, gas and petroleum products | Petroleum Ministry
Corn, and other green products | Department of Agriculture
Non-pesticides chemicals | Ministry of Industries /State Trading Corporation
Radio active substance | Nuclear Energy Authority
Spirits (Alchol) | Excise Department

Submission Procedure
Obtain Application Forms Counter – Unit 03

Making Payments
Counter – Cashier

Submission of Application Form
Request Letter and Support Documents Counter – Unit 03
question_en: What documents are required to apply for an import license for chemicals, animal products, and herbal products?
answer_en: The required documents include four copies of Proforma Invoices, a Business Registration Certificate, four copies of the indent form, and an approval letter from the relevant authority.
question_ta: இரசாயனங்கள், விலங்கு பொருட்கள் மற்றும் மூலிகை பொருட்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான உரிமத்திற்கு விண்ணப்பிக்க தேவையான ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தேவையான ஆவணங்களில் புரோஃபார்மா விலைப்பட்டியல்களின் நான்கு நகல்கள், ஒரு வணிக பதிவுச் சான்றிதழ், இன்டென்ட் படிவத்தின் நான்கு நகல்கள் மற்றும் சம்பந்தப்பட்ட அதிகாரியிடமிருந்து ஒப்புதல் கடிதம் ஆகியவை அடங்கும்.
question_si: රසායනික ද්‍රව්‍ය, සත්ව නිෂ්පාදන සහ ඖෂධ පැළෑටි ආනයනය කිරීම සඳහා බලපත්‍රයක් සඳහා ඉල්ලුම් කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන අතරට ප්‍රොෆෝමා ඉන්වොයිසි හතරක්, ව්‍යාපාර ලියාපදිංචි සහතිකයක්, ඉන්ඩෙන්ට් පෝරමයේ පිටපත් හතරක් සහ අදාළ අධිකාරියෙන් අනුමැති පත්‍රයක් ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Amended Licenses Import of Chemicals Unit 3/4
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: License Amendments: Costs, Fees, and Penalties
---
Costs Related to the Service

Cost : There is no fee for the application forms

Fee: Rs.50.00 for amendments

Note: If the amendments exceed invoice value 0.1% of the CIF value in excess.

Penalties: No penalties involved in this service

Surcharge: If the applicant has violated the licensing conditions, he/she will be charged a fine. The Controller of Imports and Exports approves the fine.
question_en: What is the fee for making amendments to the 'Amended Licenses Import of Chemicals Unit 3/4' service?
answer_en: The fee for amendments is Rs. 50.00.
question_ta: 'இரசாயன இறக்குமதி அலகு 3/4க்கான திருத்தப்பட்ட உரிமங்கள்' சேவையில் திருத்தங்களை மேற்கொள்வதற்கான கட்டணம் என்ன?
answer_ta: திருத்தங்களுக்கான கட்டணம் ரூ. 50.00 ஆகும்.
question_si: 'රසායනික ද්‍රව්‍ය ආනයනය සඳහා සංශෝධිත බලපත්‍ර ඒකකය 3/4' සේවාවෙහි සංශෝධන සිදුකිරීම සඳහා ගාස්තුව කීයද?
answer_si: සංශෝධන සඳහා ගාස්තුව රු. 50.00 කි.

context:
Service: Renewal of Vehicle License Through Divisional Secretariat
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: වාහන බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීම - අයදුම් කිරීමේ උපදෙස් සහ අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි
---
වාහන අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීමේ වාහන බලපත්‍ර අයදුම් පත්රය නව වාහන බල පත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අවශ්‍ය වන අමතර ලියකියවිලි මෙන්න: වාහනයේ ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සහතිකය හෝ වාහනයේ හැඳුනුම්පත, සහ වාහනයේ රක්ෂණ සහතිකය. අයදුම් කිරීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය මෙසේය: පළමුව, ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයේ විමසීම් අංශයෙන් අයදුම් පත්‍රය ලබාගන්න. අයදුම් පත්‍ර අංකය ඔබගේ බලපත්‍රය නිකුත් කරන පළාත අනුව වෙනස් වන බව සලකන්න. උදාහරණයක් ලෙස, බස්නාහිර පළාත සඳහා අංකය උ.ඡ වන අතර, දකුණු පළාත සඳහා ීගඡ වන අතර, මධ්‍යම පළාත සඳහා ක්.ඡ වේ. අවශ්‍ය උපකාරක ලියවිලි ලෙස ලියාපදිංචි පොත හෝ වාහන හැඳුනුම්පත, වාහන රක්ෂනය, සහ වාහන බලපත්‍රයේ මුල් පිටපත අවශ්‍ය වේ. ඔබගේ ලියාපදිංචි පොත නැතිවී ඇත්නම්, ඒ බව සහතික කරමින් මෝටර් රථ ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවෙන් සහතික පත්‍රයක් ලබාගෙන ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයට ඉදිරිපත් කරන්න.

අයදුම් පත්‍රය භාර දීම සඳහා, ඔබගේ සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අයදුම් පත්‍රය සහ අදාළ උපකාරක ලියකියවිලි ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයේ වාහන බලපත්‍ර අංශයට ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය. මෙම අංශය සඳුදා සිට සිකුරාදා දක්වා පෙ.ව. 9.00 සිට ප.ව. 3.00 දක්වා විවෘතව ඇත. ප්‍රසිද්ධ නිවාඩු දිනවලදී කාර්යාලය වසා ඇත. සේවාව ලබා ගැනීමට ගතවන කාලය විනාඩි 15ක් පමණ වේ (පෝලිමේ ගත කරන කාලය ඇතුළුව), සහ බලපත්‍රයේ වලංගු කාලසීමාව වසර 1කි.
question_en: What are the operating hours for the vehicle license section at the Divisional Secretariat?
answer_en: The vehicle license section at the Divisional Secretariat is open from Monday to Friday, from 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM, and is closed on public holidays.
question_ta: பிரதேச செயலகத்தில் வாகன அனுமதிப்பத்திரப் பிரிவின் செயற்பாட்டு நேரம் என்ன?
answer_ta: பிரதேச செயலகத்தில் உள்ள வாகன அனுமதிப்பத்திரப் பிரிவு திங்கள் முதல் வெள்ளி வரை காலை 9:00 மணி முதல் மாலை 3:00 மணி வரை திறந்திருக்கும். பொது விடுமுறை நாட்களில் மூடப்படும்.
question_si: ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයේ වාහන බලපත්‍ර අංශය විවෘතව තබන වේලාවන් මොනවාද?
answer_si: ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයේ වාහන බලපත්‍ර අංශය සඳුදා සිට සිකුරාදා දක්වා පෙ.ව. 9.00 සිට ප.ව. 3.00 දක්වා විවෘතව පවතින අතර, ප්‍රසිද්ධ නිවාඩු දිනවලදී වසා ඇත.

context:
Service: Importation of Used Motor Cycles and Cars for Re-export After Repairing - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Submission Procedure and Departmental Process
---
Submission Procedure Obtain [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/DepImportExportForm2.pdf) s Counter – Unit 02

Making payments Counter – Cashier

Submission of [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/DepImportExportForm2.pdf) and Support Documents Counter – Unit 02

[Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/DepImportExportForm2.pdf) : Specimen [Indent Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/DepImportExportForm2.pdf)

Procedure

Step 1: Importer hands over all support documents to Unit 02. Step 2: Unit 02 examines the documents against licensing details. Step 3: Debiting the imported motor cycles with the approval of the Assistant Controller. Step 4: Hand over the debit documents to the importer with one copy being kept with the Department for office use.

Note:

- If the importer has violated licensing conditions, additional licensing fees will be charged by the Assistant Controller.
- If, due to any reasons, the import value exceeds the license value, the additional amount will be charged with the approval of the Controller of Imports and Export.
- If the impot time line does not tally with the license period, the applicant should submit a letter making a request for an amended license.
- If the imported motor bicycle do not tally with the license for motor bicycles, an amended license should be obtained.
question_en: What is the primary service offered by Unit 2 regarding motor vehicles, and what is the ultimate purpose of this importation?
answer_en: Unit 2 offers a service for the importation of used motor cycles and cars, with the ultimate purpose being re-export after repairing them.
question_ta: அலகு 2 வழங்கும் மோட்டார் வாகனங்கள் தொடர்பான முக்கிய சேவை என்ன, இந்த இறக்குமதியின் இறுதி நோக்கம் என்ன?
answer_ta: அலகு 2 ஆனது பயன்படுத்தப்பட்ட மோட்டார் சைக்கிள்கள் மற்றும் கார்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான சேவையை வழங்குகிறது, இதன் இறுதி நோக்கம் பழுதுபார்த்த பிறகு அவற்றை மறு ஏற்றுமதி செய்வதாகும்.
question_si: 2 වන ඒකකය මඟින් සපයනු ලබන මෝටර් රථ සම්බන්ධ ප්‍රධාන සේවාව කුමක්ද, සහ මෙම ආනයනයේ අවසාන අරමුණ කුමක්ද?
answer_si: 2 වන ඒකකය පාවිච්චි කරන ලද යතුරුපැදි සහ කාර් ආනයනය කිරීමේ සේවාව සපයන අතර, එහි අවසාන අරමුණ වන්නේ අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීමෙන් පසු ඒවා නැවත අපනයනය කිරීමයි.

context:
Service: Factory Registration
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Registrations - Establishments
Topic: Eligibility and Required Documents for Registering a Leased Tea Factory
---
Registering a leased factory

- Any person whishes to lease a factory has to present a leas agreement with the factory owner which was registered at the Department of Land Registration.
- In case, there is an arrears to be paid for the small holders for their green leaves, the applicant has to come to an agreement with the Sri Lanka Tea Board regarding the procedure of payment.
- If the factory is going to be leased by a company, the all information of the company (The board of directors, constitute of the company, the registration certificate of the company. etc.) should be provided.

Process of submitting applications

Relevant Application – T.C. 4 form (This should be filled by the person who expects the factory registration)

The places that the application forms can be obtained - Head office of the Sri Lanka Tea board and it’s regional offices situated at Gampola, Ginigathhena(Hatton Office), Bandarawela, Rathnapura, Mathugama, Galle and Mathara.
question_en: What are the essential requirements for registering a leased tea factory?
answer_en: To register a leased tea factory, one must present a lease agreement registered at the Department of Land Registration. If there are arrears to small holders for green leaves, an agreement with the Sri Lanka Tea Board regarding payment procedure is needed. If a company is leasing, all company information, including the board of directors, constitution, and registration certificate, must be provided.
question_ta: குத்தகைக்கு எடுக்கப்பட்ட தேயிலை தொழிற்சாலையை பதிவு செய்வதற்கு அவசியமான தேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: குத்தகைக்கு எடுக்கப்பட்ட தேயிலை தொழிற்சாலையை பதிவு செய்வதற்கு, நிலப் பதிவுத் திணைக்களத்தில் பதிவுசெய்யப்பட்ட ஒரு குத்தகை ஒப்பந்தம் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும். சிறு தேயிலை தோட்ட விவசாயிகளுக்கு பச்சைத் தேயிலைக்கான நிலுவைத் தொகைகள் இருந்தால், பணம் செலுத்தும் முறை குறித்து இலங்கை தேயிலை வாரியத்துடன் ஒரு உடன்பாடு எட்டப்பட வேண்டும். ஒரு நிறுவனம் தொழிற்சாலையை குத்தகைக்கு எடுத்தால், நிறுவனத்தின் அனைத்து தகவல்களும் (இயக்குநர்கள் குழு, நிறுவனத்தின் அமைப்பு, நிறுவனத்தின் பதிவுச் சான்றிதழ் போன்றவை) வழங்கப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: බදුගත් තේ කර්මාන්ත ශාලාවක් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා අත්‍යාවශ්‍ය අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: බදුගත් තේ කර්මාන්ත ශාලාවක් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා, ඉඩම් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ ලියාපදිංචි කරන ලද බදු ගිවිසුමක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය. කුඩා තේ වතු හිමියන්ට ඔවුන්ගේ අමු තේ දළු සඳහා ගෙවිය යුතු හිඟ මුදල් තිබේ නම්, ගෙවීම් ක්‍රියාපටිපාටිය සම්බන්ධයෙන් ශ්‍රී ලංකා තේ මණ්ඩලය සමඟ එකඟතාවකට පැමිණිය යුතුය. යම් සමාගමක් විසින් කර්මාන්ත ශාලාව බදු දීමට අපේක්ෂා කරන්නේ නම්, සමාගමේ සියලු තොරතුරු (අධ්‍යක්ෂ මණ්ඩලය, සමාගමේ ව්‍යුහය, සමාගමේ ලියාපදිංචි සහතිකය ආදිය) සැපයිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Pawnbrokers License
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: Pawnbroker License Issuance and Renewal
---
පියවර 4 ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමි කාර්ය්‍යලය මගින් උකස් කිරිමේ බලපත්‍රය නිකුත් කරනු ලැබේ සටහන 1 අදාල ලියවිලි නොමැතිනමි අයදුමිපත ප්‍රතික්ෂේප කරනු ලබයි ප්‍රතික්ෂේප විමට හේතු දක්වා ඵවනු ලැබේ සටහන 2 සෑම අවුරුද්දකම උකස් කිරිමේ බලපත්‍රය අළුත්කල යුතුය අදාල ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකමී වරයා බලපත්‍ර ලාබියා පිළිබදව සෑහීමකට පත් නොවේ නමී බලපත්‍රය අළුත්කිරීම අනුමත නොකෙරේ විශේෂ කරුණු 1. ව්යාපාරයක් පැවරීම ප්රාදේශීය ලේකමි කාර්ය්යලයේ අනුමැතියකින් තොරව ව්යාපාර වෙනත් අයෙකුට පැවරීම තහනමි අතර ඵසේ සිදු කලහොත් ඵය නීති විරෝධි ලෙස සලකනු ලැබේ 2. උකස්කරුට මාස තුනකට වඩා විදේශගත වීමට අවශ්ය වු විට - අදාල ප්රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලයට ලියවිල්ලක් මගින් තම අවශ්යතාවය දැනුමි දිය යුතුය - උකස්කරු විදේශගත වූ විට ඔහු වෙනුවෙන් ව්යාපාරය පවත්වාගෙන යන  පුද්ගලයා පිළිබදව අදාල ප්රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්ය්යලයට ලිබිතව දැනුමි දිය යුතුය සුදුසුකම් • අයදුම්කරු ශ්‍රි ලාංකික පුරවැසියෙක් විය යුතුය • අයදුම්කරු කිසිදු නීති විරෝධී කටයුත්තක වැරදිකරුවෙක් නොවිය යුතුය
question_en: What are the eligibility requirements for an applicant to obtain a Pawnbroker License?
answer_en: To obtain a Pawnbroker License, the applicant must be a Sri Lankan citizen and must not have been convicted of any illegal activity.
question_ta: அடகுக்கடை உரிமம் பெறுவதற்கான தகுதித் தேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: அடகுக்கடை உரிமம் பெற, விண்ணப்பதாரர் இலங்கை பிரஜையாக இருக்க வேண்டும் மற்றும் எந்தவொரு சட்டவிரோத செயலிலும் குற்றவாளியாக இருக்கக்கூடாது.
question_si: උකස් කිරිමේ බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා අයදුම්කරුවෙකුට තිබිය යුතු සුදුසුකම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: උකස් කිරිමේ බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා, අයදුම්කරු ශ්‍රී ලාංකික පුරවැසියෙකු විය යුතු අතර කිසිදු නීති විරෝධී කටයුත්තක වැරදිකරුවෙක් නොවිය යුතුය.

context:

question_en: Who can benefit from the Product & Market Development Programmes offered by the Industrial Product Division?
answer_en: Exporters, Potential Exporters, Manufacturers, Academia, Foreign Buyers, and Policy Makers can benefit from these programmes.
question_ta: தொழிற்துறை உற்பத்திப் பொருட்கள் பிரிவினால் வழங்கப்படும் உற்பத்திப் பொருட்கள் மற்றும் சந்தை மேம்பாட்டுத் திட்டங்களால் யார் பயனடையலாம்?
answer_ta: ஏற்றுமதியாளர்கள், சாத்தியமான ஏற்றுமதியாளர்கள், உற்பத்தியாளர்கள், கல்வித்துறையினர், வெளிநாட்டு வாங்குபவர்கள் மற்றும் கொள்கை வகுப்பாளர்கள் ஆகியோர் இத்திட்டங்களால் பயனடையலாம்.
question_si: කාර්මික නිෂ්පාදන අංශය විසින් සපයනු ලබන නිෂ්පාදන සහ වෙළඳපල සංවර්ධන වැඩසටහන් වලින් ප්‍රතිලාභ ලබා ගත හැක්කේ කාටද?
answer_si: අපනයනකරුවන්, විභව අපනයනකරුවන්, නිෂ්පාදකයින්, අධ්‍යයන අංශය, විදේශීය ගැනුම්කරුවන් සහ ප්‍රතිපත්ති සම්පාදකයින්ට මෙම වැඩසටහන් වලින් ප්‍රතිලාභ ලබා ගත හැකිය.

context:

Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry

Time Allotted for Submitting of Application : From 8:30 am to 4:15 pm on public working days.

Service Charges : 1. No fees charged for approval, by the Exports Unit. 2. Rs. 794/= is charged for approval, by the Imports Unit.

question_en: What are the service charges for obtaining approval to transfer raw materials or accessories, distinguishing between the Exports Unit and the Imports Unit?

question_ta: மூலப்பொருட்கள் அல்லது துணைப் பொருட்களை மாற்றுவதற்கான ஒப்புதலைப் பெறுவதற்கு ஏற்றுமதிப் பிரிவுக்கும் இறக்குமதிப் பிரிவுக்கும் உள்ள சேவை கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: ஏற்றுமதிப் பிரிவு ஒப்புதலுக்காக எந்தக் கட்டணமும் வசூலிப்பதில்லை. இறக்குமதிப் பிரிவு ஒப்புதலுக்காக ரூபாய் 794 கட்டணம் வசூலிக்கிறது.
question_si: අමුද්‍රව්‍ය හෝ උපාංග මාරු කිරීම සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීමට අපනයන ඒකකය සහ ආනයන ඒකකය සඳහා සේවා ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: අපනයන ඒකකය අනුමැතිය සඳහා කිසිදු ගාස්තුවක් අය නොකරයි. ආනයන ඒකකය අනුමැතිය සඳහා රුපියල් 794 ක් අය කරයි.

context:
Service: Liquor Permit
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: තැබෑරුම් බලපත්‍ර ඉල්ලූම්පත් සහ අනෙකුත් බලපත්‍ර සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි
---
ඵ) තැබෑරුම් බලපත්‍ර ඉල්ලූම්පත් සඳහා ඉල්ලූම්කරු විසින් ඉහත සඳහන් ලියකියවිලි වලට අමතරව පහත සඳහන් වාර්තාද ලියකියවිලිද අවශ්‍ය වේ.

1 1975 අංක 17 දරන සමාජ ශාලා පනත යටතේ ලියාපදිංචි කළ බවට සහතිකය

2 ඉල්ලූම්කල දිනට පෙර අවුරුදු 5 ක් ඇතුළත තැබෑරුම දිගටම පැවැත්වූ බව ඔප්පු කිරීමට ලියකියවිලි (දැනට බලපත්‍ර ඇති අයට මෙය අදාළ නොවේ)

3 බැංකු ගිණුමක් ඇති බවට සහතිකයක්.

4 ක්‍රීඩා අමාත්‍යාංශය මගින් හෝ සමාජ සේවා අමාත්‍යාංශය වෙතින් ලබාගත් ලියාපදිංචි බව ඔප්පු කරන සහතිකයක්

ඵ්) අයදුමී කළ දිනට පෙර ආදායම් බදු හෝ වෙනත් අය බදු සහ මාසික ගෙවීම් කරන බවට ඔප්පු කිරීමක්

ඔ) බීර, වයින් හා සටුවටී විකිණීමෙ බලපත් සඳහා ඉල්ලූම් කරන්නන් පහත සඳහන් ලියකියවිලි ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය. ආ), ඇ), ඈ), ඉ), උ), ඌ) ඡේදවල සඳහන් ලියකියවිලි ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය.

සටහන

බලපත්‍රයක් අළුත්කර ගැනීම සඳහා පහත සඳහන් ලියවිළි ඉදිරිපත් කල යුතුවේ

- ආ), ඇ), ඈ), ඉ), උ), ඌ) ඡේදවල සඳහන් ලියකියවිලි ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය.

- බලපත්‍රය අළුත්කරන දින සිට වසර 3 කට පෙර කාළය තුල කිසිඳු නීත විරෝධී කටයුත්තක් සිදු නොවූ බවට නියෝජ්‍ය සුරාබදු කොමසාරිස් වරයා විසින් සපයන ලද වාර්ථාවක්
question_en: What are some of the essential documents required when applying for a tavern license?
answer_en: Essential documents include a certificate of registration under the Social Clubs Act No. 17 of 1975, proof of continuous operation of the tavern for the preceding 5 years (not applicable to existing licensees), a certificate of having a bank account, and a certificate of registration from either the Ministry of Sports or the Ministry of Social Services. Proof of income tax or other monthly tax payments prior to the application date is also necessary.
question_ta: மதுபான விடுதி உரிமத்திற்கு விண்ணப்பிக்கும் போது தேவைப்படும் சில அத்தியாவசிய ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: மதுபான விடுதி உரிமத்திற்கான அத்தியாவசிய ஆவணங்களில், 1975 ஆம் ஆண்டின் 17 ஆம் இலக்க சமூக கிளப்புகள் சட்டத்தின் கீழ் பதிவு செய்யப்பட்டதற்கான சான்றிதழ், விண்ணப்பத்திற்கு முந்தைய 5 வருடங்களாக மதுபான விடுதி தொடர்ந்து செயல்பட்டதற்கான ஆதாரம் (தற்போது உரிமம் பெற்றவர்களுக்கு இது பொருந்தாது), வங்கிக் கணக்கு இருப்பதற்கான சான்றிதழ், மற்றும் விளையாட்டு அமைச்சு அல்லது சமூக சேவைகள் அமைச்சிடமிருந்து பெறப்பட்ட பதிவு சான்றிதழ் ஆகியவை அடங்கும். விண்ணப்பிக்கும் தேதிக்கு முன் வருமான வரி அல்லது பிற மாத வரிக் கொடுப்பனவுகளுக்கான ஆதாரமும் தேவை.
question_si: තැබෑරුම් බලපත්‍රයක් සඳහා ඉල්ලුම් කිරීමේදී අවශ්‍ය වන ප්‍රධාන ලියකියවිලි මොනවාද?
answer_si: තැබෑරුම් බලපත්‍රයක් සඳහා ඉල්ලුම් කිරීමේදී 1975 අංක 17 දරන සමාජ ශාලා පනත යටතේ ලියාපදිංචි කළ බවට සහතිකය, ඉල්ලූම්කල දිනට පෙර අවුරුදු 5 ක් ඇතුළත තැබෑරුම දිගටම පැවැත්වූ බව ඔප්පු කිරීමට ලියකියවිලි (දැනට බලපත්‍ර ඇති අයට මෙය අදාළ නොවේ), බැංකු ගිණුමක් ඇති බවට සහතිකයක්, සහ ක්‍රීඩා අමාත්‍යාංශය මගින් හෝ සමාජ සේවා අමාත්‍යාංශය වෙතින් ලබාගත් ලියාපදිංචි බව ඔප්පු කරන සහතිකයක් වැනි අත්‍යවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි අවශ්‍ය වේ. අයදුම් කළ දිනට පෙර ආදායම් බදු හෝ වෙනත් අය බදු සහ මාසික ගෙවීම් කරන බවට ඔප්පු කිරීමක්ද අවශ්‍ය වේ.

context:
Service: Renewal of Licenses - Repairers, Manufacturers and Sellers
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Registrations - Industrial
Topic: Timelines and Validity for Manufacturing and Seller Licenses, Costs for Repairer License (Part 1)
---
Submit Application Form: Working days – Monday to Friday Counter open hours – 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays Validity Timeline The renewed repair license is valid for a period of one year after which the license must be renewed annually. Renewal of Manufacturing License Applicant can get the license within 3 months Submit Application Form: Working days – Monday to Friday Counter open hours – 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays Validity Timeline The renewed manufacturer license is valid for a period of one year after which the license must be renewed annually. Renewal of Seller License By post: 2 Weeks Physically coming to the Department: 4-7 Days Submission Timeline Submit Application Form: Working days – Monday to Friday Counter open hours – 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays Validity Timeline The renewed seller license is valid for a period of one year after which the license must be renewed annually. Costs Related to the Service Renewal of Repair License Cost Applicant should bear the cost for obtaining this service. ?
question_en: What are the general submission hours for license renewals and how long are renewed licenses (Repairer, Manufacturer, Seller) valid for?
answer_en: Applications for license renewals can be submitted from Monday to Friday, between 8:30 am and 4:15 pm, except on Public and Mercantile Holidays. All renewed Repairer, Manufacturer, and Seller licenses are valid for a period of one year and must be renewed annually.
question_ta: உரிம புதுப்பித்தலுக்கான பொதுவான சமர்ப்பிப்பு நேரம் என்ன, மேலும் புதுப்பிக்கப்பட்ட உரிமங்கள் (பழுதுபார்ப்பவர், உற்பத்தியாளர், விற்பனையாளர்) எவ்வளவு காலம் செல்லுபடியாகும்?
answer_ta: உரிம புதுப்பித்தல் விண்ணப்பங்கள் திங்கள் முதல் வெள்ளி வரை, காலை 8:30 மணி முதல் மாலை 4:15 மணி வரை, பொது மற்றும் வணிக விடுமுறை நாட்கள் தவிர சமர்ப்பிக்கப்படலாம். புதுப்பிக்கப்பட்ட பழுதுபார்ப்பவர், உற்பத்தியாளர் மற்றும் விற்பனையாளர் உரிமங்கள் அனைத்தும் ஒரு வருட காலத்திற்கு செல்லுபடியாகும் மேலும் ஆண்டுதோறும் புதுப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීම් සඳහා පොදු අයදුම්පත් භාරගන්නා වේලාවන් මොනවාද සහ අලුත් කරන ලද බලපත්‍ර (අළුත්වැඩියා කරන්නන්, නිෂ්පාදකයින්, විකුණුම්කරුවන්) කොපමණ කාලයක් සඳහා වලංගු වේද?
answer_si: බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීමේ අයදුම්පත් සඳුදා සිට සිකුරාදා දක්වා, පෙරවරු 8:30 සිට පස්වරු 4:15 දක්වා, පොදු සහ වාණිජ නිවාඩු දින හැර ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැක. අළුත්වැඩියා කරන්නන්ගේ, නිෂ්පාදකයින්ගේ සහ විකුණුම්කරුවන්ගේ සියලුම අලුත් කරන ලද බලපත්‍ර වසරක කාලයක් සඳහා වලංගු වන අතර වාර්ෂිකව අලුත් කළ යුතුය.

context:

--- | ---

Repair scale beams | 300.00
Repair spring balance | 300.00
Repair Platform machines | 350.00

Repair weighbridges | 1000.00

Class II scales | 350.00 Penalties Any person not being registered by the Director, shall be guilty of an offence and be liable to a fine not exceeding Rs. 1,000/= or to imprisonment for a term not exceeding one year or to both such fine and imprisonment. * Also Refer to offences and Penalties Section Renewal of Manufacturing License Cost Applicant should bear the cost for obtaining this service Penalties Refer Offences and Penalties Section Renewal of Seller License
question_en: What are the penalties for a person not registered by the Director who performs repair work?
answer_en: Any person not registered by the Director is guilty of an offence and is liable to a fine not exceeding Rs. 1,000 or to imprisonment for a term not exceeding one year or to both such fine and imprisonment.
question_ta: இயக்குனரால் பதிவு செய்யப்படாத ஒரு நபர் பழுதுபார்க்கும் பணிகளைச் செய்தால் அதற்கான அபராதங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: இயக்குனரால் பதிவு செய்யப்படாத எந்தவொரு நபரும் குற்றவாளி ஆவார், அவருக்கு ரூ. 1,000க்கு மிகாத அபராதம் அல்லது ஒரு வருடத்திற்கு மிகாத சிறைத்தண்டனை அல்லது இரண்டும் விதிக்கப்படலாம்.
question_si: අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා විසින් ලියාපදිංචි නොකළ පුද්ගලයෙකු අළුත්වැඩියා කටයුතු සිදු කළහොත් ඊට ඇති දඬුවම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා විසින් ලියාපදිංචි නොකළ ඕනෑම පුද්ගලයෙකු වරදකරුවෙකු වන අතර, රුපියල් 1,000කට නොවැඩි දඩයකට හෝ වසරක් නොඉක්මවන සිර දඬුවමකට හෝ එම දඩය සහ සිර දඬුවම යන දෙකටම යටත් විය හැකිය.

context:

question_en: What are the costs and fees associated with the "Helicopter, Air Craft and Spare Parts - Unit 2" service?

question_ta: "ஹெலிகாப்டர், விமானம் மற்றும் உதிரிபாகங்கள் - பிரிவு 2" சேவைக்கான செலவுகள் மற்றும் கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவைக்கான செலவு CIF மதிப்பில் 0.1% ஆகும், மேலும் கட்டணமும் CIF மதிப்பில் 0.1% ஆகும்.
question_si: "හෙලිකොප්ටර්, ගුවන් යානා සහ අමතර කොටස් - ඒකකය 2" සේවාව හා සම්බන්ධ පිරිවැය සහ ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා වන පිරිවැය CIF අගයෙන් 0.1% ක් වන අතර, ගාස්තුවද CIF අගයෙන් 0.1% කි.

context:
Service: Issuance of Recomendations for Residance Visa(RV)
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Trade Promotion
Topic: Application Procedures and Fees
---
Procedures

Application forms Application form can be obtained from the Department of Commerce, 4th Floor, “Rakshana Mandiraya”, 21, Vauxhall Street, Colombo 02 or download from www.doc.gov.lk

[Application Form Format](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/Visa Application Form.pdf)

Charges Adults - Rs. 15,000 + VAT Children - Rs. 7,000 + VAT Duration taken for the service New Applications - 20 days Renewals- 15 days Working days Monday to Friday (Except Gov. holidays)

Supporting Documents to be submitted with Residence Visa Application

•Request letter •Company profile •Copy of Memorandum of Articles •Copy of business registration with boar of directors and share holders information •Financial statements of the company – recent 2 years and Bank account details. •Copy of the passport with SL Immigration & Emigration endorsed page •Copy of the letter of contract of employment / Power of Attorney •Bio Data of applicant •Company guarantee of bearing his / her tenancy and other expenses in Sri Lanka
question_en: What are the charges for the Issuance of Residence Visa recommendations for adults and children?
answer_en: The charge for adults is Rs. 15,000 + VAT, and for children, it is Rs. 7,000 + VAT.
question_ta: வதிவிட விசா பரிந்துரைகளைப் பெறுவதற்கான கட்டணங்கள் பெரியவர்களுக்கும் குழந்தைகளுக்கும் எவ்வளவு?
answer_ta: பெரியவர்களுக்கு ரூ. 15,000 + VAT மற்றும் குழந்தைகளுக்கு ரூ. 7,000 + VAT கட்டணம் அறவிடப்படும்.
question_si: පදිංචි වීසා නිර්දේශ ලබා දීම සඳහා වැඩිහිටියන් සහ ළමුන් සඳහා වන ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: වැඩිහිටියන් සඳහා රු. 15,000 + වැට් බදු, සහ ළමුන් සඳහා රු. 7,000 + වැට් බදු අය කෙරේ.

question_en: What is the contact information for the Agricultural and Environment Statistics Division?
answer_en: The Agricultural and Environment Statistics Division can be contacted via Telephone: +94 11 2147461, Fax: +94 11 2147463, or E-mail: agriculture@statistics.gov.lk.
question_ta: விவசாய மற்றும் சுற்றுச்சூழல் புள்ளிவிவரப் பிரிவின் தொடர்புத் தகவல் என்ன?
answer_ta: விவசாய மற்றும் சுற்றுச்சூழல் புள்ளிவிவரப் பிரிவை தொலைபேசி: +94 11 2147461, தொலைநகல்: +94 11 2147463 அல்லது மின்னஞ்சல்: agriculture@statistics.gov.lk மூலம் தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: කෘෂිකර්ම හා පරිසර සංඛ්‍යාලේඛන අංශයේ සම්බන්ධතා තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: කෘෂිකර්ම හා පරිසර සංඛ්‍යාලේඛන අංශය දුරකථනය: +94 11 2147461, ෆැක්ස්: +94 11 2147463, හෝ විද්‍යුත් තැපෑල: agriculture@statistics.gov.lk ඔස්සේ සම්බන්ධ කර ගත හැක.

context:
Service: Provide Contact Details of BOI Approved Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Information
Topic: Charges for Project Details Reports
---
Charges for the two reports:

1. Details of projects in commercial operation at present.

Price per CD : Rs. 2,500.00 + 12% VAT = Rs. 2,800.00

2. Details of projects which have signed agreements with the BOI and awaiting commercial operation.

Price per CD : Rs. 1,750.00 + 12% VAT = Rs. 1,960.00

3. Apart from above;

Details of projects approved during the resent past month, and details of projects which have signed agreements during the resent past two months could be obtained via e-mail monthly, by making the following payment for six months; Rs. 6,000 + 12% VAT = Rs. 6,720

4. Downloading from the BOI Website (www.investsrilanka.com) on making following payments through Credit Cards.

Details given in 1 & 2 above        = Rs. 1,000 or US $ 10 Details added subsequently (3 above) = Rs.  500 or US $  5
question_en: What are the different ways to obtain details of BOI approved projects and their associated costs?
answer_en: Details of BOI approved projects can be obtained via CD, email subscription, or by downloading from the BOI website. For projects in commercial operation, a CD costs Rs. 2,800.00. For projects which have signed agreements and are awaiting commercial operation, a CD costs Rs. 1,960.00. Monthly email updates for six months, covering recent projects, cost Rs. 6,720. Downloading from the BOI website costs Rs. 1,000 (or US $10) for reports 1 & 2, and Rs. 500 (or US $5) for subsequent details.
question_ta: BOI அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட திட்டங்களின் விவரங்களைப் பெறுவதற்கான பல்வேறு வழிகள் மற்றும் அதற்கான கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: BOI அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட திட்டங்களின் விவரங்களை குறுந்தகடு (CD), மின்னஞ்சல் சந்தா அல்லது BOI இணையதளத்தில் இருந்து பதிவிறக்கம் செய்வதன் மூலம் பெறலாம். வணிக ரீதியாக இயங்கும் திட்டங்களுக்கான குறுந்தகடு ரூபா 2,800.00 ஆகும். ஒப்பந்தம் செய்து வணிக நடவடிக்கைக்காக காத்திருக்கும் திட்டங்களுக்கான குறுந்தகடு ரூபா 1,960.00 ஆகும். அண்மைய திட்டங்கள் தொடர்பான ஆறு மாதங்களுக்கான மாதாந்திர மின்னஞ்சல் புதுப்பிப்புகளுக்கு ரூபா 6,720 செலவாகும். BOI இணையதளத்தில் இருந்து பதிவிறக்கம் செய்ய, 1 மற்றும் 2 ஆம் அறிக்கைகளுக்கு ரூபா 1,000 (அல்லது US $10) மற்றும் பிந்தைய விவரங்களுக்கு ரூபா 500 (அல்லது US $5) ஆகும்.
question_si: BOI අනුමත ව්‍යාපෘතිවල විස්තර ලබා ගැනීමට ඇති විවිධ ක්‍රම සහ ඒවාට අදාළ පිරිවැය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: BOI අනුමත ව්‍යාපෘතිවල විස්තර CD තැටියක්, විද්‍යුත් තැපැල් දායකත්වයක් හෝ BOI වෙබ් අඩවියෙන් බාගත කිරීම මගින් ලබා ගත හැක. වාණිජ මෙහෙයුම්වල පවතින ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා CD තැටියක් සඳහා රුපියල් 2,800.00 කි. ගිවිසුම් අත්සන් කර වාණිජ මෙහෙයුම් අපේක්ෂාවෙන් සිටින ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා CD තැටියක් සඳහා රුපියල් 1,960.00 කි. මෑත කාලීන ව්‍යාපෘති ඇතුළත් මාස හයක් සඳහා මාසික විද්‍යුත් තැපැල් යාවත්කාලීන කිරීම් සඳහා රුපියල් 6,720 ක් වැය වේ. BOI වෙබ් අඩවියෙන් බාගත කිරීම සඳහා, 1 සහ 2 වාර්තා සඳහා රුපියල් 1,000 (හෝ US $10) සහ පසුකාලීන විස්තර සඳහා රුපියල් 500 (හෝ US $5) වැය වේ.

context:
Service: Product Certification Scheme (SLS Marks scheme)
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Standards
Topic: SLS Marks Scheme - Overseas: Agreement with SLSI and Bottled Water Registration
---
6. Agreement With SLSI The applicant shall enter into an agreement with SLSI for terms and conditions of operation of the permit. NOTE : The agreement between SLSI will include clauses pertaining to indemnity, misuse of SLS Certification mark, voluntary withdrawal or cancellation of permit etc. Recommendation for Health Ministry (MOH) Registration of Bottled Drinking Water Under the agreement between Health Ministry and SLSI, SLSI is the inspection body who carryout inspections and recommend for granting approval to MOH for registration of Bottled Drinking Water.

Assessment before granting approval :- On receipt of an application the institution will assess the adequacy of manufacturer’s arrangements for quality assurance based on information provided in the application. An audits at the factory is/are arranged to examine and verify the quality management system adopted by the applicant. Attention will be paid to control at production, suitability of equipment, inspection and testing facilities, training, record keeping, provision of necessary resources etc. Specific attention will be paid to hydro geological report and recommendations made under there, suitability of water resource, perimeter protection, adherence to Code of Practice for Bottled drinking Water and conformity of two consecutive samples of source water and final product to relevant standards.
question_en: What is SLSI's role in the registration process for Bottled Drinking Water with the Health Ministry, and what are the key aspects assessed before granting approval?
answer_en: Under an agreement with the Health Ministry (MOH), SLSI acts as the inspection body for Bottled Drinking Water registration. It carries out inspections and recommends approval to MOH. Before granting approval, SLSI assesses the manufacturer's quality assurance arrangements, conducts factory audits to verify the quality management system, and pays specific attention to production control, equipment suitability, testing facilities, training, record keeping, hydro geological reports, water resource suitability, perimeter protection, adherence to the Code of Practice, and conformity of water samples to relevant standards.
question_ta: சுகாதார அமைச்சகத்தில் குடிக்கத் தகுந்த பாட்டில் தண்ணீரைப் பதிவு செய்யும் செயல்முறையில் SLSI இன் பங்கு என்ன, மேலும் ஒப்புதல் வழங்குவதற்கு முன் மதிப்பீடு செய்யப்படும் முக்கிய அம்சங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: சுகாதார அமைச்சகத்துடனான (MOH) ஒரு ஒப்பந்தத்தின் கீழ், பாட்டில் குடிநீர் பதிவுக்கான ஆய்வு அமைப்பாக SLSI செயல்படுகிறது. இது ஆய்வுகளை மேற்கொண்டு சுகாதார அமைச்சகத்திற்கு ஒப்புதலைப் பரிந்துரைக்கிறது. ஒப்புதல் வழங்குவதற்கு முன், SLSI உற்பத்தியாளரின் தர உறுதிப்பாட்டு ஏற்பாடுகளை மதிப்பிடுகிறது, தர மேலாண்மை அமைப்பைச் சரிபார்க்க தொழிற்சாலை தணிக்கைகளை நடத்துகிறது, மேலும் உற்பத்தி கட்டுப்பாடு, உபகரணங்களின் தகுதி, சோதனை வசதிகள், பயிற்சி, பதிவுகளைப் பராமரித்தல், நீர்வளவியல் அறிக்கை, நீர் ஆதாரத்தின் தகுதி, சுற்றளவு பாதுகாப்பு, குடிக்கத் தகுந்த பாட்டில் தண்ணீர் வழிகாட்டுதல்களைப் பின்பற்றுதல் மற்றும் நீர் மாதிரிகள் தொடர்புடைய தரநிலைகளுக்கு இணங்குதல் ஆகியவற்றில் சிறப்பு கவனம் செலுத்துகிறது.
question_si: සෞඛ්‍ය අමාත්‍යාංශය සමඟ බෝතල් කළ පානීය ජලය ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ ක්‍රියාවලියේදී SLSI හි කාර්යභාරය කුමක්ද, සහ අනුමැතිය ලබා දීමට පෙර තක්සේරු කරනු ලබන ප්‍රධාන කරුණු මොනවාද?
answer_si: සෞඛ්‍ය අමාත්‍යාංශය (MOH) සමඟ ඇති ගිවිසුමක් යටතේ, බෝතල් කළ පානීය ජලය ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා පරීක්ෂණ ආයතනයක් ලෙස SLSI ක්‍රියා කරයි. එය පරීක්ෂණ පවත්වා සෞඛ්‍ය අමාත්‍යාංශයට අනුමැතිය සඳහා නිර්දේශ කරයි. අනුමැතිය ලබා දීමට පෙර, SLSI නිෂ්පාදකයාගේ තත්ත්ව සහතික කිරීමේ විධිවිධාන තක්සේරු කරයි, තත්ත්ව කළමනාකරණ පද්ධතිය තහවුරු කිරීමට කර්මාන්තශාලා විගණන සිදු කරයි, සහ නිෂ්පාදන පාලනය, උපකරණවල යෝග්‍යතාවය, පරීක්ෂණ පහසුකම්, පුහුණුව, වාර්තා තබා ගැනීම, ජල භූ විද්‍යාත්මක වාර්තා, ජල සම්පතේ යෝග්‍යතාවය, පරිමිතිය ආරක්ෂාව, බෝතල් කළ පානීය ජලය සඳහා වන ක්‍රියා පටිපාටි සංග්‍රහයට අනුකූල වීම සහ ජල සාම්පල අදාළ ප්‍රමිතීන්ට අනුකූල වීම කෙරෙහි විශේෂ අවධානයක් යොමු කරයි.

question_ta: தயாரிப்பு சான்றிதழ் திட்டத்தின் இயக்குனரின் தொடர்பு விவரங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: தயாரிப்பு சான்றிதழ் திட்டத்தின் இயக்குனரை தொலைபேசி: +94 11-2671567-72 Ext: 354, நேரடி தொலைபேசி: +94 11 -5626204, தொலைபேசி/தொலைநகல்: +94 11 2671953, அல்லது மின்னஞ்சல்: hgss@slsi.lk மூலம் தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.

answer_si: නිෂ්පාදන සහතික කිරීමේ අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා දුරකථන: +94 11-2671567-72 Ext: 354, සෘජු: +94 11 -5626204, දුරකථන/ෆැක්ස්: +94 11 2671953, හෝ විද්‍යුත් තැපෑල: hgss@slsi.lk මගින් සම්බන්ධ කරගත හැක.

context:
Service: Import of Vehicles Under Gift Scheme - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Gift Scheme from Family: Required Documents
---
Importation of Motor Vehicle Under the Gift Scheme from a Family Member:

- Copies of [Birth](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=367&task=info&back=0&pid=420) / [Marriage Certificate](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=420) s to prove relationship
- A copy of the [NIC](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=399&task=info&back=0&pid=420) of the license holder Visa details of the donor
- A confirmation letter from the company where the donor is employed
- Photocopies of the [passport](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=&task=info&back=0&pid=420) of the donor (pages containing personal details, validity period, data of departure from Sri Lanka
- Photocopy of valid visa (with English translation) to prove that he/she has gone abroad for employment and completed one year's stay in that country
- Letter from employer indicating the date of appointment, post held and salary paid to the donor, the fax number and e-mail address of the employee should be mentioned in this letter
- Bank documents showing foreign earnings and remittances to Sri Lanka during the period of employment abroad
- Registration Certificate/ Cancellation of Registration (re-registration) Certificate of the vehicle (with English translations)
question_en: According to the provided context, what is the main service described, and which documents are required to prove the family relationship when importing a motor vehicle under the Gift Scheme from a family member?
answer_en: The main service described is 'Import of Vehicles Under Gift Scheme - Unit 2'. To prove the family relationship for importing a motor vehicle under the Gift Scheme from a family member, copies of Birth Certificates or Marriage Certificates are required.
question_ta: வழங்கப்பட்ட சூழலின்படி, விவரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ள முக்கிய சேவை எது, மேலும் குடும்ப உறுப்பினரிடமிருந்து பரிசு திட்டத்தின் கீழ் ஒரு மோட்டார் வாகனத்தை இறக்குமதி செய்ய குடும்ப உறவை நிரூபிக்க என்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவை?
answer_ta: விவரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ள முக்கிய சேவை 'பரிசு திட்டத்தின் கீழ் வாகன இறக்குமதி - அலகு 2' ஆகும். குடும்ப உறுப்பினரிடமிருந்து பரிசு திட்டத்தின் கீழ் ஒரு மோட்டார் வாகனத்தை இறக்குமதி செய்ய குடும்ப உறவை நிரூபிக்க, பிறப்புச் சான்றிதழ்கள் அல்லது திருமணச் சான்றிதழ்களின் நகல்கள் தேவை.
question_si: සපයන ලද සන්දර්භය අනුව, විස්තර කර ඇති ප්‍රධාන සේවාව කුමක්ද, තවද පවුලේ සාමාජිකයෙකුගෙන් තෑගි යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ මෝටර් රථයක් ආනයනය කිරීමේදී පවුල් සබඳතාවය ඔප්පු කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: විස්තර කර ඇති ප්‍රධාන සේවාව වන්නේ 'තෑගි යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ වාහන ආනයනය - ඒකක 2' යන්නයි. පවුලේ සාමාජිකයෙකුගෙන් තෑගි යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ මෝටර් රථයක් ආනයනය කිරීම සඳහා පවුල් සබඳතාවය ඔප්පු කිරීමට උප්පැන්න සහතික හෝ විවාහ සහතිකවල පිටපත් අවශ්‍ය වේ.

question_en: What is the registration fee for the service of registering sellers of weights, measures, and weighing or measuring instruments?

question_ta: எடைகள், அளவைகள் மற்றும் எடை அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகளை விற்பனை செய்வோரைப் பதிவு செய்வதற்கான சேவைக்கான பதிவு கட்டணம் என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவைக்கான பதிவு கட்டணம் ரூ.300/= ஆகும்.
question_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ කිරුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ විකුණුම්කරුවන් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා ලියාපදිංචි ගාස්තුව කොපමණද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා ලියාපදිංචි ගාස්තුව රුපියල් 300/= කි.

context:
Service: Tea Exporter Registration
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Registrations - Industrial
Topic: Eligibility and Required Documents for Tea Exporters and Warehouses (Part 1)
---
Registration of Tea exporters

- Applicant should hold valid business registration certificates issued by the registrar of companies or provincial registrar of business names.
- All new comers who wish to register as exporters of tea, should have a minimum capital (invested/paid up/working) of atleast Rs. 1 million. That should be proved by forwarding a letter obtained from the relevant Bank or recognized financial institute.
- The warehouse should be constructed according to standards given by Sri Lanka Tea Board.
- The office should be established with all infrastructure facilities and the sufficient number of staff having some experience regarding the field of tea export should be recruited.

Note – An applicant who wish to register as a tea exporter, should recruit atleast one Tea Taster to his staff with 3 years experience in a recognize institute.

Registration of a warehouse

- Applicant should hold valid business registration certificates issued by the registrar of companies or provincial registrar of business names.
- The minimum requirements for registration of a warehouse are as follows.  - Well cemented floor.  - Asbestos sheets, tile or metal roofing  - Plasted walls or walls made of metal sheets  - Appropriate drainage system in order to maintain hygienic standard and to maintain the moisture level for storing of tea.
question_en: What is a specific staff requirement for an applicant wishing to register as a tea exporter?
answer_en: An applicant wishing to register as a tea exporter must recruit at least one Tea Taster to his staff with 3 years experience in a recognized institute.
question_ta: தேயிலை ஏற்றுமதியாளராகப் பதிவு செய்ய விரும்பும் விண்ணப்பதாரருக்கு ஒரு குறிப்பிட்ட பணியாளர் தேவை என்ன?
answer_ta: தேயிலை ஏற்றுமதியாளராகப் பதிவு செய்ய விரும்பும் ஒரு விண்ணப்பதாரர் தனது ஊழியர்களில் அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட நிறுவனத்தில் 3 வருட அனுபவமுள்ள ஒரு தேயிலை சுவைப்பவரை குறைந்தபட்சம் ஒருவரையாவது நியமிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: තේ අපනයනකරුවෙකු ලෙස ලියාපදිංචි වීමට අපේක්ෂා කරන අයදුම්කරුවෙකු සඳහා විශේෂිත කාර්ය මණ්ඩල අවශ්‍යතාවයක් කුමක්ද?
answer_si: තේ අපනයනකරුවෙකු ලෙස ලියාපදිංචි වීමට අපේක්ෂා කරන අයදුම්කරුවෙකු පිළිගත් ආයතනයක වසර 3 ක පළපුරුද්දක් ඇති අවම වශයෙන් එක් තේ රස පරීක්ෂකවරයෙකු හෝ ඔහුගේ කාර්ය මණ්ඩලයට බඳවා ගත යුතුය.

question_en: What are the main category and subcategory for the service 'Obtaining a Driving License Card in Replacement of an Old License Booklet'?
answer_en: The main category is 'Trade, Business & Industry', and the subcategory is 'Motoring'.
question_ta: பழைய ஓட்டுநர் உரிமப் புத்தகத்திற்குப் பதிலாக புதிய ஓட்டுநர் உரிம அட்டையைப் பெறுதல் என்ற சேவைக்கான முதன்மை வகை மற்றும் துணை வகை என்ன?
answer_ta: முதன்மை வகை 'வர்த்தகம், வணிகம் மற்றும் தொழில்' ஆகும், மேலும் துணை வகை 'மோட்டார் வாகனப் போக்குவரத்து' ஆகும்.
question_si: පැරණි රියදුරු බලපත්‍ර පොත වෙනුවට රියදුරු බලපත්‍ර කාඩ්පතක් ලබා ගැනීම සේවාව සඳහා ප්‍රධාන කාණ්ඩය සහ උප කාණ්ඩය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ප්‍රධාන කාණ්ඩය 'වෙළඳාම, ව්‍යාපාර සහ කර්මාන්ත' වන අතර උප කාණ්ඩය 'මෝටර් රථ' වේ.

context:
Service: Calibration of weights, measures and weighing or measuring Instruments
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Regulation of Trade
Topic: Eligibility for Calibration Services
---
Any individual / organization that use Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments belonging to the following measurement categories are eligible for this service. (a) Calibration of Thermometers, moisture meters, ovems (b) Calibration of Weights (c) Calibration of Balances (d) Calibration for linear measures ruler 1 m or part thereof, vernier calipers, micrometers, gauge blocks. (e) Calibration of stop watches (f) Calibration of Electrical Measuring Instruments: - Multimeter -Voltmeter -Ammeter -Ohmmeter (g) Calibration of Volumetric measures (h)Calibration of pressure gauges. (i) Radar equipment for the measure is the speed of vehicles.
question_en: Who is eligible for the calibration services, and what types of instruments make them eligible?
answer_en: Any individual or organization that uses measures and weighing or measuring instruments belonging to measurement categories such as thermometers, moisture meters, ovens, weights, balances, linear measures (ruler, vernier calipers, micrometers, gauge blocks), stop watches, electrical measuring instruments (multimeter, voltmeter, ammeter, ohmmeter), volumetric measures, pressure gauges, and radar equipment for vehicle speed, is eligible for this service.
question_ta: அளவீடுகள் மற்றும் எடையிடும் அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகளின் அளவுத்திருத்தச் சேவைக்கு யார் தகுதியானவர்கள்?
answer_ta: வெப்பமானிகள், ஈரப்பதமானிகள், அடுப்புகள், எடைகள், தராசுகள், நேரியல் அளவீடுகள் (அளவுகோல், வெர்னியர் காலிப்பர்கள், மைக்ரோமீட்டர்கள், கேஜ் பிளாக்ஸ்), ஸ்டாப் வாட்ச்கள், மின்சார அளவீட்டுக் கருவிகள் (மல்டிமீட்டர், வோல்ட்மீட்டர், அம்மீட்டர், ஓம்மீட்டர்), கனஅளவீடுகள், அழுத்தமானிகள் மற்றும் வாகனங்களின் வேகத்தை அளவிடும் ரேடார் கருவிகள் போன்ற அளவீட்டுப் பிரிவுகளின் கீழ் வரும் கருவிகளைப் பயன்படுத்தும் எந்தவொரு தனிநபர் அல்லது அமைப்பும் இந்தச் சேவைக்குத் தகுதியுடையவர்கள் ஆவர்.
question_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ මිනුම් උපකරණ ක්‍රමාංකනය කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලබන්නේ කවුද?
answer_si: උෂ්ණත්වමාන, තෙතමනය මීටර, උඳුන්, බර, තුලා, රේඛීය මිනුම් (මීටර 1 පාලක හෝ එහි කොටසක්, වර්නියර් කැලිපර්, මයික්‍රෝමීටර, ගේජ් බ්ලොක්), නැවතුම් ඔරලෝසු, විද්‍යුත් මිනුම් උපකරණ (බහුමාපක, වෝල්ට්මීටර, ඇමීටර, ඕම්මීටර), පරිමාමිතික මිනුම්, පීඩන මාපක සහ වාහනවල වේගය මැනීම සඳහා වන රේඩාර් උපකරණ වැනි මිනුම් කාණ්ඩවලට අයත් මිනුම් සහ බර කිරන හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ භාවිතා කරන ඕනෑම පුද්ගලයෙකු හෝ සංවිධානයක් මෙම සේවාව සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලබයි.

context:
Service: Complaints on violation of the Act
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Regulation of Trade
Topic: Complaint Procedure (Part 2) and Additional Information
---
2. Support Documents required Not required.

Application Forms Not applicable

Step-by-Step Procedure (Handling complaints made by the public) Step 1: Public makes complaints via letter, phone, fax or visit the Director of the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department Step 2: If the complaint is made to the Department, the Director forwards the complaint to the Asst. Superintendent. Step 3: The Asst. Superintendent then informs the Government Agent at the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Division in the respective District Secretariat. Step 4: The Government Agent informs the Officer in Charge of the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Division Step 5: The OIC and the Inspector make a field visit and send a report to the Department. Step 6: If persons mentioned in the complaint made by the public are found guilty, the Government Agent forwards the matter to courts Note 1: A complaint could also be made direct to the Government Agent at the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Division in the respective District Secretariat who would inform the Officer in Charge. Note 2: If the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department knows the complainant’s name, he will be informed of the final result. Time line Process Time Line 1 - 4 weeks Submission Time Line Submission of the Request Letter: Working days – Monday - Friday Counter open hours – 9.00 am to 4.45 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays Validity Time Line Not applicable for this service. Costs related to the service Cost There are no costs involved in this service. Fee No fee is charged Penalties Not applicable. Support documents required Support Documents are not necessary for this particular service. Citizens complaining are encouraged to provide evidence and information whenever possible.
question_en: Are there any costs or fees involved in making a complaint regarding a violation of the Act?
answer_en: No, there are no costs or fees involved in this service.
question_ta: சட்டத்தை மீறியமை குறித்து புகார் அளிப்பதற்கு ஏதேனும் செலவுகள் அல்லது கட்டணங்கள் உள்ளதா?
answer_ta: இல்லை, இந்த சேவைக்கு எந்தவித செலவுகளும் அல்லது கட்டணங்களும் இல்லை.
question_si: පනත උල්ලංඝනය කිරීමක් සම්බන්ධයෙන් පැමිණිල්ලක් කිරීම සඳහා කිසියම් වියදමක් හෝ ගාස්තුවක් ඇතුළත් වේද?
answer_si: නැත, මෙම සේවාව සඳහා කිසිදු වියදමක් හෝ ගාස්තුවක් අය නොකෙරේ.

context:

Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring

---
Penalty: No penalties involved in the process of issuing licenses Surcharge: At failing on the written test, an applicant must pay Rs. 100.00 for re applying (only valid for three re-applies) At failing on the practical test, an applicant must make the full payment for re applying (only valid for three re-applies) Support Documents Required 1. [National Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=398) / Original and a photocopy of a valid [Passport](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=399&task=info&back=0&pid=398) , containing NIC number 2. Medical certification, from a MBBS certified medical officer 3. Current driving license If applying for a license of bus or lorry: 1. A Medical Certification issued by the C.T.B. Medical Institute 2. A Certification of Competency issued by a grade “A” driving school 3. Three copies of black and white photos of size: 2*2 ”

Service Responsibility Matrix Designation Name  Division  Telephone Additional Commissioner Mr. Kannangara Licensing Division +94-11-2556856/+94-11-2516404 Assistant Commissioner Mrs. Chandra Karunasena Licensing Division - Supervising Officers Mr. Somasiri Fernando Licensing Division -
question_en: What are the surcharges an applicant must pay if they fail the written or practical driving test when extending the validity of their driving license?
answer_en: If an applicant fails the written test, they must pay Rs. 100.00 for re-applying (only valid for three re-applies). If they fail the practical test, they must make the full payment for re-applying (also only valid for three re-applies).
question_ta: ஓட்டுநர் உரிமத்தின் செல்லுபடியை நீட்டிக்க விண்ணப்பிக்கும்போது, எழுத்துத் தேர்வு அல்லது நடைமுறைத் தேர்வில் தோல்வியடைந்தால் விண்ணப்பதாரர் செலுத்த வேண்டிய கூடுதல் கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: எழுத்துத் தேர்வில் தோல்வியுற்றால், விண்ணப்பதாரர் மீண்டும் விண்ணப்பிக்க ரூ. 100.00 செலுத்த வேண்டும் (மூன்று முறை மீண்டும் விண்ணப்பிக்க மட்டுமே செல்லுபடியாகும்). நடைமுறைத் தேர்வில் தோல்வியுற்றால், அவர்கள் மீண்டும் விண்ணப்பிக்க முழு கட்டணத்தையும் செலுத்த வேண்டும் (இதுவும் மூன்று முறை மீண்டும் விண்ணப்பிக்க மட்டுமே செல்லுபடியாகும்).
question_si: රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක වලංගුභාවය දීර්ඝ කිරීම සඳහා අයදුම් කිරීමේදී, ලිඛිත හෝ ප්‍රායෝගික රියදුරු පරීක්ෂණයෙන් අසමත් වුවහොත් අයදුම්කරුවෙකු ගෙවිය යුතු අමතර ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: අයදුම්කරුවෙකු ලිඛිත පරීක්ෂණයෙන් අසමත් වුවහොත්, නැවත අයදුම් කිරීම සඳහා රු. 100.00ක් ගෙවිය යුතුය (නැවත අයදුම් කිරීම් තුනක් සඳහා පමණක් වලංගු වේ). ප්‍රායෝගික පරීක්ෂණයෙන් අසමත් වුවහොත්, නැවත අයදුම් කිරීම සඳහා සම්පූර්ණ ගාස්තුව ගෙවිය යුතුය (මෙයද නැවත අයදුම් කිරීම් තුනක් සඳහා පමණක් වලංගු වේ).

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Information
Topic: BOI Law Sections 17 and 16: Eligibility Criteria
---
Granting of approval for Investment Proposals is done in keeping with the regulations setup under Sections 17 or 16 of the BOI Law. The eligibility criteria to be satisfied under these regulations are briefed below.

1. For Granting of approval under Section 17 of the BOI Law.

Investors (both foreign and local) are eligible for relevant incentives, tax concessions, customs duty exemptions, etc., provided the fulfilling of eligibility criteria stipulated by the BOI regulations.

2. For Granting of approval under Section 16 of the BOI Law.

Foreign investors must obtain BOI approval for the foreign investment entry, to set up projects under this category, under either of the following circustances;

* The foreign investor or company does not fulfill the criteria to set up a project under Section 17 of the BOI Law. * A non-BOI enterprise transfers shares to foreign investors.

Projects approved under Section 16 of the BOI Law would operate under the Normal Laws of the country, and, would not be eligible for the Special Concessions provided under Section 17.
question_en: What are the key differences in eligibility and benefits for investment projects approved under Section 17 versus Section 16 of the BOI Law?
answer_en: Investment projects approved under Section 17 of the BOI Law are eligible for incentives, tax concessions, and customs duty exemptions, applicable to both foreign and local investors who meet BOI regulations. In contrast, projects approved under Section 16, primarily for foreign investors who don't meet Section 17 criteria or through share transfers in non-BOI enterprises, operate under normal country laws and are not eligible for the special concessions offered under Section 17.
question_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் 17வது பிரிவு மற்றும் 16வது பிரிவின் கீழ் அங்கீகரிக்கப்படும் முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்கான தகுதி மற்றும் சலுகைகளில் உள்ள முக்கிய வேறுபாடுகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் 17வது பிரிவின் கீழ் அங்கீகரிக்கப்படும் முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்கு, BOI விதிமுறைகளைப் பூர்த்தி செய்யும் வெளிநாட்டு மற்றும் உள்ளூர் முதலீட்டாளர்கள் ஊக்கத்தொகைகள், வரிச் சலுகைகள் மற்றும் சுங்க வரி விலக்குகள் போன்றவற்றுக்குத் தகுதியுடையவர்கள். மாறாக, 16வது பிரிவின் கீழ் அங்கீகரிக்கப்படும் திட்டங்கள், பொதுவாக 17வது பிரிவின் தகுதிகளைப் பூர்த்தி செய்யாத வெளிநாட்டு முதலீட்டாளர்களுக்கானவை அல்லது BOI அல்லாத நிறுவனங்கள் வெளிநாட்டு முதலீட்டாளர்களுக்குப் பங்குகளை மாற்றும்போது உள்ளவை ஆகும். இத்திட்டங்கள் நாட்டின் சாதாரண சட்டங்களின் கீழ் செயல்படும் மற்றும் 17வது பிரிவின் கீழ் வழங்கப்படும் சிறப்புச் சலுகைகளுக்குத் தகுதியற்றவை.
question_si: BOI නීතියේ 17 වන වගන්තිය සහ 16 වන වගන්තිය යටතේ අනුමත කරන ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා වන සුදුසුකම් සහ ප්‍රතිලාභ වල ප්‍රධාන වෙනස්කම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: BOI නීතියේ 17 වන වගන්තිය යටතේ අනුමත කරන ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා, BOI රෙගුලාසි සපුරාලන විදේශීය සහ දේශීය ආයෝජකයින් දිරිගැන්වීම්, බදු සහන සහ රේගු බදු නිදහස් කිරීම් සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලබයි. ඊට ප්‍රතිවිරුද්ධව, 16 වන වගන්තිය යටතේ අනුමත කරන ව්‍යාපෘති, ප්‍රධාන වශයෙන් 17 වන වගන්තියේ නිර්ණායක සපුරාලන්නේ නැති විදේශීය ආයෝජකයින් සඳහා හෝ BOI නොවන ව්‍යවසායන් විදේශීය ආයෝජකයින්ට කොටස් මාරු කරන අවස්ථාවන්හිදී අදාළ වේ. මෙම ව්‍යාපෘති රටේ සාමාන්‍ය නීති යටතේ ක්‍රියාත්මක වන අතර 17 වන වගන්තිය යටතේ ලබා දෙන විශේෂ සහන සඳහා සුදුසුකම් නොලබයි.

question_ta: "BOI வலய வேலை வங்கிகள் மூலம் வேலை தேடுதல்" சேவைக்காக எந்த வகையான மாதிரி விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்கள் கிடைக்கின்றன?
answer_ta: இரண்டு வகையான மாதிரி விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்கள் கிடைக்கின்றன: ஒரு மாதிரி வேலை வங்கி விண்ணப்பப் படிவம் மற்றும் ஒரு முழுமையான மாதிரி வேலை வங்கி (முழுமையான) விண்ணப்பப் படிவம்.
question_si: "BOI කලාපීය රැකියා බැංකු හරහා රැකියා සොයා ගැනීම" සේවාව සඳහා ලබා ගත හැකි ආදර්ශ අයදුම්පත් මොනවාද?
answer_si: ආදර්ශ අයදුම්පත් වර්ග දෙකක් තිබේ: ආදර්ශ රැකියා බැංකු අයදුම්පතක් සහ සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද ආදර්ශ රැකියා බැංකු (සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද) අයදුම්පතක්.

context:
Service: Importation of Vehicles Under the Gift Scheme for Organizations - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Validity, Costs and Special Cases for Vehicle Importation
---
Validity Time Line : The validity period for this service is 03 months

Note: If the applicant wishes to get an extension on the validity period he/she should make a request with valid reasons to the Controller. The Controller will decide whether to grant the request or not.

Costs Related to the Service

Cost : No cost involved in obtaining Application

Fee : Fee would be 0.1 % of the CIF value mentioned below.

Penalties: When the import exceeds the invoice value, the difference should be paid.

Surcharge: No surcharge involved in this service.

Special Cases If in any case that the applicant wishes to extend the validity period a request should be forwarded to the Controller. The Controller will examine the request and decide whether to grant the request or not.
question_en: What is the validity period for the service of importing vehicles under the Gift Scheme for Organizations, and how can one request an extension?
answer_en: The validity period for this service is 03 months. If an applicant wishes to extend it, a request with valid reasons must be submitted to the Controller, who will decide whether to grant the extension.
question_ta: அமைப்புகளுக்கான பரிசுத் திட்டத்தின் கீழ் வாகனங்களை இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான சேவையின் செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் என்ன, மேலும் அதை நீட்டிக்குமாறு எவ்வாறு கோரலாம்?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவையின் செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் 03 மாதங்கள் ஆகும். விண்ணப்பதாரர் செல்லுபடியாகும் காலத்தை நீட்டிக்க விரும்பினால், செல்லுபடியான காரணங்களுடன் கட்டுப்படுத்திக்கு ஒரு கோரிக்கையைச் சமர்ப்பிக்க வேண்டும். கட்டுப்படுத்தி கோரிக்கையை அங்கீகரிப்பதா இல்லையா என்பதை முடிவு செய்வார்.
question_si: සංවිධාන සඳහා තෑගි යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ වාහන ආනයනය කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා වලංගු කාලය කොපමණද, සහ එය දීර්ඝ කිරීමට ඉල්ලීමක් කළ හැක්කේ කෙසේද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා වලංගු කාලය මාස 03 කි. වලංගු කාලය දීර්ඝ කර ගැනීමට අයදුම්කරුවෙකුට අවශ්‍ය නම්, වලංගු හේතු සහිතව පාලකවරයාට ඉල්ලීමක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතු අතර, පාලකවරයා ඉල්ලීම අනුමත කරන්නේද නැද්ද යන්න තීරණය කරනු ඇත.

question_ta: பழுதுபார்ப்பவர்கள், உற்பத்தியாளர்கள் மற்றும் விற்பனையாளர்களுக்கான உரிமங்களை புதுப்பிப்பதற்கான பதிவு கட்டணம் எவ்வளவு?
answer_ta: பழுதுபார்ப்பவர்கள், உற்பத்தியாளர்கள் மற்றும் விற்பனையாளர்களுக்கான உரிமங்களை புதுப்பிப்பதற்கான பதிவு கட்டணம் ரூ. 300/= ஆகும்.
question_si: අළුත්වැඩියා කරන්නන්, නිෂ්පාදකයින් සහ විකුණුම්කරුවන්ගේ බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීම සඳහා ලියාපදිංචි ගාස්තුව කොපමණද?
answer_si: අළුත්වැඩියා කරන්නන්, නිෂ්පාදකයින් සහ විකුණුම්කරුවන්ගේ බලපත්‍ර අලුත් කිරීම සඳහා ලියාපදිංචි ගාස්තුව රු. 300/= කි.

answer_ta: முதலீட்டுச் சபையின் விநியோகப் பிரிவின் பிரதிப் பணிப்பாளர் திரு. டி. லக்ஷ்மன் பத்திராஜாவை தொலைபேசி எண் +94-11-2427170, தொலைநகல் எண் +94-11-2385736 மற்றும் மின்னஞ்சல் lakshmanp@boi.lk மூலம் தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.

question_ta: சுனாமி காரணமாக தமது மோட்டார் வாகன பதிவுச் சான்றிதழை இழந்த அல்லது சேதப்படுத்தியவர்களுக்கு என்ன சிறப்பு ஏற்பாடு உள்ளது?
answer_ta: சுனாமி காரணமாக பதிவுச் சான்றிதழை இழந்த/சேதப்படுத்தியவர்களுக்கு 3 மாதங்கள் செல்லுபடியாகும் நகல் பதிவுச் சான்றிதழ் வழங்கப்படும்.
question_si: සුනාමි හේතුවෙන් තම මෝටර් රථ ලියාපදිංචි සහතිකය අහිමි වූ හෝ හානි වූ පුද්ගලයන් සඳහා ඇති විශේෂ විධිවිධානය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: සුනාමි හේතුවෙන් ලියාපදිංචි සහතිකය අහිමි වූ හෝ හානි වූ පුද්ගලයන් සඳහා මාස 3ක් වලංගු වන අනු පිටපත් ලියාපදිංචි සහතිකයක් නිකුත් කරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Amended Licenses for Importation of Drugs - Unit 1
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: Amendment Procedure: Submission and Approval
---
Submission Procedure Making Payments Counter – Cashier

Submission of Application Form, Request Letter and support Documents Counter – Unit 01

Procedure

Step 1: Submit request letter to the Head Clerk of Unit 01. Step 2: Unit 01 considers the request. Step 3: Reasons for delay to be submitted to Unit 01 by a letter Step 4: Assistant Controller approves the amendment. Step 5: Payment. Step 6: Makes the amendments to the License.

Note:

- If it’s a time amendment, a letter stating the reason for the delay should be submitted to the Unit 01. Assistant Controller considers the request and approves the amendment.
- If the amendment is for change of the value of the invoice, invoices should be provided. Then the Assistant Controller considers the request and approves the amendment.
- If the amendment is for any other change (names, addresses), a letter stating the problem should be provided to the Unit 01. Then the Assistant Controller considers the request and approves the amendment
question_en: Who is responsible for approving amendments to licenses for the importation of drugs?
answer_en: The Assistant Controller is responsible for approving the amendments to licenses for the importation of drugs.
question_ta: மருந்துகள் இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான உரிமங்களில் திருத்தங்களை அங்கீகரிப்பதற்கு யார் பொறுப்பு?
answer_ta: மருந்துகள் இறக்குமதி செய்வதற்கான உரிமங்களில் திருத்தங்களை உதவி கட்டுப்பாட்டாளர் அங்கீகரிப்பதற்குப் பொறுப்பாவார்.
question_si: ඖෂධ ආනයන බලපත්‍ර සඳහා වන සංශෝධන අනුමත කිරීමට වගකිව යුත්තේ කවුද?
answer_si: ඖෂධ ආනයන බලපත්‍ර සඳහා වන සංශෝධන අනුමත කිරීමට සහකාර පාලක වගකිව යුතු වේ.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Trade Promotion
Topic: Service Charges and Time Taken for Approvals
---
Service Charges

For Provision of advice : No fee is charged for provision of advice.

For Application Processing: Fees for processing of investment application under Section 16 & 17 of the BOI Law is as follows.

(These payments can be made in Sri Lanka Rupees as well)

1. Fees charged Under Section 17 of the BOI Law : US $ 200 + (excluding government taxes).

2. Fees charged Under Section 16 of the BOI Law : US $ 200 + (excluding government taxes) .

Time Taken to Provide Services (General and priority services)

For Provision of advice: • Ten (10) to thirty (30) minutes for general information on investment promotion. • More time will be taken to provide more information.

For Granting of Approvals: • Priority is given to all applications. • The time taken to provide some approvals/services, such as, EIA, location, land, buildings, defence clearance, etc., will be determined by the response time of the relevant Government Ministries, Departments and Organizations in connection with the project.
question_en: What are the fees for processing an investment application under Sections 16 and 17 of the BOI Law?
answer_en: The fee for processing an investment application under Section 16 or 17 of the BOI Law is US $ 200, excluding government taxes. These payments can also be made in Sri Lankan Rupees.
question_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் 16 மற்றும் 17 பிரிவுகளின் கீழ் முதலீட்டு விண்ணப்பத்தைச் செயலாக்குவதற்கான கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் 16 அல்லது 17 பிரிவின் கீழ் முதலீட்டு விண்ணப்பத்தைச் செயலாக்குவதற்கான கட்டணம் அமெரிக்க டாலர் 200 ஆகும், இது அரசாங்க வரிகளைத் தவிர்த்து. இந்த கட்டணங்களை இலங்கை ரூபாயிலும் செலுத்தலாம்.
question_si: BOI නීතියේ 16 සහ 17 වගන්ති යටතේ ආයෝජන අයදුම්පත්‍ර සැකසීම සඳහා වන ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: BOI නීතියේ 16 හෝ 17 වගන්තිය යටතේ ආයෝජන අයදුම්පත්‍රයක් සැකසීම සඳහා ගාස්තුව රජයේ බදු හැර ඇමරිකානු ඩොලර් 200 කි. මෙම ගෙවීම් ශ්‍රී ලංකා රුපියල් වලින් ද කළ හැක.

context:
Service: Obtaining a Temporary Driving License
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Surcharge, Supporting Documents and Service Responsibility Matrix
---
Surcharge:

- At failing on the written test, an applicant must pay Rs. 100.00 for re applying (only valid for three re-applies)
- At failing on the practical test, an applicant must make the full payment for re applying (only valid for three re-applies)

Support Documents Required

- [National Identity Card](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=416&task=info&back=0&pid=395) or [Passport](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=399&task=info&back=0&pid=395)
- Foreign driving license and a photocopy of it, issued by a country, which is approved by the Department of Motor Traffic
- An English translation of the license issued by the relevant country, if it is not in English
- Two copies of black and white photos of size: 2*2 ”Original and a photocopy of Visa issued for staying in Sri Lanka

Service Responsibility Matrix

Designation | Name | Division | Telephone
--- | --- | --- | ---

Assistant Commissioner | Mrs. Chandra Karunasena | Licensing Division | -
Supervising Officer | Mr. Somasiri Fernando | Licensing Division | -
question_en: What is the main category for the service of 'Obtaining a Temporary Driving License'?
answer_en: The main category for obtaining a Temporary Driving License is Trade, Business & Industry.
question_ta: 'தற்காலிக ஓட்டுநர் உரிமம் பெறுதல்' சேவையின் பிரதான வகை என்ன?
answer_ta: தற்காலிக ஓட்டுநர் உரிமம் பெறுதல் சேவையின் பிரதான வகை வர்த்தகம், வணிகம் மற்றும் தொழில் ஆகும்.
question_si: 'තාවකාලික රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම' සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන කාණ්ඩය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: තාවකාලික රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීමේ සේවාවේ ප්‍රධාන කාණ්ඩය වන්නේ වෙළඳාම, ව්‍යාපාර සහ කර්මාන්තයයි.

question_ta: ஓட்டுநர் உரிமத்தை புதுப்பிப்பதற்கான சாதாரண மற்றும் முன்னுரிமை சேவைக்கான செயலாக்க காலக்கெடு என்ன?
answer_ta: முன்னுரிமை சேவைக்கு, துறை அமைப்பில் விவரங்கள் இருந்தால் உரிமம் ஒரு நாளுக்குள் வழங்கப்படும். சாதாரண சேவைக்கு, உரிமம் மூன்று மாதங்களுக்குள் வழங்கப்படும்.
question_si: රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් අලුත් කිරීම සඳහා සාමාන්‍ය සහ ප්‍රමුඛතා සේවා සඳහා සැකසීමේ කාලසීමාවන් මොනවාද?
answer_si: ප්‍රමුඛතා සේවාව සඳහා, දෙපාර්තමේන්තු පද්ධතියේ විස්තර තිබේ නම් බලපත්‍රයක් දින 1ක් ඇතුළත නිකුත් කෙරේ. සාමාන්‍ය සේවාව සඳහා, බලපත්‍රයක් මාස 3ක් ඇතුළත නිකුත් කෙරේ.

context:
Service: Grant approval for Indirect Exports
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: Qualifications, Procedure, and Application Details for Indirect Exports
---
Qualifications required 1. The enterprise should have signed an agreement with the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka. 2. Provision in the agreement for making [Indirect Exports](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=0&task=info&back=0&pid=1292) of items produced by the project. 3. Service/Annual fees should have been paid without dues.

Procedure for Submitting of Applications : After effecting the Indirect Export, a perfected GRN Form should be fowarded to the point of service.

Places where Applications could be Obtained :

Investor Services Department, Board of Investment of Sri Lanka, No. 14, Sir Baron Jayathilake Mawatha, Colombo 01.

or

Relevant Investor Services sub office at the Export Processing Zones / Industrial Parks at Katunayake / Biyagama / Koggala / Seethawake / Pallekele.

Application Fees : No fees charged.

Time Allotted for Submitting of Application : From 8:30 am to 3:30 pm on public working days.

Service Charges : Rs. 104/=

Time Taken to Provide Services (General and Priority services) : The perfected GRN Form is required by the BOI for reconciling the data of [Indirect Exports](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=0&task=info&back=0&pid=1292) effected by the enterprise. Handing over the GRN Form would take few minutes, and the time taken would depend on the prevailing rush at the counter.

Required Documents : The Invoice should be kept ready for forwarding if necessary.
question_en: What are the main qualifications an enterprise must meet to obtain approval for Indirect Exports?
answer_en: An enterprise must have signed an agreement with the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka, the agreement must have a provision for indirect exports of items produced by the project, and all service or annual fees should have been paid without dues.
question_ta: மறைமுக ஏற்றுமதிகளுக்கான அங்கீகாரத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கு ஒரு நிறுவனம் பூர்த்தி செய்ய வேண்டிய முக்கிய தகுதிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: ஒரு நிறுவனம் இலங்கை முதலீட்டுச் சபையுடன் ஒப்பந்தம் செய்திருக்க வேண்டும், அந்த ஒப்பந்தத்தில் திட்டத்தால் உற்பத்தி செய்யப்படும் பொருட்களின் மறைமுக ஏற்றுமதிக்கான ஏற்பாடு இருக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் அனைத்து சேவை அல்லது ஆண்டு கட்டணங்களும் நிலுவையில்லாமல் செலுத்தப்பட்டிருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: වක්‍ර අපනයන සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීමට ව්‍යවසායයක් සපුරාලිය යුතු ප්‍රධාන සුදුසුකම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: ව්‍යවසායයක් ශ්‍රී ලංකා ආයෝජන මණ්ඩලය සමඟ ගිවිසුමක් අත්සන් කර තිබිය යුතු අතර, ව්‍යාපෘතිය මඟින් නිෂ්පාදනය කරන ලද භාණ්ඩ වක්‍ර අපනයනය සඳහා ගිවිසුමේ විධිවිධානයක් තිබිය යුතු අතර, සියලුම සේවා හෝ වාර්ෂික ගාස්තු හිඟයකින් තොරව ගෙවා තිබිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Obtaining Assistance in Filling Insurance Forms
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Steps to Obtain Insurance Claim Assistance After a Motor Accident
---
Step 1: Driver immediately visit motor traffic division of police station after the accident. Step 2: Police issues an Extract of Complain for insurance form ( [police 424 form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) ) Step 3: The driver fills ‘424 form’ ( [police 424 form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) ) given by the police and submits it to the relevant insurance company to collect the insurance application form. Step 4: The driver visits motor traffic division in police station and gets assistance to fill [Insurance form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) . Step 5: The driver visits motor traffic division in police station and gets assistance to fill [Insurance form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) . Step 6: The driver submits filled application form to the insurance company. Qualification Criteria The person concerned should have been subjected to a motor accident and encountered damages or loss. The person concerned should have motor vehicle insurance for the damaged vehicle.
question_en: What is the main topic covered for obtaining assistance with an insurance claim after a motor accident?
answer_en: The main topic covered is the steps to obtain insurance claim assistance after a motor accident.
question_ta: மோட்டார் வாகன விபத்துக்குப் பிறகு காப்பீட்டு உரிமைகோரல் உதவி பெறுவதற்கான முக்கிய தலைப்பு என்ன?
answer_ta: மோட்டார் வாகன விபத்துக்குப் பிறகு காப்பீட்டு உரிமைகோரல் உதவி பெறுவதற்கான படிகள் என்பதே முக்கிய தலைப்பாகும்.
question_si: මෝටර් රථ අනතුරකින් පසු රක්ෂණ හිමිකම් ආධාර ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ආවරණය වන ප්‍රධාන මාතෘකාව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: මෝටර් රථ අනතුරකින් පසු රක්ෂණ හිමිකම් ආධාර ලබා ගැනීමේ පියවරයන් ආවරණය වන ප්‍රධාන මාතෘකාවයි.

question_en: What are the charges for obtaining trade information and statistics for different categories of users?
answer_en: University students with a confirmation letter can obtain the service for free. SMEs (Non-export business entities) and Exporters are charged a processing fee of LKR 200 and LKR 25 per page. Chambers & Trade Associations are charged LKR 200 processing fee and LKR 50 per page. Banks & Financial Institutions are charged LKR 500 processing fee and LKR 100 per page.
question_ta: வர்த்தகத் தகவல்கள் மற்றும் புள்ளிவிவரங்களைப் பெறுவதற்கான கட்டணங்கள் பல்வேறு வகையான பயனாளர்களுக்கு எவ்வாறு வேறுபடுகின்றன?
answer_ta: பல்கலைக்கழக உறுதிப்படுத்தல் கடிதத்துடன் வரும் பல்கலைக்கழக மாணவர்களுக்கு இந்த சேவை இலவசம். SMEகள் (ஏற்றுமதி அல்லாத வணிக நிறுவனங்கள்) மற்றும் ஏற்றுமதியாளர்களுக்கு செயல்முறை கட்டணம் LKR 200 மற்றும் ஒரு பக்கத்திற்கு LKR 25. வர்த்தக சபைகள் மற்றும் வர்த்தக சங்கங்களுக்கு செயல்முறை கட்டணம் LKR 200 மற்றும் ஒரு பக்கத்திற்கு LKR 50. வங்கிகள் மற்றும் நிதி நிறுவனங்களுக்கு செயல்முறை கட்டணம் LKR 500 மற்றும் ஒரு பக்கத்திற்கு LKR 100.
question_si: වෙළඳ තොරතුරු සහ සංඛ්‍යා ලේඛන ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා විවිධ කාණ්ඩවල පරිශීලකයින් සඳහා අය කෙරෙන ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: විශ්වවිද්‍යාලයකින් තහවුරු කිරීමේ ලිපියක් සමඟ පැමිණෙන විශ්වවිද්‍යාල සිසුන්ට මෙම සේවාව නොමිලේ. SMEs (අපනයන නොවන ව්‍යාපාරික ආයතන) සහ අපනයනකරුවන්ට සැකසුම් ගාස්තුව LKR 200 ක් සහ එක් පිටුවකට LKR 25 ක් අය කෙරේ. වාණිජ මණ්ඩල සහ වෙළඳ සංගම් සඳහා සැකසුම් ගාස්තුව LKR 200 ක් සහ එක් පිටුවකට LKR 50 ක් අය කෙරේ. බැංකු සහ මූල්‍ය ආයතන සඳහා සැකසුම් ගාස්තුව LKR 500 ක් සහ එක් පිටුවකට LKR 100 ක් අය කෙරේ.

context:
Service: Import of Vehicles Under Gift Scheme - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Penalties and Surcharges
---
Penalties : Genuineness of the documents submitted will be verified with relevant agencies and if forged document are submitted, those applicants will be black listed.

Surcharge : No surcharge involved in this service
question_en: What are the penalties for submitting forged documents when importing vehicles under the Gift Scheme?
answer_en: If forged documents are submitted, applicants will be blacklisted. The genuineness of the documents will be verified with relevant agencies.
question_ta: பரிசுத் திட்டத்தின் கீழ் வாகனங்களை இறக்குமதி செய்யும் போது போலி ஆவணங்களைச் சமர்ப்பித்தால் என்ன தண்டனைகள் விதிக்கப்படும்?
answer_ta: போலி ஆவணங்கள் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்பட்டால், விண்ணப்பதாரர்கள் கறுப்புப் பட்டியலில் சேர்க்கப்படுவார்கள். ஆவணங்களின் உண்மைத்தன்மை சம்பந்தப்பட்ட நிறுவனங்களுடன் சரிபார்க்கப்படும்.
question_si: තෑගි යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ වාහන ආනයනය කිරීමේදී ව්‍යාජ ලේඛන ඉදිරිපත් කළහොත් අදාළ වන දඬුවම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: ව්‍යාජ ලේඛන ඉදිරිපත් කළහොත්, අයදුම්කරුවන් කළු ලැයිස්තුගත කරනු ඇත. ලේඛනවල සත්‍යතාව අදාළ ආයතන සමඟ සත්‍යාපනය කරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Registration for Kalayatana (Art Schools)
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Loans, Funds & Incentive Schemes
Topic: Application Process and Additional Information for Kalayatanas Registration
---
i. Before the submission of [application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/Kalayathana Registration Application.pdf) for registration - you must have conducted class at least for an year uninterrupted. The [application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/Kalayathana Registration Application.pdf) form perfected by the Principal of the Kalayatanaya should be forwarded to the Director of Cultural Affairs with the recommendation of Grama Seva Niladhari of the area, Divisional Cultural Officer or Cultural Development Assistants. Applications can be obtained from the Department of Cultural Affairs and the relevant Divisional Secretariats. No fee will be charged for [application](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/Kalayathana Registration Application.pdf) . Application can be submitted within office hours on any period of the year. No charges levied for services rendered. Occupation will be granted within one day if the necessary documents and other eligibilities are fulfilled. 01.If the Kalayatana is conducted in a building owned by another, owner’s letter giving his consent for the continuation of this class must be forwarded for perusal 02.Certified copy to prove the validity of the Teaching Staff – as to this proficiency in the particular sphere of training. Director of Cultural Affairs, Deputy Director of Cultural Affairs and the Assistant Director of Cultural Affairs will as Staff officers. Deputy Director of Cultural Affairs will notify the subjects re.. for the categorized Kalayatanas (School of Art) Students who got trained in relevant subjects of activities will be given a proficiency test in that activity every year.Test will be conducted in both theory and practical.
question_en: What is the primary prerequisite for a Kalayatana before submitting an application for registration?
answer_en: Before the submission of an application for registration, a Kalayatana must have conducted classes for at least one year uninterruptedly.
question_ta: கலாயதனா பதிவுக்கான விண்ணப்பத்தைச் சமர்ப்பிக்கும் முன் அதன் முதன்மை முன்நிபந்தனை என்ன?
answer_ta: பதிவுக்கான விண்ணப்பத்தைச் சமர்ப்பிக்கும் முன், ஒரு கலாயதனா குறைந்தபட்சம் ஒரு வருடமாவது தடையின்றி வகுப்புகளை நடத்தியிருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: කල්‍යාතනාවක් ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා අයදුම්පතක් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමට පෙර තිබිය යුතු මූලික පූර්ව අවශ්‍යතාවය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමට පෙර, කල්‍යාතනාවක් අවම වශයෙන් වසරක්වත් අඛණ්ඩව පන්ති පවත්වා තිබිය යුතුය.
