question_ta: "BOI மண்டல வேலை வங்கிகள் மூலம் வேலை தேடுதல்" சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான இயக்குநர் யார், மற்றும் அவரது தொடர்பு விவரங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: திரு. டபிள்யூ. ஏ. எஃப். ஜயசிரி அவர்கள் இயக்குநர் ஆவார். அவர் தலைமை அலுவலகத்தின் ஐ.ஆர் பிரிவில் உள்ளார். அவரை +94-11-2427125, 2430516 என்ற தொலைபேசி எண்களிலும், +94-11-2387148 என்ற தொலைநகல் எண்ணிலும் அல்லது jayasiriw@boi.lk என்ற மின்னஞ்சல் மூலமும் தொடர்பு கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: "BOI කලාපීය රැකියා බැංකු හරහා රැකියා සොයාගැනීම" සේවාව සඳහා සේවාවන් භාර අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා කවුද සහ ඔහුගේ සම්බන්ධතා තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: ඩබ්ලිව්. ඒ. එෆ්. ජයසිරි මහතා අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා වන අතර, ඔහු ප්‍රධාන කාර්යාලයේ I R ඒකකයේ සේවය කරයි. ඔහුට +94-11-2427125, 2430516 දුරකථන අංකවලින්, +94-11-2387148 ෆැක්ස් අංකයෙන්, හෝ jayasiriw@boi.lk විද්‍යුත් තැපෑලෙන් සම්බන්ධ විය හැකිය.

context:
Service: Registering a New Motor Vehicle
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Registration Procedure: Steps 8-11, Inaccurate Documents, and Eligible Vehicles
---
Step 8: Department checks for the accuracy of the documents provided Step 9: Department sends the application to a new registration counter Step 10: Department issues the Vehicle Identification Card Step 11: Department issues the number plate for the applicant

If relevant documents submitted by Applicant are found Inaccurate: Reject Request for Registration and the Applicant should Re-submit all relevant documents.

Eligibility Following are the relevant vehicles that can be Registered:

1. Car
2. Lorry
3. Motor Coach
4. Three Wheeler
5. Land Vehicle
6. Motor

The Motor vehicle should hold all complete customs documents which contain all details such as make, Engine No, chassis No, Color, Engine capacity, cylinder capacity, seating capacity.
question_en: What essential details must be present in the customs documents for a motor vehicle to be eligible for registration?
answer_en: For a motor vehicle to be registered, its complete customs documents must contain all details such as make, Engine No, chassis No, Color, Engine capacity, cylinder capacity, and seating capacity.
question_ta: புதிய மோட்டார் வாகனத்தை பதிவு செய்வதற்கு தகுதியுடையதாக இருக்க, சுங்க ஆவணங்களில் என்ன அத்தியாவசிய விவரங்கள் இருக்க வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: ஒரு மோட்டார் வாகனத்தை பதிவு செய்ய தகுதியுடையதாக இருக்க, அதன் முழுமையான சுங்க ஆவணங்களில் தயாரிப்பு, இயந்திர எண், சேஸ் எண், நிறம், இயந்திர கொள்ளளவு, சிலிண்டர் கொள்ளளவு மற்றும் இருக்கை கொள்ளளவு போன்ற அனைத்து விவரங்களும் இருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: නව මෝටර් රථයක් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට, රේගු ලේඛනවල අත්‍යවශ්‍ය විස්තර මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෝටර් රථයක් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීම සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට නම්, එහි සම්පූර්ණ රේගු ලේඛනවල නිෂ්පාදනය, එන්ජින් අංකය, චැසි අංකය, වර්ණය, එන්ජින් ධාරිතාව, සිලින්ඩර ධාරිතාව සහ ආසන ධාරිතාව වැනි සියලුම විස්තර අඩංගු විය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Obtaining a Temporary Driving License
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Timeline, Costs and Penalties
---
Process Timeline:

Applied for one-day (priority) service | License issued within 3 days
--- | ---
Applied for normal service | License issued within 2 week

Submission Timeline: For Obtaining & Submitting Application Forms:

Working days | Mondays to Fridays
--- | ---
Counter open hours | 9:30 am to 3:30 pm (Normal)
Counter open hours | 9:30 am to 12:30 pm (Priority)
Holidays | All Public and Mercantile Days

Note: One Day Processing Applicants can obtain their Temporary License after 3:30 pm, within the same day of submitting forms. Validity Timeline: Validity of the application expires if the practical examination is performed after 6 months of submitting the application

Costs Related to Service

Cost of Obtaining the Application: Application forms provided free of charge

Fee:

Duration of the license | Fee
--- | ---
Less than 1 month | Rs. 600.00
Less than 2 month | Rs. 1200.00

Penalty: No penalties involved in the process of issuing licenses
question_en: What is the processing timeline for obtaining a temporary driving license when applying for the one-day (priority) service, and when can it be collected?
answer_en: When applying for the one-day (priority) service, the temporary driving license is generally issued within 3 days. However, applicants who opt for one-day processing can obtain their temporary license after 3:30 pm on the same day they submit the forms.
question_ta: ஒரு நாள் (முன்னுரிமை) சேவைக்கு விண்ணப்பிக்கும்போது தற்காலிக ஓட்டுநர் உரிமத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான செயலாக்க காலக்கெடு என்ன, அதை எப்போது பெற்றுக்கொள்ளலாம்?
answer_ta: ஒரு நாள் (முன்னுரிமை) சேவைக்கு விண்ணப்பிக்கும்போது, தற்காலிக ஓட்டுநர் உரிமம் பொதுவாக 3 நாட்களுக்குள் வழங்கப்படும். இருப்பினும், ஒரு நாள் செயலாக்கத்தைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கும் விண்ணப்பதாரர்கள், படிவங்களைச் சமர்ப்பித்த அதே நாளில் பிற்பகல் 3:30 மணிக்கு மேல் தங்கள் தற்காலிக உரிமத்தைப் பெற்றுக்கொள்ளலாம்.
question_si: එක් දින (ප්‍රමුඛතා) සේවාව සඳහා අයදුම් කරන විට තාවකාලික රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියාවලි කාලරාමුව කුමක්ද සහ එය ලබා ගත හැක්කේ කවදාද?
answer_si: එක් දින (ප්‍රමුඛතා) සේවාව සඳහා අයදුම් කරන විට, තාවකාලික රියදුරු බලපත්‍රය සාමාන්‍යයෙන් දින 3ක් ඇතුළත නිකුත් කෙරේ. කෙසේ වෙතත්, එක් දින සැකසීම තෝරා ගන්නා අයදුම්කරුවන්ට පෝරම ඉදිරිපත් කළ දිනම ප.ව. 3:30 න් පසු තම තාවකාලික බලපත්‍රය ලබා ගත හැකිය.

context:
Service: Registration for Kalayatana (Art Schools)
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Loans, Funds & Incentive Schemes
Topic: Specific Requirements for Kalayatanas Registration
---
c. Kalayatana Hall must be placed or situated a distance away from the households or neighbours to avoid disturbance and noise. d. This situated in the constitution, each Kalayatana should possess at least the minimum number of equipments or musical instruments deemed necessary to conduct the relevant course of study. e. Availability of office equipments as stated in the constitution. f. At last one teacher well-qualified in the relevant sphere of study – should be available for the Kalayatanaya so registered according to the categories mentioned in the Constitution. g .The Principal of the Kalayatanaya seeking registration under column 2 of the Constitution – should possess the final year pass in the University as Kalayathanadhipathy or a certificate to show the validity as a versatile artiste well-versed in the study of Kalayatana course of training and the history of teaching profession and the possibility of submitting a certificate of two year raining in the relevant field. h .To conduct 10 hours training class for a week within two days spending at least 5 hours a day for two days complete. (Kalayatanaya as one not allowed to grant long leave for occasions like New year, Religious Festivals or cultivation activities.
question_en: What are the mandatory qualifications required for the Principal of a Kalayatana seeking registration?
answer_en: The Principal of a Kalayatana seeking registration must possess a final year pass in the University as Kalayathanadhipathy, or a certificate demonstrating validity as a versatile artiste well-versed in the Kalayatana course of training and teaching profession history, along with a two-year training certificate in the relevant field.
question_ta: பதிவு செய்ய முற்படும் கலாயதனத்தின் அதிபருக்குத் தேவையான கட்டாயத் தகுதிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: பதிவு செய்ய முற்படும் கலாயதனத்தின் அதிபர், பல்கலைக்கழகத்தில் கலாயதனதிபதி என்ற இறுதிப் பரீட்சையில் தேர்ச்சி பெற்றிருக்க வேண்டும், அல்லது கலாயதனப் பயிற்சி மற்றும் கற்பித்தல் வரலாற்றில் தேர்ச்சி பெற்ற பன்முகக் கலைஞர் என்பதற்கான செல்லுபடியாகும் சான்றிதழுடன், தொடர்புடைய துறையில் இரண்டு வருட பயிற்சிச் சான்றிதழைப் பெற்றிருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: ලියාපදිංචිය අපේක්ෂා කරන කලායතනයක විදුහල්පතිවරයා සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය සුදුසුකම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: ලියාපදිංචිය අපේක්ෂා කරන කලායතනයක විදුහල්පතිවරයා විශ්වවිද්‍යාලයේ කලායතනාධිපති ලෙස අවසන් වසර සමත්ව තිබිය යුතුය, නැතහොත් කලායතන පුහුණු පාඨමාලාව සහ ඉගැන්වීමේ වෘත්තියේ ඉතිහාසය පිළිබඳ මනා දැනුමක් ඇති බහුවිධ කලාකරුවෙකු ලෙස වලංගු භාවය පෙන්වන සහතිකයක් සහ අදාළ ක්ෂේත්‍රයේ වසර දෙකක පුහුණු සහතිකයක් තිබිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Trade Promotion
Topic: BOI Law: Section 17 vs. Section 16 Approvals
---
Granting of approval for Investment Proposals is done in keeping with the regulations setup under Sections 17 or 16 of the BOI Law. The eligibility criteria to be satisfied under these regulations are briefed below.

1. For Granting of approval under Section 17 of the BOI Law.

Investors (both foreign and local) are eligible for relevant incentives, tax concessions, customs duty exemptions, etc., provided the fulfilling of eligibility criteria stipulated by the BOI regulations.

2. For Granting of approval under Section 16 of the BOI Law.

Foreign investors must obtain BOI approval for the foreign investment entry, to set up projects under this category, under either of the following circustances;

*   The foreign investor or company does not fulfill the criteria to set up a project under Section 17 of the BOI Law. * A non-BOI enterprise transfers shares to foreign investors.

Projects approved under Section 16 of the BOI Law would operate under the Normal Laws of the country, and, would not be eligible for the Special Concessions provided under Section 17.
question_en: What is the main difference in benefits for projects approved under Section 17 versus Section 16 of the BOI Law?
answer_en: Projects approved under Section 17 of the BOI Law are eligible for incentives, tax concessions, and customs duty exemptions, while projects approved under Section 16 operate under Normal Laws and are not eligible for these special concessions.
question_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 17 மற்றும் பிரிவு 16 இன் கீழ் அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட திட்டங்களுக்கான சலுகைகளில் உள்ள முக்கிய வேறுபாடு என்ன?
answer_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 17 இன் கீழ் அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட திட்டங்கள் ஊக்கத்தொகைகள், வரிச் சலுகைகள் மற்றும் சுங்க வரி விலக்குகள் பெறத் தகுதியுடையவை, ஆனால் பிரிவு 16 இன் கீழ் அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட திட்டங்கள் சாதாரண சட்டங்களின் கீழ் செயல்படும் மற்றும் இந்த சிறப்புச் சலுகைகளுக்குத் தகுதியற்றவை.
question_si: BOI නීතියේ 17 වගන්තිය සහ 16 වගන්තිය යටතේ අනුමත කරන ලද ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා වන ප්‍රතිලාභවල ප්‍රධාන වෙනස කුමක්ද?
answer_si: BOI නීතියේ 17 වගන්තිය යටතේ අනුමත කරන ලද ව්‍යාපෘති දිරිගැන්වීම්, බදු සහන සහ රේගු බදු නිදහස් කිරීම් සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලබන අතර, 16 වගන්තිය යටතේ අනුමත කරන ලද ව්‍යාපෘති සාමාන්‍ය නීති යටතේ ක්‍රියාත්මක වන අතර මෙම විශේෂ සහන සඳහා සුදුසුකම් නොලබයි.

context:
Service: Export Marketing Support
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Exports
Topic: Overview of Trade Fair and Export Promotion Services
---
Name of the Service | Trade Fairs, Buyer/Seller Meetings, Matchmaking Programmes overseas Seminars/Workshops/Capacity Building Training National branding programmes to promote the image of the country and business image of Sri Lanka internationally. International cooperation programmes on trade promotion EDB Scheme of Assistance for Exporters’ Own Marketing Efforts Overseas
---
Activities | Trade Fairs Organizes participation of Sri Lankan exporters at major International Trade Fairs in potential overseas markets to facilitate B 2 B promotions. Among these events there are Industry Specific trade fairs, Multi product fairs, Regional Fairs & Solo Exhibitions Selling Missions Conducts selling missions, incoming trade missions, and other export promotion projects, in-store promotions, specialized exhibitions and special product displays abroad. Business Matching Assists buyers and exporters in making appropriate contacts. Technical and Export Marketing Assistance Coordinates integrated technical and export marketing assistance programs to foster the growth of emerging export industries. Market Research Understanding the market is key in deciding where, when, what and how to export. Guided by the market /product combination approach, we undertake market research activities to formulate appropriate market entry and penetration strategies for exporters. Export marketing plans * Latest market forecasts,* Export Strategies on Sri Lanka’s priority sectors,* Business counseling and coaching, * Buyer-Seller facilitation.
question_en: What are the key services offered under the "Export Marketing Support" program to promote Sri Lankan businesses internationally?
answer_en: The key services offered include Trade Fairs, Buyer/Seller Meetings, Matchmaking Programmes overseas, Seminars/Workshops/Capacity Building Training, National branding programmes to promote the image of the country and business image of Sri Lanka internationally, International cooperation programmes on trade promotion, and the EDB Scheme of Assistance for Exporters’ Own Marketing Efforts Overseas.
question_ta: இலங்கை வணிகங்களை சர்வதேச அளவில் மேம்படுத்துவதற்காக "ஏற்றுமதி சந்தைப்படுத்தல் ஆதரவு" திட்டத்தின் கீழ் வழங்கப்படும் முக்கிய சேவைகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: வழங்கப்படும் முக்கிய சேவைகளில் வர்த்தக கண்காட்சிகள், வெளிநாட்டு வாங்குபவர்/விற்பனையாளர் சந்திப்புகள், பொருத்தப்படுத்தும் திட்டங்கள், கருத்தரங்குகள்/பயிற்சிப் பட்டறைகள்/திறன் மேம்பாட்டுப் பயிற்சி, நாட்டின் பிம்பத்தையும் இலங்கையின் வணிக பிம்பத்தையும் சர்வதேச அளவில் மேம்படுத்துவதற்கான தேசிய வர்த்தக முத்திரை திட்டங்கள், வர்த்தக மேம்பாடு தொடர்பான சர்வதேச ஒத்துழைப்பு திட்டங்கள் மற்றும் ஏற்றுமதியாளர்களின் சொந்த சந்தைப்படுத்தல் முயற்சிகளுக்கான EDB உதவித் திட்டம் ஆகியவை அடங்கும்.
question_si: ජාත්‍යන්තරව ශ්‍රී ලංකා ව්‍යාපාර ප්‍රවර්ධනය කිරීම සඳහා "අපනයන අලෙවිකරණ සහාය" වැඩසටහන යටතේ සපයනු ලබන ප්‍රධාන සේවා මොනවාද?
answer_si: සපයනු ලබන ප්‍රධාන සේවා අතර වෙළඳ ප්‍රදර්ශන, ගැනුම්කරු/විකිණුම්කරු හමුවීම්, විදේශීය ගැලපීම් වැඩසටහන්, සම්මන්ත්‍රණ/වැඩමුළු/හැකියාවන් ගොඩනැගීමේ පුහුණුව, රටේ ප්‍රතිරූපය සහ ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ව්‍යාපාරික ප්‍රතිරූපය ජාත්‍යන්තරව ප්‍රවර්ධනය කිරීම සඳහා වන ජාතික සන්නාමකරණ වැඩසටහන්, වෙළඳ ප්‍රවර්ධනය පිළිබඳ ජාත්‍යන්තර සහයෝගිතා වැඩසටහන් සහ අපනයනකරුවන්ගේ ස්වකීය අලෙවිකරණ ප්‍රයත්න සඳහා EDB ආධාර යෝජනා ක්‍රමය ඇතුළත් වේ.

question_ta: கல்வித் துறைக்கான குழுத் தலைவர் யார், அவர்களின் பதவி என்ன?
answer_ta: கல்வித் துறைக்கான குழுத் தலைவர் திருமதி நிலுபுல் டி சில்வா ஆவார், அவர்களின் பதவி இயக்குனர்.
question_si: අධ්‍යාපන අංශයේ කණ්ඩායම් ප්‍රධානියා කවුද සහ ඔවුන්ගේ තනතුර කුමක්ද?
answer_si: අධ්‍යාපන අංශයේ කණ්ඩායම් ප්‍රධානියා වන්නේ නීලුපුල් ද සිල්වා මහත්මිය වන අතර ඇයගේ තනතුර අධ්‍යක්ෂක වේ.

context:
Service: Block License - Unit 1
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: Eligibility, Required Documents, and Submission Procedure for Block License (Part 1)
---
Eligibility Should provide part shipment licenses for the last 3 years

Note: If the applicant has not abided by the licensing conditions the issue of his Block license will be rejected.

Support Documents Required Request Letter Documents to show history of the importations

Submission Procedure Making payments Counter – Cashier Submission of Indent Form, Request Letter and Documents with supported documents. Counter – Unit 01

Procedure

Step 1: Applicant should submit request letter to Unit 01 for Block License. Step 2: Unit 01 examines importation history of the applicant for the past 03 years. Step 3: Unit 01 directs the request to the Assistant Controller. Step 4: Assistant Controller approves the request. Step 5: Unit 01 charges the licensing fee of 0.1 % of the Invoice Value. Step 6: Unit 01 issues the Block License.

Note: If Assistant Controller is not satisfied with importation history of the applicant, request will be rejected.
question_en: What is the main eligibility requirement for obtaining a Block License?
answer_en: To be eligible for a Block License, an applicant must have provided part shipment licenses for the last three years.
question_ta: பிளாக் உரிமம் பெறுவதற்கான முக்கிய தகுதித் தேவை என்ன?
answer_ta: பிளாக் உரிமம் பெற தகுதியுடையவராக இருக்க, விண்ணப்பதாரர் கடந்த மூன்று ஆண்டுகளாக பகுதி சரக்கு அனுப்பும் உரிமங்களை வழங்கியிருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: බ්ලොක් බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා ප්‍රධාන සුදුසුකම් අවශ්‍යතාවය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: බ්ලොක් බලපත්‍රයක් සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමට නම්, අයදුම්කරු පසුගිය වසර තුන සඳහා කොටස් නැව්ගත කිරීමේ බලපත්‍ර ලබා දී තිබිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Information
Topic: Service Charges and Time Taken for Services
---
Time allotted for submitting of Applications On public working days, from 8.30AM to 4.30PM, at offices given above.

Service Charges

For Provision of advice : No fee is charged for provision of advice.

For Application Processing: Fees for processing of investment application under Section 16 & 17 of the BOI Law is as follows.

(These payments can be made in Sri Lanka Rupees as well)

1. Fees charged Under Section 17 of the BOI Law : US $ 200 + (excluding government taxes).

2. Fees charged Under Section 16 of the BOI Law : US $ 200 + (excluding government taxes) .

Time Taken to Provide Services (General and priority services)

For Provision of advice: • Ten (10) to thirty (30) minutes for general information on investment promotion. • More time will be taken to provide more information.

For Granting of Approvals: • Priority is given to all applications. • The time taken to provide some approvals/services, such as, EIA, location, land, buildings, defence clearance, etc., will be determined by the response time of the relevant Government Ministries, Departments and Organizations in connection with the project.
question_en: What are the service charges for processing investment applications under Section 16 or 17 of the BOI Law?
answer_en: The fee for processing an investment application under Section 16 or 17 of the BOI Law is US $ 200, excluding government taxes. These payments can also be made in Sri Lanka Rupees.
question_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 16 அல்லது 17 இன் கீழ் முதலீட்டு விண்ணப்பங்களைச் செயலாக்குவதற்கான சேவை கட்டணங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: BOI சட்டத்தின் பிரிவு 16 அல்லது 17 இன் கீழ் முதலீட்டு விண்ணப்பத்தைச் செயலாக்குவதற்கான கட்டணம் அமெரிக்க டாலர் 200 ஆகும், இது அரசாங்க வரிகளைத் தவிர்த்து. இந்த கட்டணங்களை இலங்கை ரூபாயிலும் செலுத்தலாம்.
question_si: BOI නීතියේ 16 හෝ 17 වගන්තිය යටතේ ආයෝජන අයදුම්පත් සැකසීම සඳහා සේවා ගාස්තු මොනවාද?
answer_si: BOI නීතියේ 16 හෝ 17 වගන්තිය යටතේ ආයෝජන අයදුම්පතක් සැකසීම සඳහා වන ගාස්තුව එක්සත් ජනපද ඩොලර් 200 කි, රජයේ බදු හැර. මෙම ගෙවීම් ශ්‍රී ලංකා රුපියල් වලින් ද කළ හැකිය.

context:
Service: Importation of Body Shells - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Application and Submission Procedure for Import License
---
Submission Procedure Obtain [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) s and support Documents Counter – Unit 02

Making Payments Counter – Cashier

Submission of [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) Request Letter and Documents Counter – Unit 02

[Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) s Specimen [Indent Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/)

Procedure

Step 1: Applicant obtains [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) from Unit 02. Step 2: Submits the completed [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) to Unit 02 with relevant documents. Step 3: Direct the applicant to the Asst. controller for his approval if the application is filed properly with relevant documents. Step 4: The applicant to pay license fees to Cashier and submits invoices to Unit 02. Step 5: Issue the license

Note: If the relevant documents are not submitted, the applicant will be informed of such documents. If the [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) is not filled properly, he will be assisted.
question_en: What is the procedure for obtaining an import license for Body Shells - Unit 2?
answer_en: The procedure for obtaining an import license for body shells involves five steps: obtaining the application form from Unit 02, submitting the completed form with relevant documents, getting approval from the Asst. controller, paying license fees to the Cashier, and finally, the license is issued.
question_ta: Body Shells - Unit 2 இறக்குமதி உரிமத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான நடைமுறை என்ன?
answer_ta: body shells இறக்குமதி உரிமத்தைப் பெறுவதற்கான நடைமுறையில் ஐந்து படிகள் உள்ளன: யூனிட் 02 இலிருந்து விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தைப் பெறுதல், பூர்த்தி செய்யப்பட்ட படிவத்தை தொடர்புடைய ஆவணங்களுடன் சமர்ப்பித்தல், உதவி கட்டுப்பாட்டாளரின் ஒப்புதலைப் பெறுதல், பணப்பாளர் கவிடம் உரிமக் கட்டணத்தைச் செலுத்துதல் மற்றும் இறுதியாக, உரிமம் வழங்கப்படும்.
question_si: බොඩි ෂෙල් - ඒකක 2 ආනයනය සඳහා බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියා පටිපාටිය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: බොඩි ෂෙල් ආනයන බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීමේ ක්‍රියා පටිපාටියට පියවර පහක් ඇතුළත් වේ: ඒකක 02 වෙතින් අයදුම් පත්‍රය ලබා ගැනීම, අදාළ ලේඛන සමඟ සම්පූර්ණ කළ අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කිරීම, සහකාර පාලකගෙන් අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම, මුදල් අයකැමි වෙත බලපත්‍ර ගාස්තු ගෙවීම සහ අවසානයේ බලපත්‍රය නිකුත් කිරීම.

context:
Service: Business Library Service
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Exports
Topic: Overview of the Business Library Service
---
The Business Library Service is designed for exporters, potential exporters, and the general public. It offers a wealth of information including product, market, and trade-related publications. You can also find newsletters, journals, international news magazines, buyer's directories, and research studies. Additional resources include tariff information, trade statistics, price information, and market, country, and project reports. The library operates during office hours, from 8.15 a.m. to 4.15 p.m. on working days. Visitors can receive advice and assistance on utilizing the available library resources and facilities. This service is provided free of charge. The time required to provide the service depends on the client's specific information requirements. No specific documents are required to access the service. The Trade Facilitation and Trade Information Division manages this service. For further assistance, you can contact Ms. Chathuri Pathmaperuma, an Export Promotion Officer. She can be reached at 0112300678 (telephone) or 2300676 (fax), or via email at chathu@edb.gov.lk. Ms. Pathmaperuma can help with inquiries about the library’s resources, how to find specific information, and any other questions related to export and trade data available through the service.
question_en: What is the Business Library Service, and what kind of information does it provide to its users, especially those involved in exports?
answer_en: The Business Library Service is designed for exporters, potential exporters, and the general public. It offers a wealth of information including product, market, and trade-related publications, newsletters, journals, international news magazines, buyer's directories, research studies, tariff information, trade statistics, price information, and market, country, and project reports to assist with export and trade data.
question_ta: வணிக நூலக சேவை என்றால் என்ன, மேலும் குறிப்பாக ஏற்றுமதி தொடர்பானவர்களுக்கு அது எந்த வகையான தகவல்களை வழங்குகிறது?
answer_ta: வணிக நூலக சேவை ஏற்றுமதியாளர்கள், சாத்தியமான ஏற்றுமதியாளர்கள் மற்றும் பொது மக்களுக்காக வடிவமைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. இது தயாரிப்பு, சந்தை மற்றும் வர்த்தகம் தொடர்பான வெளியீடுகள், செய்திமடல்கள், பத்திரிகைகள், சர்வதேச செய்தி இதழ்கள், வாங்குபவர்களின் கோப்பகங்கள், ஆய்வு அறிக்கைகள், கட்டணத் தகவல், வர்த்தக புள்ளிவிவரங்கள், விலை தகவல், மற்றும் சந்தை, நாடு, திட்ட அறிக்கைகள் போன்ற ஏராளமான தகவல்களை ஏற்றுமதி மற்றும் வர்த்தகத் தரவுகளுக்கு உதவுகிறது.
question_si: ව්‍යාපාර පුස්තකාල සේවාව යනු කුමක්ද, සහ එය එහි පරිශීලකයින්ට, විශේෂයෙන් අපනයන සම්බන්ධ පුද්ගලයන්ට කුමන ආකාරයේ තොරතුරු සපයන්නේද?
answer_si: ව්‍යාපාර පුස්තකාල සේවාව අපනයනකරුවන්, විභව අපනයනකරුවන් සහ මහජනතාව සඳහා නිර්මාණය කර ඇත. එය නිෂ්පාදන, වෙළඳපල සහ වෙළඳාම සම්බන්ධ ප්‍රකාශන, පුවත් පත්‍රිකා, සඟරා, ජාත්‍යන්තර පුවත් සඟරා, ගැනුම්කරුවන්ගේ නාමාවලී, පර්යේෂණ අධ්‍යයන, තීරුබදු තොරතුරු, වෙළඳ සංඛ්‍යාලේඛන, මිල තොරතුරු, සහ වෙළඳපල, රට සහ ව්‍යාපෘති වාර්තා ඇතුළු තොරතුරු සම්භාරයක් අපනයන සහ වෙළඳ දත්ත සඳහා ලබා දෙයි.

question_ta: இந்த ஆவணத்தில் மோட்டார் வாகன சேவைகள் தொடர்பாக உள்ள முக்கிய தலைப்பு என்ன?
answer_ta: முக்கிய தலைப்பு "பல்வேறு வாகனப் பதிவுச் சேவைகளுக்கு விதிக்கப்படும் கட்டணங்கள்" என்பதாகும்.
question_si: මෝටර් රථ සේවා සම්බන්ධයෙන් මෙම ලේඛනයේ ආවරණය වන ප්‍රධාන මාතෘකාව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ආවරණය වන ප්‍රධාන මාතෘකාව වන්නේ "විවිධ වාහන ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ සේවා සඳහා අය කරන ගාස්තු" යන්නයි.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Trade Promotion
Topic: Application Process and Fees
---
Places where Applications could be Obtained

Aplications for investment, along with necessary advice and guidance, could be obtained from officers attached to following offices, based on the respective Sector Group as indicated below;

Relevant sector Group located on Level 24 or 26 , Board of Investment of Sri Lanka, West Tower, World Trade Centre, Echelon Square, Colombo 01. Sector Groups located on Level 26 : 1. Tourism & Leisure 2. Knowledge Services 3. Agriculture Sector Groups located on Level 24 : 4. Infrastructure 5. Utilities 6. Education 7. Apparel 8. Manufacturing (except Apparel) 9. Regional Programmes and Export of Services

Application Fees Application forms for investment are issued free of charge.

Time allotted for provision of Advice On public working days, from 8.30AM to 4.30PM. Officials are bound to meet investors out side working hours (ie. after 4.30PM on working days and during daytime on week-ends and public holidays) as well, on special occasions.

Time allotted for submitting of Applications On public working days, from 8.30AM to 4.30PM, at offices given above.
question_en: Where can one obtain applications and advice for incentivised investment projects, and what is the fee for these application forms?
answer_en: Applications and advice for incentivised investment projects can be obtained from the Board of Investment of Sri Lanka (BOI), West Tower, World Trade Centre, Echelon Square, Colombo 01. Specifically, for Tourism & Leisure, Knowledge Services, and Agriculture, visit Level 26. For Infrastructure, Utilities, Education, Apparel, Manufacturing (except Apparel), Regional Programmes, and Export of Services, visit Level 24. The application forms are issued free of charge.
question_ta: ஊக்கமளிக்கப்பட்ட முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்கான விண்ணப்பங்களையும் ஆலோசனைகளையும் எங்கிருந்து பெறலாம், மேலும் இந்த விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்களுக்குக் கட்டணம் உண்டா?
answer_ta: ஊக்கமளிக்கப்பட்ட முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்கான விண்ணப்பங்களையும் ஆலோசனைகளையும் இலங்கை முதலீட்டுச் சபை (BOI), வெஸ்ட் டவர், உலக வர்த்தக மையம், எச்செலான் சதுக்கம், கொழும்பு 01 இல் பெறலாம். குறிப்பாக, சுற்றுலா மற்றும் ஓய்வு, அறிவுச் சேவைகள், விவசாயம் ஆகியவற்றுக்கு 26வது தளத்தைப் பார்வையிடவும். உள்கட்டமைப்பு, பயன்பாடுகள், கல்வி, ஆடை, உற்பத்தி (ஆடை தவிர), பிராந்திய திட்டங்கள் மற்றும் சேவைகளின் ஏற்றுமதி ஆகியவற்றுக்கு 24வது தளத்தைப் பார்வையிடவும். விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்கள் இலவசமாக வழங்கப்படுகின்றன.
question_si: දිරිගැන්වූ ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා අයදුම්පත් සහ උපදෙස් ලබාගත හැක්කේ කොතැනින්ද, එම අයදුම්පත් සඳහා ගාස්තුවක් තිබේද?
answer_si: දිරිගැන්වූ ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා අයදුම්පත් සහ උපදෙස් ශ්‍රී ලංකා ආයෝජන මණ්ඩලය (BOI), බටහිර කුළුණ, ලෝක වෙළඳ මධ්‍යස්ථානය, එචලෝන් චතුරශ්‍රය, කොළඹ 01 හි පිහිටි කාර්යාලවලින් ලබාගත හැක. විශේෂයෙන්ම, සංචාරක සහ විවේකය, දැනුම් සේවා සහ කෘෂිකර්මාන්තය සඳහා 26 වන මහලට පිවිසෙන්න. යටිතල පහසුකම්, උපයෝගිතා, අධ්‍යාපනය, ඇඟලුම්, නිෂ්පාදන (ඇඟලුම් හැර), කලාපීය වැඩසටහන් සහ සේවා අපනයනය සඳහා 24 වන මහලට පිවිසෙන්න. අයදුම්පත් නොමිලේ නිකුත් කෙරේ.

context:
Service: Inform about prepackaging items
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Regulation of Trade
Topic: List of Specified Packaged Goods (Continued)
---
Stationery and Books, Battery Acids, Salt, Non Alcoholic Beverages, Alcohol, Food Essences and Coloring, Pharmaceutical Products, Insecticides, fungicides, Weedicides, Pesticides, Fertilizer, Cleaning agents, Ribbon, Tapes, Elastic Tapes, Adhesive Tapes, Sewing Thread, Table Cloth, Bed Spreads, Towels, Sarees, Wood, Boxes of Matches, Candles, Crackers, Software diskettes for computers, Vegetables, Products of vegetable, Pins, Clips, staplers, Pepper, Chili, Chili powder, Coconut products, Dhal, Onion, Garlic, Rice, Potato, Potato products. ???
question_en: What categories of products are included in the 'List of Specified Packaged Goods'?
answer_en: The 'List of Specified Packaged Goods' includes a diverse range of items such as stationery, books, food products (e.g., salt, pepper, rice, vegetables), non-alcoholic and alcoholic beverages, pharmaceutical products, agricultural chemicals (e.g., insecticides, fertilizers), cleaning agents, textiles, wood, matches, candles, crackers, and software diskettes for computers.
question_ta: 'குறிப்பிட்ட பொதியிடப்பட்ட பொருட்களின் பட்டியல்' எவ்வகையான தயாரிப்புகளை உள்ளடக்கியது?
answer_ta: 'குறிப்பிட்ட பொதியிடப்பட்ட பொருட்களின் பட்டியல்' எழுதுபொருட்கள், புத்தகங்கள், உணவுப் பொருட்கள் (எ.கா., உப்பு, மிளகு, அரிசி, காய்கறிகள்), மதுபானம் அல்லாத மற்றும் மதுபானங்கள், மருந்துப் பொருட்கள், விவசாய இரசாயனங்கள் (எ.கா., பூச்சிக்கொல்லிகள், உரங்கள்), துப்புரவுப் பொருட்கள், துணி வகைகள், மரம், தீப்பெட்டிகள், மெழுகுவர்த்திகள், பட்டாசுகள் மற்றும் கணினிகளுக்கான மென்பொருள் வட்டுக்கள் போன்ற பல்வேறு பொருட்களை உள்ளடக்கியது.
question_si: 'නිශ්චිත ඇසුරුම් කළ භාණ්ඩ ලැයිස්තුවට' ඇතුළත් වන නිෂ්පාදන වර්ග මොනවාද?
answer_si: 'නිශ්චිත ඇසුරුම් කළ භාණ්ඩ ලැයිස්තුවට' ලිපි ද්‍රව්‍ය, පොත්පත්, ආහාර ද්‍රව්‍ය (උදා: ලුණු, ගම්මිරිස්, බත්, එළවළු), මධ්‍යසාර නොවන සහ මධ්‍යසාර පාන වර්ග, ඖෂධ නිෂ්පාදන, කෘෂිකාර්මික රසායනික ද්‍රව්‍ය (උදා: කෘමිනාශක, පොහොර), පිරිසිදු කිරීමේ කාරක, රෙදිපිළි, දැව, ගිනි පෙට්ටි, ඉටිපන්දම්, රතිඤ්ඤා සහ පරිගණක මෘදුකාංග තැටි වැනි විවිධාකාර භාණ්ඩ ඇතුළත් වේ.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Registrations - Industrial
Topic: Application Locations, Fees and Time Allotment
---
Places where Applications could be Obtained

Aplications for investment, along with necessary advice and guidance, could be obtained from officers attached to following offices, based on the respective Sector Group as indicated below;

Relevant sector Group located on Level 24 or 26 , Board of Investment of Sri Lanka, West Tower, World Trade Centre, Echelon Square, Colombo 01.  Sector Groups located on Level 26 :  1. Tourism & Leisure  2. Knowledge Services  3. Agriculture  Sector Groups located on Level 24 :  4. Infrastructure  5. Utilities  6. Education  7. Apparel  8. Manufacturing (except Apparel)  9. Regional Programmes and Export of Services

Application Fees Application forms for investment are issued free of charge.

Time allotted for provision of Advice On public working days, from 8.30AM to 4.30PM. Officials are bound to meet investors out side working hours (ie. after 4.30PM on working days and during daytime on week-ends and public holidays) as well, on special occasions.

Time allotted for submitting of Applications On public working days, from 8.30AM to 4.30PM, at offices given above.
question_en: What is the fee for obtaining application forms for incentivised investment projects?
answer_en: Application forms for investment are issued free of charge.
question_ta: ஊக்குவிக்கப்பட்ட முதலீட்டுத் திட்டங்களுக்கான விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்களைப் பெறுவதற்கான கட்டணம் என்ன?
answer_ta: முதலீட்டிற்கான விண்ணப்பப் படிவங்கள் இலவசமாக வழங்கப்படுகின்றன.
question_si: දිරිගැන්වූ ආයෝජන ව්‍යාපෘති සඳහා අයදුම්පත් ලබාගැනීම සඳහා වන ගාස්තුව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ආයෝජන සඳහා වන අයදුම්පත් නොමිලේ නිකුත් කෙරේ.

context:
Service: Issue Sri Lanka Certificate of Origin (COO)
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: Qualifications, Application Procedure and Service Charges
---
Qualifications required: 1. The projects should be approved and entered into agreements with the BOI. 2. Exports should have been made to European countries.

Procedure for Submitting of Applications:

Places where Applications could be Obtained: Ministry of Industrial Development, No 27, CWE Building, Vauxhall Street, Colombo 02.

Time Allotted for Submitting of Application:

On public working days: From 8:30 am to 4:15 pm. On Saturdays: From 8:30 am to 12:30 pm.

Service Charges: The Board of Investment of Sri Lanka does not charge any fees for this purpose.

Time Taken to Provide Services (General and priority services): Approximately 12 - 15 minutes.
question_en: What are the service charges for issuing a Sri Lanka Certificate of Origin?
answer_en: The Board of Investment of Sri Lanka does not charge any fees for this purpose.
question_ta: இலங்கை தோற்றுவிப்புச் சான்றிதழை வழங்குவதற்கான சேவை கட்டணங்கள் என்ன?
answer_ta: இலங்கை முதலீட்டுச் சபை இதற்காக எந்தக் கட்டணமும் அறவிடுவதில்லை.
question_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකා සම්භවය සහතිකපත්‍රය නිකුත් කිරීම සඳහා සේවා ගාස්තු කීයක්ද?
answer_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකා ආයෝජන මණ්ඩලය මේ සඳහා කිසිදු ගාස්තුවක් අය කරන්නේ නැත.

context:
Service: Consumer Education, Empowerment and Promoting the Establishment of Consumer Societies
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Trade Promotion
Topic: Timeline, Costs, and Support for Consumer Programmes
---
Time Line : Process Time Line: Applicants have to forward the request 1 month ahead of the scheduled date of the proposed program

Submission Time Line: Working days - Monday – Friday Counter open hours - 8:30 to 4:15 hrs Holidays -Public and Mercantile holidays

Validity Time Line: There is no validity time line

Cost Related to the Services: Cost: Cost is borne by the Authority. Fee: There is no fee involved in this service Penalty: No Penalty Surcharges: No Surcharges

Support Documents: No support documents are required in obtaining this service

Special Cases : A group of consumers can form a consumer organisation as per the constitution designed for the consumer organisation and register their organisation at the CAA.
question_en: What are the costs associated with the 'Consumer Education, Empowerment and Promoting the Establishment of Consumer Societies' service?
answer_en: The cost for this service is borne by the Authority. There are no fees, penalties, or surcharges involved.
question_ta: நுகர்வோர் கல்வி, அதிகாரமளித்தல் மற்றும் நுகர்வோர் சங்கங்களை நிறுவுவதை ஊக்குவித்தல் சேவைக்கான செலவுகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்தச் சேவைக்கான செலவை அதிகாரசபையே ஏற்கிறது. இதில் எந்தக் கட்டணங்களும், அபராதங்களும் அல்லது கூடுதல் கட்டணங்களும் இல்லை.
question_si: පාරිභෝගික අධ්‍යාපනය, සවිබලගැන්වීම සහ පාරිභෝගික සමිති පිහිටුවීම ප්‍රවර්ධනය කිරීම යන සේවාව හා සම්බන්ධ වියදම් මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා වන පිරිවැය අධිකාරිය විසින් දරනු ලබන අතර, කිසිදු ගාස්තුවක්, දඩයක් හෝ අමතර ගාස්තු අය නොකෙරේ.

question_ta: உற்பத்தியின் துணை ஒப்பந்தத்திற்கான ஒப்புதல் சேவையை வழங்குவதற்கான சேவைக் கட்டணங்கள் மற்றும் மதிப்பிடப்பட்ட நேரம் என்ன?
answer_ta: உற்பத்தியின் துணை ஒப்பந்தத்திற்கான ஒப்புதல் சேவையின் கட்டணம் ரூ. 650.00 மற்றும் சேவையை வழங்க தோராயமாக 10 நிமிடங்கள் ஆகும்.
question_si: නිෂ්පාදන උප කොන්ත්‍රාත්තුව සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා දීම සේවාව ලබා දීම සඳහා සේවා ගාස්තු සහ ඇස්තමේන්තුගත කාලය කොපමණද?
answer_si: නිෂ්පාදන උප කොන්ත්‍රාත්තුව සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා දීම සේවාව සඳහා සේවා ගාස්තු රුපියල් 650.00 ක් වන අතර, සේවාව සැපයීමට ආසන්න වශයෙන් මිනිත්තු 10 ක් ගතවේ.

context:
Service: Obtain New Vehicle License (Three Wheeler / Motor Cycles) from Divisional Secretariat
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Transport Services
Topic: Application for New Vehicle License (Three-Wheelers and Motorcycles) - Application Details and Required Documents
---
Application form:

Application Number / Name - Details

Application for obtaining a new vehicle license.

Obtaining a new vehicle license

Additional Documents Required:

• Registration book or vehicle identity card

• Vehicle insurance

Submission Period:

• Working hours

9.00 am to 3.00 pm

Monday to Friday

• Closing days - Public holidays

Submission Process:

1. Accepting the application form

Application forms can be obtained from the Inquiry Section of the Divisional Secretariat.

Note: _Application Number (Western Province)_

Application form number varies depending on the province issuing the license.

Example: ීගඡ (Southern Province) ක්ගඡ (Central Province)

Application Form Number

Application Form Number - 1

2. Supporting Documents

• Registration book or vehicle identity card

• Vehicle insurance

Note: - If the applicant has lost his or her registration book, a certificate from the Department of Motor Traffic Registration should be submitted to the Divisional Secretariat to certify that the registration book has been lost.
question_en: What are the essential documents required to obtain a new vehicle license for a three-wheeler or motorcycle from the Divisional Secretariat?
answer_en: The essential documents required are the Registration book or vehicle identity card and Vehicle insurance. If the registration book is lost, a certificate from the Department of Motor Traffic Registration confirming the loss must be submitted.
question_ta: பிரதேச செயலகத்திலிருந்து மூன்று சக்கர வாகனம் அல்லது மோட்டார் சைக்கிளுக்கான புதிய வாகன உரிமத்தைப் பெறத் தேவையான அத்தியாவசிய ஆவணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: பதிவு புத்தகம் அல்லது வாகன அடையாள அட்டை மற்றும் வாகன காப்பீடு ஆகியவை தேவைப்படும் அத்தியாவசிய ஆவணங்கள் ஆகும். பதிவு புத்தகம் தொலைந்துவிட்டால், அது தொலைந்துவிட்டதை உறுதிப்படுத்தும் மோட்டார் போக்குவரத்துப் பதிவுத் திணைக்களத்திலிருந்து ஒரு சான்றிதழ் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලයෙන් ත්‍රී රෝද රථයක් හෝ යතුරුපැදියක් සඳහා නව වාහන බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය අත්‍යවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි මොනවාද?
answer_si: අවශ්‍ය අත්‍යවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි වන්නේ ලියාපදිංචි පොත හෝ වාහන හැඳුනුම්පත සහ වාහන රක්ෂණයයි. ලියාපදිංචි පොත නැතිවී ඇත්නම්, එය නැතිවූ බව තහවුරු කරන මෝටර් රථ ප්‍රවාහන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ සහතිකයක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Importation of Body Shells - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Timeline, Validity, and Costs Associated with the Service
---
Time Line Process Time Line : One to two days

Submission Time Line Obtain [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) and Support Documents

Counter | – Unit 02
--- | ---
Time | – 9:00 am to 4:45 pm
Working Days | – Monday to Friday
Holidays | – Public and Mercantile Holidays

Making Payments

Counter | – Cashier
--- | ---
Time | – 9:00 am to 3:00 pm
Working Days | – Monday to Friday
Holidays | – Public and Mercantile Holidays

Submission of [Application Form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) , Request Letter and Support Documents 

Counter | – Unit 02
--- | ---
Time | – 9:00 am to 4:45 pm
Working Days | – Monday to Friday
Holidays | – Public and Mercantile Holidays

Validity Time Line The validity period for this service is 03 months If the applicant so wishes, he/she may submit a request for an extension with valid reasons, to the Controller. The Controller will then decide whether to extend or not.

Costs Related to the Service

Cost : Application forms are free

Fee: Fee would be 0.1 % of the CIF value

Penalties: If actual value of the goods imported exceeds the value indicated in the Performa invoice the difference of the license fee should be paid at the time of debiting

Surcharge: Not applicable.

Special Cases If the applicant wishes to have the validity period extended he should make a request to the Controller. The Controller will then examine the request and decide whether to grant it or not.
question_en: What is the validity period for the 'Importation of Body Shells - Unit 2' service, and how can an extension be requested?
answer_en: The validity period for this service is three months. If an applicant wishes to extend it, they may submit a request with valid reasons to the Controller, who will then decide whether to grant the extension.
question_ta: உடற்கூடு இறக்குமதி - பிரிவு 2 சேவைக்கான செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் எவ்வளவு, மற்றும் நீட்டிப்பு எப்படி கோரப்படலாம்?
answer_ta: இச்சேவைக்கான செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் மூன்று மாதங்கள் ஆகும். ஒரு விண்ணப்பதாரர் நீட்டிப்பு விரும்பினால், செல்லுபடியாகும் காரணங்களுடன் கட்டுப்படுத்தியாளருக்கு ஒரு கோரிக்கையைச் சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம், அவர் நீட்டிப்பு வழங்கலாமா வேண்டாமா என்பதைத் தீர்மானிப்பார்.
question_si: ශරීර ආවරණ ආනයනය - ඒකකය 2 සේවාව සඳහා වලංගු කාලය කොපමණද, සහ දීර්ඝ කිරීමක් ඉල්ලා සිටිය හැක්කේ කෙසේද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා වලංගු කාලය මාස තුනකි. අයදුම්කරුවෙකුට එය දීර්ඝ කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය නම්, වලංගු හේතු සහිතව පාලකවරයා වෙත ඉල්ලීමක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකි අතර, දීර්ඝ කිරීම ලබා දිය යුතුද නැද්ද යන්න ඔහු තීරණය කරනු ඇත.

context:
Service: Market Surveys & Market Reserch
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Information
Topic: Consumer Affairs Authority Market Studies and Information
---
Consumer Affairs Authority is entrusted to undertake studies. Publish reports and provide information to the public relating to market conditions and Consumer Affairs. Market Surveys are conducted to evaluate the price, quality, cost of production, distribution and availability of good all Services.

Eligibility

Submission Procedure Request should be made to the Director General of the Consumer Affairs Authority.

Procedure Step 1: Identify the Market problem Step 2: Develop survey tools & questionnaire Step 3: Select field or area to Survey/Study Step 4: Collect data & information Step 5: Process data Step 7: Prepare the report Step 8: Forward observations and recommendations to take policy decisions

Time Line Process Time Line: NA Submission Time Line: Working days - Monday – Friday Counter open hours - 8;30. to 4:15 hrs Holidays -Public and Mercantile holidays

Validity Time Line:

Cost Related to the Services Cost: Cost is born by the Authority
question_en: What aspects are evaluated during market surveys conducted by the Consumer Affairs Authority?
answer_en: Market surveys are conducted to evaluate the price, quality, cost of production, distribution, and availability of goods and services.
question_ta: நுகர்வோர் விவகாரங்கள் அதிகார சபையினால் நடத்தப்படும் சந்தை ஆய்வுகளில் என்னென்ன அம்சங்கள் மதிப்பீடு செய்யப்படுகின்றன?
answer_ta: சந்தை ஆய்வுகள் பொருட்கள் மற்றும் சேவைகளின் விலை, தரம், உற்பத்தி செலவு, விநியோகம் மற்றும் கிடைப்பனவு ஆகியவற்றை மதிப்பீடு செய்ய நடத்தப்படுகின்றன.
question_si: පාරිභෝගික කටයුතු අධිකාරිය විසින් සිදුකරනු ලබන වෙළඳපල සමීක්ෂණ වලදී ඇගයීමට ලක්කරනු ලබන කරුණු මොනවාද?
answer_si: වෙළඳපල සමීක්ෂණ භාණ්ඩ හා සේවා වල මිල, ගුණාත්මකභාවය, නිෂ්පාදන පිරිවැය, බෙදාහැරීම සහ ලබාගත හැකි බව ඇගයීම සඳහා සිදු කරනු ලැබේ.

context:
Service: Transporting Parcels by Trains
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: General Information and Application Process for Parcel Transport
---
Any type of Parcels (maximum 50Kgs per parcel) can be transported by Railway other than the goods prohibited by the Railway Ordinance and other departmental circulars. (Telephone Number: 0112320109) All Railway Station accept parcels to be transported.

11.2. Application/Reservation method of the service

Use the application form. It can be collected at the particular stations. Fill it and hand over to Railway station with the parcel. All Railway Station accept parcels to be transported by Trains on weekdays from 09.00 AM to 04.00 PM.

11.3. Payments/Charges to be made for the service

[Download Charges for Transporting Parcels by Trains](https://www.railway.gov.lk/web/images/pdf/charges_transporting_parcels.pdf)

11.4. Documents to be submitted

- National Identity Card
- Transport Permits for Timber and Purchase Bills for furniture
- Document which certify the value of the Parceled Goods if the parcel if of high value (Ex: Purchase Bill)
- The Revenue License is case of Bicycles etc.
question_en: What is the maximum weight allowed per parcel when transporting goods by trains, and what documents are generally required for this service?
answer_en: The maximum weight allowed is 50 Kgs per parcel. Generally, a National Identity Card is required. Additional documents like transport permits for timber, purchase bills for furniture or high-value goods, or a revenue license for bicycles may also be needed.
question_ta: புகையிரதங்கள் மூலம் பொட்டலங்களை கொண்டு செல்வதற்கு ஒரு பொட்டலத்திற்கான அதிகபட்ச எடை வரம்பு என்ன, இந்த சேவைக்கு பொதுவாக என்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவைப்படுகின்றன?
answer_ta: ஒரு பொட்டலத்திற்கான அதிகபட்ச எடை 50 கிலோகிராம் ஆகும். பொதுவாக, தேசிய அடையாள அட்டை தேவைப்படுகிறது. மரம், தளபாடங்கள் அல்லது அதிக மதிப்புள்ள பொருட்களுக்கான கொள்முதல் பில்கள், அல்லது மிதிவண்டிகளுக்கான வருவாய் உரிமம் போன்ற கூடுதல் ஆவணங்களும் தேவைப்படலாம்.
question_si: දුම්රිය මගින් පාර්සල් ප්‍රවාහනය කිරීමේදී එක් පාර්සලයක් සඳහා අවසර ලත් උපරිම බර කොපමණද, සහ මෙම සේවාව සඳහා සාමාන්‍යයෙන් අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන මොනවාද?
answer_si: එක් පාර්සලයක් සඳහා අවසර ලත් උපරිම බර කිලෝග්‍රෑම් 50 කි. සාමාන්‍යයෙන්, ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පතක් අවශ්‍ය වේ. දැව සඳහා ප්‍රවාහන බලපත්‍ර, ගෘහ භාණ්ඩ සඳහා මිලදී ගැනීමේ බිල්පත්, හෝ ඉහළ වටිනාකමක් ඇති භාණ්ඩ සඳහා මිලදී ගැනීමේ බිල්පත්, සහ පාපැදි සඳහා ආදායම් බලපත්‍රය වැනි අමතර ලේඛන ද අවශ්‍ය විය හැකිය.

context:
Service: Obtaining a Temporary Driving License
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Special Cases and Sample Form
---
Special Cases There are no special conditions applying to this service

Sample Form with Dummy Data Form “ [M.T.A. 35 example](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) ”
question_en: What is the service described in this context?
answer_en: The service described is 'Obtaining a Temporary Driving License'.
question_ta: இந்த சூழலில் விவரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ள சேவை என்ன?
answer_ta: விவரிக்கப்பட்டுள்ள சேவை 'தற்காலிக ஓட்டுநர் உரிமத்தைப் பெறுதல்' ஆகும்.
question_si: මෙම සන්දර්භය තුළ විස්තර කර ඇති සේවාව කුමක්ද?
answer_si: විස්තර කර ඇති සේවාව වන්නේ 'තාවකාලික රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීම'යි.

context:
Service: Debit Goods Imported - Unit 1
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: Costs, Fees, Penalties, and Special Cases
---
Costs Related to the Service

Cost : No cost is involved in obtaining the [application form](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) .

Fee: No fee related to the service

Penalties :Additional will be charged from the offenders of the license conditions. Additional fee vary from case to case and the amount of additional fee will be decided by the Assistant Controller.

Note: If the Applicant has imported goods without any license additional fee is charged.

Surcharge : If the invoice value exceeds the licensing value the department levies difference license fee for the amount in excess.

Special Cases If the Importation is done without a license, a Goods Received License is issued with an additional fee Following documents are needed to obtain Good Receive License

1. Customs Declarations
2. Indent CIE 03
3. Explanation letters
4. Approval letter from the relevant authority
5. Documents to fulfill the conditions of the license
question_en: What are the implications and requirements if goods are imported without a valid license for the "Debit Goods Imported - Unit 1" service?
answer_en: If goods are imported without a valid license, a Goods Received License can be issued upon payment of an additional fee. To obtain this, the applicant must provide Customs Declarations, Indent CIE 03, Explanation letters, an Approval letter from the relevant authority, and documents to fulfill the conditions of the license.
question_ta: "Debit Goods Imported - Unit 1" சேவைக்கு உரிமம் இல்லாமல் பொருட்கள் இறக்குமதி செய்யப்பட்டால் ஏற்படும் விளைவுகள் மற்றும் தேவைகள் என்ன?
answer_ta: உரிமம் இல்லாமல் பொருட்கள் இறக்குமதி செய்யப்பட்டால், கூடுதல் கட்டணத்துடன் ஒரு பொருட்கள் பெறப்பட்ட உரிமம் (Goods Received License) வழங்கப்படலாம். இதை பெற, சுங்க அறிவிப்புகள், இண்டென்ட் சிஐஇ 03, விளக்கக் கடிதங்கள், தொடர்புடைய அதிகாரியிடமிருந்து ஒப்புதல் கடிதம் மற்றும் உரிமத்தின் நிபந்தனைகளை பூர்த்தி செய்வதற்கான ஆவணங்கள் சமர்ப்பிக்கப்பட வேண்டும்.
question_si: "Debit Goods Imported - Unit 1" සේවාව සඳහා වලංගු බලපත්‍රයක් නොමැතිව භාණ්ඩ ආනයනය කළහොත් ඇතිවන ප්‍රතිවිපාක සහ අවශ්‍යතා මොනවාද?
answer_si: වලංගු බලපත්‍රයක් නොමැතිව භාණ්ඩ ආනයනය කර ඇත්නම්, අමතර ගාස්තුවක් ගෙවීමෙන් පසු භාණ්ඩ ලැබුණු බලපත්‍රයක් (Goods Received License) නිකුත් කළ හැකිය. මෙය ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා, අයදුම්කරු රේගු ප්‍රකාශන, ඉන්ඩෙන්ට් සීඅයිඊ 03, පැහැදිලි කිරීමේ ලිපි, අදාළ අධිකාරියෙන් අනුමැතිය ලිපියක් සහ බලපත්‍රයේ කොන්දේසි සපුරාලීමට අවශ්‍ය ලේඛන ඉදිරිපත් කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Registration of Manufacturers of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Regulation of Trade
Topic: Application Submission and Working Details
---
After the applicant receives Pattern Approval, he/she must fill the application form and submit it to the Department.

Working Days :- Monday to Friday

Working Hours :- 8.30 am to 4.15 pm

Holidays :- All Public and Mercantile holidays

Step-by-Step Procedure: Step 1: Manufacturer sends a request letter to the Department stating what is being manufactured and the Company/Manufacturer name. Step 2: A field visit is then done by the District Inspector who prepares a workshop report. District Inspector conducts a field inspection and prepares the Workshop Report. Step 3: Inspector forwards workshop report to the Department Step 4: If the Inspector has approved the workshop report the Department informs the manufacturer via letter to bring the sample. Step 5: The Manufactures brings the sample and it is checked by the Department. Step 6: Once the Pattern is approved, the Department sends the Application Form to the Manufacturer via mail. Step 7: The Manufacturer then fills the Application Form, pastes the paid stamp and sends it via mail or by physically visiting the Department. Step 8: The Department then Issues the manufacturing certificate.
question_en: What are the working days and hours for the "Registration of Manufacturers of weights, Measures and weighing or Measuring Instruments" service?
answer_en: The working days for this service are Monday to Friday, and the working hours are from 8.30 am to 4.15 pm.
question_ta: "எடைகள், அளவைகள் மற்றும் எடைக் கருவிகள் அல்லது அளக்கும் கருவிகள் தயாரிப்பாளர்களின் பதிவு" சேவைக்கான வேலை நாட்கள் மற்றும் வேலை நேரம் என்ன?
answer_ta: இந்த சேவைக்கான வேலை நாட்கள் திங்கள் முதல் வெள்ளி வரை ஆகும், மேலும் வேலை நேரம் காலை 8.30 மணி முதல் மாலை 4.15 மணி வரை ஆகும்.
question_si: "බර, මිනුම් සහ කිරුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ නිෂ්පාදකයින් ලියාපදිංචි කිරීමේ" සේවාව සඳහා වැඩ කරන දින සහ වේලාවන් මොනවාද?
answer_si: මෙම සේවාව සඳහා වැඩ කරන දින සඳුදා සිට සිකුරාදා දක්වා වන අතර, වැඩ කරන වේලාවන් පෙ.ව. 8.30 සිට ප.ව. 4.15 දක්වා වේ.

question_ta: இலங்கை ஏற்றுமதியாளர் அடைவு சேவை தொடர்பான விசாரணைகளுக்கு யாரைத் தொடர்பு கொள்ள வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: உதவி இயக்குநர் திருமதி ஹெல்மலி விதாரணாவை இலங்கை ஏற்றுமதியாளர் அடைவு சேவை தொடர்பான விசாரணைகளுக்கு தொடர்பு கொள்ள வேண்டும்.
question_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකා අපනයනකරුවන්ගේ නාමාවලිය සේවාව පිළිබඳ විමසීම් සඳහා සම්බන්ධ කරගත යුත්තේ කවුද?
answer_si: සහකාර අධ්‍යක්ෂිකා හෙල්මලි විතාරණ මහත්මිය ශ්‍රී ලංකා අපනයනකරුවන්ගේ නාමාවලිය සේවාව පිළිබඳ විමසීම් සඳහා සම්බන්ධ කරගත යුතුය.

context:
Service: Liquor Permit
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Approvals, Permits & Licenses
Topic: ස්ථානයේ පිහිටීම සම්බන්ධ සුදුසුකම්
---
• මත්පැන් විකිණීම සඳහා අඩුම තරමින් ව.අඩි. 250 ක බිම් කොටසක් තිබීම පරිභෝජනය සඳහා මත්පැන් විකිණීමේදී එහි ඉඩකඩ අඩුම තරමින් වර්ග අඩි 500 ක් තිබිය යුතුය.

සැලකිය යුතුයි

සිල්ලරට මත්පැන් (බියර්, ස්ටවුටී, වයින්) විකිණීම සඳහා බලපත් ලබා ගැනීමේදී මෙය අදාළ නොවේ.

• මත්පැන් විකිණීම සඳහා බලපත්‍රයක් ලබා ගැනීමේදී

මත්පැන් හලෙදී පරිභෝජනය නොකරන්නේනමී - පාසල් ප්‍රසිද්ධ ස්ථාන පූජනීය ස්ථාන වැනි තැන් වලින් මීටර 100 ටවත් දුරින් මත්පැන් හල් පිහිටිය යුතුය.

මත්පැන් හලේදීම පරිභෝජනය කිරීමේදී - පාසල් ප්‍රසිද්ධ ස්ථාන පූජනීය ස්ථාන වැනි තැන් වලින් මීටර 500 ටවත් දුරින් මත්පැන් හල් පිහිටිය යුතුය.

සැලකිය යුතුයි.
question_en: What are the minimum distance requirements for a liquor outlet from sensitive locations like schools, public places, or religious sites, depending on whether consumption is allowed on-site or not?
answer_en: If consumption is not allowed at the liquor outlet, it must be at least 100 meters away from schools, public places, or religious sites. If consumption is allowed at the liquor outlet, it must be at least 500 meters away from such locations.
question_ta: மதுபானக் கடையில் உட்கொள்ள அனுமதி இல்லாதபோதும், அனுமதி உள்ளபோதும், பள்ளிகள், பொது இடங்கள் மற்றும் வழிபாட்டுத் தலங்கள் போன்ற இடங்களிலிருந்து இருக்க வேண்டிய குறைந்தபட்ச தூரம் என்ன?
answer_ta: மதுபானக் கடையில் உட்கொள்ள அனுமதி இல்லாதபோது, அது பள்ளிகள், பொது இடங்கள் மற்றும் வழிபாட்டுத் தலங்கள் போன்ற இடங்களிலிருந்து குறைந்தபட்சம் 100 மீட்டர்கள் தூரத்தில் இருக்க வேண்டும். மதுபானக் கடையில் உட்கொள்ள அனுமதி உள்ளபோது, அது அத்தகைய இடங்களிலிருந்து குறைந்தபட்சம் 500 மீட்டர்கள் தூரத்தில் இருக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: මත්පැන් හලකදී පරිභෝජනය නොකරන විට සහ පරිභෝජනය කරන විට, පාසල්, ප්‍රසිද්ධ ස්ථාන සහ පූජනීය ස්ථාන වැනි ස්ථාන වලින් තිබිය යුතු අවම දුර ප්‍රමාණය කොපමණද?
answer_si: මත්පැන් හලකදී පරිභෝජනය නොකරන විට, එය පාසල්, ප්‍රසිද්ධ ස්ථාන සහ පූජනීය ස්ථාන වැනි ස්ථාන වලින් අවම වශයෙන් මීටර 100 ක් දුරින් පිහිටිය යුතුය. මත්පැන් හලකදී පරිභෝජනය කරන විට, එය එවැනි ස්ථාන වලින් අවම වශයෙන් මීටර 500 ක් දුරින් පිහිටිය යුතුය.

context:
Service: Renewing of Driving License
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Eligibility Criteria and Submission Procedure
---
- Department system (license being issues after 1996)
- Manual files (license being issued before 1996)

Provide with all the documents required within the process (please refer to the section: “Documents Required”)

Note: Any applicant who is not able to meet with above conditions will be considered disqualified from obtaining the service.

Submission Procedure: All the applications should be directed to the assistant commissioner of the Licensing Division

Assistant Commissioner – Licensing Division, Department of Motor Traffic, P.O Box 533, 581-341, Elvitigala Mawatha, Colombo 5. Note 1: Applicants are given the facility of obtaining licenses through:

- All district secretarial offices (normal service)
- Main office in Verahera – Colombo (priority service):

Only for licenses, whose records are within department system

Application Form: Form “ [M.T.A. 157](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/pdf/) ”: Application for Renewal of Driving License
question_en: What is the name of the application form required for renewing a driving license, and what are the available options for submitting the application?
answer_en: The required application form is "M.T.A. 157". Applications can be submitted to the Assistant Commissioner of the Licensing Division, or through all district secretarial offices for normal service, or the main office in Verahera – Colombo for priority service (only for licenses within the department system).
question_ta: ஓட்டுநர் உரிமத்தைப் புதுப்பிப்பதற்குத் தேவையான விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தின் பெயர் என்ன, மேலும் விண்ணப்பத்தைச் சமர்ப்பிப்பதற்கான வழிகள் யாவை?
answer_ta: தேவையான விண்ணப்பப் படிவம் "M.T.A. 157" ஆகும். விண்ணப்பங்களை உரிமப் பிரிவின் உதவி ஆணையரிடம் அல்லது சாதாரண சேவைக்காக அனைத்து மாவட்டச் செயலக அலுவலகங்கள் வழியாகவோ அல்லது முன்னுரிமை சேவைக்காக (துறை அமைப்பிற்குள் உள்ள உரிமங்களுக்கு மட்டும்) வேரஹெரா - கொழும்பில் உள்ள பிரதான அலுவலகத்திலும் சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம்.
question_si: රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක් අලුත් කිරීම සඳහා අවශ්‍ය අයදුම් පත්‍රයේ නම කුමක්ද, සහ අයදුම්පත ඉදිරිපත් කිරීම සඳහා ඇති විකල්ප මොනවාද?
answer_si: අවශ්‍ය අයදුම් පත්‍රය "M.T.A. 157" වේ. අයදුම්පත් බලපත්‍රකරණ අංශයේ සහකාර කොමසාරිස්වරයා වෙත, හෝ සාමාන්‍ය සේවාව සඳහා සියලුම දිස්ත්‍රික් ලේකම් කාර්යාල හරහා හෝ ප්‍රමුඛතා සේවාව සඳහා (දෙපාර්තමේන්තු පද්ධතිය තුළ ඇති බලපත්‍ර සඳහා පමණක්) කොළඹ, වේරහැර ප්‍රධාන කාර්යාලයට ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකිය.

context:
Service: Import of Vehicles on Foreign Earnings - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Costs, Penalties and Special Cases
---
Costs Related to the Service

Cost of Application Form : No cost of obtaining Application

Fee: Fee differs depending on the age of the Vehicle. The fee will be a percentage of the total value mentioned below.

Penalties: If the Licensee fails to present him/her self with his/her [passport](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=399&task=info&back=0&pid=415) at the time of clearance of the vehicle, his/her license will be cancelled and the vehicle will be confiscated.

Surcharge: No surcharge involved in this service.? If the vehicle is shipped before the license is obtained, an additional fee will have to be paid.

Importation of Used Motor Cars not Older than 05 Years Proof of Foreign employment for a period not less than 03 years and foreign earnings.

Importation of Used Motor Cars between 05 to 10 Years Old Proof of Foreign employment for a period not less than 05 years and foreign earnings.

Special Cases

- If in any case that the applicant wishes to extend the validity period a request should be forwarded to the Controller. Controller will examine the request and decide whether to grant the request or not
- If that value of the import goods is higher than that as mentioned in the invoice, the difference fee should be pad.
question_en: What is the penalty if a licensee fails to present their passport at the time of vehicle clearance for the 'Import of Vehicles on Foreign Earnings' service?
answer_en: If the licensee fails to present their passport at the time of vehicle clearance, their license will be cancelled, and the vehicle will be confiscated.
question_ta: வெளிநாட்டு வருவாயில் வாகன இறக்குமதி சேவையின் கீழ் வாகன அனுமதிப்பத்திரத்தின் போது உரிமதாரர் தனது கடவுச்சீட்டை சமர்ப்பிக்கத் தவறினால் என்ன தண்டனை விதிக்கப்படும்?
answer_ta: வாகன அனுமதிப்பத்திரத்தின் போது உரிமதாரர் தனது கடவுச்சீட்டை சமர்ப்பிக்கத் தவறினால், அவரது உரிமம் இரத்து செய்யப்பட்டு வாகனம் பறிமுதல் செய்யப்படும்.
question_si: විදේශ ආදායම් මත වාහන ආනයනය කිරීමේ සේවාව යටතේ වාහනය නිෂ්කාශනය කරන අවස්ථාවේදී බලපත්‍රලාභියා තම ගමන් බලපත්‍රය ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමට අපොහොසත් වුවහොත් පැනවෙන දඬුවම කුමක්ද?
answer_si: බලපත්‍රලාභියා වාහනය නිෂ්කාශනය කරන අවස්ථාවේදී තම ගමන් බලපත්‍රය ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමට අපොහොසත් වුවහොත්, ඔහුගේ බලපත්‍රය අවලංගු කර වාහනය රාජසන්තක කරනු ලැබේ.

question_ta: ஓட்டுநர் உரிமத்தின் நகலைப் பெறுவதற்கான சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான ஆணையாளர் யார், அவர்களின் தொடர்பு எண் என்ன?
answer_ta: ஆணையாளர் திரு. பி. விஜேரத்னே ஆவார், அவர்களின் தொலைபேசி எண் +94-11-2698717 ஆகும்.
question_si: රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක අනුපිටපතක් ලබාගැනීමේ සේවාව සඳහා වගකිවයුතු කොමසාරිස්වරයා කවුද සහ ඔවුන්ගේ දුරකථන අංකය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: කොමසාරිස්වරයා වන්නේ බී. විජේරත්න මහතා වන අතර, ඔවුන්ගේ දුරකථන අංකය +94-11-2698717 වේ.

context:
Service: Inform about prepackaging items
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Regulation of Trade
Topic: Packer and Importer Responsibilities for Packaged Goods
---
It is the duty of any person who is a packer or an importer of any specified packaged goods to ensure that such package is marked in the prescribed manner with - (a) A statement of quantity contained in authorized units either of weight or of volume or of length and (b) His/her name and address or a mark which enables his name and address to be readily ascertained by an inspector Therefore, the public must be aware that if any specified packaged goods mentioned below contain less than the quantity as indicated in the statement on the package or do not have a mark in authorized units on any package, the quantity it contains, then the public in entitled to inform the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department. The list of specified items is as follows Cereal, Cereal flour, Products of Cereal flour, Biscuits, Seeds, Seed Powder, Products of Seed Flour, Sugar, Glucose, Meat, Meat Products, Fish, Fish Products, Sea foods, Products of Sea Foods, Cooking Oil, coffee seeds, Coffee Powder, Chocolate, Chutney, Pickle, Sauce, Milk, Milk Products, Mushroom, Infant Foods, Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LP Gas), Petroleum Products, Agro Chemicals, Ice Cream, Spices, Building Materials, Paints, Varnish and Liquids used for dilution, Indoor Detergents, Fruits, fruit products, Food Preservatives, Extract natural yeast products, soap, Washing powder, Shoe polish, Tooth Paste, Tooth Powder, Drinking Water, Distilled Water, Cosmetics, Electrical Goods, Printing Ink and Lubricants,
question_en: What are the key responsibilities of packers and importers regarding specified packaged goods, and to which department should the public report discrepancies?
answer_en: Packers and importers must ensure specified packaged goods are marked with the contained quantity in authorized units and their name and address (or an ascertainable mark). If goods contain less than the stated quantity or lack proper marking, the public should report this to the Measurement Units, Standards and Services Department.
question_ta: குறிப்பிட்ட பொதியிடப்பட்ட பொருட்களைப் பொறுத்தவரை பொதி செய்பவர்கள் மற்றும் இறக்குமதியாளர்களின் முக்கிய பொறுப்புகள் என்ன, மற்றும் பொதுமக்கள் முரண்பாடுகளை எந்தத் துறைக்கு அறிவிக்க வேண்டும்?
answer_ta: பொதி செய்பவர்களும் இறக்குமதியாளர்களும் குறிப்பிட்ட பொதியிடப்பட்ட பொருட்களில் அங்கீகரிக்கப்பட்ட அலகுகளில் உள்ள அளவு மற்றும் அவர்களின் பெயர் மற்றும் முகவரி (அல்லது எளிதில் கண்டறியக்கூடிய அடையாளம்) குறிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளதை உறுதி செய்ய வேண்டும். பொருட்கள் குறிப்பிட்ட அளவை விட குறைவாக இருந்தால் அல்லது சரியான குறி இல்லை என்றால், பொதுமக்கள் இதனை அளவீட்டு அலகுகள், தரநிலைகள் மற்றும் சேவைகள் திணைக்களத்திற்கு அறிவிக்க வேண்டும்.
question_si: නිශ්චිත ඇසුරුම් කළ භාණ්ඩ සම්බන්ධයෙන් ඇසුරුම්කරුවන්ගේ සහ ආනයනකරුවන්ගේ ප්‍රධාන වගකීම් මොනවාද සහ මහජනතාව විෂමතා වාර්තා කළ යුත්තේ කුමන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවටද?
answer_si: ඇසුරුම්කරුවන් සහ ආනයනකරුවන් නිශ්චිත ඇසුරුම් කළ භාණ්ඩවල අඩංගු ප්‍රමාණය බලයලත් ඒකකවලින් සහ ඔවුන්ගේ නම සහ ලිපිනය (හෝ පහසුවෙන් තහවුරු කළ හැකි සලකුණක්) සලකුණු කර ඇති බව සහතික විය යුතුය. භාණ්ඩවල සඳහන් ප්‍රමාණයට වඩා අඩු ප්‍රමාණයක් අඩංගු නම් හෝ නිසි සලකුණු නොමැති නම්, මහජනතාව මෙය මිනුම් ඒකක, ප්‍රමිති සහ සේවා දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවට වාර්තා කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Extending Validity of Driving License
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Application Submission, Time Line, and Costs
---
Note 1: Applicants are given the facility of obtaining licenses through • All district secretarial offices (normal service) • Main office in Verahera – Colombo (priority service) Note 2: • Please refer to section: “Submission Time Line” • Please refer to section: “Support Documents” Application Form Form “M.T.A 34”: Application for Extending Validity of a Driving License Time Line Process Timeline: Applied for one-day (priority) service License issued within 1 week Applied for normal service License issued within 2 week – 3 months Submission Timeline: For Obtaining & Submitting Application Forms: Working days Mondays to Fridays Counter open hours 9:30 am to 3:30 pm (Normal) Counter open hours 9:30 am to 12:30 pm (Priority) Holidays All Public and Mercantile Days

Note: One Day Processing Applicants can obtain their New Extended License after 3:30 pm within the same say of submitting forms.

Validity Timeline: Validity of the application expires if the practical examination is performed after 6 months of submitting the application Costs Related to Service Cost of Obtaining the Application: Application forms provided free of charge Type of Service  1 Class of Vehicles  2 Classes of Vehicles Normal service Rs. 520.00 Rs. 1020.00 Priority service Rs. 770.00 Rs. 1720.00
question_en: What is the application form name for extending the validity of a driving license, and what are the costs for extending a license for one class of vehicles under normal and priority services?
answer_en: The application form is "M.T.A 34". For one class of vehicles, the normal service costs Rs. 520.00 and the priority service costs Rs. 770.00.
question_ta: ஓட்டுநர் உரிமத்தின் செல்லுபடியை நீடிப்பதற்கான விண்ணப்பப் படிவத்தின் பெயர் என்ன, மேலும் ஒரு வகை வாகனங்களுக்கான உரிமத்தை நீடிப்பதற்கான சாதாரண மற்றும் முன்னுரிமை சேவைகளுக்கான கட்டணங்கள் யாவை?
answer_ta: விண்ணப்பப் படிவம் "M.T.A 34" ஆகும். ஒரு வகை வாகனங்களுக்கு, சாதாரண சேவைக்கான கட்டணம் ரூபாய் 520.00 மற்றும் முன்னுரிமை சேவைக்கான கட்டணம் ரூபாய் 770.00 ஆகும்.
question_si: රියදුරු බලපත්‍රයක වලංගුභාවය දීර්ඝ කිරීම සඳහා වන අයදුම් පත්‍රයේ නම කුමක්ද, තවද එක් වාහන වර්ගයක් සඳහා බලපත්‍රයක් දීර්ඝ කිරීමේ සාමාන්‍ය සහ ප්‍රමුඛතා සේවාවන් සඳහා වන පිරිවැය කීයද?
answer_si: අයදුම් පත්‍රය "M.T.A 34" වේ. එක් වාහන වර්ගයක් සඳහා, සාමාන්‍ය සේවාව සඳහා රුපියල් 520.00 ක් සහ ප්‍රමුඛතා සේවාව සඳහා රුපියල් 770.00 ක් වැය වේ.

context:
Service: Import of Vehicles Under Gift Scheme - Unit 2
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Motoring
Topic: Validity and Costs
---
Validity Time Line : The validity period for this service is 03 months

Note : If the applicant wishes to get an extension on the validity period he/she should make request to the Controller with valid reasons. The Controller will decide whether to grant the request or not.

Costs Related to the Service

Cost : No cost involved in obtaining Application Form

Fee: The fee will be a percentage of the CIF value mentioned below. This is payable to the department by bank draft.

Importation of vehicles for Temples under the Gift Scheme | . | Importation of vehicles as family members under the Gift Scheme | Importation of vehicles for Organizations under the Gift Scheme
--- | --- | --- | ---
Age of vehicle | Fees as % | 15% of the CIF value of the vehicle should be paid as vehicle license fee | If the gift is to social service Organizations - 15%. (If free from gift tax, only 100/- LKR)
5 – 6 years | 25,000/= LKR | . | .
6 – 7 years | 50,000/= LKR | . | .
7 – 8 years | 100,000/=LKR | . | .
8 – 9 years | 125,000/=LKR | . | .
9 – 10 years | 150,000/=LKR | . | .
question_en: What is the standard validity period for the "Import of Vehicles Under Gift Scheme" service, and what is the process if an extension is required?
answer_en: The standard validity period for the "Import of Vehicles Under Gift Scheme" service is 03 months. If an extension is required, the applicant should make a request to the Controller with valid reasons, and the Controller will decide whether to grant the request or not.
question_ta: “பரிசுத் திட்டத்தின் கீழ் வாகனங்கள் இறக்குமதி” சேவைக்கான நிலையான செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் என்ன, மேலும் நீட்டிப்பு தேவைப்பட்டால் அதற்கான செயல்முறை என்ன?
answer_ta: “பரிசுத் திட்டத்தின் கீழ் வாகனங்கள் இறக்குமதி” சேவைக்கான நிலையான செல்லுபடியாகும் காலம் 03 மாதங்கள் ஆகும். நீட்டிப்பு தேவைப்பட்டால், விண்ணப்பதாரர் நியாயமான காரணங்களுடன் கட்டுப்பாட்டாளரிடம் கோரிக்கை வைக்க வேண்டும், மேலும் கட்டுப்பாட்டாளர் கோரிக்கையை அனுமதிக்கலாமா வேண்டாமா என்று முடிவு செய்வார்.
question_si: “තෑගි යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ වාහන ආනයනය” සේවාව සඳහා සම්මත වලංගු කාලය කුමක්ද, සහ දිගුවක් අවශ්‍ය නම් ඒ සඳහා ක්‍රියාවලිය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: “තෑගි යෝජනා ක්‍රමය යටතේ වාහන ආනයනය” සේවාව සඳහා සම්මත වලංගු කාලය මාස 03 කි. දිගුවක් අවශ්‍ය නම්, අයදුම්කරු වලංගු හේතු සහිතව පාලකවරයාට ඉල්ලීමක් කළ යුතු අතර, ඉල්ලීම ලබා දිය යුතුද නැද්ද යන්න පාලකවරයා තීරණය කරනු ඇත.

question_ta: BOI காணி வங்கியில் இருந்து முதலீட்டாளர்களுக்கு விசாரணையின் பேரில் என்ன தகவல்கள் வழங்கப்படும்?
answer_ta: காணி வங்கியில் பதிவுசெய்யப்பட்ட காணிகள் மற்றும் தனிநபர்கள், நிறுவனங்கள் ஆகிய காணி உரிமையாளர்களின் விபரங்கள் முதலீட்டாளர்களுக்கு வழங்கப்படும்.
question_si: BOI ඉඩම් බැංකුවෙන් විමසීමක් කළ විට ආයෝජකයින්ට ලබා දෙන තොරතුරු මොනවාද?
answer_si: ඉඩම් බැංකුවේ ලියාපදිංචි කර ඇති ඉඩම් වල විස්තර සහ පුද්ගලයන් මෙන්ම සංවිධාන ද ඇතුළුව ඉඩම් හිමියන් පිළිබඳ තොරතුරු ආයෝජකයින්ට ලබා දෙනු ඇත.

context:
Service: Calibration of weights, measures and weighing or measuring Instruments
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Regulation of Trade
Topic: Timeline, Costs and Support Documents
---
Time line Process Time Line 1 week (Approximately) Submission Time Line ?Submit request letter: Working days – Monday - Friday Counter open hours – 8.30 am to 4.15 pm Holidays – All Public and Mercantile Holidays Validity Time Line Not applicable for this service. Costs related to the service Cost The cost may vary depending on the measurement instrument. Fee The fees may vary depending on the measuring instrument. Penalties Not applicable for this service. Support documents required Support Documents are not necessary for this particular service. If previous Calibration Certificates have been obtained, appropriate to submit them.
question_en: What is the approximate process timeline for the calibration service, and during which days and hours can a request letter be submitted?
answer_en: The approximate process timeline for the calibration of weights, measures, and weighing or measuring instruments is 1 week. Request letters can be submitted on working days from Monday to Friday, between 8:30 am and 4:15 pm. The counter is closed on all Public and Mercantile Holidays.
question_ta: எடை, அளவீடுகள் மற்றும் எடை அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகளை அளவீடு செய்யும் சேவைக்கான தோராயமான செயல்முறை காலக்கெடு என்ன, மேலும் எந்த நாட்களில் மற்றும் நேரங்களில் ஒரு கோரிக்கை கடிதத்தை சமர்ப்பிக்க முடியும்?
answer_ta: எடை, அளவீடுகள் மற்றும் எடை அல்லது அளவிடும் கருவிகளை அளவீடு செய்வதற்கான தோராயமான செயல்முறை காலக்கெடு 1 வாரம் ஆகும். கோரிக்கை கடிதங்கள் திங்கள் முதல் வெள்ளி வரையிலான வேலை நாட்களில், காலை 8:30 மணி முதல் மாலை 4:15 மணி வரை சமர்ப்பிக்கலாம். அனைத்து பொது மற்றும் வர்த்தக விடுமுறை நாட்களிலும் சேவை மையம் மூடப்பட்டிருக்கும்.
question_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ කිරුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ ක්‍රමාංකනය කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා ආසන්න ක්‍රියාවලි කාලරාමුව කුමක්ද, සහ ඉල්ලීම් ලිපියක් ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකි දින සහ වේලාවන් මොනවාද?
answer_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ කිරුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ ක්‍රමාංකනය කිරීමේ සේවාව සඳහා ආසන්න ක්‍රියාවලි කාලරාමුව සති 1 කි. ඉල්ලීම් ලිපි සඳුදා සිට සිකුරාදා දක්වා වැඩ කරන දිනවල පෙ.ව. 8:30 සිට ප.ව. 4:15 දක්වා ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැක. සියලුම රජයේ සහ වෙළඳ නිවාඩු දිනවල කවුන්ටරය වසා ඇත.

context:
Service: Complaints on violation of the Act
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Regulation of Trade
Topic: Eligibility and Complaint Procedure (Part 1)
---
Eligibility Any person who has information or evidence about any other person - - In any place or area, by any means whatsoever, with direct or indirect, makes any false, incorrect or untrue declaration or statement as to the number, quantity, measure, gauge or weight of any goods or things in connection with their purchase, sale, weighing or measurement or in the computation of any charges for services rendered on the basis of weight or measure, or who sells, or causes to be sold or delivers or causes to be delivered to a purchaser anything by weight or measure short of the quantity demanded of or represented by the seller. -Who uses for the purpose of any trade or has in possession for use in any trade, any weight or measure or weighing or measuring instrument which is not correct. -May apply for this service as mentioned below

1 . Inform Department -The public can make complaints by letter, phone (0112588914), fax (0112597758) or visit the Director of the Department or an agent of the Government | Working Days Monday to Friday Working Hours 8.30 am to 4.15 pm
--- | ---
question_en: What are the ways in which the public can make a complaint regarding violations of the Act, and what are the working hours for this service?
answer_en: The public can make complaints by letter, phone (0112588914), fax (0112597758), or by visiting the Director of the Department or a Government agent. The service is available from Monday to Friday, 8:30 am to 4:15 pm.
question_ta: சட்ட மீறல்கள் குறித்து பொதுமக்கள் எவ்வாறு புகார்களை தெரிவிக்கலாம் மற்றும் இந்த சேவைக்கான பணி நேரம் என்ன?
answer_ta: பொதுமக்கள் கடிதம், தொலைபேசி (0112588914), தொலைநகல் (0112597758) மூலம் அல்லது திணைக்களத்தின் பணிப்பாளரையோ அல்லது அரசாங்க முகவரையோ நேரில் சென்று புகார்களை தெரிவிக்கலாம். இச்சேவை திங்கள் முதல் வெள்ளி வரை காலை 8:30 மணி முதல் மாலை 4:15 மணி வரை கிடைக்கும்.
question_si: පනත උල්ලංඝනය කිරීම් සම්බන්ධයෙන් මහජනතාවට පැමිණිලි ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකි ක්‍රම මොනවාද සහ මෙම සේවාව සඳහා වැඩ කරන වේලාවන් කවරේද?
answer_si: මහජනතාවට ලිපියක් මගින්, දුරකථනයෙන් (0112588914), ෆැක්ස් මගින් (0112597758) හෝ දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා හෝ රජයේ නියෝජිතයෙකු හමුවීමෙන් පැමිණිලි කළ හැකිය. මෙම සේවාව සඳුදා සිට සිකුරාදා දක්වා පෙ.ව. 8:30 සිට ප.ව. 4:15 දක්වා ලබා ගත හැක.

context:
Service: Sri Lanka Transport Board
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Transport Services
Topic: Overview and Functions of the Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB)
---
The SLTB was reconstituted by Sri Lanka Transport Board Act No 25 of 2005 and is the successor to the Ceylon Transport Board (1958-1978), Sri Lanka Central Transport Board and Regional Boards (1978-2005), Peoplized Transport Service (1990-1997) and the Regional Transport Companies (1997-2005).

Functions

- To provide an efficient passenger service by bus throughout the country, while competing with the private sector under regulated market conditions.
- To provide bus services for services of a socially necessary service for which specific subsides are provided by the regulator
- To become the market leader in the provision of qualitative bus transport services by improving in reliability and safety, customer care.
- To maintain designated bus terminals and to improve the services at such terminals for passenger benefit.
- To become financially efficient and independent to compete with private sector in the long term.
- To be available for deployment in emergency situations.
question_en: What is the Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB) and under which act was it reconstituted?
answer_en: The Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB) is the national public bus transport service, reconstituted by the Sri Lanka Transport Board Act No 25 of 2005.
question_ta: இலங்கை போக்குவரத்து சபை (SLTB) என்றால் என்ன, அது எந்தச் சட்டத்தின் கீழ் மறுசீரமைக்கப்பட்டது?
answer_ta: இலங்கை போக்குவரத்து சபை (SLTB) என்பது தேசிய பொதுப் பேருந்து போக்குவரத்து சேவையாகும், இது 2005 ஆம் ஆண்டின் 25 ஆம் இலக்க இலங்கை போக்குவரத்து சபை சட்டத்தின் கீழ் மறுசீரமைக்கப்பட்டது.
question_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකා ගමනාගමන මණ්ඩලය (SLTB) යනු කුමක්ද සහ එය කුමන පනතක් යටතේ ප්‍රතිසංවිධානය කරන ලද්දේද?
answer_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකා ගමනාගමන මණ්ඩලය (SLTB) යනු ජාතික පොදු බස් ප්‍රවාහන සේවාව වන අතර, එය 2005 අංක 25 දරණ ශ්‍රී ලංකා ගමනාගමන මණ්ඩල පනත මගින් ප්‍රතිසංවිධානය කරන ලදී.

question_ta: எடைகள், அளவுகள் மற்றும் கருவிகளை அளவீடு செய்வதற்கான கோரிக்கை கடிதம் யாருக்கு அனுப்பப்பட வேண்டும்?

question_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ උපකරණ ක්‍රමාංකනය කිරීම සඳහා වන ඉල්ලීම් ලිපිය ආමන්ත්‍රණය කළ යුත්තේ කාටද?
answer_si: බර, මිනුම් සහ කිරුම් හෝ මිනුම් උපකරණ ක්‍රමාංකනය කිරීම සඳහා වන ඉල්ලීම් ලිපිය දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයාට ආමන්ත්‍රණය කළ යුතුය.

context:
Service: Grant approval to set up incentivised Investment Projects
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Registrations - Industrial
Topic: Investment Approval Qualifications and Priority Sectors
---
Following qualifying criteria have to be satisfied by the investor for investing in Sri Lanka.

Under the Board of Investment Law No. 04 (BOI Law) of 1978 and its amendments, the BOI is the premier agency responsible for granting approval for Direct Foreign Investment, as well as Local Investment.

The Government of Sri Lanka has identified following nine (9) Priority Sectors to encourage setting up of [Investment Projects](https://gic.gov.lk/gic/index.php/en/component/info/?id=0&task=info&back=0&pid=1269) in Sri Lanka.

1. Tourism & Leisure 2. Knowledge Services 3. Agriculture 4. Infrastructure 5. Utilities 6. Education 7. Apparel 8. Manufacturing (except Apparel) 9. Regional Programmes and Export of Services

All sectors indicated above are open for foreign investment except for following four (4) sectors which are reserved for Sri Lankans.

1. Money lending 2. Pawn broking 3. Coastal fishing 4. Retail trade (with less than one million USD worth of capital)

5. Provision of security services including security management, assessment and consulting to individuals or private organizations
question_en: What is the primary agency responsible for granting approval for direct foreign investment and local investment in Sri Lanka?
answer_en: The Board of Investment (BOI) is the premier agency responsible for granting approval for Direct Foreign Investment, as well as Local Investment in Sri Lanka.
question_ta: இலங்கையில் நேரடி வெளிநாட்டு முதலீடு மற்றும் உள்ளூர் முதலீடுகளுக்கு ஒப்புதல் அளிக்கும் முதன்மை நிறுவனம் எது?
answer_ta: முதலீட்டுச் சபை (BOI) இலங்கையில் நேரடி வெளிநாட்டு முதலீடு மற்றும் உள்ளூர் முதலீடுகளுக்கு ஒப்புதல் அளிக்கும் முதன்மை நிறுவனமாகும்.
question_si: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ සෘජු විදේශ ආයෝජන සහ දේශීය ආයෝජන සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා දීමේ ප්‍රමුඛතම නියෝජිතායතනය කුමක්ද?
answer_si: ආයෝජන මණ්ඩලය (BOI) ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ සෘජු විදේශ ආයෝජන සහ දේශීය ආයෝජන සඳහා අනුමැතිය ලබා දීමේ ප්‍රමුඛතම නියෝජිතායතනයයි.

question_ta: எடைகள், அளவைகள், அளவீட்டுக் கருவிகளுக்கான மாதிரி ஒப்புதலைப் பெறுதல் சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பான செயல் இயக்குநர் யார்?
answer_ta: அளவீட்டு அலகுகள், தரநிலைகள் மற்றும் சேவைகள் திணைக்களத்தின் செயல் இயக்குநர் திரு. கே. பிரேமசிறி குமார இச்சேவைக்கு பொறுப்பாவார்.
question_si: බර, මිනුම්, මිනුම් උපකරණ සඳහා රටා අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම සේවාවට වගකිව යුතු වැඩබලන අධ්‍යක්ෂවරයා කවුද?
answer_si: මිනුම් ඒකක, ප්‍රමිති සහ සේවා දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ වැඩබලන අධ්‍යක්ෂ, කේ. ප්‍රේමසිරි කුමාර මහතා මෙම සේවාවට වගකිව යුතුයි.

context:
Service: Providing Bonds & Guarantees
Main Category: Trade, Business & Industry
Subcategory: Loans, Funds & Incentive Schemes
Topic: Background and Establishment of the Construction Guarantee Trust/Fund (CGF)
---
For several decades, Construction Contractors, particularly the small and medium scale Contractors were faced with a dilemma in complying with the regulations that require them to furnish Bonds and Guarantees for the purpose of Bidding and Executing Construction Contracts for both the State and Private Sector Organizations. Such a scenario was caused as Commercial Banks demand large cash margins or immovable property as Security/Collateral for providing the Construction Contractors with bonding facilities. Such margins or collateral ranged from 100-200% of the Bond value.

On representations made by the Industry in this regard, the Government in 1999 decided to set-up a Government Funded Organization to provide the required facilities to Construction Contractors against reasonable conditions. For this purpose Government allocated a grant of Rs.100.0 Million from the Budget. The secretary to the Treasury was entrusted to implement the proposal to established a trust and accordingly the declaration of trust was entered between the Secretary to the Treasury as settlor and bestowed powers to a Board of Trustees comprised from Government & Private sector for the proper execution and the Management of the Trust/Fund.

It was in this context that the Construction Guarantee Trust/Fund (CGF) was established in 1999 as an Independent Trust with autonomy. Accordingly, the Trust/Fund is presently administered by a Board of Trustees represented from the Government and Private Sectors, under the Chairmanship of the Secretary to the Ministry incharge of the subject of construction.
question_en: Why was the Construction Guarantee Trust/Fund (CGF) established, and when?
answer_en: The Construction Guarantee Trust/Fund (CGF) was established in 1999 by the Government to provide bonding facilities to Construction Contractors against reasonable conditions, as commercial banks demanded large cash margins or immovable property as security.
question_ta: கட்டுமான உத்தரவாத அறக்கட்டளை/நிதி (CGF) ஏன் மற்றும் எப்போது நிறுவப்பட்டது?
answer_ta: வணிக வங்கிகள் கட்டுமான ஒப்பந்தக்காரர்களிடமிருந்து பெரிய ரொக்கப் பண வரம்புகள் அல்லது அசையாச் சொத்துக்களைப் பாதுகாப்பாகக் கோரியதால், கட்டுமான ஒப்பந்தக்காரர்களுக்கு நியாயமான நிபந்தனைகளின் கீழ் பிணைப்பு வசதிகளை வழங்குவதற்காக, அரசாங்கத்தால் 1999 இல் கட்டுமான உத்தரவாத அறக்கட்டளை/நிதி (CGF) நிறுவப்பட்டது.
question_si: ඉදිකිරීම් ඇපකර භාරය/අරමුදල (CGF) පිහිටුවනු ලැබුවේ ඇයි සහ කවදාද?
answer_si: වාණිජ බැංකු ඉදිකිරීම් කොන්ත්‍රාත්කරුවන්ගෙන් විශාල මුදල් ආන්තික හෝ නිශ්චල දේපල ඇපකරයක් ලෙස ඉල්ලා සිටි බැවින්, සාධාරණ කොන්දේසි යටතේ බැඳීම් පහසුකම් සැපයීම සඳහා රජය විසින් 1999 දී ඉදිකිරීම් ඇපකර භාරය/අරමුදල (CGF) පිහිටුවන ලදී.
